story:
About this project

 The founder of Hop Step Jump, Chef Shashank Agtey, is an experienced Executive Chef who's had the pleasure of cooking for two Presidents. In addition to cooking, Shashank is a health and fitness expert as well as a culinary educator with a passion for healthy eating. Shashank began running 45 years ago and excelled in the sport. As a chef and athlete, he is dedicated to bringing the highest quality nutrition bars, with the best taste, straight to you.

Hop Step Jump carefully selected five key superfoods for optimal health and performance: Bee Pollen, Maca Powder, Chia Seeds, Cardamom, and Beet Powder.

Hop Step Jump combined ancient knowledge with modern science to formulate nutritional, great tasting products using the highest quality ingredients from around the world.

 Every Hop Step Jump bar is made from all natural, sustainable ingredients. It's our mission to strive for national excellence by improving the performance of a generation of people through better nutrition and teaching them how to live longer.

WE PROUDLY DONATE TO THE BUSIEST & BEST BEE EXPERTS IN THE BUSINESS!

THE UNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA’S HONEY BEE RESEARCH AND EXTENSION LAB

  Award-Winning Master Chef and Athlete, Shashank Agtey, has fused his love of cooking healthy, clean, nutritious food with his long-running interest in athletics and training by systematically creating a line of All-Natural, GMO-Free, Gluten-Free Energy Bars specifically designed to Supply, Sustain, and Refuel Energy for your workout.

An “All-American” athlete, Shashank began running over 45 years ago and excelled in the sport. He continues to exemplify a healthy lifestyle through regular participation in marathons all over South Florida. After years of eating energy bars, he decided it was time to create a set of nutritious energy bars with three extraordinarily phenomenal tastes. Each bar is specifically formulated to enhance the performance and experience of working out. The Hop bar supplies energy, the Step bar sustains energy, and the Jump bar refuels energy. 

 This is Shasank’s opportunity to show people what energy bars should taste like. They are made with the highest quality ingredients incorporating power ingredients and super foods such as Bee Pollen, Maca Powder, Chia Seeds, Cardamom, and more. There are no alcohol sugars in any of the bars and every ingredient is folded in - the bee pollen is not crushed, the almonds are whole, the chia seeds are whole, and so on. 

Hop Step Jump will use the funds to produce and manufacture the bars for a wholesale and retail basis targeting fitness, culinary, nutrition, and health food based national chains as well as local businesses. Hop Step Jump will be available on the website (www.HopStepJumpEnergyBars) for ecommerce sales. The brand would also sponsor athletic events and participate in running, obstacle course, and other sports/training related activities. 

Chef Shashank is an active participant in the South Florida area as an avid promoter for various charities. Keeping in line with the spirit of giving back, Hop Step Jump is currently partnered with the University of Florida’s Honey Bee Research & Extension Lab. Shashank plans for proceeds from Hop Step Jump sales to go directly to helping the honey bee, an integral part of our ecosystem that is currently in trouble. By giving back to UF’s HBREL, Hop Step Jump will help them aim to improve the health and productivity of honey bee colonies in Florida and globally by investing in research projects focusing on honey bee husbandry, ecology, behavior, and conservation.

Even if you can't support with funding, please share this page with your friends and family! Every like, share and follow would mean the world to us! Check out our website, Facebook page (Hop Step Jump Energy Bars), Twitter (@HopStepJumpBars), and Instagram (@HopStepJumpBars). 

Risks and challenges

1.) Costs are locked down - every penny counts and every little bit helps us reach our goal of improving the health and wellness of our world as well as improving the health of the honey bee population.

2.) Quality Control - Hop Step Jump prides itself on providing the freshest, highest quality ingredients. However, with that comes a high cost to import some of our products directly from the countries that produce the best quality ingredient available.

3.) We have shipping and strong lines of distribution in place, portion of funds will go to making this a reality.

4.) Lastly, we are solely dedicated to this project. We have all eyes and our full commitment to making this Energy Bar System work successfully.

Powered by: Sidewalk Chef, visit www.sidewalkchef.com

story: Providing 300 diagnostic MRI scans for those who really need them. High tech open MRI system for accurate diagnosis to aid management of diseases. Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) scans are excellent means of imaging the human body in great detail. Ghana has one MRI scanner for every 2.4 million persons. This current drive seeks to raise funds to raise $45,000.00 to perform 300 free MRI scans over the next 4 months for patients who need them but cannot afford to have them.  Your donation will ensure that a needy child, man or woman will have access to this cutting edge technology and hopefully make a difference in their medical care.

story:
"Medicine is an A and B conversation; you can C your way out." 
A = Patient        B = Provider
C = government, pharmaceutical companies, insurance companies, hospitals, unreasonable social expectations, medical education costs, employers, lawyers, documentation/HIPAA requirements...

As an adult & child psychiatrist from deep in East Texas, I'm pissed that we have a system that allows non-clinical forces to come between me and my patients.  I need your help to fundamentally change American healthcare access and delivery.

We have the opportunity to create universal healthcare for every person in the United States.

Introducing PSYCH:  Practical Solutions Yielding Comprehensive Healthcare

I built PSYCH to be democracy in action; it's based on the best of American ideals:  freedom of choice, responsible capitalism, personal responsibility, and quality through competition.  PSYCH provides universal access to affordable healthcare to every person, regardless of age, employment, sexual orientation, gender identity, location, mental health, military experience, and citizenship.  PSYCH promotes mind and body wellness from the cradle to the grave.

And I think it's nifty that the acronym that will revolutionize American healthcare coincides with my beloved profession.  ;-)

The basics of PSYCH have already been published on my website:  www.changehealth.today and there is a Twitter handle under the same name.  This Indiegogo campaign is to raise money to create a fantastic whiteboard animation video that succinctly and creatively conveys the major parts of PSYCH in a visually engaging format that we can use as part of a larger marketing campaign that targets Congresspeople, state representatives, and our general citizenry.

What do you have to lose by investing in a new universal healthcare paradigm?

Our inefficient and unfair healthcare delivery system does not favor the patient (i.e. you will be a patient at some point in your life.)  It behooves us to build a better system. I hope that every person that's ever experienced a delay in care, expensive premium, loss of policy, confusing EOB (explanation of benefits), delay at the pharmacy, confusion of prior authorization, denial of healthcare claim, COBRA, or poor access to prior health records will donate towards this first step.

[Future plans for marketing/exposure include postcard mailings to Congress, video/entries for TED talks, mass mailings to colleges and universities, and a social media blitz unlike the world has ever seen.]

The biggest challenge to PSYCH is systemic learned helplessness. Every single person that I've talked to (patient and provider) wants a better system. Yet, they feel helpless against big lobbies and businesses who purposefully obfuscate the system in their favor (not yours.) 

In the event we are short of funding, I will continue to push forward with financially supporting this dream through personal funding. As an early career psychiatrist with $150,000 of student loan debt to repay, I acutely feel the pain of our broken system. So exercise your right to create good healthcare; doctor's orders. :D

story:
Our Story: A Patient’s Journey Focused on Driving Change for Others

Hello! We are Carevena, a mobile health technology startup, and I’m its founder, Caleb. This journey started with Psoriasis, a chronic autoimmune disease, effecting over 7.5 million in the US, of which I’m a patient. Psoriasis is a condition where the immune system attacks the skin, organs, and joints often producing red patches, inflammation, and chronic pain.

 

In my instance, I was diagnosed and placed on chemo drugs, immunosuppressants, and a number of other nasty medications to bring it under control. At the time, 80% of my body was covered. Eventually, that cleared up and now, ten years and ten different medications later, I find myself here.

 

Being a designer with a chronic condition I had to ask, “How might design play a role in supporting those with chronic conditions like psoriasis?”. To explore the question further, I not only looked at my own story, but spent three years talking to other patients about their experiences, their challenges, and what they saw as gaps and opportunities. I started Carevena as a direct outcome to this as a desire to better empower those with chronic conditions to track and manage their care and more effectively share their story with their medical provider.

 

 

We assembled a team and began co-creating prototypes with patients and doctors to define, design, and develop a tool that would work for both. We arrived at our first solution, Dermitrax, as the patient enabling tool.

 

But What does it Do?

 

Join With Us

Margaret Mead once said, “Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.” This journey we are on is a long one and not a simple one. Your help, support, and drive can impact us in many valuable ways, and it is our hope you will take that leap.

 

Our goal is to raise $40,000.00 that will be used across three phases to ultimately arrive at an application solution that creates empowerment and ownership of a lifelong condition. Phase one: develop our beta tool and further test and iterate to gather more data. Phase two: begin defining the key requirements and regulation challenges for a secure, Health Information Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) compliant integration. Phase three: work with a collaborating medical staff to prototype and conceptualize our doctor dashboard.

 

We have a plan for success. We have started the work and established a network of medical professionals who are eager to see this succeed. Now, we need you. You can support our endeavor of patient empowerment in key fundamental ways.

 

Our Team

 

The WHY

Simon Sinek famously said in his TEDx Talk, “People don’t buy what you do, they buy why you do it.” Our WHY is simple, we believe that design can play a central role in changing the lives of those with chronic conditions to live better, longer lives.

 

This effort started out focused on psoriasis, but as we spoke with patients, caregivers, advocates, and doctors we realized that it’s much bigger than that. While an estimated 7.5 million Americans (National Psoriasis Foundation) live with psoriasis, there are more than 40 million people who live with skin or cancer related conditions. According to the American Cancer Society, an estimated 87,000 will be diagnosed with some form of cancerous melanoma on their skin with 1 in 5 adults developing it.

 

Your support is going to have direct impact on how those patients manage care and conditions by giving them the complete transformation and experiencing of life.

 

Key Risks & Key Challenges

 

What if We don’t Succeed?

 

That’s okay. Whatever we do raise will go directly to achieving our Phase 1 goals and further working on Dermitrax. If at first you don’t succeed, try, try (and try!) again. Our team will persist and we will endeavor to find a way to finish the development of the patient-focused application while re-defining our timeline for the larger challenges.

 

To Learn More Visit

Click the buttons below to learn more about Carevena, Dermitrax, and mobile health.

story:
Our Introduction

A Delicious Dessert, rich with healthy goodness is every dessert-lover’s ultimate fantasy. We @  Berrys present to you, a unique range of Organic, Non-GMO, Vegan Soy-Milk inspired dairy free ice-cream.

Compared to traditional dairy-based ice creams, our desserts are ‘Cholesterol-Lactose-Dairy-Gluten free’. We introduce this ‘One-of-the-Kind’ experience for you to enjoy without any apprehensions. The taste & mouth feel is even better compared with dairy based ice creams.

Join us, to enjoy the sweet taste of our success as ‘1st Indian Brand to introduce Soy-milk dairy free ice-cream’. With significant production cost-advantage of nearly 40%, this ‘low-cost high-quality’delicious dairy-free ice-cream, will be a Game-Changer in ice-cream world.

Entrepreneur’s Journey

Mr. Bhanu Murthy  Gona , Founder of Berrys (M/S. Gona Creamlines) hails from rural background. He began his career as an employee and went on to become an aspiring entrepreneur in 2000, by establishing his own company with a small investment. Today, the 2000 sq.mts facility (at Industrial Development Area, Hyderabad) produces 24,000 litres of dairy-based ice-creams per day in 54 flavours & 32 novelties and giving livelihood for 600 people.

Concept Brief

Our aim is to delight Health-conscious, Lactose-intolerant group with a unique dessert. To address their liking, we introduce to you Berrys Organic Soy-Milk based dairy free ice-cream.  The Brain-child of Mr . Bhanu Murthy Gona, this new variety of delicacy is produced using low-cost Eco-friendly technology.

Here, Mr. Gona is directly addressing you, about our motto;

‘Dear Indiegogo Project Motivators, 

Being an Agro-industrialist with an Agrarian background, I strongly advocate improving farmer’s socio-economic status is important. Thereby, I have created a ‘Buy-Back organic Contract Farming’ model using traditional NON-GMO soy seeds.

The entire ‘Harvesting-Processing-Manufacturing’ process is 100% Eco-friendly and supports Go-Green concept. Since, Soy crop requires minimal water resources, we also have the benefit of  ‘preserve & conserve natural resources’ policy to support future generations within our capacity.

At this juncture, I am happy to inform you, that, I received a Certificate as ‘Regional Eco-Business Ambassador, Eco-preneur Club’ instituted by BYST from   Honorable HRH Prince Charles, The Prince of Wales, in the category of ‘Best Innovation and Efforts for introducing new technology.’

Proposal to back us

We have completed R&D and tested a couple of product samples. Having received positive feedback from our review group, we are geared up to start commercial manufacturing of this Organic, Non-GMO, Vegan & Cholesterol,Lactose,Gluten-free Low-fat High-protein content Soy Milk Based Dairy-free ice-cream Now, we will walk you through, the concept materialization through Organic Farming, Eco-friendly Production & Manufacturing. Our business mantra being ‘Organic Food Lifestyle’ our approach is 100% Eco-friendly (i,e)

  • Selection of A-grade premium quality traditional Organic soy-seeds & Ingredients.
  • Usage of 100% natural bio-degradable bio compost & fertilizers.
  • Eco-friendly and organic method of extraction of Soy-milk. 
  • Eco-friendly processing of soy milk into dessert and extract into cookies.

Organic Farming

  • We follow ‘Buy-Back agreement model’ via contract farming (I,e we provide all raw materials, machinery and transport facilities to farmers, required from sowing seeds to reaping crops) to ensure the quality of crops produced.
  • We will provide premium quality Soy seeds (100% organic, traditional and specific Soy variety) to the farmers
  • Usage of bio-compost (to nullify usage of chemicals and fertilizers) to grow crops for duration of 4-months
  • Under the supervision of Company Field Officers (who offer technical support & advise) the farmers will be assisted to produce maximum crop-yield.

Eco-Processing & Eco-Friendly Production

Using Eco-friendly technology (To avoid noise, air, water pollution levels, nullify bacteria formation) Soy seeds are processed to extract soy-milk and soy-extract. The Soy milk is converted into ice-cream and soy extract (which is rich in high proteins) is baked into soy-cookies. This way, there is zero percent waste-age.

All the ingredients used to make the dessert (Soy Skimmed Milk Powder, Sugar, Flavors, Emulsifiers, Stabilizers and Colors) are 100% organic. Stabilizers are derived from organic Guar Gum seeds, are processed into powder. Also, organic sugar is used in the mixture, contributes to healthy body and also has Eco-friendly properties.

Ingredients:

Soy Milk: Organic & Non-GMO soy beans processed milk with high Protein

Fat: Eco friendly processing of Soy Oil Trans Fat.

SSMP: Bio nutrient rich spray dried from whole Organic & Non-GMO Soy Milk and processed in house.

Sugar: Naturally processed organic sugar procured from the best and certified organic sugar manufacturers.

Emulsifier: Processed from partial Hydrolosis of Fats of Veg Origin

Stabilizer: Organically grown Guar seeds processed inhouse.

Color: Collected and processed from Organic Pigments

Flavours: Organically grown Vanillian pod extracts, natural Fruit & herb based flavours.

Health Benefits

  • 100% Organic & Non-GMO, Gluten free Seeds-Natural & Traditional seeds, Zero toxins, No pesticides or chemicals used
  • Zero-Cholesterol & Obesity - For 90% of population, who are worried about weight-gain and cholesterol, our desserts have low fat content, which means it can be consumed without any hesitation.
  • 100% Vegan-Since, it is a dairy free ice-cream, it's a revelation to vegan population.
  • Lactose Free-For people allergic to lactose, this scoop of dessert is a delicious treat
  • Eco-friendly processing and manufacturing-We believe in ‘Go Green’ concept, to leave positive impact on Earth.



Target

Bonus

Goals

$72,000

  Nil

Production - 150  ltrs / hour

Cost advantage - 40% compared to dairy ice cream

Employment Opportunity - 36 & 100 Farmers

Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 100 hectors

$100,000

New flavours discovered in our R& D for 2 years

2 Flavours of cookies

Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients

Production - 200  ltrs / hour

Cost advantage - 41% compared to dairy ice cream

Employment Opportunity - 48 & 225 Farmers

Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 225 hectors

$250,000

New flavours discovered in our R& D for 3 years

3 Flavours of cookies & 3 Flavours Soy dairy free ice cream

Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients

Production - 500  ltrs / hour

Cost advantage - 43% compared to dairy ice cream

Employment Opportunity - 120 & 500 Farmers

Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 500 hectors

$500,000

New flavours discovered in our R& D for 4 years

4 Flavours of cookies & 4 Flavours Soy dairy free ice cream

Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients

Production - 1000  ltrs / hour

Cost advantage - 45% compared to dairy ice cream

Employment Opportunity - 174 & 1000 Farmers

Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 1000 hectors

$750,000

New flavours discovered in our R& D for 5 years

5 Flavours of cookies & 5 Flavours Soy dairy free ice cream

Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients

Production - 2000  ltrs / hour

Cost advantage - 47% compared to dairy ice cream

Employment Opportunity - 224 & 2500 Farmers

Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 2500 hectors

$1,000,000

New flavours discovered in our R&D for 6 years

6 Flavours of cookies & 6 Flavours Soy dairy free ice cream

Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients

Production - 5000  ltrs / hour

Cost advantage - 50% compared to dairy ice cream

Employment Opportunity - 315 & 5750 Farmers

Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 5750 hectors


Testing and Certification

We strongly adhere to Indian Food Safety Standards. Our laboratory follows the necessary procedures ‘for Testing & Quality Check’ to test the raw material. Once approved, the raw material is sent for production & manufacturing of ice-cream.

Risks & Challenges

  • Farmers Education: Educating a farmer to grow organic crop is an hectic task
  • Agriculture Land:  Soil nature and strength will be checked. Soil-testing will be done to nullify any risks of soil-related issues with necessary measures by fertilizing the soil with 100% natural fertilizers.
  • Climate: It could be biggest risk factor and challenging to our timeline. 
  • R&D & Inspection of ‘Lab, Facility and Product’: As the dessert has high protein content, there is high risk of perishability given the timeline schedule. 
  • Organic flavors/Colors-To purchase the necessary materials of premium quality is critical
  • Transport/storage: It is a definite risk (given it's an ice-cream) and challenge to store and transport.
  • Marketing Campaign: To generate public interest through campaign (Time consuming process) and pull the crowd can be a challenge.

Why are we using Indiegogo?

Indiegogo is one of the most encouraging platform to pitch our business concept. The history of success ratio has motivated us. With a strong hope that backers would support our dream project, we present our business idea.

Your support means everything!

We are keeping our fingers crossed, Hope you’ll help us achieve 1st production run a reality! We are just one-click away to hear what you think of our project!
story_txt:
Our Introduction
A Delicious Dessert, rich with healthy goodness is every dessert-lover’s ultimate fantasy. We @  Berrys present to you, a unique range of Organic, Non-GMO, Vegan Soy-Milk inspired dairy free ice-cream.
Compared to traditional dairy-based ice creams, our desserts are ‘Cholesterol-Lactose-Dairy-Gluten free’. We introduce this ‘One-of-the-Kind’ experience for you to enjoy without any apprehensions. The taste & mouth feel is even better compared with dairy based ice creams.
Join us, to enjoy the sweet taste of our success as ‘1st Indian Brand to introduce Soy-milk dairy free ice-cream’. With significant production cost-advantage of nearly 40%, this ‘low-cost high-quality’delicious dairy-free ice-cream, will be a Game-Changer in ice-cream world.


Entrepreneur’s Journey
Mr. Bhanu Murthy  Gona , Founder of Berrys (M/S. Gona Creamlines) hails from rural background. He began his career as an employee and went on to become an aspiring entrepreneur in 2000, by establishing his own company with a small investment. Today, the 2000 sq.mts facility (at Industrial Development Area, Hyderabad) produces 24,000 litres of dairy-based ice-creams per day in 54 flavours & 32 novelties and giving livelihood for 600 people.



Concept Brief
Our aim is to delight Health-conscious,
    Lactose-intolerant group with a unique dessert. To address their liking, we
    introduce to you Berrys Organic Soy-Milk based dairy free ice-cream.  The Brain-child of Mr . Bhanu Murthy Gona, this
    new variety of delicacy is produced using low-cost Eco-friendly technology.
Here, Mr. Gona is directly addressing you, about our motto;
‘Dear Indiegogo Project Motivators,  
Being an Agro-industrialist with an Agrarian background, I strongly advocate improving farmer’s socio-economic status is important. Thereby, I have created a ‘Buy-Back organic Contract Farming’ model using traditional NON-GMO soy seeds.
  
The entire ‘Harvesting-Processing-Manufacturing’ process is 100% Eco-friendly and supports Go-Green concept. Since, Soy crop requires minimal water resources, we also have the benefit of  ‘preserve & conserve natural resources’ policy to support future generations within our capacity.
At this juncture, I am happy to inform you, that, I received a Certificate as ‘Regional Eco-Business Ambassador, Eco-preneur Club’ instituted by BYST from   Honorable HRH Prince Charles, The Prince of Wales, in the category of ‘Best Innovation and Efforts for introducing new technology.’



Proposal to back us
We have completed R&D and tested a couple of product samples. Having received positive feedback from our review group, we are geared up to start commercial manufacturing of this Organic, Non-GMO, Vegan & Cholesterol,Lactose,Gluten-free Low-fat High-protein content Soy Milk Based Dairy-free ice-cream Now, we will walk you through, the concept materialization through Organic Farming, Eco-friendly Production & Manufacturing. Our business mantra being ‘Organic Food Lifestyle’ our approach is 100% Eco-friendly (i,e)


Selection of A-grade premium quality traditional Organic soy-seeds & Ingredients. 
Usage of 100% natural bio-degradable bio compost & fertilizers. 
Eco-friendly and organic method of extraction of Soy-milk.  
Eco-friendly processing of soy milk into dessert and extract into cookies. 



Organic Farming

 We follow ‘Buy-Back agreement model’ via contract farming (I,e we provide all raw materials, machinery and transport facilities to farmers, required from sowing seeds to reaping crops) to ensure the quality of crops produced. 
 We will provide premium quality Soy seeds (100% organic, traditional and specific Soy variety) to the farmers

 Usage of bio-compost (to nullify usage of chemicals and fertilizers) to grow crops for duration of 4-months 
 Under the supervision of Company Field Officers (who offer technical support & advise) the farmers will be assisted to produce maximum crop-yield. 



Eco-Processing & Eco-Friendly Production
Using Eco-friendly technology (To avoid noise, air, water pollution levels, nullify bacteria formation) Soy seeds are processed to extract soy-milk and soy-extract. The Soy milk is converted into ice-cream and soy extract (which is rich in high proteins) is baked into soy-cookies. This way, there is zero percent waste-age. 
All the ingredients used to make the dessert (Soy Skimmed Milk Powder, Sugar, Flavors, Emulsifiers, Stabilizers and Colors) are 100% organic. Stabilizers are derived from organic Guar Gum seeds, are processed into powder. Also, organic sugar is used in the mixture, contributes to healthy body and also has Eco-friendly properties.



Ingredients:
Soy Milk: Organic & Non-GMO soy beans processed milk with high Protein
Fat: Eco friendly processing of Soy Oil Trans Fat.
SSMP: Bio nutrient rich spray dried from whole Organic & Non-GMO Soy Milk and processed in house.
Sugar: Naturally processed organic sugar procured from the best and certified organic sugar manufacturers.
Emulsifier: Processed from partial Hydrolosis of Fats of Veg Origin
Stabilizer: Organically grown Guar seeds processed inhouse.
Color: Collected and processed from Organic Pigments
Flavours: Organically grown Vanillian pod extracts, natural Fruit & herb based flavours.


Health Benefits

 100% Organic & Non-GMO, Gluten free Seeds-Natural & Traditional seeds, Zero toxins, No pesticides or chemicals used

 Zero-Cholesterol & Obesity - For 90% of population, who are worried about weight-gain and cholesterol, our desserts have low fat content, which means it can be consumed without any hesitation.
100% Vegan-Since, it is a dairy free ice-cream, it's a revelation to vegan population.

 Lactose Free-For people allergic to lactose, this scoop of dessert is a delicious treat

 Eco-friendly processing and manufacturing-We believe in ‘Go Green’ concept, to leave positive impact on Earth.















Target


Bonus


Goals




$72,000


  Nil


Production - 150  ltrs / hour
Cost advantage - 40% compared to dairy
  ice cream
Employment Opportunity - 36 & 100 Farmers
Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement
   - 100 hectors 




$100,000


New
  flavours discovered in our R& D for 2 years
2 Flavours of cookies
Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients


Production - 200  ltrs / hour
Cost advantage - 41% compared to dairy
  ice cream
Employment Opportunity - 48 & 225 Farmers
Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 225 hectors




$250,000


New
  flavours discovered in our R& D for 3 years
3 Flavours of cookies & 3 Flavours
  Soy dairy free ice cream
Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients


Production - 500  ltrs / hour
Cost advantage - 43% compared to dairy
  ice cream
Employment Opportunity - 120 & 500
  Farmers
Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 500 hectors




$500,000

  flavours discovered in our R& D for 4 years
4 Flavours of cookies & 4 Flavours
  Soy dairy free ice cream
Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients


Production - 1000  ltrs / hour
Cost advantage - 45% compared to dairy
  ice cream

  Farmers

5 Flavours of cookies & 5 Flavours
  Soy dairy free ice cream
Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients

Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 2500 hectors

  flavours discovered in our R&D for 6 years
6 Flavours of cookies & 6 Flavours
  Soy dairy free ice cream
Homemade recipes with sample  ingredients


Production - 5000  ltrs / hour
Cost advantage - 50% compared to dairy
  ice cream
Employment Opportunity - 315 & 5750
  Farmers
Organic Soy Farming using buy back agreement  - 5750 hectors





Testing and Certification
  We strongly adhere to Indian Food Safety Standards. Our laboratory follows the necessary procedures ‘for Testing & Quality Check’ to test the raw material. Once approved, the raw material is sent for production & manufacturing of ice-cream.


Risks & Challenges

Farmers Education: Educating a farmer to grow organic crop is an hectic task
 Agriculture Land:  Soil nature and strength will be checked. Soil-testing will be done to nullify any risks of soil-related issues with necessary measures by fertilizing the soil with 100% natural fertilizers.

 Climate: It could be biggest risk factor and challenging to our timeline. 

 R&D & Inspection of ‘Lab, Facility and Product’: As the dessert has high protein content, there is high risk of perishability given the timeline schedule. 

 Organic flavors/Colors-To purchase the necessary materials of premium quality is critical

 Transport/storage: It is a definite risk (given it's an ice-cream) and challenge to store and transport.

 Marketing Campaign: To generate public interest through campaign (Time consuming process) and pull the crowd can be a challenge.




Why are we using Indiegogo?
Indiegogo is one of the most encouraging platform to pitch our business concept. The history of success ratio has motivated us. With a strong hope that backers would support our dream project, we present our business idea.
Your support means everything!
We are keeping our fingers crossed, Hope you’ll help us achieve 1st production run a reality! We are just one-click away to hear what you think of our project!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Philipp and im currently developing a file compression utility called "BulkZip", located @ http://www.bulkzip.com. I'm a certified Project Manager with an academic background in technology and economics. 

I'm currently working fulltime in a niche that has been, for the last 10 years, deemed non-innovative, over-saturated and flooded by masses of free competition that is sometimes even better than the paid one. It can't get any worse but i like a challenge. Aside from this, i am working on a simplified Theory of Everything - Both have lots of math and logic, i like that stuff. 

I want to be able to continously focus on the development of the product. It has recently achieved a stable and reliable build and received a couple of thumbs up here and there. We did some giveaways at sharewareonsale.com and giveawayofhteday.com. It's free to download and you can check it out yourself right now @ http://download.bulkzip.com (7MB, 32Bit/64Bit).

There is also a full product data sheet available @ http://www.bulkzip.com/pdf/product_sheet.pdf describing, what is existing already. I think its good to show you that me and my team get things done and accomplished.

Behind the project is the drive for perfection.  I was also very dissatsified with the existing products and came to project my own solution towards an optimum file compression and archiving tool. Here is a small video on BulkZip:


... and here are some screenshots:


The Plan

With the money raised, i want to extend BulkZip in a way, that it is not only stronger in the horizontal (=support of more file formats), but also in the vertical (=compression related features). 

Extend it in the horizontal

I want to add first and foremost read/extract support for around ~55 exotic formats. We already support the extraction of 35 file formats and would then support in total a stunning 90 file formats - something no archiver ever managed to do. PeaZip claims to support 150+ formats, but that is a vastly inflated number as they count reading Microsoft Word files and others that are not really compressors in a more closer sense. They also count extensions double, e.g. GZ and TAR.GZ; so their claim is not serious. I'am serious about that file format support. My aim is to effectivly abolish all these other archivers like WinRAR, 7Zip and WinZip and to create that one very tailored tool that has it all and that everybody deems the best software in the niche. These 55 "new" formats are mainly old, exotic and cross-application file types like Amiga, ROM/Chip Formats, CD/DVD formats coming from thr MS-DOS era, are System/Disk Drive related or from the old Usenet days. It's not easy to implement them, as many are nearly dead or specialist for them are very rare. We have a sophisticated C# interface that allows us quick and easy integration of a format once we have access to a source or command line tool. It is nearly independent on the initial coding language. In terms of copyright, proprietary format holders are required by EU and US law to give way to the distribution of a limited access solution for their file format. That covers exactly what we want to do (Read/Extract). 
We did research on the top 30 file archivers and compressors (WinRAR, BandiZip, IZArc, WinZip etc.) and figured that eventually each of them supports 1-3 of these exotic formats, but none does all. We want to make it easy and that a user can access every file, no matter how rare its type is:

  • .A (Unix Archive)
  • .ALZ (AlZip's format)
  • .ADF / .ADZ (Amiga Disk File)
  • .ARCHIVER
  • .APK (Android Package)
  • .APM
  • .B1 (B1 Free Archiver)
  • .BALZ
  • .B64 (Base 64 MIME)
  • .BH (BlackHole Format)
  • .BZA
  • .CB7 / .CBA / .CBR / .CBT / .CBZ
  • .C2D (CD Image)
  • .CDI (CD/DVD Format)
  • .CFS (Compact File Set )
  • .CPIO (Linux)
  • .CPT (Compact Pro)
  • .DAR (Disk Archiver)
  • .DD (Disc Doubler)
  • .DCS (Amiga Format)
  • .DGC (2001 Japanese Format)
  • .DEB (Linux/Debian Package)
  • .DMS (Amiga Format)
  • .ENC
  • .EGG (ALZIP's own format)
  • .F (Amiga Format)
  • .FAT (System related)
  • .GCA
  • .GZA
  • .HQX (Binhex)
  • .HKI (WinHKI Format)
  • .HA
  • .HFS
  • .HXS
  • .J2J
  • .KGB (KGB Archiver's format)
  • .KMZ (Google Earth Archive)
  • .IZE
  • .IMP (DVD)
  • .IPA (Apple iOS)
  • .ISZ (Disk Image)
  • .ICE
  • .LBR (1980's Unix Archiving)
  • .LCD
  • .LZO (Liv-Zempel-Oberhumer)
  • .LZX (Amiga Format)
  • .MBF
  • .MBR (System related)
  • .MDF (DVD)
  • .MIM
  • .MSI (Installer)
  • .MSLZ
  • .NTFS (System related)
  • .NRG (Disc Image)
  • .NSIS (Installer)
  • .PAK
  • .PAX
  • .PDI (Disc Image)
  • .PEA (PeaZip's format)
  • .PK1/2/3 (Quake Archive)
  • .PKD (Amiga PackDev)
  • .PMA
  • .RPM (Linux Redhat Package)
  • .SIT/.SITX (StuffIt's format)
  • .SQX
  • .SquashFS (ROM writing)
  • .UDF (CD/DVD Format)
  • .UU
  • .VHD (Virtual HardDisk)
  • .XMS (Amiga xMash)
  • .XPI (Mozilla Archive)
  • .XAR (eXtensible ARchive format)
  • .XXE
  • .YZ1 (Popular in asia around 1990)
  • .ZOO (1990's era format)
  • .ZOM (Amiga Zoom)


Extend it in the vertical

The Features we want to implement: 
In addition to that, we want to add the most useful and requested file archiver features. We've scouted, as mentioned above, the competition very intense. As a result of this, our product backlog is now filled with these:
  • Benchmark (As seen in 7z) 
  • Search in Archive(s) (As seen in IZArc)
  • Multi Extraction Tool (As seen in PowerArchiver)
  • Batch Compress Tool (As seen in PowerArchiver)
  • Advanced Report (As seen in WinRAR)
  • Re-compression (As seen in FreeArc)
  • Advanced Error Reporting (We want to achieve a 100% error free product)
  • Left-Side File Browser/Dual-Panel
  • In-App Tabs (As seen with RK Archiver)
To not impend any patents or violate copyrights, we would orientate on the existing solutions, but integrate them in a way, that its after all better done as in their original.

Internal & Technical Stuff:
  • Improved and format tailored file sorting for faster compression/decompression
Take a look at this video to understand the impact of file sorting:

  • Normalization Phase before Compression
  • Process Priority Selector (As seen with WinAce)
  • Select/De-Select by Type (As seen with 7z)
  • Background & Pause Option (As seen with 7z)
  • Updated Extraction and Compression Interface
  • Precise Prognosis (As seen with WinRAR)
  • Multi-Core Support
Here's a partial view on the planned roadmap so far:


The Impact

In the long run we want to build a well balanced product that is regarded as "the best" in multiple criteria regarding speed, strength, usability and feature density. We want that the recognition of the saying "to RAR" or "to ZIP" something, gets slowly associated with our tool. It's not impossible, but it will take at least a few years from now on. If we get the proper funding (we do not require that much) we will  make it happen.


Risks & Challenges

We have the typical risk of software development: Incompatibilities, need for reverse engineering, bugs, bugs, bugs. Currently the challenge is money to buy food and pay for shelter. There is a likelyhood that we might completely fail, but that is eventually in everything there is.


Other Ways You Can Help

Download our software and use it. We build it for you!

story:
“It’s either you or it’s not”

If it’s you then you must be able to proceed without further ado and without the need of any other form of identification or proxy devices

If someone else attempts to impersonate you than the security system must recognize that the impostor is not you, ergo access must be denied.

The problem:

The wholesale identity theft of personal information and criminal impersonation is as rampant as ever in spite of the introduction of new protective measures and the cost of managing risk and defending against ID theft is spiraling out of control.

Our solution:

Your smart phone will recognize its master. As long as you are facing your smartphone it will concurrently verify you as the master. If you lose it or hand it over to another person or someone else take it away from you it will lock up until it sees  its master again.

Project iDentifyME™
Your smartphone became such a representation of who and what you are it is becoming essential that the device must recognize you and only you as the master to keep the contents confidential and for your eyes only.

Current security features addressing the security issue by controlling who signs in but does not limits who is accessing the contents afterwards. Our progressive approach is to continuously observe your presence facing your device by observing a series of your biometric signature to make sure it you and not an impostor. 

Technically speaking this software will autonomously collect and evaluate a torrent of biometric characteristic of the subject person. Unlike currently prevailing, passive non-biometric and biometric approaches our method is live dynamic observation of the subject person autonomously and continuously. Autonomously simply means without user entering a password, touch a sensor, present a card or other proxy devices and continuous refers to a mechanism progressively and perpetually authenticating a person during the course of a transaction. 

This approach offers inherent benefits that are extremely critical to any situation where it is important to make sure that the persons are who they claim to be. 

The proposal:
The plan is to develop an embodiment of the concept and subsequent development of a biometric software system, in two phases, that captures  biometric signature to positively identify individuals while stationary or on the move from near or a distance.

  • Currently available solutions are already proven to be ineffective and error prone. False identification can be a detrimental affect on a person's life.
  •  As we see it the demand for a solution is solidly established worldwide and there is an opportunity to fill a longstanding void in the security, access authentication, and person identification market space.
  • Upon deployment it will represent a giant leap from current prevailing methods in non-biometric and biometric identification technology.
  • This market is mature, clearly defined, yet wide open and ready to engage with a solution that offers true security and confidentiality.

The concept is based on employing a video imaging device (video camera) to obtain multiple biometric characteristics of the subject person’s body and face by scanning the images rapidly, progressively and continuously while the subject person is in the range of the video imaging device. The concurrent scanning is resulting in a preponderance of cumulative data to evidentiate the true identity of the subject person.

This system will be applicable for personal use on their devices and enterprises dealing with any sort of identity and access management for their users, staff or customers. There are quite a few approaches available for authenticating users or controlling their access to services and resources. These include non-biometric approaches like usernames and passwords, access cards, fingerprints (relatively new in this space but has been the norm for lawful investigations) and some other newer challenging biometric technologies. It doesn’t take us too much courage to say that we understand the incompetence of the non-biometric approaches and we succeeded to overcome the challenges with biometrics.

We believe that within a few years after iDentifyME™ goes live, it will become the De-Facto user identification and authentication system across industries and the world.

Challenges
 in the recently emerging biometric ID methods are dealing with technical and implementation issues. Some of these concerns are related to the usability of the biometric technology, especially by people with disabilities or characteristics different from the perceived norm. Other concerns relate to broader issues of personal privacy and identity theft. 

Operational and performance Characteristics sought
The concurrent scanning of multiple biometric characteristics will result in a preponderance of cumulative data to identify & authenticate the subject person. 

Technical approach:
The concept is based on employing a video imaging device to obtain the biometric characteristics while the subject person is in the range of the video imaging device.

The Tasks:
1.  In order to proof the concept and evaluate the feasibility and scaling, numerous currently available certified best of breed biometric technologies will be evaluated and a list of probable collaborator companies will be compiled. Specifically face detection and recognition, mood and alertness through facial expression, iris pattern recognition from long distance, life detection through the eye and facial temperature, gait and motion analysis are of specific interest to the project. 

2.  Research emerging technologies, analyze and categorize the vendors and the potential relevant offerings on each respective fields of biometrics. Acquire and evaluate samples exploring their abilities and willingness to become a collaborative partner in the project. Estimate cost and timeline to develop a viable product and related cost of future maintenance and upgrades within an estimated product life cycle and consequently develop a “Blueprint” and Scrum development timeline.

The anticipated impact
The impact of iDentifyME™ on how people will interact with technology will be profound and will permanently alter our symbiotic relationship with our digital self (identity).

iDentifyME™ will replace passwords, ID cards, smart cards, pins, tokens and various proxy devices that require user manuals and instructions on how to proceed with self identification.

In the future individuals signing on to their bank account or entering into a secure environment will be as simple as just showing up and be present during the transaction.

Use of funds in current phase 1:

Create a workable and demonstrable proof of concept and feasibility for the industry, government agencies and personal use in smartphones. Develop a plan to secure the next stage, phase 2 of financing a full scale development to bring iDentifyME to market worldwide.
story_txt:
“It’s
 either you or it’s not”
If it’s you then you must be able
 to proceed without further ado and without the need of any other form of
 identification or proxy devices
If
someone else attempts to impersonate you than the security system must recognize
that the impostor is not you, ergo access must be denied.The problem:The wholesale identity theft of personal information and criminal impersonation is as rampant as
ever in spite of the introduction of new protective measures and the cost of
managing risk and defending against ID theft is spiraling out of control.Our solution:Your smart phone will recognize its master. As long as you are facing your smartphone it will concurrently verify you as the master. If you lose it or hand it over to another person or someone else take it away from you it will lock up until it sees  its master again.Project iDentifyME™Your smartphone became such a representation of who and what you are it is becoming essential that the device must recognize you and only you as the master to keep the contents confidential and for your eyes only.Current security features addressing the security issue by controlling who signs in but does not limits who is accessing the contents afterwards. Our progressive approach is to continuously observe your presence facing your device by observing a series of your biometric signature to make sure it you and not an impostor. Technically speaking this software will autonomously
collect and evaluate a torrent of biometric characteristic of the subject
person. Unlike currently prevailing, passive non-biometric and biometric approaches our method is
live dynamic observation of the subject person autonomously and continuously. Autonomously simply means without user entering a password, touch a sensor, present a card or other proxy devices and continuous
refers to a mechanism progressively and
perpetually authenticating a person during the course of a transaction. This
approach offers inherent benefits that are extremely critical to any situation
where it is important to make sure that the persons are who they claim to be. The proposal:The plan is to develop an embodiment of the concept and subsequent development of a biometric software system, in two phases, that captures  biometric signature to positively identify individuals while stationary or on the move from near or a distance.


Currently available solutions are already proven to be ineffective and error prone. False identification can be a detrimental affect on a person's life.


 As we see it the demand for a solution is solidly established worldwide and there is an opportunity to fill a longstanding void in the security, access authentication, and person identification market space.


Upon deployment it will represent a giant leap from current prevailing methods in non-biometric and biometric identification technology.


This market is mature, clearly defined, yet wide open and ready to engage with a solution that offers true security and confidentiality.


The concept is
based on employing a video imaging device (video camera) to obtain multiple
biometric characteristics of the subject person’s body and face by scanning the
images rapidly, progressively and continuously while the subject person is in
the range of the video imaging device. The concurrent scanning is resulting in a preponderance of cumulative
data to evidentiate the true identity of the subject person.
This
system will be applicable for personal use on their devices and enterprises dealing with any sort of identity and
access management for their users, staff or customers. There are quite a few
approaches available for authenticating users or controlling their access to
services and resources. These include non-biometric approaches like usernames
and passwords, access cards, fingerprints (relatively new in this space but has
been the norm for lawful investigations) and some other newer challenging
biometric technologies. It doesn’t take us too much courage to say that we
understand the incompetence of the non-biometric approaches and we succeeded to
overcome the challenges with biometrics.
We
believe that within a few years after iDentifyME™ goes live, it will become the
De-Facto user identification and authentication system across industries and
the world.
Challenges in the recently
emerging biometric ID methods are dealing with technical and implementation issues. Some of these concerns
are related to the usability of the biometric technology, especially by people
with disabilities or characteristics different from the perceived norm. Other
concerns relate to broader issues of personal privacy and identity theft. 
Operational and performance Characteristics soughtThe concurrent scanning of multiple biometric
characteristics will result in a preponderance of cumulative data to identify
& authenticate the subject person. Technical approach:The concept is based on employing a video imaging device to obtain the
biometric characteristics while the subject person is in the range of the
video imaging device.

order to proof the concept and evaluate the feasibility and scaling, numerous
currently available certified best of breed biometric technologies will be
evaluated and a list of probable collaborator companies will be compiled.
Specifically face detection and recognition, mood and alertness through facial
expression, iris pattern recognition from long distance, life detection through
the eye and facial temperature, gait and motion analysis are of specific
interest to the project. 
2.  Research
emerging technologies, analyze and categorize the vendors and the potential
relevant offerings on each respective fields of biometrics. Acquire and
evaluate samples exploring their abilities and willingness to become a
collaborative partner in the project. Estimate cost and timeline to develop a
viable product and related cost of future maintenance and upgrades within an
estimated product life cycle and consequently develop a “Blueprint” and Scrum
development timeline.
The anticipated impactThe impact of iDentifyME™ on how people will interact with technology
will be profound and will permanently alter our symbiotic relationship with
our digital self (identity).
iDentifyME™ will replace passwords, ID
cards, smart cards, pins, tokens and various proxy devices that require user
manuals and instructions on how to proceed with self identification.
In the future individuals signing on to their bank account or entering into a secure environment will be as simple as just
showing up and be present during the transaction.

story:
Why Me? Why This Campaign?

Most people wish they were in a career field that they love...however most of us have a hard time getting there. When you have the chance to do what you love and make a difference...you sometimes have to take the risk and dive head first!

I love making people feel good about themselves which is why I went to school to be a cosmetologist. However that wasn't the path that I wanted to take. What I loved doing was making candles and body products that were safe for all types of skin...but also affordable for most people.

Of course that means research...research and more research. After all the research and knowledge becomes the next step of actually producing this great product...but keeping a high quality. What does that take of course...money.

What's it gonna' take?

I've always been a bargain hunter...coupons, sales and deal have never been an issue. Those are how you stretch the all-mighty dollar. Of course to have a high quality product you're going to need higher quality ingredients. Due to my great sense of bargains I have found great deals on quality ingredients...that not even big brand companies use...but still will provide a profit.

What's really going to reel in the customer though is the labeling and marketing. If you don't catch the eye then no matter what the ingredients are...they consumer probably won't stop to even look. So thats where another chunk of funding would go.

Lastly, you have to have some durable packaging because of course we want to send theses products across country and lets be honest UPS and FedEx aren't the most gentle package handlers. So purchasing good quality packing is vital.  

Something for Everyone

Being able to purchase bath, body and skin care products that are great quality is really a mood enhancer and stress reliever.  Many people want to buy stuff from those larger companies but the price is just too high. This will afford many, many more people the opportunity to experience these pleasures!


Risks & Challenges

Of course competing with large scale companies will be hard...but I have already created a following thus far and know that with the right support I can really go far.


Word of mouth is my best friend! The more people you tell and the more times you share...the more opportunity for someone that may LOVE this too see it and support! Make sure to use all the share features...I appreciate it all!!!

story:
Short Summary

Phoenix KinetiCream was created by physicians to be a natural effective alternative to over-the-counter creams, gels and ointments that do not do anything other than mask your symptoms.  We are all about minimizing pain, but covering it up without doing anything to affect the root causes never made sense to us.  Also, some of the garbage that many companies put in their topicals doesn't belong anywhere near your body.  KinetiCream focuses on using natural source ingredients as much as possible and those ingredients being of the best quality to help decrease inflammation in the target area. 

What We Need & What You Get

There are so many topical creams and lotions out there that claim to get rid of pain. However, very few non-prescription formulas can produce real anti-inflammatory effects.  We are using this campaign to raise funds that will allow us to complete specific research through Kent State University that will show the level of inflammation and muscle damage that KinetiCream can treat and possibly even prevent.  When these university proven results are demonstrated to hospitals and rehabilitation centers, we can widen the scope of what KinetiCream can be used to treat, ranging from simple sprains and strains to skin burns from radiation treatment for cancer.  We know that KinetiCream has  many non-traditional uses for a natural topical pain reliever, but in the medical world, it has to be proven before we can make these claims.  
  • The research will cost approximately $75,000.  When finished, it will be presented at the American College of Sports Medicine Annual Meeting 2017 in Denver, Colorado.
  • We want to get you your own bottle(s) of KinetiCream so you can experience the results yourself, and also get you some amazing perks in the process.  We have numerous professional athletes that use our product such as pro football players, pro wrestlers, pro bodybuilders and folks from just about every other sport!  One of our favorite folks is 5x Mr. Olympia, Phil Heath.  He is willing to help out with some of our offers, so be sure to check them out.
  • If our goal is reached, our owners will donate $5000 to the Children's Cancer Research Fund (childrenscancer.org)
  • If we don't reach our goal, the funds raised will still be used for this research project, as we feel it is integral for the world to understand that KinetiCream is more than just another topical pain reliever.

The Impact

Think very quickly and you can think of at least three of your friends or family members that suffer with pain, arthritis or other musculoskeletal symptoms that KinetiCream could help.  Think a little harder and you will recall someone who has fought with cancer.  Radiation therapy was probably part of their treatment.  That radiation produces minor skin burns and significant irritation. If those friends or family members could be relieved of their pain and inflammation with KinetiCream, wouldn't you rather they use a natural product than drugs?  

  • KinetiCream was created by doctors who want to reduce the reliance on drugs and surgery where possible.  A natural over-the-counter formula that treats only the area of concern was the best option. 
  • Oral NSAIDs (Non-Steroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drugs) can causes liver and kidney damage because they are taken orally and must be filtered through the digestive system.  A topical formula prevents this.
  • KinetiCream is already used around the world with great results and a ton of testimonials.  It is time to show the proof so that we can continue our mission of helping the world to move better.

Risks & Challenges

There's always a chance that these results don't show what we expect.  We would be surprised, but there is that chance.  It would give us valuable information so that we could improve KinetiCream to get even better clinical results, with the lab research to match.

We also realize that people may think our product is no different than others that are out there already.  We promise that you can search all around, and you will not find a product as complete as KinetiCream in helping to minimize pain and inflammation naturally.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help financially, we understand.  However, remember those friends and family members suffering from pain?  Send this campaign to them.  They'll be getting the best deal on KinetiCream AND helping us to complete this valuable research.  Additionally, we hope that you will:

  • Share this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter and other Social Media.
  • Remember KinetiCream if you ever do have musculoskeletal pain and inflammation!

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Dr. Craig Banks, Dr. Timothy Ko, Dr. Jim Morgenstern and Mr. James Sparrow

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
