story:
Nederlandse versie hieronder

  • almost 1% of the world's population have epilepsy
  • 30% of people with epilepsy do not respond to medical treatment
  • 1 out of 7 people with epilepsy suffer from difficult to notice absence seizures

Absences are silent epileptic seizures that are really, really difficult to notice. This makes it challenging for parents to report seizure frequency to medical professionals. But it is especially tough in the classroom for child and teacher.

  1. Slim headset sends brain activity to the smartphone.
  2. The Epihunter app detects absence seizures and turns on the smartphone light.
  3. Seizure length is displayed to inform child if preferred.
  4. Teacher is aware of seizures and can react appropriately.
  5. Objective data on seizures is stored to provide insights to parents.

 

 

​StartIt@KBC DemoDay 2017

Pitch by Tim (father of child with absence seizures) about Epihunter.
Supportive intro by Erik Janssen (Head of Innovative Solutions - UCB)
(subtitles available)
 

 

Press coverage

 

Evening news TV - één (in Dutch) More on VRT NWS
Morning radio - Radio 1 (in Dutch) Interview with Tim More on website Radio 1
Kids TV - Karrewiet (in Dutch) Daan about his epilepsy See on website Karrewiet

Staring versus Absence seizures

Mostly we imagine very visible muscle and body movements when we think about epilepsy. Absence seizures - also called non-motor seizures or "petits-mals" - are much more difficult to notice in daily life. The person will simply stare, react in slow motion and stop movements. Seizures can last from a few seconds to several minutes. Some of the differences with "staring" are highlighted below:

Back to the top

Back to the top

  • Scale our platform to host much more data
  • Translations to ensure utmost usability
  • Create a parent web portal and start with a neurologists portal
  • Help to staff our team to support users 

Learn more and Subscribe
www.epihunter.com

Can I also use Epihunter Classroom at home?
Yes! See below.

  1. Child wears headset at home and data is sent to smartphone.
  2. Epihunter app detects absence seizures and sends alerts to a Parent app. (iOS & Android) (offered for free by end of 2018)
  3. Parent is aware of seizure and is able to react if needed.
  4. All data and information is stored for the future.
  5. Parents can consult seizure log and information on a secure website

Can I use Epihunter Classroom if my child has motor seizures?
Epihunter Classroom focuses only on the detection of absence seizures. If both motor and absence seizures occur, Epihunter will only detect and report on absence seizures.

What's the cost for a consumer EEG headset and how does it look?
We are currently testing multiple consumer EEG headsets. Prices typically range from €150-300. 

I'm an adult with absence seizures, can I also use Epihunter Classroom?
Yes, Epihunter Classroom can also be used by adults at home, work or where you see valuable. 

Can Epihunter Classroom be used worldwide?
Today, we primarily focus on European users, as this will allow us to provide you with the high quality user support you deserve. Nevertheless, we do not exclude users outside of Europe.

Please note: The goal of Epihunter Classroom is to help children, their teachers and parents live better with absence seizures. Epihunter Classroom is not a medical device, and as such should not be used for medical purposes. Together with our partners, e.g. the Flemish Epilepsy Association, Epihunter is setting up clinical studies to gather the necessary evidence to expand our current solutions to medical use.

 

Back to the top

 

  • bijna 1% van de wereldbevolking heeft epilepsie
  • 30% van de mensen met epilepsie reageren niet of nauwelijks op huidige medicatie
  • 1 op 7 mensen met epilepsie heeft moeilijk op te merken absence aanvallen

Absences zijn stille epileptische aanvallen die echt heel moeilijk op te merken zijn. Dit maakt het een uitdaging voor ouders om de frequentie van aanvallen te rapporteren aan medische professionals. Maar het is vooral moeilijk in de klas, zowel voor het kind als voor de leerkracht.

  1. Dunne headset stuurt hersenactiviteit naar de smartphone.
  2. Epihunter app detecteert absence aanvallen en laat het smartphone lampje branden.
  3. Lengte van aanval wordt getoond om kind te informeren indien gewenst.
  4. De leerkracht is bewust van aanvallen en gepast reageren.​
  5. Objectieve informatie wordt opgeslagen en geeft ouders inzicht.

 

 

​StartIt@KBC DemoDay 2017

 
Pitch door Tim Buckinx over de kort en lange termijn visie van Epihunter.
Intro door Erik Janssen (Head of Innovative Solutions Mission - UCB)
(ondertitels zijn beschikbaar)
 

 

 

Avondnieuws TV - één Zie meer op VRT NWS

Ochtendradio - Radio 1 Interview met Tim Meer op website Radio 1

Jeugd TV kanaal - Karrewiet Interview met Daan Meer op website Karrewiet

Staren versus Absence epilepsie

Meestal wordt bij epilepsie gedacht aan zeer zichtbare spier- en lichaamsbewegingen. Absence aanvallen - ook wel niet-motorische aanvallen of "petits-mals" genoemd - zijn in het dagelijks leven veel moeilijker op te merken. De persoon zal gewoon staren, in slow motion reageren en stoppen met bewegen. Aanvallen kunnen enkele seconden tot enkele minuten duren. Enkele van de verschillen met "staren" hieronder:

Terug naar boven

Terug naar boven

  • Onze platform opschalen om veel meer data te verwerken
  • Vertalingen voor maximaal gebruiksgemak 
  • Het creëren van een webportaal voor ouders en de start met een portaal voor neurologen
  • Hulp om ons team voor gebruikersondersteuning samen te stellen

Lees meer and Blijf op de hoogte
www.epihunter.com

Kan ik Epihunter Classroom ook thuis gebruiken?
Ja, zie hieronder!

  1. Kind draagt headset thuis en data wordt naar de smartphone gestuurd.
  2. Epihunter app detecteert een absence aanval en stuurt een signaal naar een Ouder smartphone app. (iOS & Android) (gratis aangeboden eind 2018)
  3. Ouder is bewust van aanval en kan reageren indien nodig.
  4. Alle data en informatie zijn opgeslagen voor toekomstig gebruik
  5. Ouders kunnen historiek van aanvallen en informatie raadplegen op een beveiligde website.

Kan ik Epihunter Classroom gebruiken als mijn kind motorische aanvallen heeft?
Epihunter Classroom richt zich enkel op het detecteren van absence aanvallen. Als er zowel motorische als absence aanvallen plaatsvinden, dan zullen we enkel absence aanvallen detecteren en rapporteren.

Wat kost een EEG-headset voor consumenten en hoe ziet deze eruit?
We testen momenteel meerdere consumenten EEG-headsets. Prijzen variëren meestal van € 150-300.

Ik ben een volwassene met absence aanvallen, kan ik Epihunter Classroom ook gebruiken?
Ja, Epihunter Classroom kan ook door volwassenen thuis, op het werk of waar je het nuttig acht, worden gebruikt.

Kan Epihunter Classroom wereldwijd worden gebruikt?
Vandaag richten we ons op Europese gebruikers, omdat dit ons in staat stelt de ondersteuning te bieden die jullie verdienen. Desondanks sluiten we gebruikers buiten Europa niet uit.

Let op: het doel van Epihunter Classroom is om kinderen, hun leerkrachten en hun ouders te helpen in hun dagelijks leven met absence aanvallen. Epihunter Classroom is geen medisch hulpmiddel en dient daarom niet voor medische doeleinden te worden gebruikt. Samen met onze partners, zoals de Vlaamse Epilepsie Liga, is Epihunter bezig met het opzetten van klinische studies om het nodige wetenschappelijke onderbouw te verzamelen om onze huidige oplossingen voor medisch gebruik uit te breiden.

Terug naar boven
story_txt:
Nederlandse versie hieronder
almost 1% of the world's population have epilepsy
30% of people with epilepsy do not respond to medical treatment
1 out of 7 people with epilepsy suffer from difficult to notice absence seizures
Absences are silent epileptic seizures that are really, really difficult to notice. This makes it challenging for parents to report seizure frequency to medical professionals. But it is especially tough in the classroom for child and teacher.

Slim headset sends brain activity to the smartphone.
The Epihunter app detects absence seizures and turns on the smartphone light.
Seizure length is displayed to inform child if preferred.

Teacher is aware of seizures and can react appropriately.

Objective data on seizures is stored to provide insights to parents.
  ​StartIt@KBC DemoDay 2017 Pitch by Tim (father of child with absence seizures) about Epihunter.Supportive intro by Erik Janssen (Head of Innovative Solutions - UCB)(subtitles available)  Press coverage Evening news TV - één (in Dutch) More on VRT NWSMorning radio - Radio 1 (in Dutch) Interview with Tim More on website Radio 1Kids TV - Karrewiet (in Dutch) Daan about his epilepsy See on website KarrewietStaring versus Absence seizuresMostly we imagine very visible muscle and body movements when we think about epilepsy. Absence seizures - also called non-motor seizures or "petits-mals" - are much more difficult to notice in daily life. The person will simply stare, react in slow motion and stop movements. Seizures can last from a few seconds to several minutes. Some of the differences with "staring" are highlighted below:Back to the topBack to the top

Scale our platform to host much more data

Translations to ensure utmost usability
Create a parent web portal and start with a neurologists portal

Help to staff our team to support users 

Learn more and Subscribewww.epihunter.comCan I also use Epihunter Classroom at home?Yes! See below.
Child wears headset at home and data is sent to smartphone.
Epihunter app detects absence seizures and sends alerts to a Parent app. (iOS & Android) (offered for free by end of 2018)


Parent is aware of seizure and is able to react if needed.
All data and information is stored for the future.
Parents can consult seizure log and information on a secure website
Can I use Epihunter Classroom if my child has motor seizures?Epihunter Classroom focuses only on the detection of absence seizures. If both motor and absence seizures occur, Epihunter will only detect and report on absence seizures.What's the cost for a consumer EEG headset and how does it look?We are currently testing multiple consumer EEG headsets. Prices typically range from €150-300. I'm an adult with absence seizures, can I also use Epihunter Classroom?Yes, Epihunter Classroom can also be used by adults at home, work or where you see valuable. Can Epihunter Classroom be used worldwide?Today, we primarily focus on European users, as this will allow us to provide you with the high quality user support you deserve. Nevertheless, we do not exclude users outside of Europe.Please note: The goal of Epihunter Classroom is to help children, their teachers and parents live better with absence seizures. Epihunter Classroom is not a medical device, and as such should not be used for medical purposes. Together with our partners, e.g. the Flemish Epilepsy Association, Epihunter is setting up clinical studies to gather the necessary evidence to expand our current solutions to medical use. Back to the top 
bijna 1% van de wereldbevolking heeft epilepsie
30% van de mensen met epilepsie reageren niet of nauwelijks op huidige medicatie
1 op 7 mensen met epilepsie heeft moeilijk op te merken absence aanvallen
Absences zijn stille epileptische aanvallen die echt heel moeilijk op te merken zijn. Dit maakt het een uitdaging voor ouders om de frequentie van aanvallen te rapporteren aan medische professionals. Maar het is vooral moeilijk in de klas, zowel voor het kind als voor de leerkracht.

Dunne headset stuurt hersenactiviteit naar de smartphone.

Epihunter app detecteert absence aanvallen en laat het smartphone lampje branden.
Lengte van aanval wordt getoond om kind te informeren indien gewenst.
De leerkracht is bewust van aanvallen en gepast reageren.​

Objectieve informatie wordt opgeslagen en geeft ouders inzicht.
  ​StartIt@KBC DemoDay 2017  Pitch door Tim Buckinx over de kort en lange termijn visie van Epihunter.Intro door Erik Janssen (Head of Innovative Solutions Mission - UCB)(ondertitels zijn beschikbaar)   Avondnieuws TV - één Zie meer op VRT NWSOchtendradio - Radio 1 Interview met Tim Meer op website Radio 1Jeugd TV kanaal - Karrewiet Interview met Daan Meer op website KarrewietStaren versus Absence epilepsieMeestal wordt bij epilepsie gedacht aan zeer zichtbare spier- en lichaamsbewegingen. Absence aanvallen - ook wel niet-motorische aanvallen of "petits-mals" genoemd - zijn in het dagelijks leven veel moeilijker op te merken. De persoon zal gewoon staren, in slow motion reageren en stoppen met bewegen. Aanvallen kunnen enkele seconden tot enkele minuten duren. Enkele van de verschillen met "staren" hieronder:Terug naar bovenTerug naar boven
Onze platform opschalen om veel meer data te verwerken

Vertalingen voor maximaal gebruiksgemak 
Het creëren van een webportaal voor ouders en de start met een portaal voor neurologen

Hulp om ons team voor gebruikersondersteuning samen te stellen
Lees meer and Blijf op de hoogtewww.epihunter.comKan ik Epihunter Classroom ook thuis gebruiken?Ja, zie hieronder!
Kind draagt headset thuis en data wordt naar de smartphone gestuurd.
Epihunter app detecteert een absence aanval en stuurt een signaal naar een Ouder smartphone app. (iOS & Android) (gratis aangeboden eind 2018)


Ouder is bewust van aanval en kan reageren indien nodig.
Alle data en informatie zijn opgeslagen voor toekomstig gebruik

Ouders kunnen historiek van aanvallen en informatie raadplegen op een beveiligde website.
Kan ik Epihunter Classroom gebruiken als mijn kind motorische aanvallen heeft?Epihunter Classroom richt zich enkel op het detecteren van absence aanvallen. Als er zowel motorische als absence aanvallen plaatsvinden, dan zullen we enkel absence aanvallen detecteren en rapporteren.Wat kost een EEG-headset voor consumenten en hoe ziet deze eruit?We testen momenteel meerdere consumenten EEG-headsets. Prijzen variëren meestal van € 150-300.Ik ben een volwassene met absence aanvallen, kan ik Epihunter Classroom ook gebruiken?Ja, Epihunter Classroom kan ook door volwassenen thuis, op het werk of waar je het nuttig acht, worden gebruikt.Kan Epihunter Classroom wereldwijd worden gebruikt?Vandaag richten we ons op Europese gebruikers, omdat dit ons in staat stelt de ondersteuning te bieden die jullie verdienen. Desondanks sluiten we gebruikers buiten Europa niet uit.Let op: het doel van Epihunter Classroom is om kinderen, hun leerkrachten en hun ouders te helpen in hun dagelijks leven met absence aanvallen. Epihunter Classroom is geen medisch hulpmiddel en dient daarom niet voor medische doeleinden te worden gebruikt. Samen met onze partners, zoals de Vlaamse Epilepsie Liga, is Epihunter bezig met het opzetten van klinische studies om het nodige wetenschappelijke onderbouw te verzamelen om onze huidige oplossingen voor medisch gebruik uit te breiden.Terug naar boven

story:
HOW IUBI IS CHANGING LIVES?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

IUBI looks like a toy, but it is a fully integrated platform for patients, parents and health professionals in the process of introducing a healthy routine for children.

For kids, IUBI presents itself as a challenge, in addition it helps them learn and adhere to healthy routines, being also their best companion.

For parents, IUBI plays a role in reminding children of routine but important tasks such as eating, brushing teeth, taking a shower, taking medicine, only in a fun and recreational way, taking the weight off to charge children at all times.

For doctors, IUBI is the best patient-centric partner platform, so they can have a detailed report and a more complete information from their patients, which can revolutionize the way to treat chronic diseases.
 

Story of IUBI

IUBI was created to increase the adherence in treatment and to empower kids to improve their health.

 

THE EXPERIENCE

IUBI was created in a laboratory with an algorithm that learns and teaches to be healthier from the interaction with the kids and their routines. As much training IUBI receives, while the kids are teaching him, the more he understands human needs and generates small challenges, every day, to learn more about the children habits. It can be about food, taking medicine, social interaction, exercises, or even IUBI can learn how to dance.

The more IUBI is trained and get these interactions with the kids, the more he can evolve and customize the experience of his trainers. Children from 3 to 11 years old are the ideal trainers to IUBI. Together they grow up, they learn and get new challenges to improve their health. It can be to understand the difference between an apple and a chocolate, the time to take a shower, not forget to take the medicine, do exercises, socialize with friends and family.

All the time that the kids open the App or interact with IUBI IoT they have a new experience with an increasingly evolved robot

The trainers will get points, pins and rewards that can be changed when IUBI get new updates. In the future, IUBI will include new features, functionalities and be. As much more he is trained, the more he evolves.

❤ Every Physical update the user can use the own reward to purchase a new version. ❤

 

Gamifying kids routines to improve their health

Gamification is a great way to teach users.
Every experience counts to the user, who will get points, receive rewards and learn more about what can help and make them healthier.

6 - 13 years old (the age range we're focusing our efforts)
IUBI comes in 3 languages: English, Portuguese and Spanish

 

As humans we have difficulties following routines. For kids this process grows with age, and this according to  the culture, region, education, social interaction, economic conditions, and others. We respect all differences and learn from every need.

 

Healthy kids can use IUBI too, though IUBI has been designed for kids in treatment of chronic diseases, there isn’t restrictions or contraindications.

 

If you still keep your inner child, we strongly recommend you to get your IUBI, feel free to buy your own IUBI!

 

The science behind IUBI

Behavior + Environment + Biological factors

Based on important PhD researches and studies involving patients treatment, patient centric, health routines, human behaviors and biological factors unified creating a powerful and unique source of science. IUBI is building as a platform to integrate others professionals, research and health solutions. In future, IUBI will integrate technology + science in a simple plug and play solution that parents, doctors, researches and kids can be benefit of different solutions align with IUBI purpose.

The technology behind IUBI

Internet Of Things + Mobile

Funcionalities

Sensors - IUBI can get the heart rate, oximetry (the amount of oxygen in the body) and body temperature; Children will collect these values to give IUBI energy.

LEDs Each LED color will define a task on the routine or a need of treatment. For example: red is to take medicine, blue is to do the hygiene, green is time to eat, and so on.

Conversation - IUBI can listen and talk to stimulate children to understand what they are feeling, have a clear view of their routines and the overall processes they are going through.

Image Recognition - IUBI can interact with the child reality through the AR (augmented reality), here is where the kid teaches IUBI how the treatment happens and how it is their reality. Teaching IUBI about food, how to dance, to do exercises and how they take medicine, in a fun and happy interface.

+

 

Tech Specs

 

DONATE

Support with a donation and give IUBI to early adopters. We will select the trainer of robot according order of subscription, and share the beneficiaries (respecting the identification) in our page and by e-mail.

 

BE OUR PARTNER

Supporters will donate IUBI to early adopters.  Be our Partner and receive IUBI as a donation. Apply here.

 

Timeline and Deadline

 

Our Crew



Biz Dev, technology enthusiast and passionate to create a positive impact in the world. Business Administrator with an MBA in Strategic Business Management. She has already founded other companies and believes in Iubi’s capacity on transforming the way to improve people’s health.

 



IT guy, specialist in gamification and new technologies, experienced in people-centric solutions. Has unique skills and business vision, scientific curiosity and programming. System Analyst with a post-grad in Strategic People Management. Loves his two kids and is working to help other kids around the world.

 



Super Doctor, serial entrepreneur in health area. PhD student in Clinic Surgery, she believes that behavior, environment and the patient history together have the power to transform the way we care and worry about our health.

 

 


Crazy scientist, lives in a laboratory and uses all the knowledge he can have in order to take an excellent product and experience to our users.

 

 

PRE-ORDER TODAY FOR THE BEST DEAL

 

Testimonials

 

Who's Talking about IUBI

 

IUBI Shipping

IUBI will ship worldwide. The shipping fee is included in the product.

IUBI will ship to the super Early Bird backers first in Jul/Aug 2019. The others can expect shipping to begin in Aug/Sep 2019.

We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your IUBI ship date.

For questions about your order, please contact hello@iubi.me

 

Why order now

By backing today, you’ll get or donate to own IUBI at an exclusive price that won’t be offered again commercially.


Powered by

❤ Nosotras Creamos - CORFO - Universidad Técnica Frederico Santa Maria
❤ Hacking Health

story:
The EZ Breethy is a reusable FDA approved Silicone mask that filters 95% of common contaminants and reduces waste by one third. Unlike existing masks on the market, the EZ Breethy mask features a flexible, patent-pending face piece that provides outstanding protection and comfort.

EZ Breethy was created by a mom entrepreneur that had trouble finding a descent facemask readily available on the market for her and her children.

    

 

The EZ Breethy Mask is designed to provide excellent protection.

    

                    

 

 Benefits of the EZ Breethy Mask include:

 

Comfortable Face Seal and Adjustable Ear Clips

Comfortable safe FDA approved silicone

 

 

High-Efficiency Filters: 95% protection from contaminants 

Reduced Cost & Waste: With our reusable design and 10 filters included we will reduce waste from one-time use and throw away masks. EZ Breethy Mask uses custom-fit KN95 filters.

     

 

Reusable Design: Easily cleanable, dishwasher safe, hand-wash or boil to sanitize. 

             

   

 

Drawbacks of Existing Masks

Each of these mask types has the following three issues.

Poor face seals: Existing masks don't always achieve an adequate seal on the face, resulting in decreased protection 

High waste and cost: N95 and surgical masks need to be changed regularly, which is can be expensive and cause waste.

 

Who should use the EZ Breethy Mask?

Train Commuters 

City Goers 

Shoppers

Children at play 

Service Industry

 

Adults Colors

 

Children's Colors

 

Size Guide

                                        

Measure from the centerline of your face at your mouth to at least 1 inch (2.5 cm) past the outside corner of your mouth. The outer edge of the  Mask should sit against your face at .5 to 1 inch outside the corner of your mouth

Double the measurement you have taken and match to the best fit from the below:

Medium- Will fit those with a max measurement of 4.3 inches. (recommended for most women up to 190 pounds)

Large- Will fit those with a max measurement of 4.7 inches. (Recommended for most men up to 220 pounds and women over 190)

Extra Large - Will fit those with a max measurement of 5.2 inches. (Recommended for men over 220 pounds)

* If you have a larger size nose that sits high we recommend sizing up.

Children's- Recommended for children ages 3-10

story:
Introduction

QuikSet Courts was established to serve a simple yet meaningful mission. We want to create a better beach volleyball experience through intuitively designed and quality products—and in doing so, give underprivileged youth in the U.S. the opportunity to learn and play the game. That’s why we reimagined the conventional court design and launched our first adjustable court product. 

 

 

 

 

 

Providing a quality product is but one part of QuikSet Courts vision. For every court purchased, $1 of the sale is donated to the AVPFirst nonprofit initiative which makes it possible for kids around the country to learn the game of beach volleyball regardless of their economic status. 

Funding through Indiegogo will directly support additional product development for a QuikSet 2” adjustable line product and a QuikSet Net product. 

What We Need

When we started off 4 years ago, we had a dream and loan. Prototyping, testing, reworking, retesting—it all culminated in the first QuikSet product being listed on Amazon in 2018.

Sales on Amazon have proven that consumers are interested and have an appetite for more.  

The “more” part is right where you come in. We're seeking $16,500 of support to fund the following QuikSet initiatives:

  1. Additional Production Run of 400 QuikSet Courts (currently available 1” wide adjustable line)
     
  2. Design, prototype and development for QuikSet Net product
     
  3. Design, prototype and development for QuikSet Courts 2” wide adjustable lines

For your contribution, we will provide special deals on our adjustable court product, early access to future products like the QuikSet 2” inch wide adjustable lines and the QuikSet Net when they hit the market along with exclusive branded apparel.

The Impact

With over 100 adjustable courts sold, 6 5-star reviews on Amazon and more than $100 donated dollars to AVPFirst—this is only the beginning for QuikSet Courts. Your help will bring more QuikSet products to market and allow our youth to learn and play the game. 

Quality First

We will always remain focused on the quality and the integrity of our manufacturing process. When something doesn’t meet our expectations, we know it will not meet yours—so all of our products will be repeatedly vetted and tested to ensure QuikSet customers are satisfied.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, we would appreciate you sharing this link with those that might be interested or understand our vision.

story:
Hi I knew that according to:  www.ahrq.gov  60,000 people die each year due to pressure ulcers, almost all of us had or will have a family member who could suffer painful ulcers capable of causing death, our project created a device that prevents the development of pressure ulcers, only in the United States 2.5 million people are affected every year according to the study of  https://www.ahrq.gov/professionals/systems/hosp...

I am an RN / MSN nurse and the most effective way we have to avoid pressure ulcers is exactly that, avoiding pressure on bony prominences, this must be done by changing the position patient every two hours, but the reality is that the nurses we are overloaded with work and we can not go every two hours to change all patients bedridden in position, it is impossible, (This hurts our backs a lot)

At other times, we educate family members about changes in the home for bedridden patients, but often they hurt their backs doing strength incorrectly, sometimes they do not have time to change their position every two hours and sometimes they forget

Our device is portable and very effective, is able to change people bedridden automatically every 2 hours or manually with just pressing two buttons, supports patient up to 600 pounds

For this reason we are contributing our knowledge to improve the health of our society, but we need your help we need your contribution and even more important that you share this information with your friend and family

 

                                                        Additional study data

 

The Cost: Pressure ulcers cost $9.1-$11.6 billion per year in the US. Cost of individual patient care ranges from $20,900 to 151,700 per pressure ulcer. Medicare estimated in 2007 that each pressure ulcer added $43,180 in costs to a hospital stay.

Lawsuits: More than 17,000 lawsuits are related to pressure ulcers annually. It is the second most common claim after wrongful death and greater than falls or emotional distress.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Our device can be used by patients with limited mobility either in hospitals, senior centers, or the home itself, these are some examples of conditions that can lead to the development of pressure ulcers.

 

1. Hemiplegia

2. Hemiparesis

3. Paraplegic

4. Patients in a coma

5. Patients in induced coma (medication)

6. Patients in moderate and high sedation

7. Braden scale 15 or less

8. Glasgow scale 10 or less

9. History of ulcers or lesions in the area (Sacral, coccyx, Heels, Omoplato, Calves)

10. Idiopathic hypersomnolence

11. Lethargy

12. Unconscious

13. Loss of sensory

14. Narcolepsy

15. Malnutrition

16. Patients with limited mobility, bedridden and altered metal status

17. Medical Recommendations

18. Nursing Recommendations

 

if you have doubts consult a health professional, an example to not use this equipment would be fractured hip

 

 

Patent Pending
story_txt:
Hi I knew that according to:  www.ahrq.gov  60,000 people die each year due to pressure ulcers, almost all of us had or will have a family member who could suffer painful ulcers capable of causing death, our project created a device that prevents the development of pressure ulcers, only in the United States 2.5 million people are affected every year according to the study of  https://www.ahrq.gov/professionals/systems/hosp...
I am an RN / MSN nurse and the most effective way we have to avoid pressure ulcers is exactly that, avoiding pressure on bony prominences, this must be done by changing the position patient every two hours, but the reality is that the nurses we are overloaded with work and we can not go every two hours to change all patients bedridden in position, it is impossible, (This hurts our backs a lot)
At other times, we educate family members about changes in the home for bedridden patients, but often they hurt their backs doing strength incorrectly, sometimes they do not have time to change their position every two hours and sometimes they forget
Our device is portable and very effective, is able to change people bedridden automatically every 2 hours or manually with just pressing two buttons, supports patient up to 600 pounds
For this reason we are contributing our knowledge to improve the health of our society, but we need your help we need your contribution and even more important that you share this information with your friend and family

story:
Short Summary:

Hello! Would you like to be part of a Joyous Movement? I’m Beth Amine and as an author, speaker, visual artist, dancer, performer and self-expression specialist for nearly 50 years, I have personally seen thousands of people of all ages and walks of life come alive, heal disorders and create a deep connection to who they essentially are through the magic of art and movement programs. I witness miracles of renewed life daily in as diverse of populations as seniors with Alzheimer’s, executives, war veterans, children and just every day working folk.

This is purely from being shown through my classes, simple training programs and lifestyle coaching how to allow or inspire connection to this essential joyous core of our beings. Health, happiness, longevity and quality of life are all increased.

In the past ten years, through my work with elders of every age and ability, I have developed a highly effective, interactive group activity that engages even the most un-engage able of residents. I call it Joyous Movement. Individuals who do not speak will sing, and those who do not move become animated, breathe and move their hands and feet. This simple system of engagement through music, colorful props and the touch of the human heart also leaves caregivers and facilitators with the same sense of joy and fulfillment that can last the rest of the day or week.

The joyous results are so profound and heartwarming and the need is great in our elder communities, where individuals are often isolated and unresponsive. I have a deep desire to spread this simple system to retirement homes and residences through the county by training individuals to bring these simple techniques to every body and ability. The program is effective for Memory Care, Assisted and Independent Living.  In our successful proven training program, anyone interested can be taught how to facilitate this activity. Retirement residence life enrichment or activity directors are always in need of engaging events. In order to get these programs to all who can benefit and have our presence known in the larger community, we need funds for marketing, web work, office administration and promotional materials.

We also provide preventative lifestyle coaching through our Joyous Longevity programs. I have a new book on how to cultivate a long and happy life and a comprehensive business plan. As we all age, these programs are at the height of innovation as science proves the preventative and restorative capacity of music, movement and the arts. The largest benefit is that the human spirit is moved, revealed, and shared. My passion is inspiring joy, community celebration and a flourishing inner life and the vision is planetary!

What We Need:

To get started, the funds will go towards monthly business expenses, rebranding, website systems creation, and new collateral materials. We also need the right staff for office administration and marketing. Our goal is to create a globally inclusive party for everybody through the programs we offer. The business structure and marketing system that is in place needs updating and expanding. Currently there are five websites that need to be coordinated into the Joyous Every Day Living Lifestyle. The right staff for office administration and marketing is crucial.  What is working successfully for us now is: a book,  business plan, instructional videos, a training webinar, workbook, website, working instructors, a fifty year track record, testimonials and community support.

1. Our current website needs to be remodeled and have staff for consistent updates.

2. Staff for promotional event and talk bookings.

3. Office order and organization.

4. Social Media manager.

5. Online workshops filmed and in place for national trainings.

6. Merchandise ordered. This includes props for all instructors.

7. Video hosting fees for Vimeo of our training and class videos.

8 Marketing of trainings locally and nationally.

9. Marketing of videos and affiliate products.

10. Videographer and editor.

11. Umbrella website and image organization for all Beth Amine products.

12. Salaries for Beth, the founder and other staff members.

13. Back pay of Beth’s cash investment $10,000

14, Radio show and media fees.

15. Graphic Designer for logo and website.

16, Staff to pay: Office organizer, marketer, social media and membership, content providers

17, Head of PR:

Promote the overall Brand of Joyous Every Day Living through: Creating Press Packets for Talk and Workshops on Joyous Living and Longevity Book Talks and Workshops at Retreat Centers, conferences and other venues.

Oversee radio and podcast marketing Link with Beth’s Social Media and E-list Marketing for a coordinated outreach of book, talks and workshops with a focus on Joyous Movement Assisted Living Senior Movement Programs and Instructor Trainings.

Reach our target market of women from 40-70 who are looking for a deeper, fun and more caring relationship with themselves and their ability to expand through self love and community service. This includes caregivers at senior residences and organizations who need a system of renewal. Our other deep offering is to provide a positive new paradigm and possibility for moving through time in a healthy, passionate, vital, vibrant and inspired way.

  1. Merchandising: Kimi Vandyk fee to manage

What you get: 

Gifts/rewards

We have lots of fun, artistic, party perks for you for donating:

❤ Signed premier edition of the book Joyous Every Day Living                $75

❤Signed premier edition of the book with an angel mention on the gratitude page of our new website and a personal note or call from Beth                                                 $100                                    

❤A Heartwarming: Sponsor a senior for a private Joyous Movement  experience in their home or retirement community.                                                                                          $250

❤Sponsor a Joyous Movement Class in a retirement community  of your choice

                                                                                                                                            $500

❤Spend a VIP creative day with Beth Amine in her Garden                         $1,000

❤Sponsor 5 trainees with full scholarships to the training programs.       $1,500

❤Have a book signing and dance party at your home or Beth’s Garden with Belly Dance lessons, delicious food, and a talk on longevity by author Beth Amine for up to 10 people.                                                                                                                                                                            $3,000

❤A spa day and shrine making workshop for up to 10 guests with gourmet lunch  

                                                                                                                                          $10,000                

The Impact

I  have a further mission. What if maintaining joy, passion, health and vitality throughout our entire life cycle was the norm? I also provide self-empowering preventative programs through Joyous Every Day Living Lifestyle education. As an author, lecturer and performer I already see results of the Joyous Every Day Living Programs. My book is also called Joyous Every Day Living. I now host podcasts weekly on the same topic for seniors and anyone interested in aging well and living an inspired life. People are reached through social media, keynote speaking engagements, trained instructors successfully bringing Joyous Movement to retirement homes and multi-generational community celebrations.

10,000 baby boomers are reaching retirement age every day and this trend will continue until 2030. Meeting the health, social and economic needs of this massive population is staggering. What if a new model was presented, helping seniors live independently longer with a much higher quality of life, less dependent on medication and more on self-responsibility? Simple lifestyle choices provide a groundbreaking, supportive approach to an old paradigm that says we much age and decline with suffering.

Risks & Challenges

We are creating a new approach to existing paradigms of how we must live and age, so there can be resistance from the past. We feel that the public is ready for a new possibility based on self-responsibility and personal joy. 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to contribute besides money.  We always welcome talent, new ideas and the sharing of our campaign is a great gift as well!

story:
Why We Need Your Support:

The video above, created by one of our students at the Cherry Hill location, is my favorite video in the 10 years that we've been around. It captures the reason we began and it is why I want us to band together and fight for PPK.

Its pretty obvious how serious things got and how quickly they got there. We are officially on lockdown as of today and were forced to close our doors at the Pinnacle Parkour Academy, Wash. Twp location. This is absolutely the best thing for the health and safety of our folks but man is this going to hurt the business. 

Will PPK Wash Really Go Out of Business?

Yes, definitely...but we're not going down without a FIGHT! If our team of passionate coaches band together and work hard over the next few weeks/months AND you decide to contribute and keep us going then we can weather the storm. We will be bringing you videos, building you obstacles, delivering you Tshirts, and offering you private training sessions. We have been teaching Parkour for over 10yrs and will do whatever it takes to keep this alive. 

How Can You Help?

If you can contribute, great! Let's get you hooked up with some custom obstacles, or some private lessons, or even some gear. If you are not in a position to part with any cash, no worries at all. You can help us by sharing this campaign or even help by building obstacles with us! 

Either way we appreciate you, and we care about you. Nothing in my life has been more rewarding than having a positive impact on you and your loved ones. We truly consider you family. Thank you. 

Looking forward to growing with you through this challenging time. Lets come out stronger on the other side. Lets continue to INSPIRE THROUGH MOVEMENT! 

God Bless,

Coach Phil

story:
Meet Aspire

We all know how it feels when you're less than confident about your body, and we are all guilty of trying new ways of making ourselves look better. That's why we came up with device that specifically helps women get rid of cellulites and firm up their legs at the same time. 

Utilising Electro Muscular Stimulation or EMS, this proven technology penetrates deep into the muscles to activate 90% of the muscles fibres and has been used as a fitness enhancement tool all over the world. EMS also targets cellulite directly as it prevents and reduces the development of cellulite by toning and tightening the muscles. It also promotes the circulation of blood flow and removes lymphatic drainage to achieve tight, seamless legs.

It is a globally known fact that topical creams and LED light treatments are not very effective as these methods only target the surface of the skin and not within. More effective treatments such as those involving clinical services are not the most ideal for the everyday woman given their high up-keep cost with unsustainable results. An average of USD $200 per session with follow up visits every month are necessary to maintain the results. Taking these factors into consideration, we decided to invent a problem solving product that promises results, has a low up-keep cost and of course, affordable.

Unlike conventional EMS technology where the product is hooked onto a wired console, our product is totally wireless. This seamless design fits like a second skin and provides a full range of movement and comfort. Embracing a positive body image, we have created a wide range of sizes and fitting to suit all body types. This anti-bacterial fabric is not only suitable for sensitive skin but produces high energy conductivity of the electrodes as well.

The Aspire Pants has electrodes covering the abs, quads, hamstrings and glutes. The electrodes will target the different muscle groups by sending gentle impulses and working the problem areas by tightening connective tissues and reducing cellulite.

All it takes is 3 steps to start using the product. Put on the Aspire Pants, power up the device and select your desired level of intensity. We recommended to use the product 3 times a week, with a duration of 30 minutes for each session.

The Aspire Body Firming Gel is a natural toning amino acid to target problem areas from within, to smoothen and firm the skin. This anti-cellulite cream is enriched with activating properties to reduce the appearance of uneven skin texture. This product has undergone years of research and development and was made specifically to be the perfect pairing for use with the Aspire Pants. For optimal results, it is recommended to use both the gel and Aspire device together which will help reduce the appearance of problem areas and restore women’s self-confidence.

The Anti-Cellulite mode will prevent the development of cellulite by toning and tightening the muscles and also improve the blood circulation in order to remove fat nodules in the problem areas. Adjusting the intensities will depend on how the body feels on that day, there are some days where require a little more intensity and there are some days where you need something lighter; a program tailored for you.

Bring the Aspire Pack anywhere and use it anytime of the day. This leisure product is not only compact, convenient but also capable of delivering results you desire.

 

Timeline

The Aspire project started in August 2017. We have begun working on finalising our prototype and we are well within our time schedule.


 

The Impact

80 – 90% of women around the world are troubled with cellulite issues some point in their life. More than 1000 women in the New York were surveyed and 91% of them with cellulite suffer from insecurity, low self-confidence and would want to change that part of their body. Our purpose of this project is to help women reduce cellulite and restore their confidence at an affordable cost.

Billions of dollars were spent on cellulite creams and treatments such as liposuction in hope that they can reduce cellulites. Cellulites are a layer of fat underneath the skin that gets compressed by connective tissues. When fat cells get squeezed, they create a dimple appearance on the external part of the skin. With EMS technology, it can help reduce cellulite by:

  • Penetrating deep muscles
  • Toning/ increasing muscle mass
  • Tightening connective tissues
  • Improving circulation and skin tone
  • Burn fat

In other words? A more toned and sculpted bottom, thighs and legs. 


Package Contents

Aspire Controller
Aspire Pants
Anti-cellulite cream
USB-C Charging Cable
Instruction Guide

 

Risk and Challenges 

As we are launching a personal home system, it will be difficult for us to keep track the number of hours each user is using per week. Although some users may feel that using the product on an everyday basis might be beneficial, it is actually detrimental in the long run. Your body needs to rest, recover and regenerate.

Our recommended usage will be 3 times per week for 30 minutes per session, and we strongly advise to use the Body Firming Gel before each session to speed up the results. 

The handling of the pants and device are one of our top concerns as well. As they are delicate products, users will need to exercise special care for handling and washing the pants. Please do not forget to detach the device from the pants before you wash!

Extensive information have been placed into videos and tutorials to educate users on washing the suits and using the system. A tutorial booklet/washing instruction will also be made to ensure that users are fully aware of the labels.

 

Size Measurements

 

Our Team

Traditionally, EMS machines are bulky, expensive and cumbersome to use. As we have been in the EMS industry for the last 8 years, we strongly believe that everyone should be able to afford and experience this great technology.

Aspire is the first product that we will be launching. We want to use the expertise that we have in our technology and launch a product specially for women all over the world who has cellulite and restore their self-confidence.

Aspire is being designed and manufactured by notable industrial companies that has many years of experience and accolades behind them. By using renowned industry players with many years of experience, we hope Aspire will achieve the highest standard possible giving customers the best user experience and reliability.

Our electronic engineering design partner has more than 15 years of R&D experience in a wide range of applications.  They are experienced in wireless technical solutions, security access systems, mobile handheld computers, large scale public transport integration systems and even military applications.  Their clients include world renowned companies like Sony, Siemens, Philips. With their help, we have managed to build a robust and dynamic system from ground up to give the best possible EMS device available in the market.

Our manufacturing partner works closely with the engineering design house to ensure the design of the hardware is manufactured within specifications with zero error.  This technical company was established in 2000 and has major contracts with multinational companies like Hewlett Packard, Intel, Panasonic, Bosch, Dyson and Schlumberger, just to name a few. They have been involved in simple PCB manufacturing to highly complex systems for space satellites.  Their experiences include consumer electronics, semiconductor electronics, industrial electronics, medical electronics, oil and gas electronics, space satellite electronics and military/avionics electronics. 

With all the knowledge and vast experience behind Aspire, customers can be rest assured that Aspire will perform up to expectations and bring forward the best EMS products in the market. Our commitment to you is of utmost importance, and we intend to deliver to products on time. All rewards are expected to ship by mid May 2019. However, should there be any external factors that might delay shipment, (such as unexpected component shortages, shipping delays etc), we will do our level best to resolve any problems encountered.

An average of USD $200 per session with follow up visits every month are necessary to maintain the results. Taking these factors into consideration, we decided to invent a problem solving product that promises results, has a low up-keep cost and of course, affordable.Unlike conventional EMS technology where the product is hooked onto a wired console, our product is totally wireless. This seamless design fits like a second skin and provides a full range of movement and comfort. Embracing a positive body image, we have created a wide range of sizes and fitting to suit all body types. This anti-bacterial fabric is not only suitable for sensitive skin but produces high energy conductivity of the electrodes as well.The Aspire Pants has electrodes covering the abs, quads, hamstrings and glutes. The electrodes will target the different muscle groups by sending gentle impulses and working the problem areas by tightening connective tissues and reducing cellulite.All it takes is 3 steps to start using the product. Put on the Aspire Pants, power up the device and select your desired level of intensity. We recommended to use the product 3 times a week, with a duration of 30 minutes for each session.The Aspire Body Firming Gel is a natural toning amino acid to target problem areas from within, to smoothen and firm the skin. This anti-cellulite cream is enriched with activating properties to reduce the appearance of uneven skin texture. This product has undergone years of research and development and was made specifically to be the perfect pairing for use with the Aspire Pants. For optimal results, it is recommended to use both the gel and Aspire device together which will help reduce the appearance of problem areas and restore women’s self-confidence.The Anti-Cellulite mode will prevent the development of cellulite by toning and tightening the muscles and also improve the blood circulation in order to remove fat nodules in the problem areas. Adjusting the intensities will depend on how the body feels on that day, there are some days where require a little more intensity and there are some days where you need something lighter; a program tailored for you.Bring the Aspire Pack anywhere and use it anytime of the day. This leisure product is not only compact, convenient but also capable of delivering results you desire. TimelineThe Aspire project started in August 2017. We have begun working on finalising our prototype and we are well within our time schedule. The Impact80 – 90% of women around the world are troubled with cellulite issues some point in their life. More than 1000 women in the New York were surveyed and 91% of them with cellulite suffer from insecurity, low self-confidence and would want to change that part of their body. Our purpose of this project is to help women reduce cellulite and restore their confidence at an affordable cost.Billions of dollars were spent on cellulite creams and treatments such as liposuction in hope that they can reduce cellulites. Cellulites are a layer of fat underneath the skin that gets compressed by connective tissues. When fat cells get squeezed, they create a dimple appearance on the external part of the skin. With EMS technology, it can help reduce cellulite by:
Penetrating deep muscles
Toning/ increasing muscle mass
Tightening connective tissues
Improving circulation and skin tone
Burn fat
In other words? A more toned and sculpted bottom, thighs and legs. 
Package Contents
Aspire ControllerAspire PantsAnti-cellulite creamUSB-C Charging CableInstruction Guide Risk and Challenges As we are launching a personal home system, it will be difficult for us to keep track the number of hours each user is using per week. Although some users may feel that using the product on an everyday basis might be beneficial, it is actually detrimental in the long run. Your body needs to rest, recover and regenerate.Our recommended usage will be 3 times per week for 30 minutes per session, and we strongly advise to use the Body Firming Gel before each session to speed up the results. The handling of the pants and device are one of our top concerns as well. As they are delicate products, users will need to exercise special care for handling and washing the pants. Please do not forget to detach the device from the pants before you wash!Extensive information have been placed into videos and tutorials to educate users on washing the suits and using the system. A tutorial booklet/washing instruction will also be made to ensure that users are fully aware of the labels. 
Size Measurements Our TeamTraditionally, EMS machines are bulky, expensive and cumbersome to use. As we have been in the EMS industry for the last 8 years, we strongly believe that everyone should be able to afford and experience this great technology.Aspire is the first product that we will be launching. We want to use the expertise that we have in our technology and launch a product specially for women all over the world who has cellulite and restore their self-confidence.Aspire is being designed and manufactured by notable industrial companies that has many years of experience and accolades behind them. By using renowned industry players with many years of experience, we hope Aspire will achieve the highest standard possible giving customers the best user experience and reliability.Our electronic engineering design partner has more than 15 years of R&D experience in a wide range of applications.  They are experienced in wireless technical solutions, security access systems, mobile handheld computers, large scale public transport integration systems and even military applications.  Their clients include world renowned companies like Sony, Siemens, Philips. With their help, we have managed to build a robust and dynamic system from ground up to give the best possible EMS device available in the market.Our manufacturing partner works closely with the engineering design house to ensure the design of the hardware is manufactured within specifications with zero error.  This technical company was established in 2000 and has major contracts with multinational companies like Hewlett Packard, Intel, Panasonic, Bosch, Dyson and Schlumberger, just to name a few. They have been involved in simple PCB manufacturing to highly complex systems for space satellites.  Their experiences include consumer electronics, semiconductor electronics, industrial electronics, medical electronics, oil and gas electronics, space satellite electronics and military/avionics electronics. With all the knowledge and vast experience behind Aspire, customers can be rest assured that Aspire will perform up to expectations and bring forward the best EMS products in the market. Our commitment to you is of utmost importance, and we intend to deliver to products on time. All rewards are expected to ship by mid May 2019. However, should there be any external factors that might delay shipment, (such as unexpected component shortages, shipping delays etc), we will do our level best to resolve any problems encountered.

story:
WELCOME

Welcome to the campaign and thank you for taking the time to review the offering. 

The aim of this campaign is to produce best practice Yoga Cards as a new way to learn, teach and practice yoga. The cards will be available in digital and printed card format at a price point affordable to everyone.

Hola, my name is Fernando Díaz. 

I am a certified Physical Therapist, Osteopath and a Yoga Instructor, with many years of practice in Europe, India and Asia. 

I have used my knowledge of science and yoga to successfully treat thousands of people with many different musculoskeletal conditions.  I have been delighted to share my knowledge of anatomy and bio mechanics with many yoga teachers through certified yoga teacher training courses.

I am passionate about teaching and practising yoga correctly and safely to prevent unnecessary injuries. This passion and my medical background has led me to develop a best practice guide for yoga postures (asanas) in the form of yoga cards. 

The yoga cards provide an easy way to learn, teach and practice yoga correctly and safely. The cards introduce a comfortable starting point to learn the best practice foundation of yoga and a development path to more progressive sequences.

By supporting this campaign you are investing in your own yoga knowledge, good health and personal development, ensuring that you gain all the physical and mental benefits that a regular yoga practice can provide.

Your Investment & Your Reward

The goal is €5500. 

This will facilitate a higher print volume which will lower the cost of each card.  If this goal is not reached a smaller print production will run from the amount raised, therefore even the smallest investment will make a big impact. 

There are four options to invest and participate in this campaign.

 

€5 - Foundation Yoga Card Set 

A digital yoga card Sun Salutation sequence will be sent to thank you for your support. This is ideal for everyone.

€15 - Digital Yoga Card Set 

A sequence with a Sun Salutation (Surya Namaskar), a Hatha Yoga sequence, Mantra and Sutras Cards. 

€28 - Yoga Card Flex Box Set 

A box set with 54 cards - 50 Asanas and 4 philosophy. This is ideal for anyone who is developing their yoga practice and for yoga teachers.

€55 - Professional Premium Yoga Card Box Set

A premium box set of 88 Yoga Cards. 80 Asanas and 8 philosophy cards. This is ideal for anyone who is developing their yoga practice and for yoga teachers.

The Impact

As science and research continues to demonstrate the benefits of a regular yoga practice for health and well being, yoga is increasing in popularity amongst all age groups around the world.  According to the Yoga Federation around 300 million people practice yoga worldwide. In the US 56% of yogis are beginners and according to the Yoga Alliance 14 million people practising yoga are over the age of 50 and men practising yoga has increased by 150% in the last 4 years. In this environment Yoga Cards provide best practice help, support and guidance for both students and teachers.

After many years of practice as a Physical Therapist, Osteopath and a Yoga Instructor I recognised a gap in the anatomical and bio mechanical aspect of Yoga education. The Yoga Cards seek to bridge that gap.

A pilot study for the Yoga Cards was successfully completed in 2019. The study included a small group of yoga students, yoga teachers and a sports science department at a University. The feedback received enabled the Yoga Cards to evolve and develop.

 

Risks & Challenges

The Yoga Card project is now at an advanced stage. The aim is to produce digital and hard copy best practice Yoga Cards which are available at an affordable price point for everyone.  The cost to market will vary depending on volume of print run, volume of purchase and route to market.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to be involved and are not able to contribute financially you can still participate in the following ways:

Please get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. I am sure you know somebody who likes to  practice, study or teach Yoga. The Yoga Cards are for everyone. 

Share the link for the campaign, no contribution is too small!

And that's all there is to it.

Namaste and thank you!

story:
Let's face it.. Cardio is boring - and we believe that movement should be exciting. That's why we've pushed the line between gaming and real-life sports by transforming play into a social, fun and active competition that combines physical activity and gaming.

Strike, jab, and dodge. JABII gets your pulse up while you're having fun. Playfights between friends of all ages have never been more exciting and safe. JABII gives you all the adrenaline and none of the bruises.


JABII is played by two people who face off in a real-life match that combines the techniques of fencing and boxing, without the pain. It is possible through the innovative mechanics in the extendable boxing-device that is the JABII. Using your smartphone, you can track every single punch and even record your glorious battles.
 


It only takes a couple of minutes to start up your match with JABII and get your pulse racing! No need for the change of clothes or the long, tiresome commute to the gym.

JABII is fun first, activity second - and our user tests show that people don’t realise that they’ve been physically active and gotten their pulse up until AFTER the match is over.





The JABII has been playtested for safe strikes on all ages groups and has been proved to be 100% safe. The rubber front of the JABII works like a reverse airbag that lets out air as it hits your opponent.

The 60 specially-made springs pull out the power of every punch, leaving a soft touch on impact. 

In other words, you can strike your opponents with fury without worrying.

The front of the JABII is equipped with a durable rubber pillow. It acts like a reverse airbag and results in punches that you can feel, but which does not hurt.

 
 

 




In your home or outdoors, you decide where you play. All you need is a minimum of 33 square feet (3 m2) of space and you are good to go.



 



Did you know that only two minutes of HIIT training gives the same effort in increased metabolism as 30 minutes of running? The activity of a JABII match is comparable to HIIT training and gives you a fun and quick way to get active.

Studies show that a lot of gym-goers don’t get their pulse up to a high enough level when training alone. With JABII, the adrenaline of the battle is sure to get your whole body moving and heart beating.
 


Getting your heart beating faster than its resting rate each day trains your body to move oxygen and blood to your muscles more efficiently - but getting there through traditional training methods can take a lot of time.





 



Many interactive games focus primarily on your upper body parts. JABII matches activate your whole body even in short matches! JABII will make sure your arms, shoulders, core and legs will be activated to the fullest.




The built-in referee controls the match and rules, much the ones you know from Tekken or Street Fighter. The app also keeps track of your every move and saves your personal stats on your player profile.

REAL-LIFE VIDEO GAMING
Hit record before the battle and share a video of your victory after the match. The app’s advanced sensors track your every dodge and jab and update your AR health-bars in real-time.

MATCHUP WITH ANYONE
Technique means more than strength. JABII’s innovative mechanics level the playing field.

GET ACTIVE WITH YOUR FRIENDS
Arrange your own tournaments. Fight your way to the top of the leaderboard.

SHARE DIRECT TO YOUR SOCIAL ACCOUNTS
The app records your biggest wins and most epic knockouts.

FULLY CUSTOMISABLE BATTLES
Choose match duration, number of rounds and much more.

PLAY OFFLINE
Worried you’ll wreck your stats warming up? Turn off the app and play the built-in battle mode in a game of first-to-three hits.


JABII is more than a game. It is an experience that allows you to step into the world of gaming and giving you the chance to become the hero. Experience the adrenaline-pumped feeling of fighting sports, developed by a team including former professional fighters.​




The JABII device is hard to compare to any other game or gadget on the market. Figuring out the design wasn't easy. And once the mechanical construction and idea was finalised, we had to figure out the right materials to create a product that can take a beating.

96 high-quality components - from micro CPUs to light sensors and bluetooth 5.0 - have been expertly added onto the PCB that carries the electronics and brain of the JABII.



There's a ton of features (visible and hidden) in the JABII, we've selected some of those that we are extra proud to have included:








You may have been on a camping trip, business trip, or holiday and thought to yourself "I wish I brought my dumbbells." - but did you ever? Probably not - it's too much of a hassle. 

But we guarantee whenever you’re away, you're going to want to take your JABII with you. Weighing just 2 x 22oz (2 x 650g), the JABII is lightweight and easy to carry with you on-the-go, for a quick, intense workout.

 







Christian & Giang  

Copenhagen entrepreneurs Christian Thostrup and Giang Le came up with JABII out of a shared passion for sports, play and gaming. With their observation of the global increase in inactive screen-time with both kids and adults, their goal was to create a product that combined the best from the physical and active world of sports, and the adrenaline-filled competition and fun from the world of gaming.

“I loved kickboxing since my youth,” says Giang, “the challenge and the adrenaline – there’s nothing like it. We made JABII so everyone can step into that world and be the hero.”

With Christian’s natural-born entrepreneurial and hardware skills, and Giang’s engineering background and business development experience, they knew they were the team to make it happen.







 





It’s been a 3-year journey perfecting JABII: 100s of tests: almost 10,000 points of prototype feedback. Now we’re nearly there, and we’re thrilled to be entering production.

Now, to take the game globally, we’re looking to reach $10k with the Indiegogo launch. 

To everyone who’s followed us, thank you for all the love and the feedback over the last 3 years. We couldn’t have done it without you. 

Order now and get ready to #igniteyourgame !







We’re lucky to have some of the best talents in the world at our fingertips – and after all, we’ve been through together, we happy to call some of these bright minds ‘family’.

As a team, we’re very passionate and nerdy – a mixed bag of gamers that have been in the industry for 20+ years together with some of the brightest up-and-coming young talents.

Between us, we cover everything from product development, electronics, software, game design, art direction and product design through to customer service.




We’re not only building a game here. We’re making an Esports revolution – pushing the line between gaming and sport. Together, we can do anything. 





Impact... material strength... flexibility... swings... We have tested it all.

Hundreds of different tests have been carried out with internal and external testers, and by experts from all over Europe who have visited our Copenhagen office and pitched in with ideas on how to put the JABIIs to the test.

 


 



Practise makes perfect, and with Christian in the front, JABII has a veteran with more than 20+ years of experience in the production of hardware products. Together with strong partners on the electronics-side, we are confident in the product that we have created.
 







Above, you can see images from our electronics manufacturer in Sweden, a machine from our production that makes the JABII grip and the part of our office that we have rigged out to be ready to handle the assembly with love and care that we personally will test and ship to make sure that everything is as it should be.
 


“No Man is an Island”, they say, and we know it's true. JABII has a long list of partners and friends who have contributed with knowledge, funding, and skills.

There are too many to name them all. Among those who really stood out are DGI and the IT University of Copenhagen.

DGI is Denmark’s largest sports organisation, with 1,700,000 members (out of 5,800,000 Danes -  that's almost ⅓ of the total population). DGI focuses on strengthening volunteer sports in Denmark and increasing the health and well-being of Danish society. in 2018, JABII won the DGI sports innovation competition "DGI Impact".

The IT University of Copenhagen is Denmark's top tier technical and engineering University. Together with DTU - Denmark's Technical University - they helped us with the latest tech insights and access to testing facilities and brainpower. 


 


You can earn 10% on each sale you help us bring, it's very easy to start and get earning. Just click on the banner below to read more.











We will ship you your JABII at our costs to our international hubs. Depending on where in the world you are, we will either ship to you from our hub in DK (EU backers), Singapore (Singaporean backers), Canada (Canadian backers), Australia (Australia and New Zealand backers), or Atlanta (USA and the rest of the world). 

Unfortunately, different import laws and customs have made it possible for JABII to only ship to certain countries. 

Write us at sales@jabii.com if your country is not on the list - then we may be able to give you a unique shipping price!

story:
According to FCC, Marvoto Z1 applies ultrasound imaging which has been used for over 20 years in the market and it has an excellent safety record. It is based on non-ionizing radiation, so it does not have the same risks as X-rays. 

 

Marvoto Z1 has been dedicated to making Ultrasound Technology portable and suitable for everyone's family. After our fetus camera being awarded as shown below, Marvoto Z1 has made the Belly Fit our newest trial in the fitness field, based on the guaranteed safety of portable ultrasound technology.

Marvoto Z1 applies Mobile Application to present images and results after measuring body fat. Although it can only be applied by Android System, it is the world's first fat scanner that can present changing fat figures with images. 

 

Marvoto Belly Fit provides you with A Weekly Line Chart of the changing figures of your body fat. This helps record the effectiveness of your work on reducing body fat after taking Marvoto Belly Fat in use. 

 

No worries on the extra fat of your body! Marvoto Z1 provides targeted exercise tips after being applied to measure the thickness of fat & to keep on track of your fat thickness. We have different solutions to those extra fats, no matter it's on your arm or on your belly. 

 

​

 

 

 

​

Marvoto Z1 Team has made a collaboration with Kickbooster.

Kickbooster will Pay 10 % Commissions to Backers For Sharing Your Favorite Product in Cash!

 

Marvoto will unlock the following perks according to the target goals completed within the

time-limit. 

 

We are doing free-shipping worldwide for this crowdfunding.

We plan to ship starting in July 2020. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of the products' ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

We've prepared a FREE Marvoto Belly Fit Z1 for all our IGG backers. All backers who choose to show support by donation or purchasing our product. The free Marvoto Belly Fit Z1 will be delivered to a lucky person!
The lucky person will be chosen through a lucky draw@the end of the IGG Campaign!
story_txt:
According to FCC, Marvoto Z1 applies ultrasound imaging which has been used for over 20 years in the market and it has an excellent safety record. It is based on non-ionizing radiation, so it does not have the same risks as X-rays.  Marvoto Z1 has been dedicated to making Ultrasound Technology portable and suitable for everyone's family. After our fetus camera being awarded as shown below, Marvoto Z1 has made the Belly Fit our newest trial in the fitness field, based on the guaranteed safety of portable ultrasound technology.Marvoto Z1 applies Mobile Application to present images and results after measuring body fat. Although it can only be applied by Android System, it is the world's first fat scanner that can present changing fat figures with images.  Marvoto Belly Fit provides you with A Weekly Line Chart of the changing figures of your body fat. This helps record the effectiveness of your work on reducing body fat after taking Marvoto Belly Fat in use.  No worries on the extra fat of your body! Marvoto Z1 provides targeted exercise tips after being applied to measure the thickness of fat & to keep on track of your fat thickness. We have different solutions to those extra fats, no matter it's on your arm or on your belly.  ​
