story:
Finally! Breastmilk storage that makes your life easier

  • Safely chilled milk 20+ hours
  • Effortless to clean—Use the dishwasher!
  • Caregivers can feed the baby on the go—Use the lid!
  • Breeze through security with confidence
  • Easily connects to every major pump and your hands-free bra—Medela native or use a standard adapter for all other major pumps (choose the Adapter as one of your Perks, includes 2)

 

 

* Lid (3 oz) and inner Milk Chamber (12 oz) easily connect to your hands-free bra. Ounce marks are laser-etched on both to track milk.  

 

 

 

 

 

Choose your color and enjoy!

Our top-quality matte powder-coat finishes launch in three colors to match your style. Each Chiller is available in Plum, Ocean or Sage. Choose your favorite color at Checkout when you purchase your Chiller.  

 

Ceres Chill is...

And it's more affordable! 
Ceres Chill is more affordable than the current alternatives, especially considering the expense of coolers, ice packs, storage systems, and added plastic bags. 

Did my husband just steal my Ceres Chill for his tailgate?!  
Ceres Chill offers moms a beautiful alternative to coolers that they can proudly use for the rest of their lives. But that doesn't mean only moms will love it. With a 36 oz double-walled, stainless steel capacity or a 12 oz inner Milk Chamber for infusing water or chilling favorite beverages without dilution, you'll want to use this Chiller for sports drinks, coffee, tea, fruit-infused water, wine or beer for long after your breastfeeding days are behind you.

And it converts to a baby bottle!
Ceres Chill is the best option for caregivers running out with the baby and bringing breastmilk along. Not only can you easily toss it in the diaper bag, you also have a bottle built right into the lid. Watch how...

 

Moms can't wait!

 

 

I've lived through the challenges of breastfeeding and spoken to hundreds of moms. The world needed an alternative to big ol' coolers and loads of plastic.

I know firsthand that it is practically impossible to exclusively nurse a baby for a year: There's just no way to have your baby with you every moment, on every plane, in every boardroom,  or at your side on each battlefield (literally for our soldier moms and figuratively for the rest of us). 

To breastfeed up to this point, we've had no choice but to deal with what was available, no matter how clunky and difficult to use. 

Now we have a choice. We choose our babies, ourselves, and the environment.

 

Our road to bringing you Ceres Chill

We love Indiegogo!

We want moms to have the very best designed Chiller made out of the very best, safest materials. We've already invested the money in design and stainless steel tooling so we're well on our way. Next up:

  • $12,500 for our initial production run
  • $2,500 to finalize tooling and make Ceres Chill compatible for every major pump without using an adapter

Back us and one of the first Ceres Chill Breastmilk Chillers goes to you! 

Plus, Indiegogo makes it possible to donate a breastmilk Chiller. We chose Mom2Mom Global and Breastfeeding in Combat Boots, which support military families who face challenges breastfeeding all over the world. This is an exceptionally well-run joint non-profit worthy of generous support.   

This Chiller will change the world by helping moms and keeping huge amounts of plastic out of our landfills.   

  • Convenient. Just one Chiller to drop in your bag and go.
  • Easy to Use. Pump directly into Ceres Chill anywhere that takes you away from your baby and fridge.​​
  • ​Clean and safe. No more sticky messes from changing out plastic bottles while pumping.
  • Save time and money. Dishwasher safe and durable. No bags and bottles.  
  • Versatile. Caregiver on the go? Use the lid as a bottle to feed the baby safely chilled breastmilk. 
  • Save the environment. Ceres Chill eliminates waste and expense (an average of 4-12+ plastic bottles and between 300-2000+ disposable bags during the months a woman breastfeeds).
  • Sustainable. Use it long after you are done breastfeeding to chill (but not dilute) juice, sports drinks, wine, beer, iced coffee...Use our infuser to make your favorite tea, coffee or delicious fruit- infused water that stays hot or cold for hours. 
  • Use it with your existing pump and hands-free bra! Medela native or use a standard adapter for all other major pumps. Adapter available as a Perk you can purchase with your Chiller or through any major retailer. 

 

Other ways you can help

We can’t thank you enough for helping to make Ceres Chill a reality. 

We understand everyone isn't able to support us with a pledge. We're asking that you share what we're doing even if you can’t give a dollar, purchase a Ceres Chill for yourself (who couldn't use 36 oz of state-of-the-art ice cold/hot storage?) or donate a Chiller to Mom2Mom Global. Help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, by emailing your friends a link to this campaign, or sharing it in all your great mama/playgroups and any other place you can think of! 

 

 

  • Huge discounts on a limited number of Ceres Chill breastmilk Chillers for early birds who back this campaign.
  • Choose your favorite color! Each Ceres Chill Breastmilk Chiller comes in Plum, Blue or White. The chiller consists of 5 parts: 36 oz chiller, 12 oz inner Milker Chamber for milk, 3 oz lid that doubles as a bottle or cup, Cap to seal milk in, threaded neck (Connector) compatible with Medela and Evenflo.  An adapter allows you to easily connect to Spectra, Avent, Babybuddha, and more... Adapter available with your Chiller at Checkout or through any major retailer.
  • Even bigger discounts when you choose 2 complete Chillers as a set. Select the two-pack from the Perks and then choose from Plum, Sage or Ocean at Checkout.  
  • Add a discounted extra 12 oz inner Milk Chamber if you don't need another full Chiller but would like a spare chamber as a back-up to use for your last pump of the day or to leave in the fridge or the dishwasher.
  • Donate Chillers to Mom2Mom (Breastfeeding in Combat Boots)
  • 6-Packs of Chillers for organizational distribution (NICUs, corporate gifts for moms returning to work, lactation consultants, etc.)
  • If you love what we are doing and want to see us succeed in our mission to make moms' lives easier and eliminate plastic waste, please feel free to donate any amount by clicking on the hot pink "Back it" button at the very top of the page beside the video or (on your mobile) scroll all the way to the right of the listed Perks.  
  • Give Ceres Chill as the Perfect Gift Super-Fast. Although Chillers won't be available until September, you can still give Ceres Chill as a gift in August.  Check out the Perk to add a gorgeous, strong Archer Mama tote to give with a booklet that will tell a new mom all that she has to look forward to in just a few weeks.  Then we will send her Chiller ASAP so she can hold the amazingness in her own hands.  

 

Shipping Times and Costs

We're currently able to ship to the United States and Canada with discounted shipping at checkout.  3-6 business days is the expected speed. 

We are also now excited to announce we are shipping to the UK, Netherlands and Australia.  Shipping is discounted but still has to cross an ocean or two so it is $25 flat rate, even if you order more than one Chiller - so go crazy and make the most of the shipping cost!  Shipping will take 10-20 days estimated so those Chillers are predicted to arrive in October.  

We're working on worldwide shipping. Please email us with any specific questions about shipping and if you really need a Chiller to get to you in a specific country.  

 

Risks can always arise during a project like this. We've made sure we educated ourselves about the risks and found the right manufacturing partners to deliver the quality moms need and deserve.  We've assembled an amazing team to make sure we get these Chillers in your hands as soon as possible.

Our top manufacturers are hard at work rolling these Chiller parts out, so THAT part of the risk is not a concern. The next thing is getting these Chillers assembled, packaged, out the door, and into your hands.

We've kept the timeline as tight as possible because we know moms need these Chillers NOW.  Given recent trade and geopolitical issues, there is a risk of small delays that will be beyond our control, but we're taking every step available to get these Chillers here as soon as we can.  We're so close, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know!

 

SPECIAL THANKS

story:
Have you wondered why you feel exhausted even after a long night of rest? Sleep quality matters.  

With Respio Sleep Monitor, you can finally UNLOCK the mystery of sleep quality with accurate sleep tracking. Follow its Insights & tips to improve your sleep immediately.

Sleep affects every part of life—your health, your mood and more. It can help you perform at your best, stay productive, and fight weight gain and depression. So if you’re ready to make the most of your day, start by improving your night. 

That's why we developed RESPIO, the smart sleep coach that works as an accurate non-invasive bio-metric tracker that will effortlessly monitor everything about your sleep, allowing you to effectively improve the quality of your sleep. 

 

 

The Respio Sleep Monitor uses tracked data and analytics to measure, manage, and improve your sleep, right from your phone. Leveraging an extremely thin sensor strip that you’ll never even notice, wake up, open your iPhone or Android app, and learn everything you need to know about your sleep habits.

Enjoy automatic tracking that provides you with information related to sleeping times, breathing, snoring, bedroom temperature, and humidity. Plus, with personalized sleep coaches, find a new motivation in your life to improve your sleep quality. A better life starts with more restful sleep. Who doesn't want to sleep better? 

The best part is that Respio works almost as if it was not there. This is a 1mm thin highly accurate sensor strip that picks up your sleeping patterns as you rest and sleep on it (literally). It works with any mattress, you can perfectly put your bedsheets on top of it and forget about it. Unlike other devices on the market, Respio is not a wearable, so you won’t need to do anything other than sleeping on it!   

 

 

 

Respio App analyzes your sleep and life patterns to find the most likely cause with machine learning techniques. Respio App collects the physical information and the daily activities of the user when measuring sleep. By analyzing sleep and activities for more than two weeks, we find the factors that have the greatest effect on sleep. Users will be able to manage the factors that have the greatest effect on sleep and gradually reduce symptoms.

 

Respio accurately analyzes your personal sleep data and calculate your sleep debt. Check your sleep debt just like checking the balance on your bank account.

 Sleep debt is a fancy term, but it perfectly describes the problem. Every time you do not sleep well, your body and mind accumulate a sleep deficit that keeps on mounting and making you feel exhausted and unproductive, no matter how many cups of coffee you take. If you consecutively abuse your sleep cycle, sleeping for only a few hours each night without any REM sleep or a sleeping environment that is right for you, the abuse is going to add up.

For sleep debt analysis, Respio collects the following physical information, gender, age, BMI. Daily activity factors include; alcohol, caffeine, smoking, fever, workout, medicine, stuffy nose, shower, sunlight exposure, stress, change of sleep environment and so on.

Respio would never force you to enter your personal information and daily activities to analyze sleep apnea if you are concerned about your privacy.

 

Repsio App optimizes your bedtime and wake time to reduce the sleep debt in the most natural way possible. Besides, it will monitor the sleep environment-humidity, brightness, and temperature and provides suggestions to improve your overall sleep quality.

Our goals are simple: we want to accurately detect your sleeping patterns and habits to reduce your sleep debt accumulation. Along the way, we want to make falling sleeping easier for everyone, with an affordable and accessible sleep coach that was made just for you.

 

Repio's Breathing Exercise Program is an incremental upgrade of which A**** inc. offers on there A**** Watch

A*****'s breath app just notifies you and shows and guides the same breathing pattern over and over again. Respio App analyzes and personally trains you so you can breath better and relax better. After using the Respio breath exercises you will reap the benefits of relaxation, improved concentration, stress reduction, normalization of blood pressure, and an increased lung capacity that will help you beat your insomnia. 

 

Respio app works both on iOS and Android systems and both the Respio sensor strip and app are only for individual use- which means that Respio can only be used by one person at any given time and that the cumulative data collected by Respio can only help the person whose sleeping data has been collected. That's one of the beauties of Respio: It's a truly highly personalized sleeping coach!

 

How does Respio compare to other sleep trackers? Sleep trackers are not a new thing, so what makes RESPIO so special? In traditional medical communities, sleep tracking is very expensive and takes a full night at their clinic. What's the point of tracking just one night? Plus, when you sleep at a different place, you sleep differently because you need to be more aware of and get used to the different sleep environment. It's a basic evolution mechanism. 

 

 

 RESPIO is a unique sensor with integrated breathing-measurement technology. The interior features a pressure sensor and the exterior is made of 100% cotton. RESPIO’s sensor transmits breathing signals to the RESPIO app via Bluetooth 4.0. The data-collecting function of RESPIO offers more detailed results, scores and suggested tips and exercises over time: the more you use it, the best it performs. 

The RESPIO app will be available for iOS and Android systems

 

 

 

 

 

In 2018, we launched a campaign on Indiegogo to take RESPIO forward, but we failed for one simple reason: by then, RESPIO was exclusively focused on Sleep Apnea, as we forgot one very key ingredient—that was an extremely narrow approach that didn’t clearly convey how helpful RESPIO could be for every person dealing with sleeping problems.

So we learned from that mistake, we made further improvements in the device and in the app, and we are now re-launching RESPIO as the perfect sleeping sidekick and smart sleeping coach that is going to make your days a lot better by turning your difficult nights into journeys of sweet restorative dreams.

Busy professionals that see stress affecting their sleep, like executives, professionals with changing sleeping schedules, like nurses, and professional drivers working at night are just some examples of people who can turn to RESPIO to get the quality healthy sleep for the quality of life that they deserve.

 

We added many safety circuits and tried various tests because Respio Sensor is installed on bed mattress during sleep. Many people have worried about electrical shocks or fire from the sensor.  

(1) Safety against moisture

Respio Sensor operates at 3.3v. 3.3 V is not dangerous because it is as low as two typical batteries(1.5v x 2). We had an experiment to pour water into the sensor to check electrical safety. The sensor worked normally and there was no electrical leakage.

 

(2) Don’t worry about the effect of electromagnetic radiation,

We have already tested RESPIO in an anechoic chamber with EMI Tester.  Electromagnetic waves are released at a safe level from 9 dBuV/m to 18 dBuV/m.

RESPIO sensor measures subtle pressure changes caused by chest and abdomen movement. This is why Respio sensor strip should be placed at the level of the chest. The chest cavity and abdomen expand and deflate during respiration. Respio measures the movement of the chest and abdomen to collect data and translate into something that regular customers could understand: sleep score.

When you breathe in, both chest and abdomen expand at the same time. The sensor detects this movement. So when you breathe in, the sensor graph shows a sudden spike.

When you breathe out, both chest and abdomen deflate to a neutral state. Respio sensor detects this change, and the sensor graph shows accordingly as shown in the pictures.

 

 

 

This video shows the change of the data values. When I apply force onto a sensor, the sensor value increases, and when I release, the sensor value decreases. The oscilloscope next to the laptop also shows the same results. Check it out! 

 
 

Our Real-World Testing: In unforced breathing, Respio detects the breathing cycle accurately during the inhalation and exhalation cycles. During the phase of sleep apnea, the graph flattens out.

 
Our team with software developers, hardware engineers, AI researchers, we are ready to take this product to market.  We are proud of delivering true innovations. Though the diverse background, our team is unified under a vision: “Improving Health”. Building in-house software and hardware is not easy, especially bio-metric sensors. 
 
 
 

Risks and challenges

With our years of experience in the industry, we are very confident with our process and production schedule for Respio. However, we also know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we’ve made sure to account for some amount of craziness or unforeseen problems that may occur in our schedule. If something does go wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and about the way in which we are solving them.

If you consecutively abuse your sleep cycle, sleeping for only a few hours each night without any REM sleep or a sleeping environment that is right for you, the abuse is going to add up.For sleep debt analysis, Respio collects the following physical information, gender, age, BMI. Daily activity factors include; alcohol, caffeine, smoking, fever, workout, medicine, stuffy nose, shower, sunlight exposure, stress, change of sleep environment and so on.Respio would never force you to enter your personal information and daily activities to analyze sleep apnea if you are concerned about your privacy. Repsio App optimizes your bedtime and wake time to reduce the sleep debt in the most natural way possible. Besides, it will monitor the sleep environment-humidity, brightness, and temperature and provides suggestions to improve your overall sleep quality.Our goals are simple: we want to accurately detect your sleeping patterns and habits to reduce your sleep debt accumulation. Along the way, we want to make falling sleeping easier for everyone, with an affordable and accessible sleep coach that was made just for you. Repio's Breathing Exercise Program is an incremental upgrade of which A**** inc. offers on there A**** WatchA*****'s breath app just notifies you and shows and guides the same breathing pattern over and over again. Respio App analyzes and personally trains you so you can breath better and relax better. After using the Respio breath exercises you will reap the benefits of relaxation, improved concentration, stress reduction, normalization of blood pressure, and an increased lung capacity that will help you beat your insomnia.  Respio app works both on iOS and Android systems and both the Respio sensor strip and app are only for individual use- which means that Respio can only be used by one person at any given time and that the cumulative data collected by Respio can only help the person whose sleeping data has been collected. That's one of the beauties of Respio: It's a truly highly personalized sleeping coach! How does Respio compare to other sleep trackers? Sleep trackers are not a new thing, so what makes RESPIO so special? In traditional medical communities, sleep tracking is very expensive and takes a full night at their clinic. What's the point of tracking just one night? Plus, when you sleep at a different place, you sleep differently because you need to be more aware of and get used to the different sleep environment. It's a basic evolution mechanism.    RESPIO is a unique sensor with integrated breathing-measurement technology. The interior features a pressure sensor and the exterior is made of 100% cotton. RESPIO’s sensor transmits breathing signals to the RESPIO app via Bluetooth 4.0. The data-collecting function of RESPIO offers more detailed results, scores and suggested tips and exercises over time: the more you use it, the best it performs. The RESPIO app will be available for iOS and Android systems     
In 2018, we launched a campaign on Indiegogo to take RESPIO forward, but we failed for one simple reason: by then, RESPIO was exclusively focused on Sleep Apnea, as we forgot one very key ingredient—that was an extremely narrow approach that didn’t clearly convey how helpful RESPIO could be for every person dealing with sleeping problems.
So we learned from that mistake, we made further improvements in the device and in the app, and we are now re-launching RESPIO as the perfect sleeping sidekick and smart sleeping coach that is going to make your days a lot better by turning your difficult nights into journeys of sweet restorative dreams.
Busy professionals that see stress affecting their sleep, like executives, professionals with changing sleeping schedules, like nurses, and professional drivers working at night are just some examples of people who can turn to RESPIO to get the quality healthy sleep for the quality of life that they deserve.
 

We added many safety circuits and tried various tests because Respio Sensor is installed on bed mattress during sleep. Many people have worried about electrical shocks or fire from the sensor.  
(1) Safety against moisture
Respio Sensor operates at 3.3v. 3.3 V is not dangerous because it is as low as two typical batteries(1.5v x 2). We had an experiment to pour water into the sensor to check electrical safety. The sensor worked normally and there was no electrical leakage.
 
(2) Don’t worry about the effect of electromagnetic radiation,
We have already tested RESPIO in an anechoic chamber with EMI Tester.  Electromagnetic waves are released at a safe level from 9 dBuV/m to 18 dBuV/m.


RESPIO sensor measures subtle pressure changes caused by chest and abdomen movement. This is why Respio sensor strip should be placed at the level of the chest. The chest cavity and abdomen expand and deflate during respiration. Respio measures the movement of the chest and abdomen to collect data and translate into something that regular customers could understand: sleep score.

When you breathe in, both chest and abdomen expand at the same time. The sensor detects this movement. So when you breathe in, the sensor graph shows a sudden spike.
When you breathe out, both chest and abdomen deflate to a neutral state. Respio sensor detects this change, and the sensor graph shows accordingly as shown in the pictures.
  
 
 
This video shows the change of the data values. When I apply force onto a sensor, the sensor value increases, and when I release, the sensor value decreases. The oscilloscope next to the laptop also shows the same results. Check it out! 
 

 
Our Real-World Testing: In unforced breathing, Respio detects the breathing cycle accurately during the inhalation and exhalation cycles. During the phase of sleep apnea, the graph flattens out.



 Our team with software developers, hardware engineers, AI researchers, we are ready to take this product to market.  We are proud of delivering true innovations. Though the diverse background, our team is unified under a vision: “Improving Health”. Building in-house software and hardware is not easy, especially bio-metric sensors.    
Risks and challenges
With our years of experience in the industry, we are very confident with our process and production schedule for Respio. However, we also know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we’ve made sure to account for some amount of craziness or unforeseen problems that may occur in our schedule. If something does go wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and about the way in which we are solving them.

story:
My dream is to satisfy Israel's craving for our national fast-food favorite with a vibrantly healthy, scrumptiously energizing re-invention of the falafel.

I hope you will join me in fulfilling my two-part mission:

1) To produce great-tasting kosher sprouted pitas and breads for sale to the public--for the first time in Israel!  In America, sprouted bread is in every major supermarket, and easily accessible.  In Israel, we have nothing like this, not even in the health food stores.  There is a huge unmet demand for delicious, high-quality sprouted bread here in Israel.  


2) To open Israel's 1st healthy falafel stand, to be located in the Central Jerusalem Market, knows as the 'Shuk'.  It is the center of food culture and the hippest spot to enjoy culinary experiences.   Although the health food stores in the shuk are always packed, currently there are no healthy options for prepared food. 





The concept of falafel is genius: it's simple to make, tastes great, vegan friendly and made with local ingredients.  And while falafel is so awesome, imagine how much better it would be if it weren't made with white pita and falafel deep fried in rancid oil.

Introducing the

   1st Organic, Sprouted Falafel 

     in Jerusalem and Israel


This 'new and improved' falafel will be made using my very own  100% sprouted organic pitas filled with live pesto, fresh hot sauce, homemade pickles and salads. I sprout the chickpeas before cooking them for hummus and the techina is made from soaked and sprouted sesame seeds.   And of course, the sprouted, baked falafel.  (No deep-frying!) 

I only use cold-pressed olive oil, real sea salt, fresh lemon, garlic and herbs, making my unique falafel truly delicious, nutritious and medicinal!

'Let your food be your medicine,' said Hippocrates, father of modern medicine.

'Let your medicine taste amazing,' says Samantha Siegel, founder of Rustic Regal Sprouted Bread Bakery.

Grains, legumes and seeds will be soaked, sprouted and baked to create a fusion of raw, vegan and Middle Eastern cuisine.  And together we will see Jerusalem -- the holiest city in the Holy Land -- serve residents and tourists the world’s healthiest street food.                                                                           


Selling my sprouted falafel at a local fair. People loved it! They couldn't believe how good healthy food can taste. We sold everything.

Who I Am and What I Do

Hi, I'm Samantha Siegel, mother, artist, dancer, baker and founder of Rustic Regal Sprouted Bread Bakery in Jerusalem.  Originally from Chicago, I moved to Israel 12 years ago to learn from Shoshana Harrari, Israel's renown health guru, who has helped thousands of people heal from every ailment under the sun. She taught me the basics of raw, living foods and how to make sprouted bread.


Shoshana Harrari, my teacher and soul sister.

"Samantha's sprout bread creations have reached the rare meeting place of excellent cuisine and true health."                      - Shoshana Harrari


Pitas, Tortillas, Breadsticks and Loaves


For the past 3 years, I have been supplying the country’s only 100% organic sprouted breads with absolutely no flour, yeast or additives. It contains just the sprouts and sea salt!

(One other bakery in Jerusalem sells a sprouted bread, but it contains flour, oil and sugar.)

Bread for Gluten Intolerance

I have sold thousands of packages of sprouted bread to people throughout the country.  For many of my gluten-intolerant clients, my bread is the only bread they can eat!  


An article in Breaking Israel News that just came out:

http://www.breakingisraelnews.com/72848/what-do...


 What is Sprouted Bread?

Instead of grinding dormant wheat berries into a lifeless flour, I germinate them into living sprouts.

Sprouts are wonderful for the flavor of the bread and what your body truly needs and desires.  It's the best of both worlds.  

Benefits of Sprouting your Grains

- Sprouting multiplies vitamin and mineral levels up to 600%

- Sprouting decreases 'phytic acid' (an anti-nutrient that blocks mineral absorption), so you can absorb the nutrients from the rest of the meal

- Sprouted grains are tolerated by many people with gluten sensitivities

- Sprouted grains are easily digested and absorbed

- Higher in protein and lower in carbs

- Richer, sweeter and more satisfying than flour 

-Higher in B vitamins and the best option for vegetarians and vegans

- Lower glycemic level, a better option for those with diabetes



Phase 1:  Producing Sprouted Pitas 

I need to set up and outfit my own factory.  This will require rent, infrastructure improvements, purchasing equipment and raw materials, hiring workers, and obtaining approval from the Health Ministry as well as certification for kashrut.  

Health-food stores, organic-food delivery companies, and specialty-catering and organic restaurants are already lined up to purchase our sprouted pitas. 


Phase 2: Our Own Storefront / Sprouted Falafel Stand

There is no better place to open Rustic Regal's Sprouted Falafel than right in the center of it all: the famous Shuk, Jerusalem's outdoor market. The Shuk is the #1 destination for food shopping of all kinds, and is the new trendy hotspot for restaurants and bars.  

My falafel stand will be an eco-friendly, health and fast-food oasis.  It will be quaint, woodsy, and homey, with murals, biblical references and quotes on the walls, a place for physical and spiritual rejuvenation in the middle of the city.

Rustic Regal's Sprouted Falafel will result in happier, more fulfilled people - because health is wealth! 


Why My Sprouted Bakery and Falafel Stand Will Succeed

- Israel has a booming health market filled with organic restaurants, health food stores and alternative, natural products.  

- Israel has a 5% vegan rate, one of the world’s highest.

- There is no real competition in the area of sprouted breads products.  

- The gluten-free market is booming, and sprouted bread is tolerated by many people with gluten sensitivities.

- Falafel stands are by far the most successful style of restaurant in Israel. While 80% of traditional restaurants fail within the first year due to high overhead costs, 90% of falafel stands are cash-flow positive.

- My falafel is the best tasting ever, and it makes you feel great even after you eat it.


Quick History Lesson!

Essene bread - Native to the land of Israel

The Essenes, a Jewish group that flourished from the 2nd century BC to the 1st century AD, are credited with the first recipe for sprouted bread.  They sun-dried thin sprouted wheat wafers on hot rocks under the Ein Gedi sun.  
It's  time to bring back sprouted bread to its native land.  With the help of your contributions, there will be untold benefits to the quality of life of the people in the holy land.  

Please visit my campaign on my website at: 

 http://www.rusticregal.com/indigogo-campaign/


Check out 'Rustic Regal Bakery' on Facebook


 Samantha Siegel

rusticregal@gmail.com

052 415 9714

Jerusalem, Israel


PERKS

Here are a few of the Illustrations from my children's book 'Moon Night', written and illustrated by yours truly! It's an adventurous bed-time story celebrating life, the natural world and the relationship between mother and child.  It is enjoyed just as much by adults as children!


Here is my painting of Jerusalem...

story:
With your help, we're developing a range of revolutionary, discreet, medically-approved inhaled nicotine products that will help smokers across the world quit safely

We're aiming for medical approval from the UK regulatory authority and the FDA in the US so we can help smokers give up effectively and safely

There is growing concern amongst smokers trying to quit that electronic cigarettes and vaping products, while now commonplace, are entirely unregulated and are made in factories where there are no controls on the quality of the parts, materials or chemicals placed inside and heated. These can include substances such as unregulated nicotine concentrate. Aside from news stories about the burns caused by exploding batteries, there is currently no conclusive clinical research evidence on the side effects of e-cigarette chemical vapour on health.


Help us develop a safe medically-licensed alternative for smokers by donating as little as £5 (that's less than $8) TODAY.




Check out our website to find out more about us, our story and how you can be part of a Tobacco Free World at www.tobaccofreeworld.co.uk


When you donate you will:

Help the continuing development of a revolutionary medically-licensed product that will help smokers in Europe and the US quit safely


We need £2.5 million to complete the first phase of this game-changing project. The reason we need so much is that developing a product to the highest safety standards and doing all the work required to obtain a licence from the FDA or MHRA is expensive.  For some current manufacturers of unregulated e-cigarettes, the cost is simply too much. Not only that but developing a licensed, safe product requires the right expertise. We have that expertise, most existing manufacturers do not.
We're very clear on what the product needs to do and how to obtain a licence. We've got a detailed business plan for the next two years and we've started on the road to developing our prototype - the first working example of our product. You can read more on our website at www.tobaccofreeworld.co.uk
 By contributing as little as just £5 or $5 you can help us finish our design and so that we can get our truly innovative product to market. 

How we'll use your money

Your money will fund the next phase of our work which will take 9-12 months. Once that's done, we can obtain a licence and make our product available to as many smokers and vapers as possible so they can quit with the reassurance that the product they are using is safe and manufactured to the highest standards.

Here's how we're planning to use your money: 

Got a question?

We've answered the most common questions on our website at www.tobaccofreeworld.co.uk

If you can't find the answer to your question drop us a line and we'll add the answer to our FAQ page just as soon as we can.

story:
Short Summary

We are four high school students looking to start our own Junior Roller Derby League. We have one derby girl on board, but her league disbanded and we're ready to start a new one! We have been talking about it for about a year and we are finally in a position to take action. 

What We Need & What You Get 

We need to raise $3000 to get the team up and skating. We need at least ten members to start a team, that means ten pairs of skates, ten helmets, ten sets of knee and elbow pads, ten jerseys. We also need a skating rink to practice and money to legally start a league. 

We're going to start a newsletter so we can send you updates on how the team is going, so you can see what you helped us start.

If we don't reach our goal, we will be putting all of the money towards as much equipment we can get for our skaters.


The Impact

This will impact the people on our team by giving them a place to spend their time in a physically active way. 

Teenagers have nothing to do in Floyd, our town. People are constantly looking for activities and complaining about the lack of. A Jr. Roller Derby team would be really good for this town and give the teenagers a healthy activity. 

Risks & Challenges

Some of the risks and challenges associated with this project:
  • Getting all the paper work and becoming a legal league
  • Informing parents and skaters about the risks of skating
  • Filing for liability waivers 
  • Finding a place in our town that is safe for us to skate in
  • Also reserving a skating rink in another town to scrimmage and compete at
  • Finding other Jr. leagues around the area to scrimmage and compete against

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, share this awesome project on social media! We encourage you use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The world’s first cosmetic mobile app scanner for personalized skincare.

Have you ever wondered “Which moisturizer should I buy for my skin?” or “Are the ingredients in this shampoo suitable for my hair?"

We have. And that's why we created CosScan. Personalized based on each user's data, skin and product history, CosScan helps you take the guesswork out of choosing the perfect skincare product, anywhere and anytime.

First Singapore app to be featured on:

It was broadcast via National TV distribution to all Top 20 TV markets (e.g. New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Chicago) and to more than 96 million households in the United States.

Also Seen On:

CosScan in action:

There’s no one size fits all for skincare products

Your skin is unique and that makes finding the ideal skincare product frustrating at times. That’s why the first thing we get all users to do when they download CosScan from the App Store or Google Play is to profile their skin.

Answer a few short questions, let CosScan analyze your skin type, and you're all set to receive personalized skincare recommendations!

Find out if a product is suitable for your skin

CosScan works as your personal skincare advisor on the go. Not sure if you should purchase a new cosmetic product? Or perhaps you’re wondering which skincare product in your regime is causing you to have breakouts? Just open the app and snap a picture of the ingredient list on your product! Sounds simple enough?

Here’s what goes on in the background:

  1. Our state-of-the-art Object Character Recognition (OCR) module converts all images to text to identify the ingredients present.
  2. Suitability of product ingredients are swiftly analysed using CosScan’s intelligent ingredient categorizing system.
  3. You get a personalized report based on your skin profile within seconds of scanning!

Get personalized reports based on our comprehensive database

Want to find out the suitability of the different ingredients present? View our detailed report so you get a better understanding of the ingredient compatibility with your skin. This is backed by our comprehensive database with over 17,000 ingredients, one that we’re constantly adding new ingredients to!

And to make future skincare or cosmetic product purchase a ton easier?

  1. Use our report saving function to store products for easy reference.
  2. Our intelligent search function will predict the ingredient you’re looking for, so you can find it with ease next time!

Help more people find the right product for their skin type

*Note: All funds raised will be used solely for the development of this project. The founders do not draw a salary for any work done or for services rendered to the company.

About us

Currently available on:

Supported by:

This Digital Skin Platform project is a joint collaboration between the Agency for Science Technology and Research, Nanyang Technological University and SkintechMD Singapore.
story_txt:
The world’s first cosmetic mobile app scanner for personalized skincare.
Have you ever wondered “Which moisturizer should I buy for my skin?” or “Are the ingredients in this shampoo suitable for my hair?"
We have. And that's why we created CosScan. Personalized based on each user's data, skin and product history, CosScan helps you take the guesswork out of choosing the perfect skincare product, anywhere and anytime.



First Singapore app to be featured on:





It was broadcast via National TV distribution to all Top 20 TV markets (e.g. New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Chicago) and to more than 96 million households in the United States.




Also Seen On:




CosScan in action:






There’s no one size fits all for skincare products
Your skin is unique and that makes finding the ideal skincare product frustrating at times. That’s why the first thing we get all users to do when they download CosScan from the App Store or Google Play is to profile their skin.
Answer a few short questions, let CosScan analyze your skin type, and you're all set to receive personalized skincare recommendations!





Find out if a product is suitable for your skin
CosScan works as your personal skincare advisor on the go. Not sure if you should purchase a new cosmetic product? Or perhaps you’re wondering which skincare product in your regime is causing you to have breakouts? Just open the app and snap a picture of the ingredient list on your product! Sounds simple enough?
Here’s what goes on in the background:

Our state-of-the-art Object Character Recognition (OCR) module converts all images to text to identify the ingredients present.
Suitability of product ingredients are swiftly analysed using CosScan’s intelligent ingredient categorizing system.
You get a personalized report based on your skin profile within seconds of scanning!







Get personalized reports based on our comprehensive database
Want to find out the suitability of the different ingredients present? View our detailed report so you get a better understanding of the ingredient compatibility with your skin. This is backed by our comprehensive database with over 17,000 ingredients, one that we’re constantly adding new ingredients to!
And to make future skincare or cosmetic product purchase a ton easier?

Use our report saving function to store products for easy reference.
Our intelligent search function will predict the ingredient you’re looking for, so you can find it with ease next time!







Help more people find the right product for their skin type
*Note: All funds raised will be used solely for the development of this project. The founders do not draw a salary for any work done or for services rendered to the company.




About us




Currently available on:















Supported by:














This Digital Skin Platform project is a joint collaboration between the Agency for Science Technology and Research, Nanyang Technological University and SkintechMD Singapore.

story:
Oncometrik is a medical-decision support tool that allows oncologists to design personalized treatments for their patients based on the genetic profile of the tumor. MIT has selected 50 people from around the globe to go to Boston (USA) this summer to jumpstart their projects at the highly-selective Global Entrepreneurship Bootcamp program. Help Miguel Pardo, biologist and entrepreneur, to take 'oncometrik' to the most prestigious technological university in the world to make it real.

How Oncology works today.

Treatments in Oncology are still mainly based on trial-and-error:


How ONCOmetrik will improve treatments design.

However, in the last years, we have started to design treatments based on the tumor profile of the patient. We call this "Precision medicine".

oncometrik is a tool that will allow physicians to make timely and informed decisions on a patient’s treatment, based on the DNA profile of the tumor. 

Miguel Pardo, ideator & project leader.

Hi all,

  • My name is Miguel, ideator and project leader of ONCOmetrik. I am a biologist and entrepreneur with experience in Oncology, working with patients, families, doctors, hospitals, insurance companies and labs. I know the struggles.
  • I have been selected by MIT to attend the Global Entrepreneurship Bootcamp, where the challenge is to take your idea and create a successful startup in 1-week.
  • I need $10,000 to cover the costs of the program in Boston and jump-start the development of the tool.
SOME ADDITIONAL CV INFO:

Degree in Biology, specializing in Biotechnology (Complutense University, Madrid). I did two fellowships in research in molecular biology on glioblastoma multiforme, a violent type of cancer, and hypertension in adults. Right after my degree, at 22, I co-founded my first company together with a doctor and a lawyer: ONCOHOPE.org, a platform to facilitate cancer patients and their families a better access to state-of-the-art cancer treatments in Spain.

In January 2015, I presented my project Oncometrik (the reason for this campaign) to Singularity University's Call to Innovation 2015, being shortlisted in the Top 50 of more than 15,000 projects.

In June 2015, I was granted an scholarship to participate in a program at Harvard Innovation Lab.

We can make it at MIT. 

The Massachusetts Institute of Technology is reknown for being the home of many technological innovations. We hope to leverage its potential to power the project and attract data scientists, programmers, genetists and medical advisors.

$10,000 is all. How the money will be spent.

If we reach our funding goal, the money will be spent in this way:


  • $6,000 to cover tuition costs at MIT
  • $1,000 to book a round-trip ticket Madrid (ES) - Boston (USA)
  • $1,000 to cover accommodation for the week
  • $2,000 to cover startup creation costs

With your help and MIT's tutoring, we truly believe this could be the next big leap in cancer care worlwide. 

Spread the word now!

story:
OUR MISSION IS:
"To promote health and wellness in the Caribbean region, especially among the underserved, vulnerable and special-needs population, through education, and to assist with treatment plan and equipment needs"



Hello!

My name is Hope Miller-Bodden and I am the President and CEO of Caribbean Health Outreach, Inc. (CHO), a non-profit health organization based in Southern California. Each year, our volunteers, who consist of dedicated doctors, nurses and support staff, facilitate an annual health mission to promote the health and wellness in underserved communities. Our teams of medical professionals provide health education and service in the areas of vision, dental and medical screenings. Over the last five years, we have served over 15,000 people both in Jamaica and Haiti.

CHO provides comprehensive healthcare services and continuing health education to the Caribbean while improving health awareness through a series of health related educational sessions.  We satisfy these goals through a unique series of multi-faceted programs and initiatives: 

  • Our Annual Health Mission : A weeklong event of services to the local population that include general and specific problem visits, diabetes and hypertension screenings, pap smears, EKG exams, vision screenings (including the distribution of reading glasses and sunglasses and glaucoma screenings) and dental examinations, treatment and education and medication management for all related issues.

We are requesting your assistance in the following ways:

  • Research shows us that heart disease, stroke and hypertension are at a crisis level in the Caribbean and amongst underserved populations. Unfortunately, often in these same communities there is an acute shortage of blood pressure machines in the public health system. available for use.  You can help by donating funds towards the purchase of blood pressure machines. 
  • Cervical cancer is also one of the leading causes of death for women in Jamaica and the Caribbean region and this can be prevented, just by a routine Pap Tests and adequate follow up attention. You can help by donating funds towards the purchase of pap screenings materials and to cover the cost of a local Pap test for each woman serviced. A Pap Test in Jamaica cost about JA$  which is roughly $ in US currency.
  • With the noted significant increase in HIV, especially among the youth, HIV/STD health awareness and prevention is crucial and critically needed in the Caribbean. CHO each year conducts community events and outreach efforts, including HIV screening and STD counseling, with the participants served. You can help by donating funds to aid in the procurement of HIV testing kits, educational materials and funds

I credit the monumental success of our organization solely to the collaborative effort of a wonderfully dynamic and extraordinary team of individuals. The great sense of humanitarianism amongst the CHO Health Team, Board of Directors and the local service clubs are the greatest testimony of the vision, passion and success of Caribbean Health Outreach.

We really need your help and assistance to continue to make a difference to the people we serve both here and abroad.We depend 100% on private donations and look forward to your support and/or participation of our efforts.

Thank You & ONE LOVE!

story:
Short Summary 

Dear Friends, Fans of the show and new Fans

My name is Nicole Monique, the Host and Producer of That’s What SHE Said Sports. I started That’s What SHE Said Sports (Sports Talk HER Way) in 2012 after being disillusioned with Shawshank aka corporate America.  I wanted to go back to my first love – broadcasting.  But this time I wanted to combine that love with my passion – sports. Ever since I was a little girl I wanted to do radio, TV, be an actress or win the Heisman Trophy.  My parents always said to dream BIG.

I’m incredibly proud of what I’ve accomplished ‘so far’ but there is still so much work to do.  I originally started doing shows at local sports bars  and from there created my podcast with my good friend and co-dude Bee Gee.  As the audience started growing we decided to move our show to 920 the Answer a radio station located in the heart of Buckhead in Atlanta. We are on Saturday’s from 4-6pm. This is where we need YOU. We are definitely onto something but need your help in keeping it going. 

Air is not cheap and we have created this campaign to 'stay' on the air.  Your contributions keep us on 920 the Answer, it keeps our name out there and allows us to grow the show even more.  Every penny gives us the opportunity to do what we do best on the air – talk, entertain and have fun.

What We Need & What You Get

 

Our goal is $55,000 – this allows us to pay the radio station for our air time and keep us going every Saturday afternoon.  We pay per hour and we get billed monthly and with football season right around the corner – we need to be on the air! Football season is our favorite time of the year and the let’s call them “discussions” are beyond entertaining.

We’ve put together some really good perks – everything from a shout out on the air, a gift certificate towards a cruise and giving you the opportunity to co-host live on the air with me and Bee Gee.

Now if we don’t reach our goal (but I feel that we will) whatever we get will go to the station.  Some time on the air is better than nothing.

  https://soundcloud.com/twss-sports/august-8-2015-if-it-looks-like-a-duck

The Impact

 

This show is important and needed. Bee Gee and I can’t do it alone. We appreciate all those who follow us on social media and those who faithfully call into the show.  We hear the feedback from our fans “we want more.”  That’s our goal with this campaign – to give more.  We pride ourselves in the work we do in the community – volunteering with local food banks, working with the special Olympics and providing a platform to all those who normally wouldn’t get a shot to tell their story. 

We have built relationships with some of the local sports team in Atlanta, I’ve had the opportunity to appear on HLN Weekend Express and local charities have asked us on numerous occasions to MC their events.  This is why this radio show is so important.  It’s more than just radio it’s taking the brand to the next level.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Radio is a business and we have worked hard to get sponsors.  But as you know people want to “see” and “hear” you before they invest in you. So by being on the air and continually growing our audience we will be able to get the sponsors needed after this year. So this campaign is important to get us headed in the right direction.  Without it we can’t do the show – plain and simple. So every penny is greatly appreciated and will not be wasted.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Anything you can do to help we will love and appreciate! If you can’t give monetarily can you please spread the word and tell EVERYONE – that is priceless too!

story:
Why are WE here?

3 theories: Evolution put us here; Aliens put us here; Creationism.

18 years ago I was blessed to start:  www.creationism.org

[EDITED on June 30th] -- -Gee - almost no interest...?

After 1 month, $150 raised.

Hmmm ... let me try a different strategy.

-- The Great Commission (Matthew 28:18-20) --
"And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth. Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen."

I have lived overseas about 8 years of my adult life, i.e. outside of the US.  Folks who speak English as a second language, for them it is still an effort.

We NEED to get quality apologetics (Bible-supporting) information translated into the heart-languages of the people out there.

GENESIS - is so important to God - that it is how He starts the Bible.

GENESIS - is so important to Satan - that this is exactly how he is debilitating modern believers, with the belief that "the Bible has errors" in it.


Oceans - the salt content is increasing a little each year; it is measurable.  Earth's oceans are not a billion years old.  The rate of salt increase is happening too fast!

Earth's spin - is slowing a little each year.  In fact since the 1970s they've been adding 1 second about every 1.5 years.  If the Earth is only 10,000 years old, no big deal - but if someone claims that the Earth is billions of years old - sorry!  That is unscientific.

The Great Barrier Reef - near Australia - is only thousands of years old (based on its current growth rate).

The Sahara Desert, the world's largest, (based on current rates of expansion) is also only thousands of years old.

Ancient Calendars - if evolution were true - then (ahem) why didn't ANYONE in the world begin a calendar prior to about 5,000 or 6,000 years ago?  They claim that humans have been humans for 50,000 or 100,000 years, right?  But all the old calendars started less than 6,000 years ago:  Chinese, Mayan, Irish, Indian, etc.

ALL THE SCIENCE!!! - supports creation theory just fine!

Hominids - ever heard of malnutrition?  Of course there are some deformed skeletons out there!  Ever heard of inbreeding causing deformities?

Well ... perhaps I'll continue to plod along with a low or non-existent budget.  But it sure would help a lot of souls if I could get a few major materials into Farsi (Persian) and Tagalog and Hindi, et cetera.

Please help - so we can reach MORE folks with quality Bible-supporting apologetics information.

story:
Featured on the media

English

 

Albanian


What is Dentem?

Dentem is a platform which allows dental clinics to better manage their business by utilizing electronic tools. Simple implementation of ERP - CRM (Enterprise Resource Planning - Client Relationship Management) for dental clinics allows users to store patients files, manage agendas and monitor financials among other things. 
Patients also benefit from Dentem as they can access their doctors agenda, book an appointment online, search for new clinics, rate and comment on clinics. 
The platform stretches beyond basics. We will introduce a crowdfunding platform for all dental needs that are going to be integrated into the platform. Our team is working on a Visual API to allow researchers to analyze massive data, slice and dice report information as needed. Sparing them all the time they would need to run all those surveys. The platform is web based and the apps are available on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store. 

Desktop and Laptop Dentem - Website

Try the demo - Click Here

E-mail : info@ionian.co

Password: ionian123

What can clinics do?

  • Manage Patient Files
  • Manage Agendas
  • Alert their patients for upcoming visits(via SMS, E-mail or Push Notifications)
  • Manage staff
  • Manage services offered
What can patients do?
  • View doctors agenda
  • View their personal information
  • Search local clinics
  • Rate/Review clinics
PS: The patient view is still in development and it will be finished soon!

Android App - Dentem on Google Play

Thinking Ahead..
Big Data Analysis
The system is designed to allow as much information to be on the system. The will patients will live in the system as single nodes. The niche of our product is the ability to run custom analysis with real (anonymous) data in order to receive custom reports based on researchers needs. 
Social Impact
We are working hard to create a crowdfunding platform tracking dental issues and targeting people that cannot afford their dental expenses. We will collaborate closely with local NGOs (Non Government Organizations) to test out the idea and potentially make it global.

iPhone App Dentem on App Store

Timeline 

Future Goals


Use of Funds

The Team

The Team as of 2015



Challenges

No matter the result of the campaign the project will live on. There are a lot of challenges ahead. The main challenge right now is for Dentem to get all certifications and the compliance's needed to enter the US market. As we love law and we want to deliver something according to US Federal law we will start selling the software once it is HIPPA compliant.

What is HIPPA?

Other than that we want to deliver the update on the apps that will allow every patient to access the system and start discovering clinics, looking at their dental record and book appointments at their doctors office.

We have started locally and we want to expand globally but we will take one step at a time.

On the other hand, we want to include new platforms and mediums that the app will be available. With the first being the territory of smartwatches with Android Wear and Apple Watch. Them moving to Windows - Windows Mobile. Later on with Dedicated Desktop Apps. As well as integrate third party tech like Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook and Wunderlist, Google Keep for note keeping.

Pricing - Clinics


If you can't contribute. You can still help us.

If you are not able to help us by donating you can still help us by :

  • Sharing the campaign with your friends
  • Sharing the campaign in your public profile
  • Refer the app to your dentist(doctor).

We appreciate sharing as much as we appreciate donations. #SharingIsCaring 

Referral = Donation

You can reach all the tiers or even ambassador rank even without giving a dime. Just refer your friends or people that could be interested in the project and if they donate you will be entitled to all the perks above.

Special thanks to Jon Tarifa for the music

Jon Tarifa  - Youtube
Jon Tarifa - Facebook
Jon Tarifa - We can make it feat. Mame Balla

Alert their patients for upcoming visits(via SMS, E-mail or Push Notifications)
Manage staff
Manage services offered



What can patients do?




View doctors agenda

View their personal information
Search local clinics
Rate/Review clinics

PS: The patient view is still in development and it will be finished soon!

Android App - Dentem on Google Play





Thinking Ahead..
Big Data Analysis
The system is designed to allow as much information to be on the system. The will patients will live in the system as single nodes. The niche of our product is the ability to run custom analysis with real (anonymous) data in order to receive custom reports based on researchers needs. 
Social Impact
We are working hard to create a crowdfunding platform tracking dental issues and targeting people that cannot afford their dental expenses. We will collaborate closely with local NGOs (Non Government Organizations) to test out the idea and potentially make it global.
iPhone App Dentem on App Store


   Timeline  




Future Goals







Use of Funds



The Team
The Team as of 2015









Challenges

 No matter the result of the campaign the project will live on. There are a lot of challenges ahead. The main challenge right now is for Dentem to get all certifications and the compliance's needed to enter the US market. As we love law and we want to deliver something according to US Federal law we will start selling the software once it is HIPPA compliant.


What is HIPPA?

Other than that we want to deliver the update on the apps that will allow every patient to access the system and start discovering clinics, looking at their dental record and book appointments at their doctors office.We have started locally and we want to expand globally but we will take one step at a time.On the other hand, we want to include new platforms and mediums that the app will be available. With the first being the territory of smartwatches with Android Wear and Apple Watch. Them moving to Windows - Windows Mobile. Later on with Dedicated Desktop Apps. As well as integrate third party tech like Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook and Wunderlist, Google Keep for note keeping.Pricing - ClinicsIf you can't contribute. You can still help us.If you are not able to help us by donating you can still help us by :
Sharing the campaign with your friends
Sharing the campaign in your public profile
Refer the app to your dentist(doctor).
We appreciate sharing as much as we appreciate donations. #SharingIsCaring Referral = DonationYou can reach all the tiers or even ambassador rank even without giving a dime. Just refer your friends or people that could be interested in the project and if they donate you will be entitled to all the perks above.Special thanks to Jon Tarifa for the musicJon Tarifa  - YoutubeJon Tarifa - FacebookJon Tarifa - We can make it feat. Mame Balla

story:
Our Mission

Founded in 2012 in Bethesda, MD, Lolly’s Locks is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization dedicated to providing high-quality wigs to cancer patients suffering hair loss as a side-effect of chemotherapy.

Lolly’s Locks works with wig-providers across the country to serve a diverse population of women because we know cancer has no boundaries. In just over two years, we have provided wigs to over 365 cancer patients in 44 states.

Hair loss is one of the most psychologically detrimental side-effects of cancer. When women lose their hair, they lose a part of their identity. High-quality wigs can cost thousands of dollars, and are typically not covered by insurance. In collaboration with our wig-providers, we seek to ensure that our recipients receive a wig that is stylized and personalized to them to make them maintain dignity, normalcy, and privacy in their lives despite the traumatic effects of cancer.

What We Need & What You Get

As we have grown, we have been fortunate to receive both national and local press. The press was targeted primarily at one of our audience- potential recipients- but not to the donors that make our mission possible. Thus, applications poured in, but donations did not keep up.  This led to our having to make the extremely hard decision to close our application process until we brought in more money.

In the last month we have made enormous strides to allow us to be able to reopen as soon as possible. We have scoured the internet applying for every grant possible, we have reached out to new donor populations, we have spread the word about Lolly's Locks as far and as wide as our hearts can reach. We have signed up for farmers markets, worked with fundraisers, reached out to retail stores, sought out new partners. We have spent hours upon hours trying to figure out how to sustain our mission financially when each wig costs our organization right around $1,000. I often wake up in the middle of the night thinking about ways to bring in more donations. I have been keeping a notepad next to my bed for this reason. I will wake up with text scattered across a sticky note reminding me to email a donor or to reach out to a new company. I check my email constantly hoping that a new donation has reached my inbox. We bicker over who gets to open the mail, just to see if a new check has come in. We find ourselves on the phone, early in the morning, weekends, late at night, discussing possible fundraising options.

The decision to close applications was bittersweet. Naturally, we are so disappointed that we are unable to sustain with current demand. We have consistently stated that our goal is to never turn away a worthy recipient and by closing applications, we are leaving many women desiring our services in the lurch. We get calls every day from women asking when we will be able to open our doors again. These are women that want to feel comfortable in their own skin, that want to feel like themselves. It breaks my heart to turn them away. Coming in to work and not calling recipient after recipient is so hard. It makes me cringe to think that there are women that visit our website and are greeted with the message that our application is closed when they are in dire need of the normalcy that a quality wig would provide.

We are slowly getting closer to our goal to be able to reopen applications but we still have a ways to go. We are now turning to you to help us fund wigs for TEN cancer patients in need. This will cost us approximately $10,000, and we are asking for your help and compassion to help us do it. 

We have some great swag that will look great on you AND help to spread the word about Lolly's Locks to your nearest and dearest! If you donate the amounts specified below, we will happily send you the corresponding item while supplies last!

  • For a $30 donation, you will receive a super soft, stylish Lolly's Locks Logo t-shirt.

  • For a $65 donation, you will receive a sterling silver Lolly's Locks Logo bracelet.

  • For a $75 donation, you will receive a sterling silver Lolly's Locks Logo necklace.

  • For a $100 donation, you will receive one of five gold Lolly's Locks Logo necklaces.


The Void We Fill

The influx of applications and increased demand illustrate that our organization fills a huge void in quality of life of people going through cancer treatment. While there are multiple organizations whose missions are to grant hair prostheses to children with hair loss due to cancer or other medical conditions, such resources are severely limited where adult cancer patients are concerned. Most adult cancer patients who cannot afford a quality wig are forced rely on wig banks stocking cheap or refurbished, used wigs. While such programs can be an important resource, the patients who seek to use them are faced with an extremely limited selection, often comprised of wigs that look nothing like their pre-cancer hair and which do not even fit properly.

A high-quality wig is comfortable and undetectable. There is no slipping, no scratchiness, and it is customized to match the style and color of a woman’s pre-cancer hair as much as possible. Many of Lolly’s Locks’ recipients have reported that having a high-quality wig has meant that they are once again able to take an active role in the aspects of life they have always enjoyed without fearing that they will be viewed as a cancer patient, because they look and feel like themselves. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't in the position to make a contribution (and, seriously, every little bit does help), please consider spreading the word about Lolly's Locks and make some noise about our campaign to get 10 special cancer patients in high-quality wigs!

story:
About Paulita

Paulita is a beautiful girl. She is six years old and has a genetic skin disease called Epidermolysis Bullosa, which is painful and incurable. We have created a Facebook page for her called www.facebook.com/juntosporpaulita

About this campaign

Because of Paulita’s condition, she has to avoid any friction on her skin. Selecting clothes to wear is a difficult task.

Before to buy, we need to check if the clothes to buy could to produce any friction with Paulita's skin. When we buy t-shirts, we must to check if the garment has flat seams. Pants cannot be snug at the waist. Sneakers can not to have a solid heel. Caps should not press the forehead. In addition, we must to check the fabric quality to avoid fabric that cause itching.

The emotional part the hardest. Sometimes she wants a special dress and ask for it insistently. Unfortunately that garment is not suitable for her, and she remains sad.

Our desire is Paulita be able to use conventional clothes like any other girl.

What does she need?

Fortunately we were able to found therapeutic clothes for Paulita. These clothes that would work like a "second skin" by protecting the wounds, reducing the itching, holding the bandages, and wrapping around the body for maximum mobility.
The company name that makes these products is Skinnies, and the ideal products for Paulita are listed here:

https://www.skinniesus.com/wound-care-and-eb/wound-care-and-eb-girls

The products that need Paulita are:

a. Arm Tube in WEB (4 units)

b. Short Sleeved T- Shirt in WEB (Girls) (4 units)

c. Leggings in WEB (4 units)


Impact

Any product that can improve the quality of Paulita’s life is very important for her and for us.  Relief of the daily pain and discomfort generates a big impact in the life of Paulita and her the family.

Other ways to help

  • Please share our campaign in your social networks (Facebook, Twitter, etc)
  • Please remember to click the "LIKE" button on our Facebook page. www.facebook.com/juntosporpaulita

Thank you very much for you support


Sincerely yours,

Leydi Perez (Paulita's mom)


--------------------------------------- SPANISH / ESPAÑOL ---------------------------------------

Acerca de Paulita

Paulita es una bella niña de 6 años de edad, que nació con una enfermedad congénita en la piel llamada Epidermolisis Bullosa, una enfermedad congénita de la piel, dolorosa e incurable. Para ella hemos creado una página de Facebook llamada www.facebook.com/juntosporpaulita


Acerca de esta campaña

Debido a la condición de Paulita, seleccionar y comprar ropa para ella es una tarea muy difícil.

Antes de comprar debemos examinar las prendas para asegurarnos de que no producirán algún roce en la piel de Paulita. Por ejemplo, los polos y blusas deben tener costuras planas, sin relieve.  El elástico de los pantalones no pueden apretar demasiado la cintura. Y las zapatillas no pueden tener el talón demasiado firme. Cualquier gorrita no debe tener contacto con su frente. También revisamos el material de la ropa para evitar picor o alergias.

Lo que más nos duele es que muchas veces ella quiere escoger su ropa, a veces se enamora de un vestido y nos lo pide insistentemente con mucha emoción, pero para nuestra mala suerte, es ropa no adecuada para ella. No la podemos comprar y ella se queda muy triste.

Nuestro deseo es que Paulita pueda usar ropa convencional como cualquier otra niña.


Que necesita?

Afortunadamente pudimos encontrar en internet una gama de productos de ropa interior terapéutica diseñados para la enfermedad de Paulita. Esa ropa terapética trabaja como una segunda piel protegiendo el vendaje y manteniendolo firme, reduciendo el picor, envolviendo su cuerpo pero dandole máxima movilidad.

La empresa que vende estos productos se llama Skinnies, y las prendas ideales para Paulita están listadas en el siguiente link: 

https://www.skinniesus.com/wound-care-and-eb/wound-care-and-eb-girls

Los productos que necesitaría Paulita son:

a. Arm Tube in WEB (4 unidades)

b. Short Sleeved T- Shirt in WEB (Girls) (4 unidades)

c. Leggings in WEB (4 unidades)


Impacto

Cualquier producto que mejore la calidad de vida de nuestra Paulita es muy importante. Nuestros días están llenos de curaciones, vendajes, antibióticos, entre otros debido a la cantidad de heridas, por lo que aliviar el dolor y las molestias de las heridas tendría un impacto muy grande en la vida de Paulita y de su familia.


Otras formas de ayudar
  • Por favor comparta nuestra campaña en su Facebook, Twitter u otras redes sociales
  • Por favor no olvide dar "Me gusta" a nuestra página www.facebook.com/juntosporpaulita


Muchas gracias y bendiciones a todos

Leydi (Mamá de Paulita)

story:
NEOMATCHA - original highest quality MATCHA green tea with all of the benefits you would expect from Green Tea and so much more. 

If you enjoy the many benefits of healthy Green Tea - then you will truly enjoy NEOMATCHA. 

The king of Green Teas - Matcha provides all of the benefits of traditional green tea available on the supermarket shelves today but with so much more.

This well kept secret is now available to you through this campaign - so check out the perks to the right to purchase our select finest quality matcha - NEOMATCHA and start everyday the ZEN way!


WHY NEOMATCHA?

Rooted in Japanese tradition, the Japanese tea ceremony, established by Zen-master Sen-no-Rikyu, is about more than just drinking tea; it is a spiritual journey that embodies harmony and tranquility. 

A high quality Green Tea - Matcha is traditionally prepared by adding hot water to the matcha powder and whisking to a froth, allowing the drinker to enjoy the benefits of the entire green tea leaf.

Inspired by the traditional Japanese tea ceremony, NEOMATCHA a daily cup of Zen  


To produce the freshest finest quality matcha - NEOMATCHA has chosen to partner with tea farmers who combine traditional methods with modern technology to produce a high quality product with huge health benefits.


THE PROCESS

  • Prior to the Spring harvest, green tea fields are gradually covered over in order to reduce the amount of sunlight exposed to the leaves. 
  • Shading is only implemented for high-grade teas that are used to produce some of the best matcha in the world. 
  • By reducing natural photosynthesis in the leaves, the plants increase chlorophyll production, which gives our matcha its vibrant green color.


  • Our matcha is cultivated in Nishio, which is located in the heart of the Aichi Prefecture. 
  • Nishio’s ideal misty climate and rolling hills makes it the perfect region to produce a very high grade Japanese green tea. 
  • The tea produced in Nishio has a much deeper taste and aroma as well as a more vibrant green color. 
  • While green tea is harvested in many countries such as China, Vietnam, and Indonesia, only Japan produces the highest-quality matcha. 

THE BENEFITS OF MATCHA

MATCHA - THE UNSUNG SUPERFOOD

Matcha is a finely stone ground, green tea powder that contains a wealth of antioxidants, amino acids, chlorophyll, and many vitamins and nutrients. 

Unlike steeped tea, the amount of nutrients consumed when drinking matcha is far greater as the entire leaf is ingested.  


1 cup of NEOMATCHA is nutritionally equivalent to 10 cups of steeped tea.


Antioxidant Activity

Our ceremonial grade matcha is exceedingly rich in antioxidants, which provides protection from:

  • Ageing 
  • Tissue damage 
  • Infections
  • Poor Immune system
  • Inflammatory diseases.

FACT: NEOMATCHA’s ceremonial grade matcha has over 14 times the antioxidant value of wild blueberries.

Sugar-Free

FACT: Matcha is surgar-free and low calorie (less than 3 calories per serving)!


Provides Sustained Energy

Matcha provides a slower breakdown of caffeine in the bloodstream, which prevents the symptoms of jittering and crashing normally associated with coffee and other sources of caffeine. 

Natural Detox

Matcha contains a wealth of chlorophyll, which is natural detoxifier. eliminating harmful chemicals and heavy metals from the body as well as regenerating the body on a cellular level. 

Matcha also contains dietary fiber, a detoxifying agent that can curb appetite and promote healthy digestion.  

Metabolism & Weight Loss

Matcha has the potential to boost metabolism, the concentration of EGCG is 137 times greater than the average steeped green tea. The low caffeine content of matcha prevents the production and excretion of cortisol, the body’s stress and fat storage hormone. 


L-theanine, a natural amino acid in matcha, increases alpha wave frequencies which induces a state of calm alertness. This attribute of matcha promotes relaxation while boosting concentration. The amino acid is also known to reduce anxiety and enhance mood.


With your support, we will achieve our goal of $5,000 which will allow us to do the following:

  • ship out the initial orders
  • package and label design
  • set up the website
  • advertising and marketing
  • create a recipe book (stretch goal)
Thank you for reading our campaign we are happy to answer any questions and if you want further information please get in touch we can't wait to talk ZEN and tea with you.

In the meantime please remember to check out our special supporters rewards to the right and purchase your NEOMATCHA tea. 

Please share the campaign using the Indiegogo share tools on the left!

Tell everyone you know who loves tea, wants to lose weight, needs more energy or just wants to indulge in some ZEN everyday...

Feel free to share our images here on the campaign via Twitter, Instagram and Pinterest and help us to start a conversation about Matcha

Post comments on this page, post on Facebook, LinkedIn or Google+ and help us to build a community of modern day 'ZEN TEA DRINKERS'
Contact Us:
tea@neomatcha.com
Follow Us
Instagram: @neomatchatea
Twitter: @neomatchatea
Facebook: Neomatcha
