Matcha provides a
slower breakdown of caffeine in the bloodstream, which prevents the symptoms of
jittering and crashing normally associated with coffee and other sources of caffeine. 



Natural Detox




Matcha contains a wealth of chlorophyll, which is natural detoxifier. eliminating harmful chemicals and heavy
metals from the body as well as regenerating the body on a cellular level. 
Matcha
also contains dietary fiber, a detoxifying agent that can curb appetite and
promote healthy digestion.  

Metabolism & Weight Loss


Matcha has the potential to boost metabolism, the concentration of
EGCG is 137 times greater than the average steeped green tea. The low caffeine
content of matcha prevents the production and excretion of cortisol, the body’s
stress and fat storage hormone. 


L-theanine, a natural amino acid in matcha, increases alpha wave frequencies which induces a state of calm alertness. This attribute of matcha promotes relaxation while boosting concentration. The amino acid is also known to reduce anxiety and enhance mood.


With your support, we will achieve our goal of $5,000 which will allow us to do the following:

ship out the initial orders
package and label design
set up the website
advertising and marketing
create a recipe book (stretch goal)

Thank you for reading our campaign we are happy to answer any questions and if you want further information please get in touch we can't wait to talk ZEN and tea with you.

In the meantime please remember to check out our special supporters rewards to the right and purchase your NEOMATCHA tea. 

Please share the campaign using the Indiegogo share tools on the left!

Tell everyone you know who loves tea, wants to lose weight, needs more energy or just wants to indulge in some ZEN everyday...

Feel free to share our images here on the campaign via Twitter, Instagram and Pinterest and help us to start a conversation about Matcha

Post comments on this page, post on Facebook, LinkedIn or Google+ and help us to build a community of modern day 'ZEN TEA DRINKERS'
Contact Us:
tea@neomatcha.com
Follow Us
Instagram: @neomatchatea
Twitter: @neomatchatea
Facebook: Neomatcha

story:
Short Summary

Early in the morning on New Year's Day 2015 Maxwell went to the ER with complaints of severe abdominal pain. The ER nurses and doctors were unable to discover the source of the pain after several hours, but they did know that he had an astronomically high blood-sugar reading.

Once the ER  nurses brought Maxwell's blood-sugar back to normal he was Life-Flighted to Kansas City, where the doctors discovered that Maxwell had Type 1 Diabetes, also known as Childhood Diabetes.

After several months, Maxwell finally started to get used to checking his blood-sugar regularly and giving himself insulin.

Now Maxwell's family is trying to pay off the ER and helicopter bills, but are having a hard time making ends meet right now. They need $4000 to pay off the hospital bills.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Maxwell's family needs $4000 to pay hospital bills.
  • We have many prizes available, including a few live DJ sets by Krillik on ARBrony Radio, custom vectors by Ty Trance, and several other prizes.
  • Even if we don't reach our goal, all money raised will be put towards Maxwell's hospital bills and other medical expenses.

Risks & Challenges

There are many difficulties I, Maxwell's older brother, face in this, the most significant being that I have virtually no prior experience with fundraising. However, I have a great network of people I'm working with, including many who have lots of experience with fundraising.

With our drive, and the help of our connections, I have no doubt that we will be able to raise enough to pay for Maxwell's hospital bills.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help:

  • If you are an artist, musician, or other content creator and would like to contribute some of your time and effort, please contact me for ways to help.
  • Don't forget to share this with everyone you can, every little bit helps!

Contributor Links

  • Ty Trance: http://acerome.deviantart.com/gallery/50848793/MLP-Vectors
  • Britt Fields: http://pretty-pretty-star.deviantart.com
  • Krillik: https://www.mixcloud.com/djkrillik/

story:
Summary of Caddo Mountain Spring Water, LLC 

My name is Barry Davidson and I am the founder or Caddo Mountain Spring Water. And I'm passionate about clean, pure water and here is the reason why!

The Technology does not exist (it is scientifically impossible) to filter out all of the contaminates that can be found in a lot of U.S. municipal sourced water (tap water) - the base ingredient for most bottled “purified” water. Particularly harmful contaminates in water that cannot be filtered out are Nano-particles of heavy metals such as Aluminum and Pharma Drugs. “Purified” water versus spring water is like comparing a poor grade of cheese spread or worse to real cheese! The reason most of the major U.S. water bottlers are bottling and selling “purified” water (Pure Life/Nestle’, Aquafina/PepsiCo, Dasani/Coca-Cola) is the difficulty in finding, accessing and availability (if not sustainability) of good all natural spring water and, of course, the cost.

We found our world class all natural spring water in a sparsely populated mountain area surrounded by National Forest Lands.

The availability of good drinking water is going to become a much larger problem in the future. Improper Chemical Manufacturing, Mining, Oil & Gas Exploration and Waste Water Treatment practices, as well as runoff from farm and ranch operations has been hugely disruptive to US Fresh Water sources. These improper practices are contaminating and displacing clean water that could have been used for drinking water. The largest U.S. water bottler had contaminates found in fracking fluids in two of its branded water products according to their own water analysis reports!

We’re here to change that with the cleanest, purest, healthiest, mountain spring sourced water in the world. We are an “American Owned” company and we need your help. Your contributions will help us to build a facility to bring our spring water to bottling plants for distribution around the country so “You Can Drink Healthy Again.”

Good drinking water is a serious and growing health issue that needs your help. Watch our video and Take Back Your Rights to clean, pure water. It’s a matter of health for you and your family.

What We Need & What You Get

We need approximately $1 million in equity funding today to allow us to build our own complete source water bottling facility. However, our Crowdfunding Campaign goal today is only $300,000 which will allow us to complete and operate a bulk water loading facility at our source water location. With a bulk water loading operation we can move our water to other peoples' bottling plants to bottle our water. If we don't reach our Campaign goal we will utilize whatever monies we do raise to set about putting our bulk water loading facility in place one piece of equipment at a time.
We have some outstanding perks for you to say "Thank You" for supporting our project. We were fortunate enough to be personally introduced early on to a great group of creative people from Phoenix, AZ at Production Services Arizona who produced our Campaign Video and helped us come up with some one of kind "premiums". A lot of thought and effort went into our perk offerings. We truly tried to tie together our supporter rewards to give everyone the best sense of a community project possible. We believe we have a premium for everyone. In fact, if you don't agree and have a perk idea for us that you think would be a great addition to our offerings please let us know and we will give your idea serious consideration. Please view our Crowdfunding Campaign Video as we worked very hard to make it both informative and entertaining. It is narrated by MythBusters' Robert Lee from Down Under. Robert with his distinctive accent, helped us to challenge a water myth!
All of our utility premiums come with a definite tie to our Company and/or project. A number of our rewards entail name recogition and naming rights of the supporter tied to our source water property which will create a lasting association between us! Our Vision is to Preserve and Enhance our water's naturally pristine, aesthetic and historic-storied location. We have a house, artesian well and barns that date back to the 1800s. One of our barns ("Over Yonder") has a great story and is about to be featured in a Public TV documentary titled "Barns of Arkansas". The beautiful Caddo River-truly one of the most gorgeous rivers in America, runs thru the center of our 100+ acre property. We have a recent vintage mountain side cabin which overlooks the Caddo River Valley in need of some TLC so people can enjoy it. And of course, we have numerous attractive Springs! 

The Impact

With the support of the Crowdfunding Community we can make available the finest all natural spring water obtainable during a time when good clean water is in dwindling supply. Our world class spring water along with our Advocacy for Clean Water, Sustainability and Care for the Environment and our American stewardship of its best spring water can make a difference in enhancing the health and lives of millions of people. The number one goal of the Company is to exceed the expectations of its product consuming public.
I have Founded or Co-founded successful start-up entities in the past. I believe creating jobs and making the payroll of an organization you founded or helped to found is a true test of your leadership and management ability.
I have a long history as a Registered Investment Advisor with an unblemished record of handling peoples' money. The entities and monies under my direction have enjoyed only unqualified audits and audit reports. Mike Boswell our Co-founder was part of a large investment organization for some 16 years and its President for five years. We each enjoy an outstanding reputation which is the most important thing to us.
You can hear me discuss water with Jeff "Erskine" Payton the Host of the syndicated radio program "Erskine Overnight" in an hour long segment airing Ocober 10, 2015 and arkived thereafter on his website for later listening. It was a privilege for me to be on Erskine's program. He is very knowledgeable about water and water issues today. He won a award in 2014 for "Excellence in Health Journalism".

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge at this time is equity funding for the Company. The vast majority of wealth gatekeepers today don't want to invest in start-up entities. They got burned with their start-up investments during the great "recession" of 2008-2009 and don't want to risk repeating that experience.
We believe Crowdfunding is a natural fit for us to raise equity for our new Company. We trust that our project and its attributes will resonate with millions of people. We have sourced the best all natural spring water obtainable. People everywhere need good clean water to sustain their life and flourish. Our source water property is pristine, protected and sustainable-renewable and has a great legacy. We are an American owned Company whose interests are aligned with the American people particularly with regard to clean water, sustainability and care for the environment. We can have a large positive social impact enhancing the health and lives of millions of people with our water, our Advocacy for Clean Water, Sustainability and Care for the Environment. Finally, Mike and I have the Leadership Ability, Experience and Integrity to help assure our project's success! 
We like and share the same sense of Community that Crowdfunding entails. We are happy and thrilled to formally intoduce our Caddo Mountain Spring Water product for the first time on the Indiegogo Crowdfunding Campaign platform. We are passionate about our spring water, the Company's potential future success and the positive social impact that will come from our project. Hopefully, we will be welcomed into the Crowdfunding Community and can be the next "Poster Child" for a successful Indiegogo Crowdfunding Campaign.

Contributing as well as Other Ways You Can Help!

Please help and support us by contributing and telling your family and friends about our project! Be sure to use Indiegogo share tools!

We fully understand and appreciate that some people just cannot afford to contribute much money to our project despite their best intentions or postive feelings of support. Therefore we have set our starting contribution level at $10 during the first 3 days of our campaign.

Importantly, in an effort to garner additional support and help from those who just cannot afford to contribute much money but want to assist us, we are giving an Award Dinner with a Co-founder in beautiful historic Hot Springs, Arkansas - The "Spa City" in "The Natural" State known for its water! The Award Dinner goes to the single contributor who Refers the most supporters to our Campaign. It is a way for us to meet and say "Thank You" in person for supporting and assisting in our project!

For a contributor to count as a referrer, you must promote our campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to any resulting contributions or visits.

As an example, when Funder A is logged into their account and uses Indiegogo’s share tools to send a tweet, the link in the tweet includes Funder A’s unique ID. Then, when Funder B reads the tweet and clicks through the link to contribute, Funder A is recognized as helping bring in the amount contributed by Funder B.

story:
Everyone was bummed to see Skyler and Spencer eliminated from VH1's show TWINNING.  They are good-hearted, honest young men who had planned to donate half of their winnings to St. Jude Children's Research Hospital.  Let's make this more than just another reality show.  Let's follow Skyler and Spencer's lead and use the power of TWINNING to save lives!!!  Please donate- even just a dollar- to help Skyler and Spencer make a meaningful donation to St. Jude Children's Research Hospital.

Mama Nick has proposed a challenge to the winners of TWINNING- Think of something more than just yourselves and donate half of your winnings to St. Jude.  Think of the lives that could be saved with $111,111.11 donated towards research and treatment!!!  Let's hope to see one giant donation from the lucky set of Twinners!

#twinning #teamnick #teamblack #wedemboyz #twinningforstjude

story:
Short Summary

Hello. My name is James Malcolm. I'm the Inventor of the Cane Angel. I need your help to bring the Cane Angel to all those folks who can benefit from this invention such as the elderly, handicapped, veterans and others who use a cane or crutches.

The idea for the Cane Angel came to me while watching my 88 year old mother & 90 year old step dad, who are cane users, try and negotiate simple everyday tasks. For example at a restaurant they would have to prop their canes against a wall, out of reach, under the table or against the chair where they are in the way or fall. When they go to the bank or any counter and they need to use both hands, many times they set their canes against a wall and their cane falls to the floor. This is difficult for them or any elderly or handicapped person to bend to pick up their canes. The Cane Angel solves this problem by enabling the user to attach their cane or crutches to their belt, purse, chair, walker or electric scooter.

I love my family as I am sure you do. Like me, you would do anything to help make their lives easier. And what about other elderly people and especially veterans? They have done so much for all of us. Now is your chance  to help by making the Cane Angel available to all those in need. Don't take my word for it. Look around and take note of the people around you who use a cane or crutches. You'll see for yourself the disadvantages they face daily. 

Your contribution, either financially or word of mouth can make a tremendous difference in their lives. 

What We Need & What You Get

I am seeking $5,000.00 toward the manufacturing, website and marketing of the Cane Angel. Initial sales will be through our website, word of mouth on social media, news outlets and direct to Veterans groups and senior publications. Word of mouth by you, our contributors, will play a significant role.

Our website: CANEANGEL.COM will be ready to launch in a few weeks. On the site we will offer the Cane Angel for only $10.00, with the initial offer as a BUY ONE GET ONE FREE. In the offer we encourage buyers to use one and share the extra Cane Angel with a family member, friend or better yet, a veteran or total stranger.

I want you to know how much I appreciate you and thank you that I have plenty of PERKS to help you make the Cane Angel available to all who need one. Please take a look at our PERKS and choose the one that's right for you.

Risks & Challenges

Our initial fundraising goal is modest but hope that we reach and even surpass our goal. I believe the cost of doing business will be self funded once the Cane Angel is available for sale online. 

The good news is that the Cane Angel is manufactured in the U.S.A.. Quality control can be easily checked during the manufacturing process to ensure top quality. Cane Angel is Patent Pending and Trademark applied for.

Other Ways You Can Help

I would love to have you as a contributor. We need all the financial help we can get. However, please don't let this stop you from getting the word out about the Cane Angel. Your help with social media is invaluable. Or, if you have a good idea of another way of spreading the word, please contact me. I'd love to hear your ideas. If we can implement them we certainly will.

And don't forget that Indiegogo has share tools to help.

story:
UPDATE... The Balance Loft will be opening without Indiegogo Funding  and this is a great opportunity to GET Studio classes at A Discount!  It was a great way create a buzz and  sell classes before the space officially opens on June 15, 2015!  The monthly unlimited memberships will NOT be offered once The Balance Loft opens and this is an exclusive offer to people who contribute NOW!  After working out the numbers monthly unlimited doesn't WORK for my biz model and this will be limited to 20 people. 

I am also impressed by the community of Troy supporting this project and complete strangers have helped me on this site along with donations like signs!:)
Thanks Devonna, YOU ROCK!!!

Enough of the Biz end....

The Balance Loft has been my labor of love for the last 2 years and every space I looked at just didn't feel right.  A few months ago I met with Sequence Development to look at an apartment and we started chatting about opening a new biz here in Troy.  Wow! I had been looking for the perfect space for the last 2-3  years and I have finally found it!  Finally everything is falling into place, effortlessly.

I owned a successful salon and high end boutique in Malta, NY for 5 years. My salon was all about an experience... my clients are essentially family.  Guaranteed a Ton of Laughs, Life Lessons and Great Hair!  I LOVE what I do and have never worked a day in my life since 2007!  However I have decided to take a leap of faith and change my direction and business model. It's time to do something bigger and better, and fulfill my ultimate goal of helping people on a grander scale.

The concept of an integrative wellness and fitness space started to come together in November 2012.  I was in Love with doing Barre 4 times a week which eventually led me to getting certified.  Eventually, I found hot yoga last winter and this was a serious game changer and pushed me to go outside of my “comfort zone”. This was a HUGE shift for my mind and body! So much I have now decided to get my 200 hour yoga certification this coming summer!  I am so excited and these classes, along with my energy work have fine-tuned this passion of mine which is to help people!!

The Balance Loft is going to be a magical space that will allow me to give clients an experience immediately upon their arrival in  the studio.  There will be urns with cucumber/mint infused water available and after class cool/moist towelettes with essential oils will be available for all clients. The Balance Loft will be heated by Infrared Plates that have a plethora of health benefits from collagen production to helping joint issues like Rheumatoid Arthritis.  The flooring will be nonslip and firm but will allow enough "give" to be easier on your joints than wood floors.

The Balance Loft is all about learning.  Beginner Classes in a Warm Room will be offered and you can work at your own pace.  Advanced classes and workshops will be offered as well and we can grow together!!! This will be a  learning and growth experience for all who come!  I am always open to new ideas and if you have something to share bring it to my attention and maybe we can run with it!

The Balance Loft is a 2 studio space offering Yoga, Prenatal Yoga, Barre, Pilates Mat and TRX Fusion Sessions. The studio will be a luxurious space offering clients a 60-90 minute warm or HOT retreat in a Scandinavian inspired oasis! There will be a NO cell phone policy in the space and there will be a 15 break between studio sessions in order to  allow clients to properly transition back to their daily lives. How awesome does that sound!?!

My vision is to make The Balance Loft a Mini Retreat, catering to beginners, intermediate and as well as advanced practitioners!  A special space where you can come to relax, unwind and free your mind!   

It takes a team to make a dream and so I am asking for some help in order to make this space as Amazing as I know it can and WILL be!!!

Thanks so much for believing my ability to make The Balance Loft a Reality in Historic Downtown Troy, NY!!!! It's Happening!!

NOT ON KICKSTARTER!!!! My video guy didn't Edit this and KICKSTARTER said they didn't want anything to do with YOGA!  YUP.  This was planned for them and they financed My First Potato Salad for $57k and turned their noses up at my project.
Sophie at Kickstarter literally said they do not anything to do with YOGA, Studios or  Yoga Certifications.  Trust  me I tried to "repackage" my plan and I got an immediate NO YOGA response. 
Who says NO to Yoga and YES to Potato Salad?
Priceless....

 Indiegogo has Sir Richard Branson of Virgin behind it and the VP of Google .... I can and will sprinkle in the other players backing Indiegogo! 

4/16/15 Construction starts tomorrow and I will be posting pics of the space coming together! :)

Warmest Regards,

Kelly Kendall

PS. Please feel free to contact me personally about any questions you might have about The Balance Loft etc.  www.kellykendall3@icloud.com
story_txt: UPDATE... The Balance Loft will be opening without Indiegogo Funding  and this is a great opportunity to GET Studio classes at A Discount!  It was a great way create a buzz and  sell classes before the space officially opens on June 15, 2015!  The monthly unlimited memberships will NOT be offered once The Balance Loft opens and this is an exclusive offer to people who contribute NOW!  After working out the numbers monthly unlimited doesn't WORK for my biz model and this will be limited to 20 people.  I am also impressed by the community of Troy supporting this project and complete strangers have helped me on this site along with donations like signs!:)Thanks Devonna, YOU ROCK!!!Enough of the Biz end....The Balance Loft has been my labor of love for the last 2 years and every space I looked at just didn't feel right.  A few months ago I met with Sequence Development to look at an apartment and we started chatting about opening a new biz here in Troy.  Wow! story:
For the past year, I have been teaching full yoga classes on the karma SUPtra board to my clients, and as you will read in the Testimonials below, the classes have been an absolute hit! Propelled by all of this enthusiastic support, I launched karma SUPtra officially, as an Exhibitor, at the 2015 Yoga Conference in Toronto, with the goal of sharing this extraordinary practice with the rest of the world! This too was a resounding success, from both a feedback and exposure standpoint! Boards are now available on a made-to-order basis, for both Individual Purchase and for Volume Studio Purchase. Ultimately, I would love to see the karma SUPtra, Indoor SUP-Yoga System, rolled out as a part of the karma SUPtra brand…a program introduced to Yoga Studios across North America, potentially globally, with karma SUPtra providing a turnkey solution in terms of curriculum and equipment.

BIG GOALS I know!!! That's where you come in! If karma SUPtra excites you, like it does me, I invite you to join me in launching karma SUPtra into the stratosphere!!!  How? Be the very best cheerleader you can be…post comments and share this campaign with as many people as you can, I would be most grateful!  And if making a financial contribution to the business development of karma SUPtra, in exchange for some awesome perks, is where your heart and head lead you, well, that would be just AMAZING too!!! Together, we can take this powerful, playful practice to the masses and help make the world a healthier, happier place!!!

 Gratitude & Namaste. 

Julie

Kind Words About karma SUPtra!

With our SUP season being as short as it is, many people long to keep their season alive. SUP Yoga has become a very real portion of the SUP market/industry, and the Karma SUPtra Indoor SUP Yoga Board takes it from the water to the studio, almost seamlessly. The boards width allows you to open your stance, and the three balance cushion system is a close to the real thing as you can get. The cushions allow the board to roll gently from side to side, forcing you to concentrate on your balance and your mid-line. The cushions are sized perfectly to the shape of the board and provide the proper amount of resistance that will allow you recover if you do start to roll. The Karma SUPtra board and Julie’s playful, yet mindful, practice make this an activity that even the most seasoned Yogi, SUP’er, or weekend warrior would appreciate! - Glen Buchanan; Product Manager Rogue Stand-up Paddleboards, WPA SUP Flatwater Instructor

More testimonials here!


The karma SUPtra System

The Karma SUPtra Indoor Yoga Board has been thoughtfully crafted to emulate the outdoor SUP-Yoga experience on water. The board is supported by a series of inflatable cushions, which serve to increase or decrease the stability of the board. Board dimensions are optimized, longer and wider, to ensure space for proper alignment in yoga poses and it features a sticky mat surface to reduce slippage. The Karma SUPtra Indoor Yoga Board may become your new yoga mat!!!

Specs:

Board: 3/4" maple ply; 78" x 23.5" x 5/8" (18 pounds)
Cushions: Small, 13.8" diameter, color: blue; Large, 23.6 diameter, color: blue
*Each board comes with 2 x small cushions and 1 x large cushion.
 


Art-Inspired karma SUPtra Boards

The above covers function, let’s talk flare!  From the beginning I had a vision of the boards appearing larger than life; the capacity to facilitate an experience beyond the physical practice! A board, when not in use, that you could proudly lean or hang on your wall, as part of your home or office décor…a piece of art that continues to inspire and compel you! One small problem, yours truly is a terrible artist-ha!ha! However, I live in a community rich and thriving with artistic talent, therefore it seemed only right to pay homage and keep it local! This led me to the uber-gifted Krista and to say the least, a collaboration made in heaven. And for me, she has totally captured the playful, vibrant spirit of karma SUPtra and the essence of my most fave activities; Yoga and SUP. Check out our first, Art-Inspired Back Board Graphics…Wake Up & Be Awesome, Namaste and the latest addition, Fire in the Belly! And, this is just the beginning!!!



BENEFITS of karma SUPtra!

  • full body workout
  • strengthens core
  • head to toe muscular engagement
  • identifies imbalances/compensations in the body
  • intuitively connects you to the breath
  • cultivates presence
  • improves flexibility
  • cross-training tool for athletes
  • deepens your mat practice
  • translates beautifully to the outdoor SUP-Yoga experience
  • a mind, body, soul experience
  • enjoy 12 months of SUP-Yoga practice
  • you are going to sweat!
  • it's a blast!

How Your Investment Will Be Gratefully Put to Work...

$100,000 in a Nutshell!

  • 250 base boards with inlay                                                         $50,000
  • Branded Cushions: 500 x 14" and 250 x 24" cushions      $12,000
  • SUP-Traction Mats/Pads (4 colors x 200/color *min)     $15,000
  • Packaging                                                                                            $5,000
  • Product Development *details outlined below                     $18,000
Goal:  
  • Reduce manufacturing costs in an effort to improve retail cost of board to the consumer (incl. individual and studio volume purchases) and to maintain margins favorable to business growth and sustainability. 
  • Improve karma SUPtra delivery to the consumer/studio. Currently 6- 8 weeks.

Product Development

  • Carrying bag for single board with cushions
  • Racking system for studio/fitness facilities
  • Replaceable mat option
  • Handle on board for ease of transportation
  • Paddle option
  • Videos (Intro/Beginner to accompany board purchase and Intermediate/Advanced for purchase)
  • Online karma SUPtra classes, pay per class
  • Cushions sell on their own for rehab/physio needs

  • The karma SUPtra Indoor SUP-Yoga Program. A yoga system/ training rolled out as a part of the karma SUPtra brand… a program introduced to Yoga Studios across North America with karma SUPtra providing a turn key solution in terms of  curriculum and equipment.



Current Go-to-Business Model

  • Currently boards are made to order (pick mat color/graphic or no graphic), with a 6-8 week turnaround time. Would like to improve this turn around time, by establishing a platform/inventory from which to grow…ie. 250 boards ready to go for customization.
  • Individual customers may order his/her karma SUPtra board on-line; Buy your karma SUPtra board here!
  • Studio/Fitness Facility Volume Pricing available, with options to customize board with studio logo/artwork. 

THE REVOLUTION: YOGA & SUP

Simply put, these two activities are a match made in heaven; kind of like peanut butter and chocolate! There is a natural synergy between Yoga and SUP; from an energetic standpoint, to the organic nature of both activities, to the embodiment of mind, body and spirit. Just imagine moving through yoga poses, whilst immersed in nature; floating upon the water, listening to the sing-song of birds, the breeze upon your skin, big blue skies and fresh air…it is magical!

THE REVELATION: Bringing Yoga & SUP Indoors!

At its very best, the SUP season in much of North America is 5 months! So, when one falls in love with the sport of SUP and SUP Yoga, what does one do to keep the momentum going during the long winter months? Well, you bring it inside of course!

Introducing Karma SUPtra, the SUP-Inspired Indoor Yoga Board

INSPIRED, I explored like-minded products in the marketplace and with all due respect, felt there was an opportunity to create an Indoor SUP Yoga experience more reflective of the organic nature of both Yoga and SUP. The result: a less mechanical design; a longer, wider board to optimize space for proper alignment in yoga poses, and a sticky mat surface to reduce slippage. The lightweight karma SUPtra board is supported by a series of inflatable cushions, which serve to increase or decrease the stability and challenge of the board.  Great for the beginner to the more experienced yogi...think breath, presence, core engagement, balance and yes, you are going to sweat!  Not to mention, from a business standpoint, yoga is a $27 billion dollar industry and Stand Up Paddleboarding is the fastest growing sport in the world...together, they truly are a match made in heaven...in every way! 

About Julie 

Creator of karma SUPtra, Studio Director, Yoga Therapist, RYT 500, Paddle into Fitness Ambassador/Affiliate, Certified WPA Level 1 SUP Instructor, B.A. Kin.

Julie, much to her delight, stumbled into Stand Up Paddleboarding when a good friend who had been SUP’ing for years suggested “it may be a good fit with yoga and we should chat”. Immediately, Julie agreed that there was indeed an amazing synergy between the two practices; the only problem was it was the middle of winter! In typical Julie style, waiting for spring to arrive was just way too long, so she thought ‘let’s introduce an Indoor Sup Yoga Program; make our own boards, and get clients excited and ready for an upcoming summer of SUP on water!’ With support from family and friends, karma SUPtra was created and both the boards and classes were successfully launched at her studio in Uxbridge. Let’s just say clients raved about the experience!

Suffice it to say, Julie came into the SUP life through the path of yoga and it was not until summer arrived, that she finally had the opportunity to take SUP to the water. And guess what? She fell more madly in love! Fueled by this new passion, Julie promptly completed her SUP Yoga Teacher Training/ Paddle Into Fitness Certification and Level 1 WPA SUP Instructor Certification with Gillian Gibree at SUPGirlz in Toronto, ON.  She is pretty sure she smiled through the entire training; marveling at the SUP-Yoga union and the playfulness it infuses into the practice of yoga, not to mention the incredible connection to nature and water. Pure bliss. Julie skipped away from the training inspired to share SUP Yoga with as many people as possible, and is now a proud Ambassador and Affiliate of the Paddle Into Fitness Team!

A little more about Julie, she completed her RYT 200 teacher training at White Lotus Foundation in Santa Barbara, CA under the direction of Ganga White, Tracey Rich and Sven Holcomb. It was a life-altering experience, to say the least.  Julie then completed her RYT 500 and Professional Yoga Therapist Certification; mentoring with Yoga Therapist, Karen Claffey, and the esteemed faculty of The Heaven on Earth Yoga Institute in Stoney Creek, Ontario. This intensive training profoundly impacted Julie’s deeper understanding of the power of Therapeutic Yoga to heal the mind, body and spirit.

Julie is a firm believer that personal health and vitality come first- practice this and you will find yourself thriving in all other aspects of your life! Whether you are participating in one of Julie’s group classes or working with her privately, Julie energetically shares her passion for the healing power of yoga and she will inspire you to discover your own capacity to cultivate optimal vitality through your yoga practice…both on and off the water!

story:
Hi, we are Constance and Patricia (my 89 year old Mom), and we're Partners in EyeShades!

Have you ever had the experience of your eyes being so tired at the end of your day that putting potato slices on them sounds like a good idea, me too! For years I have been supervising courses under fluorescent lighting. After a few hours, my eyes are toast and I can barely see the facilitator at the front of the room!

I came up with the idea for EyeShades, yet I was stumped in how to actually design the last connecting piece. This is where Mom comes in with all of her knowledge, wisdom and experience! Sitting in her kitchen, sharing what I wanted to do and where I was stuck, Mom leaves the room and comes back with a possible solution, voila,  EyeShades are born!

We know some folks will wear hats, caps or visors, however, all of those options mess with our hair, creating a new problem! Now you have another option, which is functional and fashionable, EyeShades,  and they fit on YOUR glasses!

$7,500.00 is our minimum goal and the money will be used toward marketing, manufacturing and distribution costs. At this time, neither Mom nor I are taking salaries, we intend EyeShades go BIG and we will be compensated later. Right now, getting EyeShades off the ground is where we need your support! We are currently making each one by hand and this is not sufficient or efficient as demand grows. Thank you for seeing value and contributing as we navigate the ground floor, preparing to launch EyeShades into the World!

When you donate, watch for an email from us so we know what colors to send you!Your feedback is welcomed, the initial interest has been great and people have suggested EyeShades may:  help deter Migraine headaches; perfect for reading in bright sunshine; create eye ease while working under fluorescent lights; keeping misty moisture off your glasses; even be an alternative for sunglasses! The surprising benefit, you can actually see a persons eyes rather than your own reflection, when talking with them!
Fund Us and Feel good!  .05% of all proceeds will be donated to 'Friends of NCRD, Pool Account'.  (google NCRD, Aquatics Center for more information about our 'old' Pool).
 

Another way you can support us....

GET THE WORD OUT and make some noise about our campaign. use the Indiegogo share tools! 

With Gratitude and Appreciation! /Constance & Patricia

story:
Basic Concept


Want to see the more detailed version of the workflow? Click this link.


The product is already in development. is the developer producing the G4CTour App. The version 1.0 will be out in June 2015. 


                         


You enter your scores into the G4CTour App after each round you play on tour and our application figures your "net score" based on the tee blocks you play and the rating of the course you are playing. It does this every time you play. 

We do not use outside organizations handicaps. When you play on the G4CTour you are establishing a handicap with us. This way handicaps are based on rounds you play with us.

This keeps people who try to cheat off the site. It also allows us to share only the range of handicap you are in, instead of an exact number. 
This keeps people from trying to shoot certain scores based on an exact handicap number. The beauty of this is that even though it is a complicated subject we make it simple you just do the following 

  1. Golf
  2. Enter your score for that round and we do the rest. 

These rounds must be played with at least one other competitor. This can be someone you know or it can be someone you found on our find a competitor tool. 

We have several tools to aid in the authentication of your scores. A few of these are automatic location verification over the period of the round via satellite imaging

as well as both competitors must verify the others score correctly for the round to post along with this we limit how many times you can play with the same competitor. 

Each round you play also automatically populates your name into the leaderboard in the state you are registered. But you are free to compete in any state at anytime. 

These rounds are paid out twice a week.

So Monday to Friday is considered one day and will be paid out within 48 hours of the close of the day Friday. The second day is Saturday to Sunday. During these time periods you are free to play as many rounds as you would like to try and improve your position. 


Each round you play will also earn you points no matter how you finish you earn points.

These points are accumulated all season and on two occasions the top 288 in each state will play for a running total jackpot that takes a small percentage of every entry and pools it until the time of the event. 

These events are called Majors the are held mid season and at the end of the season and should draw jackpots in excess of $100,000. Each state will have its own season depending on its weather. Some States will have year round seasons with three Majors. 


The beauty of the app is it also allows men and women to compete together as well as amateur players who wish to compete but want to keep their status as an amateur can play and receive gift cards in the amount allowable by the USGA. 


As you can see G4CTOUR is creating a community were you can meet and compete with other golfers no matter what their skill level. 

G4CTOUR uses an odds chart created by Dean Knuth that states the odds for shooting certain scores based on each handicap. We use this chart as well to throw out unrealistic scores those of over 250,000 to 1 odds. 

G4CTOUR also has set up 2 divisions to keep it fair for 20+ handicap and 0 handicap players. Since the odds are greater to shoot lower than your handicap in the higher ranges. We have a 0-15 Division and a 16+ Division

G4CTour Rules
Golf Pay Day 
Contact
 G4CTOUR has  4 Years of financial projections as well as 3 years of workflow and design.
 Accredited investor? Click Here 


I would like to thank the team that has been working so diligently to get this Tour off the ground. I am including a link here. Any kind of web or programming service you need please contact them! 

 

Short Bio.
I am a Husband and a Father of 4. I have been and entrepreneur since I was 17 ( thats been a fews years ago : ) ) I have ran several businesses and continue to learn each and every day. I believe life is about helping others get what they want and in turn we get what we want. I have taken several classes both online and on campus I will include the links below. 

Parkland College 
Stanford University 
Khan Academy 
Code School 
Codecademy

story:
We invented a material for fast hair growth by chance ensuring hair regrowth appearance in just five days. The material is designed as cosmetics and acquired special cosmetics qualification in China. For the material’s hair regrowth function, we have already applied for the patent in China, United States, European Union and Japan.

Androgenetic alopeciais a problem which 50% men and 10% women will be faced. Aging process faced by each person could initiate with hair loss for some people. Same with aging, hair loss is also a difficult medical problem. Our hair regrowth invention (US2015/0004254A1) has potential to thoroughly solve hair loss problem, and are likely to offer a cure idea for other complicated diseases. Our products are put on the market as special cosmetics in China (similar to Quasi-Drug Label in Japan), but special cosmetics cannot be advertised as a drug for treating hair loss problem, so the product won’t be known by customers or recognized by doctors even it can solve the problem of hair loss. That’s the reason we decide to apply to the FDA for investigational new drug (IND) and new drug applications (NDA).

Why Do We Want Crowdfunding?

About two out of ten Chinese adult males experience hair loss, while about one out of twenty adult women does. Therefore in China it is estimated that there are 65 million men and 15 million women are suffering hair loss. In the United States about four out of seven adult males are suffering hair loss.

There are an estimated 40 million men and 12 million women experiencing some degree of hair loss in the United States alone. Two-thirds of American men will see the affects of Androgenetic alopecia by the age of 35.



In order to meet such a large market demand, we decided to launch this crowdfunding.

The crowdfunding will be used for the production, while the rest of the money will be used for preclinical study, phase I clinical research and application to the FDA for clinical tests.

The cost of FDA application for preclinical trials and phase I clinical study is estimated as $2 million. We will raise funds by crowdfunding and fill the gap by other means.

Reasons for Androgenetic Alopecia

Male hormone translates into DHT which will block the hair follicle regeneration. DHT can make obstacles in the process of hair follicle stem cells translating into hair follicle cells, preventing hair follicle regeneration, thus regenerated hair follicles keep shrinking until disappear.

The study found that hair follicle stem cells in hair loss area are normal, so hair follicle stem cells loss is not the main cause of hair loss (learn more about the study).

There are two possible ways of DHT blocking hair follicle regeneration process: 1. DHT leads to the hyperplasia and enlargement of sebaceous gland near the top of  head, as with DHT leads to the prostate enlargement of male, which squeezes the survival space of the hair follicles, therefore stopping hair follicle regeneration after normal falling off; 2. After the cycle of hair follicle anagen, catagen and telogen, the body will give hair follicle stem cells the right stimulation signal, initiating the hair follicle stem cells regeneration process but DHT accumulation interferes or disrupts the signal transmission, thus blocking the regeneration process of hair follicle stem cells differentiating into hair follicle cells.

Both two ways lead to the same result: sebaceous gland cells encroach on the space of hair follicles, thus hair loss area is not only very oily (that’s why every hair loser has this problem), and making hair follicle regeneration lose physical space and more difficult.

Androgenetic Alopecia Treatment Difficulties

1. How to make physical space for hair follicles. The long process of hair loss with hair follicles falling off, and sebaceous glands cells gradually occupy the space of the hair follicle. The simple physical logic tells us that physical space must be made for hair follicle for its regeneration. If see some effective hair regrowth technologies, such as hair transplant surgery, you will find the most simple idea of providing specific space for hair follicle is man-made wound.

The study found that man-made wound healing process will produce new hair follicle stem cells group and new hair (learn more about the study).

From hair transplant surgery we will find that hair follicles in transplantation area can regenerate after being removed. But in the hair loss area, making new pores and transplanting new hair follicles which all fall off after 3 months. The regenerated hair follicles in hair loss area should have nothing to do with transplanted hair follicles. The man-made bigger wound for new pore is the key to regenerate hair follicles in hair transplant surgery.

Talents of Chinese people with traditional Chinese medicine experience and exploration also provide an effective way of hair regrowth. That is using plum needle to knock on the head. Almost all Chinese medicine hair regrowth shops, no matter what kind of Chinese traditional medicine they choose use plum needle head knocking as supplementary means. In fact, knocking on the head with plum needle is the only solution of hair regrowth that might work. Because plum needle which knocking on the hair loss area can make a lot of wounds. Even without stem cells stimulation, it may also be accompanied by new hair follicle regeneration during the wounds heal.

2. How to initiate hair follicles regeneration by hair follicle stem cells. Modern medicines generally use cytokines to stimulate stem cell regeneration process. The special stem cells need special cytokines to stimulate them. But now there is no broad spectrum stimulating factor being found.

How Does WanBinCell work?

WanBinCell initiative in situ tissue regeneration technology is to cure hair loss by aiming at the two difficulties of Androgenetic alopecia treatment, and is able to cure quickly and keep a long-term health.

In situ tissue regeneration technology is to initiate body’s original stem cell proliferation, migration and differentiation by external physical or chemical means, thus fulfill regeneration of new healthy tissues.

In Situ Tissue Regeneration Technology

Our patent provides a method of initiating mammal’s stem cell proliferation, migration and differentiation. This method can persistently initiate in situ stem cells proliferation, migration and differentiation with minimal or no side effects. We have not only developed the theory of “in situ tissue regeneration”, but also invented the method which can timely initiate tissue regeneration of stem cells near damaged tissues, so as to cure the disease or restore young tissues. (learn more about the in situ tissue regeneration technology patent).

Mechanism

Drugs(stem cell initiators) are used on the targeted aging or damage tissues. Stem cell initiators will initiate healthy tissue regeneration of stem cells through three functions: 1. Stem cell initiators remove damaged or senescent cells, and make specific space for tissue regeneration; 2. Stem cell initiators as exogenous gas signal molecule activate stem cell proliferation, migration and differentiation; 3. Stem cell initiators regulate the immune response, to avoid infection. Under the induce of specific space, damaged tissues or surrounded normal stem cells regenerate new functional young tissues through proliferation, migration and differentiation. Impaired cells are removed as making room for tissue regeneration. Disease is cured and young tissues are restored by new tissues replacing impaired ones.

Further studies have indicated that stem cell initiator is a substance similar to ROS. Targeted drug delivery is equivalent to supplement exogenous similar ROS compounds into the target tissue. The latest study has found that improving the level of ROS could accelerate apoptosis of cancer cells and reach the goal of anticancer（For example:1. Targeting Oxidative Stress in Embryonal Rhabdomyosarcoma; 2. Antioxidants Accelerate Lung Cancer Progression in Mice; 3. Selective killing of cancer cells with a small molecule targeting stress response to ROS; 4. Breaking the depth dependency of phototherapy with Cerenkov radiation and low-radiance-responsive nanophotosensitizers.）; improving ROS could regulate immune response and treat autoimmune diseases(For example: 1. A New Arthritis Therapy with Oxidative Burst Inducers; 2. Eriocalyxin B ameliorates experimental autoimmune ncephalomyelitis by suppressing Th1 and Th17 cells.); increasing ROS level contributes to tissue regeneration(For example: 1. Amputation-induced reactive oxygen species are required for successful Xenopus tadpole tail regeneration; 2. Sustained production of ROS triggers compensatory proliferation and is required for regeneration to proceed). The three patents we applied cover three possible mechanisms of ROS, suggesting that the substance which similar to ROS can play the same role of ROS. We applied apoptosis inducer patent for substance similar to ROS (learn more about apoptosis inducer patent) used for anti-aging and tumor treatment.

Advantages of In Situ Tissue Regeneration Technology

It is a kind of stem cell therapy which makes full use of stem cell regeneration ability; Stem cells can be found in any tissue, so we can initiate in situ stem cells with no need of transplant; No need of complicated process of selection and induction; Make full use of original stem cell micro environment; No carcinogenicity and won’t cause immune rejection; Simple, high success rate, widely used, low cost and convenient.

How Does WanBinCell Hair-Growth-Promoting Solution Regrow Hair?

WanBinCell contains the substance which can activate the hair follicle stem cells to regenerate, having two key functions in the process of hair regrowth: 1. Make tiny wounds thus providing specific space for new hair follicles; 2. activate hair follicle stem cells in hair loss area and grow new healthy hair follicles.

Through experiment, WanBinCell has the following characteristics: regrow new hair in about 5 days; in half bald area, fierce hair loss period shall appear by the accelerated falling off (the severe shedding period )of original hair especially the thin ones, then new hair regrow; in bald area, new hair regrowth takes a longer time of about 1 to 3 months; no matter what the degree of hair loss is, WanBinCell shall be used for more than over one year to make sure of no hair loss appearance.

What Does WanBinCell Bring to the World?

In situ tissue regeneration technique has made a great breakthrough in traditional stem cell therapy. It can be applied as a clinical therapy immediately. It makes full use of the potential of stem cell regeneration which could cure many difficult diseases. Combined with apoptosis inducer patent technology, it is more powerful in anti-aging and cancer treatment.

Compare

There are three well-known solutions for Androgenetic alopecia: Finasteride, Minoxidil and Hair Transplant Surgery.

Case 

In this video, our case studies include hair regrowth, alopecia areata, psoriasis, Vitiligo (Hair regrowth and in situ tissue regeneration  cases).

Perks


All PERKs will start being mailed within one month after receipt of your perk contribution.

When you receive this perk, and start using it, we encourage anyone using photos to record the excitement of hair regeneration. If you are not satisfied with WanBinCell results when you run out of WanBinCell follow the instructions, and want your contribution back, we will refund the remaining contribution for you after deducting the cost ($ 25) and 10% expenses. You only need to do the following steps: 1. take 3 picture at least to record using the WanBinCell program, including before using, during using and after using; 2. send all photos to wanbincell@hotmail.com; 3. describe your requirements and views in the message.

FAQ

Why WanBinCell Works So Quickly?

New hair can regrow in about 5 days in half bald area. This is because WanBinCell contains stem cell initiators factors. They penetrate scalp, reach hair follicle stem cells, and stimulate the stem cells to grow new hair follicles. Wound will heal in 5 days, with the factors, new hair follicles could regeneration 5 days. In half bald area, hair follicles and their living space still exist, therefore new hair follicles have space to grow quickly.

Why It has Slower Effect in Bald Area?

In bald area, there are almost no hair follicles; their space has been taken up by sebaceous gland cells. Even there are stem cell regeneration stimulate factors, it is impossible to have regenerated hair follicles because of the limited physical space. So it works slowly in bald area. But by continuously creating man-made micro wounds, hair follicles will have physical space for survival. Generally in 1 to 3 months, healthy thick new hair can regrow even in bald area.

Why Have Severe Shedding Period? Can it Be Avoided?

Physical space is still the key point to solve the problem of Androgenetic alopecia. Because there are limited physical space and old hair follicles have not been cleared, new hair follicles could not regenerate. Natural regeneration of hair follicles is a process that new hair follicles replace old hair follicles which are in telogen. In fact, severe Shedding of hair exists in all effective products, such as Minoxidil and Finasteride. In the first 3 months after an effective hair transplant surgery, hairs grow from new transplant hair follicles will fall off entirely. Now it is inevitable and must be accepted. This period also has psychological impact. Different from transplant surgery, using WanBinCell does not need to shave all the old hair. Shedding period especially long hair fall off give shocks, while new hair grow in the speed of 1mm/3 days.

How Woman Avoid Severe Shedding Period?

Due to woman’s hair loss generally is not as serious as man, we recommend you to use plum needle and reduce the use time of WanBinCell. For example use WanBinCell for one week (7 days), select one day from this week to knock head with plum needle, then stop for a week, and keep doing it. Even men can use this method to avoid Shedding period. For men who can accept the period, using plum needle once a week is also helpful.

Severe Shedding Periods Due to Hair Being Burned off?

Because of the need to make tiny wounds, WanBinCell has a little corrosion effect. Corrosion effect is similar to hydrogen peroxide used in dyeing, but won’t burn out the hair for the following reasons: 1. If WanBinCell burns off hair, new hair won’t appear when using it. Even new hairs appear, it will not continue to grow. If you use it for 20 days, new hair can grow in 5 days, and generally reach 0.5 cm at 20th day; 2. If hair is burned off, it should not carry hair follicle, while actually most of the hairs fall off with hair follicles thicker than hair; 3. If it burns off hair, the original hair will grow naturally. It’s impossible to have a lot of new hair grow when stop using WanBinCell for 1 to 2 months. The truth is after using WanBinCell for 20 days, then stop, new hair will grow unceasingly after 1 to 2 month.

Why Hair Regrowth Takes Such a Long Time?

It has been found that it takes about 1 to 2 years to recover to no hair loss appearance by using WanBinCell. Since WanBinCell do not require continuous use, the overall use time is about 1 year. Hair regrowth is a big challenge. Before our in situ tissue regeneration technology, hair transplant surgery, as an effective means, requires more than six months to achieve hair regrowth. The first 3 months is shedding period and other 3 months growing period. Actually it takes 8 months for hair to grow in all transplant area. Our in situ tissue regeneration technology solves two hair loss problems: create hair follicle regeneration space and stimulate hair follicle stem cells to regenerate hair follicles. Even so, as an aging problem, hair loss cannot be solved in 1 to 2 months. In the consideration of hair loss usually lasting time of 5 to 10 years and hair loss area are completely different from healthy area, it is reasonable to rebuild a new healthy in 1-2 years.

Are Other Drugs Needed when Using WanBinCell?

WanBinCell can fully solve hair loss from essential problem. Long-term use can cure hair loss. Therefore it’s not recommended to use other drugs together, but we suggest to use plum needle. If used properly, it is quite beneficial to hair (for example, knocking as heavily as possible to make scalp bleed if pain could be tolerated).

What Advantages of Using Plum Needle?

One difficulty of Androgenetic alopecia treatment is how to provide physical space for the generation of new hair follicles. Although WanBinCell can make tiny wounds, but the size and number of wounds could not reach the requirements of fast hair regrowth. We have learned that man-made large wounds of hair transplant surgery can theoretically accelerate hair follicle regeneration process. So when knocking head with plum needle, we suggest that if you can tolerate, please knock as heavily as possible and make scalp bleed. There is no need to worry about the infection of wounds, because WanBinCell contains a substance similar to the ROS, a material could avoid infection and accelerate wound healing.

Is WanBinCell Safe?

WanBinCell had been inspected by qualified inspection agency, conforming to the safety specifications, and is a special cosmetic product examined and approved by State Food and Drug Administration of China. Actually we have done a more rigorous safety testing, therefore we can confirm that WanBinCell can be taken orally or by intramuscular injection without any side effects (watch the video of the inventor test WanBinCell safety on himself).


Why Using WanBinCell could Cause Piercing Pain? Is It Unqualified As Cosmetics?

Having no space for the new hair follicle is the key problem of hair loss. So solving the problem of hair loss must create space for new hair follicles. It’s a logical thinking that WanBinCell use chemicals to create tiny wounds. Wounds will naturally bring pain which shouldn’t be thought as a standard to judge for good cosmetics. In the United States, WanBinCell has to be put on the market as a medicine. We have applied for a patent in the United States. Piercing pain is an important mechanism process of medicine, rather than side effect.

Why Need 1-2 Years to Get Fully Recovery?

Androgenetic alopecia is one of the forms of aging, which develops relatively slow, generally obvious hair loss takes five to ten years to appear. It has long disease course and treatment time. There is still no very effective treatment for Androgenetic alopecia except hair transplant surgery with relatively fast effect (recovery also needs about 8 months), Minoxidil and Finasteride need longer time to take effect, and need to be applied for a long time. Comparatively speaking, WanBinCell technology is also the most rapid one by only taking 1-2 years to recover.

Development

About the Inventor

Xuewu Liu, Chinese, in 1998, bachelor of Nanjing University majoring in atmospheric physics and atmospheric environment. Liu has graduated from Nanjing University with a master of international business economics in 2001 and have worked in government department, financial institutions and private investment company. With high scientific literacy and innovation ability, Liu has bright ideas and thoughts in fields of economy and enterprise management. He is the inventor and applicant of this patent. He has invented three patents by doing experiments on himself, which are hair regrowth technology, in situ tissue regeneration technology and apoptosis inducer technology.

Liu believe that medicine will enable remarkable treatment techniques, if only we are able to break our thinking out of its traditional box. 

Risk

WanBinCell is a special cosmetic product approved by China’s State Food and Drug Administration, not medicine. We may encounter some challenges when applying to FDA for clinical trials, for example, most of our preclinical research will be done in Chinese laboratories, the research material may not be able to meet the requirements of FDA. More experiments will be arranged in American high-standard laboratories depending on the fund could be raised. We will try to find cooperators in the United States, especially big medicine companies experienced in new medicine applications. We hope to gain their support by exchanging our patent technologies.

Help Us Spread the Word About WanBinCell

If you have any idea on media, mailing lists, newsletters, or people who might be interested in sponsorship, partnerships or the like, please email us at liuxuewu@gmail.com.

Scientists or doctors who are professional in hair regrowth, regenerative medicine, anti-aging and anti-tumor as well as experts who are familiar with new medicine registration process are welcomed to contact us.
