about four out of seven adult males are suffering hair loss.
There
are an estimated 40 million men and 12 million women experiencing some degree
of hair loss in the United States alone. Two-thirds of American men will see
the affects of Androgenetic alopecia by the age of 35.In order to meet
such a large market demand, we decided to launch this crowdfunding.
The
crowdfunding will be used for the production, while the rest of the money will
be used for preclinical study, phase I clinical research and application to the
FDA for clinical tests.
The cost of FDA application for preclinical trials and phase I
clinical study is estimated as $2 million. We will raise funds by crowdfunding
and fill the gap by other means.
Reasons for Androgenetic
Alopecia
Male hormone
translates into DHT which will block the hair follicle regeneration. DHT can
make obstacles in the process of hair follicle stem cells translating into hair
follicle cells, preventing hair follicle regeneration, thus regenerated hair
follicles keep shrinking until disappear. 
The study found
that hair follicle stem cells in hair loss area are normal, so hair follicle
stem cells loss is not the main cause of hair loss (learn more about the study).
There are two
possible ways of DHT blocking hair follicle regeneration process: 1. DHT leads
to the hyperplasia and enlargement of sebaceous gland near the top of  head, as with DHT leads to the prostate
enlargement of male, which squeezes the survival space of the hair follicles,
therefore stopping hair follicle regeneration after normal falling off; 2.
After the cycle of hair follicle anagen, catagen and telogen, the body will
give hair follicle stem cells the right stimulation signal, initiating the hair
follicle stem cells regeneration process but DHT accumulation interferes or
disrupts the signal transmission, thus blocking the regeneration process of
hair follicle stem cells differentiating into hair follicle cells.Both two ways lead
to the same result: sebaceous gland cells encroach on the space of hair
follicles, thus hair loss area is not only very oily (that’s why every hair
loser has this problem), and making hair follicle regeneration lose physical
space and more difficult.Androgenetic Alopecia
Treatment Difficulties
1. How to make physical space for hair follicles. The long process of hair loss with hair follicles falling off,
and sebaceous glands cells gradually occupy the space of the hair follicle. The
simple physical logic tells us that physical space must be made for hair
follicle for its regeneration. If see some effective hair regrowth
technologies, such as hair transplant surgery, you will find the most simple
idea of providing specific space for hair follicle is man-made wound.
The study found that man-made wound healing process will produce
new hair follicle stem cells group and new hair (learn more about the study).
From hair transplant surgery we will find that hair follicles in
transplantation area can regenerate after being removed. But in the hair loss
area, making new pores and transplanting new hair follicles which all fall off
after 3 months. The regenerated hair follicles in hair loss area should have
nothing to do with transplanted hair follicles. The man-made bigger wound for
new pore is the key to regenerate hair follicles in hair transplant surgery.
Talents of Chinese people with traditional Chinese medicine
experience and exploration also provide an effective way of hair regrowth. That
is using plum needle to knock on the head. Almost all Chinese medicine hair
regrowth shops, no matter what kind of Chinese traditional medicine they choose
use plum needle head knocking as supplementary means. In fact, knocking on the
head with plum needle is the only solution of hair regrowth that might work. Because
plum needle which knocking on the hair loss area can make a lot of wounds. Even
without stem cells stimulation, it may also be accompanied by new hair follicle
regeneration during the wounds heal.
2. How to initiate hair follicles regeneration by hair follicle stem
cells. Modern medicines generally use cytokines to stimulate stem cell
regeneration process. The special stem cells need special cytokines to
stimulate them. But now there is no broad spectrum stimulating factor being
found.How Does
WanBinCell work?WanBinCell
initiative in situ tissue regeneration technology is to cure hair loss by
aiming at the two difficulties of Androgenetic alopecia treatment, and is able
to cure quickly and keep a long-term health. 
In situ tissue regeneration technology is to initiate body’s original stem cell proliferation, migration
and differentiation by external physical or chemical means, thus fulfill
regeneration of new healthy tissues.
In Situ Tissue Regeneration Technology
Our
patent provides a method of initiating mammal’s stem cell proliferation,
migration and differentiation. This method can persistently initiate in situ
stem cells proliferation, migration and differentiation with minimal or no side
effects. We have not only developed the theory of “in situ tissue
regeneration”, but also invented the method which can timely initiate tissue
regeneration of stem cells near damaged tissues, so as to cure the disease or
restore young tissues. (learn more about the in situ tissue regeneration technology patent).

Mechanism
Drugs(stem cell initiators) are used on the
targeted aging or damage tissues. Stem cell initiators will initiate healthy
tissue regeneration of stem cells through three functions: 1. Stem cell
initiators remove damaged or senescent cells, and make specific space for
tissue regeneration; 2. Stem cell initiators as exogenous gas signal molecule activate
stem cell proliferation, migration and differentiation; 3. Stem cell initiators
regulate the immune response, to avoid infection. Under the
induce of specific space, damaged tissues or surrounded normal stem cells
regenerate new functional young tissues through proliferation, migration and
differentiation. Impaired cells are removed as making room for tissue
regeneration. Disease is cured and young tissues are restored by new tissues
replacing impaired ones.
Further
studies have indicated that stem cell initiator is a substance similar to ROS. Targeted
drug delivery is equivalent to supplement exogenous similar ROS compounds into the target tissue. The latest study has
found that improving the level of ROS could accelerate apoptosis of cancer
cells and reach the goal of anticancer（For example:1. Targeting Oxidative Stress in Embryonal Rhabdomyosarcoma; 2. Antioxidants Accelerate Lung Cancer
Progression in Mice; 3. Selective
killing of cancer cells with a small molecule targeting stress response to ROS; 4. Breaking the depth dependency of phototherapy with
Cerenkov radiation and low-radiance-responsive nanophotosensitizers.）; improving ROS could regulate immune response and treat autoimmune
diseases(For example: 1. A New Arthritis
Therapy with Oxidative Burst Inducers; 2. Eriocalyxin B ameliorates
experimental autoimmune ncephalomyelitis by suppressing Th1 and Th17 cells.);
increasing ROS level contributes to tissue regeneration(For example: 1. Amputation-induced
reactive oxygen species are required for successful Xenopus tadpole tail
regeneration; 2. Sustained production
of ROS triggers compensatory proliferation and is required for regeneration to
proceed). The three patents we applied cover three possible mechanisms
of ROS, suggesting that the substance which similar to ROS can play the same
role of ROS. We applied apoptosis inducer patent for substance similar to ROS (learn more about
apoptosis inducer patent) used for anti-aging and tumor treatment.Advantages of In Situ Tissue Regeneration Technology
It
is a kind of stem cell therapy which makes full use of stem cell regeneration
ability; Stem cells can be found in any tissue, so we can initiate in situ stem
cells with no need of transplant; No need of complicated process of selection
and induction; Make full use of original stem cell micro environment; No
carcinogenicity and won’t cause immune rejection; Simple, high success rate,
widely used, low cost and convenient.How Does WanBinCell Hair-Growth-Promoting Solution
Regrow Hair?
WanBinCell
contains the substance which can activate the hair follicle stem cells to
regenerate, having two key functions in the process of hair regrowth: 1. Make
tiny wounds thus providing specific space for new hair follicles; 2. activate
hair follicle stem cells in hair loss area and grow new healthy hair follicles.
Through
experiment, WanBinCell has the following characteristics: regrow new hair in
about 5 days; in half bald area, fierce hair loss period shall appear by the
accelerated falling off (the severe shedding period )of original hair
especially the thin ones, then new hair regrow; in bald area, new hair regrowth
takes a longer time of about 1 to 3 months; no matter what the degree of hair
loss is, WanBinCell shall be used for more than over one year to make sure of
no hair loss appearance.What Does
WanBinCell Bring to the World?
In
situ tissue regeneration technique has made a great breakthrough in traditional
stem cell therapy. It can be applied as a clinical therapy immediately. It
makes full use of the potential of stem cell regeneration which could cure many
difficult diseases. Combined with apoptosis inducer patent technology, it is
more powerful in anti-aging and cancer treatment.
CompareThere
are three well-known solutions for Androgenetic alopecia: Finasteride,
Minoxidil and Hair Transplant Surgery.Case 
In this video, our case studies include hair regrowth, alopecia areata, psoriasis, Vitiligo (Hair regrowth and in situ tissue regeneration  cases).


Perks


All PERKs will start being mailed within
one month after receipt of your perk contribution.
When you receive this perk, and start using it, we encourage anyone
using photos to record the excitement of hair regeneration. If you are not
satisfied with WanBinCell results when you run out of WanBinCell follow the
instructions, and want your contribution back, we will refund the remaining
contribution for you after deducting the cost ($ 25) and 10% expenses. You only
need to do the following steps: 1. take 3 picture at least to record using the
WanBinCell program, including before using, during using and after using; 2. send
all photos to wanbincell@hotmail.com; 3. describe your requirements and views in
the message.FAQ
Why WanBinCell Works So Quickly?
New hair can
regrow in about 5 days in half bald area. This is because WanBinCell contains stem cell initiators factors. They penetrate scalp, reach hair follicle stem
cells, and stimulate the stem cells to grow new hair follicles. Wound will heal
in 5 days, with the factors, new hair follicles could regeneration 5 days. In
half bald area, hair follicles and their living space still exist, therefore
new hair follicles have space to grow quickly.
Why It has Slower Effect in Bald Area?
In
bald area, there are almost no hair follicles; their space has been taken up by
sebaceous gland cells. Even there are stem cell regeneration stimulate factors,
it is impossible to have regenerated hair follicles because of the limited
physical space. So it works slowly in bald area. But by continuously creating man-made
micro wounds, hair follicles will have physical space for survival. Generally
in 1 to 3 months, healthy thick new hair can regrow even in
bald area.
Why Have Severe Shedding Period? Can it Be Avoided? 
Physical
space is still the key point to solve the problem of Androgenetic alopecia. Because
there are limited physical space and old hair follicles have not been cleared,
new hair follicles could not regenerate. Natural regeneration of hair follicles
is a process that new hair follicles replace old hair follicles which are in telogen.
In fact, severe Shedding of hair exists in all effective products, such as
Minoxidil and Finasteride. In the first 3 months after an effective hair
transplant surgery, hairs grow from new transplant hair follicles will fall off
entirely. Now it is inevitable and must be accepted. This period also has
psychological impact. Different from transplant surgery, using WanBinCell does
not need to shave all the old hair. Shedding period especially long hair fall
off give shocks, while new hair grow in the speed of 1mm/3 days.

How Woman Avoid Severe Shedding Period?
Due
to woman’s hair loss generally is not as serious as man, we recommend you to
use plum needle and reduce the use time of WanBinCell. For example use WanBinCell
for one week (7 days), select one day from this week to knock head with plum
needle, then stop for a week, and keep doing it. Even men can use this method
to avoid Shedding period. For men who can accept the period, using plum needle once
a week is also helpful.
Severe Shedding Periods Due to Hair Being Burned
off?
Because
of the need to make tiny wounds, WanBinCell has a little corrosion effect.
Corrosion effect is similar to hydrogen peroxide used in dyeing, but won’t burn
out the hair for the following reasons: 1. If WanBinCell burns off hair, new
hair won’t appear when using it. Even new hairs appear, it will not continue to
grow. If you use it for 20 days, new hair can grow in 5 days, and generally
reach 0.5 cm at 20th day; 2. If hair is burned off, it should not carry hair
follicle, while actually most of the hairs fall off with hair follicles thicker
than hair; 3. If it burns off hair, the original hair will grow naturally. It’s
impossible to have a lot of new hair grow when stop using WanBinCell for 1 to 2
months. The truth is after using WanBinCell for 20 days, then stop, new hair
will grow unceasingly after 1 to 2 month.
Why Hair Regrowth Takes Such a
Long Time?
It has been found that it takes
about 1 to 2 years to recover to no hair loss appearance by using WanBinCell.
Since WanBinCell do not require continuous use, the overall use time is about 1
year. Hair regrowth is a big challenge. Before our in situ tissue regeneration
technology, hair transplant surgery, as an effective means, requires more than
six months to achieve hair regrowth. The first 3 months is shedding period and
other 3 months growing period. Actually it takes 8 months for hair to grow in
all transplant area. Our in situ tissue regeneration technology solves two hair
loss problems: create hair follicle regeneration space and stimulate hair
follicle stem cells to regenerate hair follicles. Even so, as an aging problem,
hair loss cannot be solved in 1 to 2 months. In the consideration of hair loss
usually lasting time of 5 to 10 years and hair loss area are completely
different from healthy area, it is reasonable to rebuild a new healthy in 1-2
years. 

Are Other Drugs Needed when Using
WanBinCell?
WanBinCell can fully solve hair
loss from essential problem. Long-term use can cure hair loss. Therefore it’s
not recommended to use other drugs together, but we suggest to use plum needle.
If used properly, it is quite beneficial to hair (for example, knocking as
heavily as possible to make scalp bleed if pain could be tolerated).
What Advantages of Using Plum
Needle?
One difficulty of Androgenetic
alopecia treatment is how to provide physical space for the generation of new
hair follicles. Although WanBinCell can make tiny wounds, but the size and
number of wounds could not reach the requirements of fast hair regrowth. We
have learned that man-made large wounds of hair transplant surgery can theoretically
accelerate hair follicle regeneration process. So when knocking head with plum
needle, we suggest that if you can tolerate, please knock as heavily as
possible and make scalp bleed. There is no need to worry about the infection of
wounds, because WanBinCell contains a substance similar to the ROS, a material
could avoid infection and accelerate wound healing.
Is WanBinCell Safe?
WanBinCell had been inspected by
qualified inspection agency, conforming to the safety specifications, and is a
special cosmetic product examined and approved by State Food and Drug
Administration of China. Actually we have done a more rigorous safety testing,
therefore we can confirm that WanBinCell can be taken orally or by
intramuscular injection without any side effects (watch the video of the inventor test WanBinCell safety on himself).

Why Using WanBinCell could Cause Piercing Pain? Is
It Unqualified As Cosmetics?
Having
no space for the new hair follicle is the key problem of hair loss. So solving
the problem of hair loss must create space for new hair follicles. It’s a
logical thinking that WanBinCell use chemicals to create tiny wounds. Wounds
will naturally bring pain which shouldn’t be thought as a standard to judge for
good cosmetics. In the United States, WanBinCell has to be put on the
market as a medicine. We have applied for a patent in the United States. Piercing pain is an
important mechanism process of medicine, rather than side effect.
Why Need 1-2 Years to Get Fully
Recovery?
Androgenetic alopecia is one of
the forms of aging, which develops relatively slow, generally obvious hair loss
takes five to ten years to appear. It has long disease course and treatment
time. There is still no very effective treatment for Androgenetic alopecia
except hair transplant surgery with relatively fast effect (recovery also needs
about 8 months), Minoxidil and Finasteride need longer time to take effect, and
need to be applied for a long time. Comparatively speaking, WanBinCell
technology is also the most rapid one by only taking 1-2 years to recover.
DevelopmentAbout the Inventor 
Xuewu Liu, Chinese, in 1998,
bachelor of Nanjing University majoring in atmospheric physics and atmospheric
environment. Liu has graduated from Nanjing University with a master of
international business economics in 2001 and have worked in government
department, financial institutions and private investment company. With high
scientific literacy and innovation ability, Liu has bright ideas and thoughts
in fields of economy and enterprise management. He is the inventor and
applicant of this patent. He has invented three patents by doing experiments on
himself, which are hair regrowth technology, in situ tissue regeneration
technology and apoptosis inducer technology.Liu believe that medicine will enable remarkable treatment techniques, if only we are able to break our thinking out of its traditional box. 
Risk
WanBinCell is a special cosmetic
product approved by China’s State Food and Drug Administration, not medicine. We
may encounter some challenges when applying to FDA for clinical trials, for
example, most of our preclinical research will be done in Chinese laboratories,
the research material may not be able to meet the requirements of FDA. More
experiments will be arranged in American high-standard laboratories depending
on the fund could be raised. We will try to find cooperators in the United
States, especially big medicine companies experienced in new medicine
applications. We hope to gain their support by exchanging our patent
technologies.

Help Us Spread the Word About WanBinCellIf you have any idea on media, mailing
lists, newsletters, or people who might be interested in sponsorship, partnerships or the like, please
email us at liuxuewu@gmail.com.
Scientists or doctors who are
professional in hair regrowth, regenerative medicine, anti-aging and anti-tumor
as well as experts who are familiar with new medicine registration process are
welcomed to contact us.

story:
NMS-Clip 

is a small apparatus that yields a big impact. It stops snoring fast, easily and inexpensively. It is quality checked as well as physiologically compatible. It helps to make the nights quiet and relaxing.


This is the NMS-Clip:


The NMS clip helps against snoring
The NMS-Clip is a unique German medical device. You don’t need a doctor or dentist for the initial insertion or adjustments. It is proven effective and is  straightforward to use. 


The problem: snoring
Millions of people snore. This not only bothers the partner in their sleep, it can contribute to hassles and result in bad mood.
Snoring can also lead to serious health problems: 

  • The organs are less supplied with oxygen. 
  • There may be irregular breathing which can result in dangerous sleep apnoea. 
  • A person who does not sleep properly is tired, unfocused and not powerful the next day.


How does one face the challenges in work and family having to deal this problem?


The solution: NMS-Clip

The NMS-Clip can give back the joy of life to snorers. A test in a sleep laboratory showed a 92 percent success rate.


A product against snoring? Aren’t there many already? Yes, but the NMS clip is truly unique:

  • its effectiveness has been proven
  • it is a certified and patented medical product
  • its material is detected physiologically compatible
  • it is less expensive than many other products

And last but not least, the NMS-Clip is comfortable to wear – as you fit it yourself on your teeth and your jaw.

Do you hate snoring? Then you'll love the NMS-Clip!


That’s how snoring develops:

Due to sagging muscles in the tongue and palate the upper respiratory tract narrows. The annoying snoring noise arises because the soft palate and uvula flutter with every breath. When it comes to sleep apnoea, the throat even closes completely at short notice.


That’s how the small NMS clip works:

The NMS clip slightly draws forward the lower jaw in order to straighten the whole mouth and palate area. The airways are then clear again, and snoring ceases or is greatly reduced.


And that’s how simple it is adjusted:





Who we are: a successful German founding family...

We developed, tested and patented the NMS-Clip in cooperation with a dentist friend of ours and his team. We, that are Reinhard (CEO), Caroline (research associate), Christine (accountant) and Richard Krätzig (marketing) together with Horst Fusshöller (IT-Management). Currently, we merchandise our product in the German-speaking countries of Germany, Austria and Switzerland. We just opened an office in England and started with a Japanese partnership.


And now we need you!

We are convinced that our clip is needed all around the world. Our pilot-phase has been very promising. Now we’d like to let a major advertising campaign follow. Help us to reach more people and to liberate them from their suffering, the snoring!
 Our short-term goal is to supply other European countries as well as Canada, the United States and South America.
 Ideally, we collect funds of € 100,000 or more to launch a major campaign. But even a smaller amount helps us to publicize our great product. Of course, we would like you to participate in our project. Please choose from our perks!



FAQ:


 How long does a NMS-Clip last for?

The materials used (polycaprolactone, polypropylene and polyamide) are not only very compatible but also very stable. For hygiene reasons though, we recommend to replace the NMS-Clip after about a year.

How should the NMS-Clip be maintained?

After wearing it should be simply rinsed lukewarm, dried and kept dry & cool in the supplied case until it is reapplied in the evening. We recommend using a commercially available denture cleaner every 14 days.

Where has the effectiveness of the NMS-Clip been checked?

The clip has been clinically tested in the sleep laboratory of Dr. Christoph Schenk in Osnabrueck, Germany. Out of 100 persons 84 completely stopped snoring, 8 experienced a massive reduction. Only on 8 people there was no impact detectable.

Please click here to read the test report in German: 

(http://www.nms-clip.de/images/stories/pdf/klinischer_test.pdf)

Can the NMS-Clip be readjusted, e.g. after dental correction?

The material has been selected in a way that a readjustment of the NMS-Clips is possible up to 50 times. Therefore you can just put it back into hot water until it softens, bite firmly onto it and let it cool down again.

Who tested the compatibility?

The testing institute for medical devices and material analysis in Goeppingen, Germany confirmed the compatibility. 

Please click here to read the test report in German: 

(http://www.nms-clip.de/images/stories/pdf/Pruefbericht_NMS_CLIP.pdf)

How is the NMS-Clip sold?

In Germany, Switzerland and Austria it is sold in pharmacies, dentist surgeries and via mail order. We'd like to expand this channels of distribution internationally.

Spread the word!

Do you know people who suffer from snoring? Who therefore sleep poorly, have health problems or dispute with their partner? Tell them about the NMS clip which is cheap and effective against snoring!

story:
06/05/15

We've received MANY 'Good Lucks' and Testimonials from existing users since we began this campaign nearly a month ago and I wanted to share another with you today. 

Hi Chad / Multi-Edit!

I Love Multi-edit!

I've been using it for approximately 28 years -- back in the early days, it was the only software that would open really large files, and it could SCROLL so fast!  Over the years, the "build your own macro" feature has saved me so much time!!  And the block edit, and the ASCII character map that pops up with Alt-A keystroke. I probably should do more than the $100 that I just contributed via Indiegogo.  I wrote the first draft of my dissertation in Multi-Edit!!

Jake Hershey, Ph.D.


Please help us to complete this amazing rebuild of Multi-Edit, without your help we simply won't be able to fund the completion of this project and Multi-Edit will not have any future builds.  Please share our campaign with everyone you can if you are unable to contribute and thank you from all of us at Multi Edit Software!


**Update
We've had a number of request for smaller reward options so we've added $1.00, $5.00 and $10.00 reward levels.


Let ME Help YOU!

Hello! My name is Chad Williams, President and CEO of Multi Edit Software, Inc. and I am here to tell you about our new product called Multi-Edit x or MEx. 

We developed Multi-Edit in order to provide a powerful, quality programming environment that supports over 50 programming languages from standard .txt files to programming languages both new and old. 

With years of market presence and an existing user base, we have no doubt this release will help the Programming/Text Editing Community who is always in need of a solution for quality editor for a fraction of the price of the Big Dogs but with the same POWER many have come to know and love.


-Want to code better, cleaner and faster?

-Looking for a code or text editor with amazing speed and power?

-Tired of all those other editors that look, feel and operate the way THEY want it to and NOT the way YOU code or edit?

-Frustrated with the limited support for your programming languages?

If you’re a programmer or frequently edit those plain ugly improperly formatted files, then you likely have answered YES to most of our questions above, and YOU can help Multi-Edit to once again be the BEST editor in the world!


Overview

Anyone who has encountered it knows that improperly formatted text files are a pain. We're out to change this by once again, providing the best editor on the market!

Help us establish this initiative to serve the Development Community in need of a solution.  Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this project today!


                     Screenshot of Multi-Edit (currently available release)



More about the Project

Multi-Edit over these past years has struggled to hold its edge in the market as the larger corporate owned editors with ample funding have surpassed the features of Multi-Edit.  This fact prompted us to dig deeper for a long term solution. 

This is where we started to envision Multi-Edit x and all the possible benefits we could bring to the Development Community:

We created a new design for Multi-Edit x with an entirely new framework that will allow it to once again become the powerful machine it was originally designed to be.

Newly designed Multi-Edit framework will ultimately be released as a  powerful stand alone product allowing developers in need of  basic editor framework to be easily integrated to custom products/programs.

Provide the familiar user interface to function as before with a new and powerful engine.

Eliminate limitations such as: No cross platform support (currently only available as a Windows product), no Unicode support and therefore no ability to provide multi-language support for other countries as well as additional limitations that simply couldn’t be overcome with our existing outdated framework.

When reviewing these benefits, features and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a business that needs to be created. We know that when executed properly we can reach a large market of people in need of an easy, more productive way to code with amazing speed and power. 

Our features will make us incredibly qualified to once again succeed in the software industry.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us a key player if not leader in the Programming and Text Editor market once again.

Our mission is to take care of every crowd funder, supporter and customer with the utmost respect and care.  We fully understand this will be the key to our growth.


What is our funding goal and where will the funding go towards?

In order for us to complete the Multi-Edit x Windows release we are looking to raise $200,000 which will be enough to hire a qualified development team to complete MEx for Windows build. If funding exceeds our goal, we’ll not only complete the Multi-Edit x for Windows release, but will then split our development team in two directions. One team will maintain the Windows build and continue to add and enhance features, while the other team will begin our first ever Linux build.

As we continue to progress and if funding exceeds our expectations, we’ll move forward to our planned Mac build as well and eventually offer a mobile release or both portable drive use as well as a Phone App version of Multi-Edit.

Following the release of the Windows, Linux and Mac builds, we’ll focus on enhancing our framework to become a ‘stand-alone’ product to allow others to utilize the power and functionality we’ve created to use for other software projects that require a SOLID base framework for programming/text editing needs.

We also have defined projects to begin creating custom language parsers to allow users to utilize other languages such as RUBY, Python, Java etc. to write powerful macros that will be interpreted to use Multi-Edit's built in CMac language. This will allow users/programmers the ability to create full-fledged add-ons without the need to learn Multi-Edit's CMac language.


    See Multi-Edit in action in a video Tutorial on using Projects and Sessions
   

Who uses Multi-Edit might be asking yourself? That's a very GOOD question and since Multi-Edit has been around since DOS, that's a HUGE list of licensed users to reference. Currently there are licensed Multi-Edit Users in 79 countries and we currently manage 51 authorized resellers located in 37 countries across the globe.

Below we've provided a list of some of our customers who you're likely to recognize, but our Licensed User base extends well beyond these Customers!

                         A small sample of Current Multi-Edit license holders


"Multi-Edit is the most useful tool I have ever had for programming, which I've been using since the early 1990s (COBOL and FORTRAN, lol).  Over the years, it has saved my life many times over with the powerful search/sort/select functions and the file compare feature, to name just a few.  
Thanks for sticking around, I am really looking forward to a new release!"
Jennifer M.

"I love Multi-Edit, I use it for everything, right now oracle PL/SQL and ASP. The most fun feature is the block operations and being able to easily go into someone else's code and get everything aligned and indented properly...other most important features are just too numerous to list!
Thanks for your great product!"
Sean L

"I have used Multi-Edit for ‘some years’ – mostly because it is very flexible with how you are able to open a file several times and show different parts of the same code file at the same time and because search is so super fast … Ctrl+Alt+Up/Down is so nice!"
Jesper G.

"There is no one best feature in Multi-Edit. There are just so many great features (Multi-tags, compiler integration, session manager, bookmarks, file search,) that just make Multi-Edit the best. I’ve used Multi-Edit ever since I was introduced to the DOS version back in 1992. I’ve worked several companies since then and have used Multi-Edit as my foundation for embedded code development. Multi-Edit’s integrity, flexibility and easy of use, has made the editor an indispensable tool."
Ron S

"While there are a lot of things I like about ME, I suppose the single most important thing is that the source for most of the program is included, letting me extend it to my little heart's content. I include in this the built-in template facility, as well as the extensible macro language and the way it lets you integrate functionality into the program in a way indistinguishable from the shipped interface. As an example, I'm in the process of putting together a fairly messy and massive set of C++ extensions for ME. These are for my own use, but if I get them to a decent production level, I see no reason not to share with others. And that's the cherry that caps my comments; since everyone can modify the program, some really nice, often unusual mods can end up in the shipped product."
Reid S.

"I use ME every day for my work and it is my primary editor.  I'm stuck on the old style Wordstar keyboard layout with some scripts of my own design that extend its capabilities.  What interests me most is to see ME extended into the Linux market so that I can have one editor for both environments."
Chris F.

"I have been using Multi-Edit since my DOS days of programming in dBASE/Clipper and using Evolve.  I use Multi-Edit primarily on HTML and PERL scripts.  I fuss and complain when I have to use Visual Studio’s editor for its lack of features.  I have written a few macros and tweaked the templates to meet my specific programming needs.  On a good day, I’ve spent all my time in ME."
James C.

What is our project time line?

When the MEx project is funded, we’ll begin the development at full speed. As the product is already nearing completion we anticipate two to three months development time to achieve a solid Public Beta release. We will allow an additional two months or less for complete Beta testing (as many options/functions/features have already been tested), adding final features, updated documentation and ultimately the release of Multi-Edit x for Windows.

Regardless of funding amounts beyond our goal, we’ll immediately take the proceeds and roll back into the development of our much anticipated Linux build and will then move forward with our Mac build.  Funding received will go towards development and design of the MEx product line until ALL builds are available in their full release.


Stretch Goals

Not only will MEx provide Windows, Linux and Mac builds, but as we get our revenues rolling or if funding surpasses our expectations, we’ll not only continue to develop this product line, but will begin developing releases for mobile devices as well so that you can 'Utilize the Power of ME wherever YOU may be'!


Risks???

Multi-Edit has been a successful product for over 30 years, with a very diverse global audience. This new framework has been carefully thought out and will succeed regardless of the initial feature sets released as our track record has proven that all previous new releases have brought in revenues large enough to sustain operations and future patches and builds for years to come. With funding going directly into development of MEx, we will continue to add new features to all builds and in no time will once again become the Editor of Choice, Built by Users for Users!


About Us

Our company is passionate with creating an unmatched solution that’s fast and effective for your coding/text editing needs. Our company operates based on our mission statement to once again be the BEST editor choice in the world!  For our full About Us story, see our About Multi-Edit page at http://multieditsoftware.com/about-multi-edit-software-inc/. 


How You Can Help ME?

For us to bring MEx to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get the ball rolling and bring our MEx concept to a completed product.  In order for us to release the Multi-Edit x Windows build we are planning to raise $200,000, which will be enough to hire an experienced development team to complete Multi-Edit x. It will also assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly with a donation of $100 or more, you get the chance to be one of the first users of Multi-Edit x. 

We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions as recommended and requested by our Users.

Our Multi-Edit x build requires pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page) and help us spread the word by sharing this campaign with everyone you know and lets get this project started!


Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters. 

Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  Your direct participation in our campaign make you a direct part of our Multi-Edit x family!


If you wish to contact us:

  Website: http://multieditsoftware.com/

Our Social Media Connections:

  Twitter:  https://twitter.com/MESoftwareInc

  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/multiedit 

  YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfblShqr1cnltnafgzEy6HQ?view_as=public

Contact Information
Name: Chad Williams 
Phone: 480-610-2700

  E Mail: funding@multieditsoftware.com 

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration, investment opportunities or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at funding@multieditsoftware.com

story: About three years ago, I discovered Imagination Yoga from a featured article in Entrepreneur Magazine. Slowly but surely, I've been planning to make this happen in Wisconsin. Our campaign goal is $5000 to cover educational training, travel expenses, and marketing. We will be contributing our own funds to help get this started as well.

story:
3BUoMTQhnSoM797aP81mGUor4oeGRzvUcg


The Journey

MMA, with its convergence of techniques brings the entirety of martial arts to a new level.  But over time, I found I needed more. I needed a way to know that what I’m learning is quality training and suitable to my body type, skill level, learning style, and attention to detail. 

That’s why I found it strange, in this day and age, that my coaches told me not to look online for the answers. What were my coaches trying to protect me from? 

Then I realized, in this information super age, with any and all people posting techniques online, making DVDs, and writing books, it is tough to know who really knows what they are talking about. 

 I knew I had to solve this problem by making Martial Arts Training available to everyone!


So What?

Getting started in Martial Arts Training can be intimidating.  For newcomers we want to lower the barrier to entry. At the same time those who already train, progress can be slow and there is a need for quality instruction outside of the gym. 

One size fits all training programs help bring an entire academy up but not the individuals.  The best and easiest way to improve your game is through tailored video instruction. 

MA Vids currently offers free curated videos which are logically categorized.  We need your help to deploy a subscription-based service of combat sports video techniques.

1. Benefits to Subscribers

  • Access to superior techniques in multiple disciplines of martial arts that are not available anywhere else
  • Tailored videos by instructors based on user demands
  • Techniques on demand for quick reference or binge watching
  • Frequent updates of videos by an increasing number of instructors

2.  Benefits to instructors

  • Access to a platform for teaching techniques without having to build it or market it themselves
  • Gym owners/coaches will gain exposure for their academy and supplement their income
  • Active fighters will have a recurring source of revenue, be able to earn passive income even if they become injured, and grow their fan base leading to larger salaries
  • Retired fighters will have a recurring source of revenue and increase their public exposure
  • Access to a platform to use and wear gear by sponsors without paying royalties to us

What You Get

Your partnership will help coaches and fighters increase their income and exposure while helping newbies and experienced fighters enhance their skills.

At the same time, you will receive some great perks such as… 

                 T-Shirt Details                              Sticker and Gi Patch Details

      


With Your Help We Will

1.  Finish the development and deployment of the subscription platform 

2.  Improve our marketing, PR, outreach, and networking efforts so we can expand our capacity to involve more instructors. 

3.  Support fighters who can’t afford to buy video recording equipment or pay freelancers to shoot and edit videos in cities around the world. 


FAQ

Why do subscribers need this service? 


But I already pay for a gym membership, why should I subscribe?

Our subscription service is a fraction of the cost of a gym membership and unlike most gyms where you are locked into a multi-month or yearly contract, you can cancel our services at any time. The free curated videos are available to all so no matter what your budget you can access martial arts techniques. 

Why wouldn't an instructor just start their own site?

We take the hassle out of creating a platform and marketing it.  We want instructors to focus on what they do best.

How do instructors earn revenue?

Instructors are paid according to our revenue sharing model.  Instructors earn income based on the relative percentages of the number of views their videos received compared to the other instructors on the platform for that month.  This is beneficial to the instructors because the more popular they become, the more money they earn and the more subscribers sign up, the more money they earn.  This is beneficial to the subscribers because instructors will tailor their videos to user demands.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone is in a financial position to help.  You can still support the cause by spreading the word about MA Vids through social media.

Indiegogo MA Vids


 3BUoMTQhnSoM797aP81mGUor4oeGRzvUcg

story:
Short Summary

Hey! I’m Emily! I’m an intuitive healer and hold a Masters in Designing Experiences. I help design rituals which help people make decisions, and get through their troubles. 

My plan is to make a downloadable video training series which helps you understand my technique for designing your own ritual spaces, and design ritual based power practices by you and for you - the goal, is to make it easier to get what you want in life and still have fun and feel healthy at the same time. 

The healing effects of this work are huge. We live in a time where we need to reconnect to our bodies and to the healing power of ritual.  Ritual connects us to Spirit  -  the vital principle that gives life and breath to living organisms. 

Our modern diseases have roots in isolation. This video training series will aim to bring people out of isolation and connects them to real tools on how to create their own sacred space and access the healing powers of guided meditation, breath, nature, and getting present. 


What We Need & What You Get

This project requires $15,000 for product development & online content delivery. I’m currently studying Chinese herbs, 5 element acupuncture, and plant spirit medicine at the Academy for 5 Element acupuncture The funds will go both toward my studies, video production, and building the online platform where people can download and share. 

When you contribute to this project you’ll get an ebook that shows you how to adjust your energetics when you manifest, and align with what you want most. You’ll also get the complete series of i-receive meditations, which unlock and explain a complete blueprint and step by step guide to getting the things that  you want,after you have already manifested them. Perks also include private intuitive healing sessions with me personally, and my signature “receive” necklace that comes with a special healing ritual. 


The Impact

My Masters in Designing Experiences make me qualified in creating polished beautiful products that elevate and add value to people’s lives. The healing essential oil blends engage the senses and guide people though each of the 5 videos on creating their own ritual space. Each video includes homework assignments and a platform to share your experience. Funding will also be used for marketing on Facebook, Google, and online publications

If we do not reach our entire goal, the funds will be used to prototype the video product to the best of our ability to keep the project alive and moving forward. 

I’ve been running my own professional practice where I do rites of passage and ritual work, coaching, clairvoyant intuitive readings, and healing body work with people in New York City and globally for the past 6 years. I’m uniquely qualified and experienced in spirituality, health care, design & business. I am the best person to bring this much needed product the the market and I know exactly what to do. Overcoming the hurdle to making sacred space safe, easy, and accessible for anyone is the goal.

You can help by sharing about this product! its an exciting new product at the intersection of Healing, Arts, Sciences, and Business! Use the Indigogo share tools to contribute and pass this along to people who would also be interested in joining the cause. We need your support and we trust that this product is ripe and the time is now.
story_txt:
Short Summary 

Hey! I’m Emily! I’m an intuitive healer and hold a Masters in Designing Experiences. I help design rituals which help people make decisions, and get through their troubles. 






My plan is to make a downloadable video training series which helps you understand my technique for designing your own ritual spaces, and design ritual based power practices by you and for you - the goal, is to make it easier to get what you want in life and still have fun and feel healthy at the same time. 






The healing effects of this work are huge. We live in a time where we need to reconnect to our bodies and to the healing power of ritual.  Ritual connects us to Spirit  -  the vital principle that gives life and breath to living organisms. 


Our modern diseases have roots in isolation. This video training series will aim to bring people out of isolation and connects them to real tools on how to create their own sacred space and access the healing powers of guided meditation, breath, nature, and getting present.

This project requires $15,000 for product development & online content delivery. story:
In June 2014, the Kalwa community experienced a terrible tragedy. One of our children, an 11-year-old boy named Shrawan, died suddenly from an undiagnosed illness. Shrawan, a beautiful boy, full of energy, humor, intelligence and affection who loved drawing and learning and had an endearing mischievous streak and a captivating smile, died from the kind of illness that most American children would barely notice. One Tuesday, the Gabriel Project staff noticed that Shrawan wasn’t his usual vivacious self, and he said that he wasn’t feeling well, that he had a headache and fever. By Friday night, Shravan was no longer among the living. It is a tragedy of mind-numbing preventability. We are all left wondering if Shrawan would have visited a doctor, received some medicine, maybe had a throat culture, would this of happened? All Shrawan needed to do was to see a doctor and get some medicine – something that most of us take for granted with our own children. We are left wondering why such basic practices are simply not available to the children in the slums. This reality is heartbreaking beyond description.

There are no readily available medical services for the children in the slums. The closest hospital is 1 ½ hours walk to and from the slums, and requires a day
off from work for parents who are hungry for any work they can get. These
hospitals have long lines, severely under staffed, close early and often
treatment is costly. As a result, most children miss out on basic care, babies
miss out on vaccines, pregnant women miss out on prenatal care, and avoidable
deaths bring tragedy to the entire slum community.

If Shrawan left us with one message it’s this: The children in the slums need and deserve basic medical care. The beautiful, innocent children of the slums deserve the same chances in life as do my children, your children, and the children in the rest of the world.

GPM and Sundara have the solution – and we need your help. Together with Doctors for You (www.doctorsforyou.org), an Indian NGO dedicated to bringing free medical care to vulnerable populations around India, we are establishing a medical clinic in the Kalwa slum that will provide free, professional, high-quality, local medical care to 7,000 children and maternal care. The clinic will be staffed by doctors and nurses who specialize in treating vulnerable populations, and will include outreach programs and educational programs within the slum community to stress the importance of preventive health, vaccinations, prenatal care, and more. GPM and Sundara staff and volunteers will be an integral part of implementation, working alongside the staff on education and outreach.

Our approach to the welfare of the children in the slums (and their families) is holistic and well integrated in community development: nutrition, literacy, economic empowerment, hygiene and sanitation, and, now, comprehensive health care. The impact of proper health care for children cannot be overstated. Proper health care affects physical, emotional and mental development, and provides children with the best chances that they have for thriving throughout their lives.

But we need your help to achieve this. We need to raise $50,000 to set up and operate for the first year in order to service 7,000 children.
Please help us by donating, sharing and spreading the word. You can use the Indiegogo sharing tools to help spread the word. Help us make our dream a reality. The children of India thank you. We thank you.

story:
Memory & Cognitive Impairment testing tool for visually impaired

Background

Since 2011, a diagnostic tool, titled UMACE (Universal Memory and Cognitive Exam) has been tested on more than 350 samples comprising normal (literate and illiterate), psychiatric and neurological patients rendering substantial quantitative and qualitative data. In an ambitious attempt to empower and support people through innovative methods, the creator of UMACE, Mangal Kardile, a researcher from the City of Nashik in India, seeks to further improve this existing tool to analyze memory and cognitive impairment of the visually impaired population around the globe.

With a growing concern regarding an increase in the number of people affected by Alzheimer’s & Dementia in India with an alarming 10 million + patients by the year 2020 (Kounteya Sinha, TNN, 2009, based on global dementia & aging reports by, WHO, NIH, NIA and ADI, ARDSI), the researcher initiated her project with the help of local psychiatrists and neurologists in 2011. This project concluded in mid-2014 and was accomplished in three phases.

The development of UMACE started in June 2011 when it raised the need for an instrument that could be used to detect cognitive impairments in the illiterate population while developing a technology based therapy for dementia. The therapy research work was carried out using available MMSE test with minimal number of participants and the research paper titled: “Cohesion of Cognitive and Technological inference for treating Dementia” was presented in - The Fifth International congress of the Asian Society Against Dementia, Jointly organized by - Asian Society against Dementia, The Chinese Dementia Research Association, The Hong Kong College of Psychiatrists— Hong Kong, Nov. 2011

The UMACE diagnostic tool for memory and cognitive impairments has been developed in three different phases.

* First phase – Development of items with a diagnostic kit with verbal and non-verbal tasks with the statistical assessment for tool validity, comparing UMACE with MMSE with two Normal sample groups (Literate and Illiterate N=78).

The research paper based on these studies was presented in Australia 2012. Title - “Using a Multicultural Model to develop an Universal Diagnostic Tool for Cognitive and Memory Impairments” International Psychogeriatric Association International Meeting, Cairns, Australia, 7-11 September, 2012

* Second phase - The UMACE testing was performed for a group of 35 male and female patients with varied psychiatric disorders in a private psychiatric clinic using the original UMACE item structure and was compared with MMSE with a group of 35 male and female Normal population (N=70)

* Third phase - In the third phase different neurological disorder groups were administered in a private neurology clinic (total 7 groups- Vertigo, Migraine with and without aura, Epilepsy & Seizure disorder, Stroke, Parkinson, Brain diseases, Other neurological disorders) for 205 neurological disorder patients. This study excluded the patients previously diagnosed with Alzheimer’s & Dementia.

The additional test assessment functions are added in the third phase to assess the patients with Stroke or similar disorder having disabilities in speech and motor coordination.

The above mentioned UMACE diagnostic tool research work has been carried out by the researcher through her own expenses owing to the lack of funding opportunities in India for this particular venture. At the final stage the researcher was awarded AUD 3500, through “Capacity Australia”, an NGO run by experienced and eminent psychogeriatricians in Sydney, Australia. Through these funds, she was able to continue the publication process for UMACE. The current UMACE diagnostic tool is suitable to assess all people having no cut off criteria based on education or disability, except for the visually impaired and persons having an IQ below 70.

About the UMACE-VIP tool

Further the researcher has been developing a tool for visually impaired population, named as UMACE-VIP (UMACE- Visually Impaired) to detect memory and cognitive impairments as India shoulders the largest burden of global blindness, about 15 million across the country (38 million visually impaired worldwide) with 30000 new cases being added each year. The 75% of these cases are of avoidable blindness, but India has acute shortage of optometrists, while India needs 40,000 optometrists, it has only 8,000 (http://www.netradaan.com/blind-statistics-india...).
The global population about 38 million persons at present who are blind and, by definition, cannot walk about unaided. They are usually in need of vocational and/or social support.



Necessity for Tool Development

285 million people are estimated to be visually impaired worldwide: 39 million are blind and 246 have low vision. About 90% of the world's visually impaired live in low-income settings (Visual impairment and blindness Fact Sheet, WHO, N°282, 2014). One out of every three blind people in the world lives in India (Anugraha Drishtidaan, 2013, http://www.anugrahadrishtidaan.org/Blindness-Gl...)

Concerning the years lived with disability for all types of non-communicable chronic diseases; the ages 60 + blind population lives the longest years with disability which is 13.3 years lived with disability (21.5% of old age), (World Alzheimer report, ADI, 2009) and there has been little consideration regarding understanding how much percentage of cognitive impairments might be present within this population when they are already at the loss of a very important visual sensory information.

The loss of sight causes enormous human suffering for the affected individuals and their families. It also represents a public health, social and economic problem for countries, especially the developing ones, where 9 out of 10 of the world's blind live. In fact, around 60% of them reside in sub-Saharan Africa, China and India. If additional resources are not urgently mobilized and efforts are not made to curb this trend, by 2020 the global burden of blindness can double. The developing countries will bear the brunt (WHO, vision 2020, The right to sight).

Based on the above studies the researcher has also created a memory and cognitive exercises kit for mild to severe cognitive impairments caused by various neurological disorders and also comprising special features for the visually impaired by which they could be able to enhance the cognitive learning right from the childhood that could be useful for future career skill development. The brain exercises kit will be in the market soon with the name “BrainNext”.

The Importance of Human brain cognition

The major sensory information in humans is derived through visionary senses and visual perceptions. A person who is visually impaired is deprived of this sensory information which blocks the visual imagery cognitions that are normally stored and referred by the human brain. The absence of visual information in the brain has proved to make a huge difference in the memory and cognitive processes, more prominently, after the age of 60. Other visual associations such as visuo-spatial coordination, visuo-motor coordination, visuo-auditory, visuo-tactile and visuo-olfactory could contribute to loss of major information, which is stored by the complex coordination between temporal lobe, parietal lobe and occipital lobe. The cumulative information processing within these major parts of the human brain is stored in short-term and long-term memory and is retrieved frequently by working memory as and when required.

The UMACE-VIP tool has been primarily developed to assess other important cognitive domains in the visually impaired population such as audio-tactile-spatial-motor coordination.

How will this innovation make a difference?

Currently, there are no specific diagnostic tools available to detect memory and cognitive impairment among people who are visually impaired; It is of utmost importance to prioritize this as the aging blind population is gradually increasing on a global scale. Statistically, 82% of people living with blindness are aged 50 and above, (Visual impairment and blindness Fact Sheet, WHO, N°282, 2014)

Utilization of funds

The researcher is seeking funds to support a sample study in India, concerning the development and assessment of the visually impaired population, completing assessment of two groups of visually impaired population- one which has lost vision since birth and the other population which has lost vision after birth due to some reason.

These funds will be used to create the diagnostic tool, develop a cognitive rehabilitation kit for the visually impaired and conduct a free clinical assessment of 50 visually impaired individuals for memory and cognitive impairments as well as assist in the publication of the research findings and for raising awareness.

I appreciate your contribution towards my mission of improving the quality of life globally, one individual at a time.

Sincerely,

Mrs. Mangal Kardile

MPsychClin, MPhil, PGDipPsychClin & IDMHL&HR 


Other Ways You Can help

Please help to share this campaign with your family, friends and colleagues with Indiegogo shared web tools.

story:
Main PCB Prototype V.3.0 (RET-100)

Check out the demo's in the Gallery

Our Story

All products normally start out as an idea, and our little Retrievor was no different. 

The question "Can it be done?" lingered for a few months until other questions were answered. 

Along the way, we've had engineers tell us:

"it's impossible, you can't make it round. It has to be square or rectangular". 

"you can't possibly make it that size as we'd struggle to fit the components in something twice that size"

Well, we ignored all of this and went ahead anyway!

We're Featured In The Press

From Humble Beginnings!


Then on to our Retrievor RET-100

Although this was definitely the best looking device throughout the development process, we encountered many issues which meant we had to completely re-design 4 different  prototypes from the PCB design upwards. 

We tried and tested several available solar cells and panels too but performance was not up to scratch so we decided to move forward with our own proprietary power source development, which brings us to..................

Our Retrievor RT-101


Our Retrievor is slightly larger than as a US Quarter in diameter and not much thicker than a few stacked together. Retrievor brings you all of the functionality a true end to end GPS solution should offer!

                                                        

What's Inside Retrievor?

Having selected and partnered with the very best designers and manufacturers of micro and nano technology, we are able to make Retrievor really tiny. Measuring only 35 mm (1.37") in diameter and 16 mm (0.63") thick means you can use Retrievor to track almost anything. 

Powered by record breaking technology which allows us to keep things really, really, small, our GPS unit is one of the industry's smallest, fully integrated module with an on-board antenna. 

                                                                   

Measuring only 10 x 10 x 3.8mm and weighing 1.6 gr., the Nano Hornet is the world’s smallest fully integrated GPS module with integrated antenna. Despite its small size and weight, the Micro Hornet integrates a patch antenna element, LNA, SAW filter, TCXO, RTC crystal, RF shield and Power Management Unit with SiRFStarIV™ GPS processor. 

Innovative GPS firmware can detect changes in context, temperature, and satellite signals to achieve a state of near continuous navigation availability by maintaining and opportunistically updating its internal parameters while consuming mere microwatts of battery power.


More GPS Features

Low profile antenna element, 

C/A code SBAS (WAAS, EGNOS, MSAS) and QZSS support 48 channels 

Ultra-high Sensitivity down to 

TTFF of < 1s in 50% of trials under Hot Start conditions

Low Power Consumption of ≤ 15mW 

High Accuracy of <2.5m in 50% of trials 

Self-managed low power modes

ARM7® microprocessor 

Ultra-low weight of 1.6g 

FCC, CE, VCCI certified RoHS II/REACH compliant


Our Retrievor Tracking Platform
We are using a customized version of OpenGTS for our tracking platform.  Access is available on most modern devices - Smartphones, Tablets, iPads etc.

Check out the demo HERE

Free Android, iPhone and Web Apps

Track your very own Retrievor any way you wish, using our feature rich applications. These allow you to set up a Geo-Zone which triggers either a text, email or ringtone once your Retrievor moves out of the zone. You can pinpoint Retrievor's exact location by zooming in, you can also check speed, distance traveled and route taken. Retrievor is accurate to <2.5 meters so finding your lost items or loved ones is a breeze!

GEO- Fencing

Track your Retrievor live online and follow its every move, set up Geo-Fence parameters which trigger an e-mail, ringtone or SMS when the device leaves or enters the designated area. Geo-fences can be selected as shapes (circle, square, rectangle) or manually by dragging the fence area to suit your specific needs.

Ease Of Use Is Always In Mind

You can chose your own icon from a standard menu for each RETRIEVOR device you want to track or even upload your very own. By clicking on the icon you are automatically taken to the "Map" screen, displaying the exact location of Retrievor, route taken, speed, and distance traveled. With all this information, there's little chance anything will be missing in action for too long!

Multi-Retrievor Support!

Want to keep track of your daughter and son's cars or two family pets at the same time? No problem! Upon activation, you can track and retrieve several devices on one mapping screen.

Multi-Purpose Attachment Clip

Your free little attachment clip allows you to attach your Retrievor to just about anything, including pet collars. 

Activation and Subscription Fees

There is a $5.29 monthly subscription fee for your first Retrievor.  Additional Retrievors can be added to your subscription plan for only $4.59 extra per month. Some good news though - As a token of our appreciation, there is NO Activation Fee for Indiegogo contributors!

GSM Coverage

Retrievor will function almost anywhere in the world using GSM networks and autonomous GPS for tracking. We have incorporated (A)ssisted GPS to improve spatial resolution (accuracy) through cell triangulation.


What We Need & What You Get

In a nutshell, we've done all of the prep work and now need your help through pre-orders to acquire the funding to go to full manufacturing to put Retrievor into large scale production.  

With your help, we need to: .

  • Place our very first full production orders
  • We also need funding to further our App development and back-end technology
  • Futher develop our proprietary power source (in parallel with the above).

Project Timeline


Risks and challenges

As with any product, supply chain logistics can potentially impact parts delivery. Additionally, delays may result from final detailing and testing lab procedures and certifications.

The Road Ahead

At this point in our venture we have already selected technology and manufacturing partners and the hardware design is secured. 


Retrievor Specs

Model

RT -101

Size

35 mm (diam) x 1 6.7 mm (H)

Weight

<18g

Communications                    

GSM/GPRS/GPS

Frequency

850/900/1800/1900Mhz

GPS chip

Nano Hornet (ORG1411)

GPS sensitivity

-163dBm

Tracking

Indoor & Outdoor

Accuracy

<2.5 meters in 50% of trials

GPS Start (Hot)

1 second

Battery

Proprietary Power Source

SIM Card

 Nano

Operating Temp

-40°C to +85°C

Certification

FCC/CE/VCCI Certified

Waterproof

Up to 3M

FAQ's

How long will the battery last?

We are developing our very own propriety power source. Battery level is dependent on usage and the rate at which you want to track the device. User defined ping rates can be adjusted from every second, through to once per day so Retrievor may never need a recharge for up to 12 months!

Will I have to sign up for a carrier subscription?

We are using AT&T for data so that Retrievor will function almost anywhere in the world using both GSM networks and autonomous GPS for tracking.  There is a subscription charge of $5.29 per month per device to cover network data charges

Will there be additional costs?

There will be  a small monthly fee of $5.29 per month per device. In effect, we are guaranteeing the subscription price at $5.29 per device for the 1st year for all of our Indiegogo pre-order customers.

How accurate is Retrievor?

Accurate within <2.5 meters in 50% of trials

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, besides USA we will ship Worldwide.

What languages will the App be available in?

Multi-language support

Can I travel with Retrievor?

Yes, without additional cost or any changes, Retrievor can be used all over the world!

How can Retrievor be so small?

With the help of smart technology and the inclusion of a propriety charging solution, Retrievor can efficiently manage the battery consumption, which means that we can use a very small power source. Retrievor is also packed with the latest components that are all very small in size..

How do I connect with Retrievor through my SmartPhone?

In the box there will be a device code for the App and our hosted web mapping service. After downloading the App from AppStore or Google Play you enter the device code and right away you are connected and can start tracking Retrievor.

Will it be possible to remote control the polling frequency ?

Yes.The polling frequency can be adjusted remotely by the user by logging into our server based application platform or through the use of our Apps. Polling can be set at anything from every second through to once per week or the device can be set in 'sleep' state for extended periods.

What are GPS and Glonass?

GPS is a satellite system created by the US military but is today mostly used for civilian purposes. Glonass is the Russian version that has better reach in many locations. To be able to offer both will give superior coverage.

How can I attach Retrievor to my child or pet?

In the box you will find a multipurpose clip that makes it possible to attach Retrievor anywhere and there will also be a specially designed collar clip for pet collars.

Can I become a distributor/dealer/reseller/retailer or partner?

At the moment we are focusing our efforts on our first manufacturing run and QA but do have small retailer/reseller bundles available here on our campaign page. Please contact us through this link http://www.retrievor.com/contact-us showing your interest and we will contact you once our first manufacturing run is complete and dispatched.

How do I charge my Retrievor?

 A micro USB cable is included in the box. Attach it to Retrievor and then you can charge it via your computer or by using the adapter that came with your SmartPhone. You can also use any standard USB A cigarette lighter adapter to charge Retrievor if needed (using the USB A - MIcro B cable which is included with your device) These chargers are freely available in most stores. 

                                         


Press

Popular Science: http://bit.ly/1a09BxU

Geeky Gadgets: http://bit.ly/1a3KNmM

Mashable: http://on.mash.to/16p0eBS
story_txt:
Main PCB Prototype V.3.0 (RET-100)Check out the demo's in the GalleryOur StoryAll products normally start out as an idea, and our little Retrievor was no different. The question "Can it be done?" lingered for a few months until other questions were answered. Along the way, we've had engineers tell us:"it's impossible, you can't make it round. It has to be square or rectangular". "you can't possibly make it that size as we'd struggle to fit the components in something twice that size"Well, we ignored all of this and went ahead anyway!We're Featured In The Press
From Humble Beginnings!

Then on to our Retrievor RET-100Although this was definitely the best looking device throughout the development process, we encountered many issues which meant we had to completely re-design 4 different  prototypes from the PCB design upwards. 
We tried and tested several available solar cells and panels too but performance was not up to scratch so we decided to move forward with our own proprietary power source development, which brings us to..................
Our Retrievor RT-101
Our Retrievor is slightly larger than as a US Quarter in diameter and not much thicker than a few stacked together. Retrievor brings you all of the functionality a true end to end GPS solution should offer!


                                                        
What's Inside Retrievor?
Having selected and partnered with the very best designers and manufacturers of micro and nano technology, we are able to make Retrievor really tiny. Measuring only 35 mm (1.37") in diameter and 16 mm (0.63") thick means you can use Retrievor to track almost anything. 
Powered by record breaking technology which allows us to keep things really, really, small, our GPS unit is one of the industry's smallest, fully integrated module with an on-board antenna. 


                                                                    
Measuring only 10 x 10 x 3.8mm and weighing 1.6 gr., the Nano
Hornet is the world’s smallest fully integrated GPS module with
integrated antenna. Despite its small size and weight, the Micro
Hornet integrates a patch antenna element, LNA, SAW filter,
TCXO, RTC crystal, RF shield and Power Management Unit with
SiRFStarIV™ GPS processor. 

Innovative GPS firmware can detect changes in context, temperature, and satellite signals to achieve a state of near continuous navigation availability by maintaining and opportunistically updating its internal parameters while consuming mere microwatts of battery power.

More GPS Features
Low profile antenna element, 
C/A code SBAS (WAAS, EGNOS, MSAS) and QZSS support 48 channels 
Ultra-high Sensitivity down to 
TTFF of < 1s in 50% of trials under Hot Start conditions
Low Power Consumption of ≤ 15mW 
High Accuracy of <2.5m in 50% of trials 
Self-managed low power modes
ARM7® microprocessor 
Ultra-low weight of 1.6g 
FCC, CE, VCCI certified RoHS II/REACH compliant

Our Retrievor Tracking PlatformWe are using a customized version of OpenGTS for our tracking platform.  Access is available on most modern devices - Smartphones, Tablets, iPads etc.



Check out the demo HERE
Free Android, iPhone and Web Apps
Track your very own Retrievor any way you wish, using our feature rich applications. These allow you to set up a Geo-Zone which triggers either a text, email or ringtone once your Retrievor moves out of the zone. You can pinpoint Retrievor's exact location by zooming in, you can also check speed, distance traveled and route taken. Retrievor is accurate to <2.5 meters so finding your lost items or loved ones is a breeze!
GEO- Fencing
Track your Retrievor live online and follow its every move, set up Geo-Fence parameters which trigger an e-mail, ringtone or SMS when the device leaves or enters the designated area. Geo-fences can be selected as shapes (circle, square, rectangle) or manually by dragging the fence area to suit your specific needs.
Ease Of Use Is Always In Mind
You can chose your own icon from a standard menu for each RETRIEVOR device you want to track or even upload your very own. By clicking on the icon you are automatically taken to the "Map" screen, displaying the exact location of Retrievor, route taken, speed, and distance traveled. With all this information, there's little chance anything will be missing in action for too long!
Multi-Retrievor Support!
Want to keep track of your daughter and son's cars or two family pets at the same time? No problem! Upon activation, you can track and retrieve several devices on one mapping screen.
Multi-Purpose Attachment Clip
Your free little attachment clip allows you to attach your Retrievor to just about anything, including pet collars. 

Activation and Subscription Fees
There is a $5.29 monthly subscription fee for your first Retrievor.  Additional Retrievors can be added to your subscription plan for only $4.59 extra per month. Some good news though - As a token of our appreciation, there is NO Activation Fee for Indiegogo contributors!
GSM Coverage
Retrievor will function almost anywhere in the world using GSM networks and autonomous GPS for tracking. We have incorporated (A)ssisted GPS to improve spatial resolution (accuracy) through cell triangulation.





What We Need & What You Get


In a nutshell, we've done all of the prep work and now need your help through pre-orders to acquire the funding to go to full manufacturing to put Retrievor into large scale production.  
With your help, we need to: .

Place our very first full production orders
We also need funding to further our App development and back-end technology
Futher develop our proprietary power source (in parallel with the above).



Project Timeline




Risks and challenges
As with any product, supply chain logistics can potentially impact parts delivery. Additionally, delays may result from final detailing and testing lab procedures and certifications.
The Road Ahead
At this point in our venture we have already selected technology and manufacturing partners and the hardware design is secured.

SIM Card

story:
Alzheimer's disease; dementia - hard to suffer from, hard to live with.

We are making this video to teach you skills that will help you better communicate with your loved ones who have Alzheimer’s disease.  What you learn will help make their lives better and your life easier. It is possible to reach them in the present moment. There are new ways to understand, new ways to help.

Do You Know Me Now? is a feature documentary exploring relationship and personhood in people who have Alzheimer’s disease and other causes of dementia. We will show our viewers ways to reach out and find the person inside the shell of memory loss.  Our video will take a novel look at what it means to be a person with dementia who is still very much alive and possessing those traits upon which relationships may be built, even late into the disease.  We will highlight the stories of some very special people and their loved ones who have found ways to connect through art and personal passions -- Cathie Borrie, Rita and Jim Houston, Lester Potts and his family.  Naomi Feil, the founder of Validation therapy, will show you how to touch, listen, and mirror the actions of your family member or friend.

Relationship that is deep and meaningful is still very much a possibility despite advancing cognitive loss.  The hope for this kind of relationship calls us to take an empathic journey into the very core of the person with dementia in search of the relational energy contained within.   

We have completed approximately half of the work needed to produce our documentary and are seeking the remainder through this Indiegogo crowd funding drive.  We need to raise $75,000 to finish Do You Know Me Now?, and get it out to the world. 

Will you please help us share insights and methods to help those with Alzheimer's disease, and those who care for them?  Loved ones may forget the date and where they are - these are not essential.  What matters is that they are still accepted as vibrant souls capable of meaningful relationships.

Thank you helping us to complete this important video!  All money raised will go to completing Do You Know Me Now?  Please watch our trailer.
