Other Ways You Can Help!

We understand it isn't always financially easy to donate. The "Golden Boy" Kintaro lived on the mountains with his mother for many years before he became a prosperous Samuari. If your balance is lost in the mountains too, you can still find ways to help - just like Kintaro did:

Tell your friends, family, and co-workers about this wonderful product! Kintaro Cells Enriched Medium makes an excellent gift for a parent or partner!
Blog about us online! Our team would love to hear about people like you spreading the word!
Share our link on Facebook!
Ask us about being a sales agent for KINTARO CELLS!
Introduce us to more connections! Know any doctors/clinics/research centers that use BM-MSC? We'd love to get to know them! The only way to better the world is to work together!


Thanks for your attention! Or - as we say in Japan - DOMO ARIGATO!!

story:
The buyers will get the MTB HOPPERs despite we reach our goal or not!

 

COMPACT

MTB HOPPER fits in any car’s trunk.
Dimensions: 825 x 610 x 100 mm (~33 x 24 x 4 in);
After using MTB HOPPER in muddy conditions, fold it dirty side inward.
The outer side is kept clean for your car’s trunk.

 

PORTABLE

MTB HOPPER’s design allows you to comfortably carry it folded or already assembled for use.
It weights almost the same as DH / FR bike, ~ 17 kg.

 

FAST AND EASY ASSEMBLY

It only takes 1 minute to assemble or disassemble MTB HOPPER.
Thanks to its design, MTB HOPPER does not require any tools for assembling.
Every MTB HOPPER includes a user manual for assembling and safe use.

 

FOR BEGINNERS

MTB HOPPER is perfect for your first air.
The best spot to catch your first air is on grass field with a mellow slope, together with a more experienced rider.

 

FOR ADVANCED RIDERS

Your imagination is the only limiting factor to what can be done with MTB HOPPER.
Figure out a new place to put it, and it will never stop providing sick lines.

 

BMX

MTB HOPPER is wide and stable.
Its progressive geometry and good grip lets you use it on any street spot.

 

GEOMETRY

MTB HOPPER’s slightly progressive geometry provides optimal smooth boost, while still suitable for faster speeds as well.
This was achieved by connecting the three top segments in angles of 5 degrees.
The adjustable legs let you control the overall angle of the kicker.

 

FAST AND STRONG LATCHES

PROTEX latches ensure that MTB HOPPER withstands all loads and is assembled quickly.
The latches are zinc plated and rust-proof.
Zinc plated hinges and stainless steel rivets.

 

FOUR ADJUSTABLE LEGS

To ensure stability, MTB HOPPER was designed with 6 points of support, 4 of which are adjustable.
The legs are made from stainless steel and 100 mm of thread.
They can be easily adjusted using fingers.

 

LIKE A BRIEFCASE

The top plate of MTB HOPPER is like a briefcase, as the whole construction folds inwards.

 

GRIP IN ANY CONDITIONS

MTB HOPPER’s design is trustworthy in any given conditions.
The pattern of the top plate and non-slippery plywood provide grip even in the muddiest conditions.

 

SURFACES

STABLE ON HARD SURFACES
​Placed on brick roads, rocks or asphalt, the metal legs provide solid grip and keep MTB HOPPER stable at all times.

DOESN’T SINK ON SOFT SURFACES
​Special pads are used when MTB HOPPER is placed on loose or soft surfaces.
They prevent legs from sinking and keeps MTB HOPPER stable on grass, sand, loam or any loose surfaces.

 

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

MTB HOPPER idea was born a few years ago. After many prototypes we already have an established product. MTB HOPPER have been thoroughly tested by local mountain biking community in many different events.

NOW its ready for mass production! We have an existing contracts with suppliers, manufacturer and parcel company. We hope you understand that challenges may arise with manufacturing, packaging, and shipping, but our goal is to fulfill orders as soon as we can so that we get MTB HOPPER in your hands quickly. We just need your help with funding to get us started!

 

LOOKING FOR PARTNERS

Our team is looking for partners which could help us to share our idea worldwide.
If you are interested in cooperation, public relations or dealership, feel free to contact our team karolis@mtbhopper.com

Click here to download media files.

story:
Introduction to sellOttO

SellOttO has been created by a couple, Franco - aeronautical engineer and Eleonora - medical doctor, inspired by their everyday cycling experiences. We have started the sellOttO project around two years ago developing 15 prototypes of saddles, testing them both in the laboratory and on the field (with the support of many cyclists on various types of bicycles). Once achieved the best balance between pedalling efficiency and saddle comfort, we have proceeded first in the ergonomic certification (with the experts of Sport Medicine Center of Pavia University) and then in the structural certification (with the Mechanical and Aerospace Departement of Turin University). With the current 1st production lot (produced with local italian expert artisans) we want now to explore the feeling of different types of cyclists around the world. The backers' contribution will be used to manufacture the 1st operative production lot; the contributors' proactive feedbacks will be welcome for the 2nd operative production lot.

     

   

   

    

Anatomy of sellOttO

The support concavity on the saddle is specially designed for the ischium and allows a more homogeneous distribution of the weight compared to traditional triangular saddles, so that sellOttO can be used with all types of bikes

 

     

     

   

 

Models of sellOttO

Here are the sellOttO basic models "I - Elegant", "II - Comfort", and "III - Sporty", to fit different body postures. In the video and image gallery more details about the several versions available for the above models.

 

Strenghts of sellOttO

As final synthesis, we are proud to share with you the sellOttO's strenghts, also vs our main bike saddle competitors.

Some customized sellOttO around the world

Thanks to all contributors around the world for backing our sellOttO.

     

     

     

     

     

    

 

Risks & Challenges

We are now proceeding with the first operative production lot, and we are confident to respect the milestones for each perk; if the final contributors will be more than our estimation, we will use the summer months to avoid delay in delivery, keeping each contributor updated about the final delivery date. SellOttO can be mounted both in the traditional seatpost (with top diameter equal to 22.2 mm) and in the new seatpost (accepting rails spaced from 34 to 36 mm); in both cases the adapters will be black colour. If you need a customized perk of our saddles (eg 3 sporty-H18 sellOttO in 1 shipment), you can email us in advance asking for your customized perk; we will try to satisfy your request, reducing shipping costs as well. If you want save money about the shipment in the Rest of the World, you can email us in advance asking for collective shipment or shipping by sea, trying again to satisfy also this request. Even if sellOttO has been tested by many cyclists using several types of bicycles, once you will receive and test our sellOttO, your further comments and suggestions will be welcome.

story:
Message from Conn, the bald guy with holes in his head:

I gamified my cancer and survived, now I'm building an app to help others do the same.

I started from the get go, imagining my cancer was something I could beat. I made them fun and playful and debunked the fear of dying through humor and the creation of visual stimulus that helped me see my cancer as something to work with, move it around, squish it, squash it and bounce it right out of the park. You name it I scribbled it down.

I turned my whole cancer experience into a game, giving myself simple fun tasks on a daily basis to thwart my cancer with my mind and body. I added physical cancer beating metaphors into my work routines and began tapping into the science of Psychoneuroimmunology - which is how what you think, can affect how your body behaves. It also started to make me stronger. Because I had a job to do! I wasn't helpless, and my immune system responded to this. Our brains are far more connected to our bodies than we've ever believed. What I was thinking, was literally making me stronger, more resilient and enabled me to bounce back better from all the different treatments I underwent. 

When I beat my cancer years later, my doctors, oncologists and a clever professor of science urged me to share my gamified approach to healing with others, to help them do just the same as me, and survive. 

So I did.

I resigned from my job as Creative Director of a big advertising agency to dedicate my life to empowering other cancer patients with a participatory role in their own healing. Why, because it's entirely free, it's a shift of mindset, an approach, that will give you a better chance of a more positive cancer outcome.

I know what it's like when facing this thing. Fear can completely disable you, that's why this app is designed to give you purpose in your own healing and to ultimately make you harder to kill. 

So let's rock! And make it a reality.

Why does the world need this?

There are millions of people facing cancer who feel entirely helpless - which can negatively affect their immune systems, making it harder for them to bounce back from the disease - But there are many more supporters like you, who can now do something to change this.

We believe that with some initial guidance and tools, people will not only be able to boost themselves, but thereafter help boost others that are in the same position they were once in.

Why The Cancer Dojo App?

It may sound strange, but it really is the best time in human history to be diagnosed with cancer - Because we now know so much more about how our brains and our bodies can work so effectively together, rather than apart - And now, importantly, we have the technology to harness and share this healing potential.

The Cancer Dojo App empowers cancer patients by enabling them with a positive purpose during a time of immense stress. It provides a simple, informed, user-friendly journey to reduce fear, inspire action and harness an increasing range of creative tools, tasks and techniques built to overcome helplessness and boost the human immune system. The app is informed by the science of Psychoneuroimmunolgy - which is how what you think, can affect how your body behaves.

It also connects patients to relevant worldwide support groups and actively empowers friends, loved ones and supporters (like you and I) to play a meaningful supportive role in boosting patients resilience.

A Complimentary Support Tool

The Cancer Dojo App is a fully complimentary support tool and should be seen as an addition, not an alternative, to any traditional therapies or those advised by your Medical practitioner. 

The Cancer Dojo App is part of Cancer Dojo's ongoing movement aimed at boosting people’s well being by building their mental fortitude to boost their immune system.

Who are we?

In 2006, Conn, is an iconic South African internationally awarded creative director, big wave surfer, husband and father of two young children who was diagnosed with a rare form of adult malignant brain cancer.

Using his experience in creative thinking and storytelling, Conn immersed himself in his cancer healing, using ideas and pens, pencils, paint and sticks of chalk. The world became his physical metaphoric cancer-beating playground - An upbeat, visually engaging canvas that helped him augment his treatments, his resilience and immune system, which ultimately helped to  manage and beat his cancer in 2013.

Since then Conn has been urged by doctors, oncologists and professors of science to share his approach of purposeful mindful thinking to assist others facing the disease - Which he did, by resigning from his job in advertising in mid 2015 to launch Cancer Dojo under the banner of his social enterprise Dojolabs CC with South African Non Profit Organization, People Living With Cancer - PLWC. Conn has shared his vision in Europe, Asia and the US as a keynote speaker and consultant on the intersection of Creativity, Technology, Resilience and Health.
 

'Cancer Dojo - Mediclinic Feature'

 

What We Need

The Cancer Dojo app is currently live on app stores!

Your contributions are not needed and we invite you to gift the app to anyone you know facing cancer. Now you can actually contribute to their recovery in a positive way. Awesome! You rock!

What the professionals have to say

"At last a brilliant App that helps a lay person to understand and to thoroughly engage with his or her cancer on a creative, self-healing path."

Dr Tom Sutcliffe, Chairman,­ Mental Health Review Board, Provincial Government Western Cape, Former Head, Western Cape Government Health

"An evolution in health care - the Cancer Dojo app is exactly what the world needs right now - a modern day solution to helping millions."

Dr James Laporta, Medical Director of the Hummingbird Cancer Centres, South Africa

"This app is far ahead of it’s time. Conn’s example in the face of a potentially debilitating cancer provides a message for all of us. In this App, Conn puts all his experience at your service."

Professor Emeritis Tim Noakes, Head of Innovation, South African Medical Council 

"Cancer Dojo is a worthy endeavour to give practical effect of the application of these new (Pyschoneuroimmunology) insights to those affected by this challenging (cancer) condition of whom Conn Bertish is a noteworthy exemplar."

Dr Claudius van Wyk - M. Phil (Applied Ethics), M.Sc (O.B.), D.Sc. (Alt.Med.) - Member Scientific and Medical Network (UK)

“A vital step in any cancer journey is to be empowered to face it’s many challenges. Conn’s journey and approach inspires and empowers.”

Dr Garth Davis - Oncologist, GVI Oncology Rondebosch

News & Media

'Cancer Dojo - Carte Blanche Feature'

'Cancer Dojo’s Conn Bertish to speak at Cannes Lions 2016'

"Founder of award-winning social enterprise Cancer Dojo, Conn Bertish, an ex-delegate, winner and judge of the Cannes Lions International Creative Festival, has been invited to join the stage this year with the likes of Sir John Hegarty, Spike Jones and Oliver Stone to share his creative mindful approach to healing which aims to increase the global cancer survival rate."

https://www.mediaupdate.co.za/publicity/109305/...

'Kicking cancer with tech'

"Cancer survivor Conn Bertish is revolutionising dealing with this disease, with the help of the latest technology and Vodacom."

http://now.vodacom.co.za/article/2016/02/23/kic...

'Cancer Dojo founder opens global oncology conference'

"When Conn Bertish beat cancer in 2013, he began a process to launch a global cancer fighting platform – Cancer Dojo, which aims to empower people facing cancer with the tools and techniques shown to strengthen the human immune system and ultimately enable a more positive cancer outcome."

https://www.mediaupdate.co.za/publicity/82861/c...

'Conn Bertish invited to speak at the IF Italians Festival'

"Conn Bertish, an internationally awarded creative director, cancer survivor and founder of Cancer Dojo, has been invited to perform the opening talk at the IF Italians Festival of creativity, held in Milan, Italy from Thursday, 5 to Saturday, 7 November 2015."

https://www.mediaupdate.co.za/marketing/83187/c...

'Former adman Conn Bertish makes cancer survival mobile'

"But it's not the fact that Bertish went through the surgery with ease that makes his story stand out - it's how he 'prepped his brain' for the process that's got people taking note."

http://www.bizcommunity.com/Article/196/12/1297...

'This survivor is creating an app to assist in the fight against cancer'

"Cancer survivor and international award-winning Creative Director, Conn Bertish, is in the process of creating Cancer Dojo a digital platform and mobile app that will provide tools and content to empower people affected by cancer and increase their survival rate."

http://www.news24.com/Video/SouthAfrica/News/Th...

 

Examples of our exercises that will be used

Part of our ongoing work is the creative execution of positive visualisations that help cancer patients take ownership of their cancer and view it in a lighter, more positive way rather than this scary and overwhelming.

Here are a few examples of our 'Imagine' series - we have hundreds more of these in  the app!

\

 
 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially, you can still help our movement! We are always looking for talented people to collaborate with and have a number of ways you can get involved!

If you're an animator, art director, software developer, writer, filmmaker, game designer, dreamer or all-round good human - Cancer Dojo could use your talent and turn your work into beneficial exercises, tools, media, features and more!

Your work can make a difference as much as your money can, so why not reach out to us and find out more?

Other than that, simply spreading the word and sharing our campaign can go a long way. The more people know about what we're doing, the more we can give back in spreading our cause!

Here are a few examples of our 'Imagine' series - we have hundreds more of these in  the app!
\



 

 

 

 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you are unable to contribute financially, you can still help our movement! We are always looking for talented people to collaborate with and have a number of ways you can get involved!
If you're an animator, art director, software developer, writer, filmmaker, game designer, dreamer or all-round good human - Cancer Dojo could use your talent and turn your work into beneficial exercises, tools, media, features and more!
Your work can make a difference as much as your money can, so why not reach out to us and find out more?
Other than that, simply spreading the word and sharing our campaign can go a long way. The more people know about what we're doing, the more we can give back in spreading our cause!

story:
Deutsche Version weiter unten. German version below.  

____________________________________________________________________

No credit card?

Don't worry! Other payment options are available here.
 


 

WE ARE FEMNA Health

THE ONE STOP SHOP FOR NATURAL FEMALE HEALTH

“We combine traditional herbal wisdom with modern research to create essential blends that support women in the different stages of life.”

- Maxie and Emily, founders of FEMNA Health

 

THE FUNCTIONAL POWER OF OUR HERBS

Our herbal teas and essential oils are made with 100 % natural ingredients. We combine traditional herbal wisdom with modern research to create herbal and essential blends that support women during the different stages of their life. Each of our teas contain a combination of 5-8 different herbs, ranging from the commonly known dandelion to the exotic Siberian ginseng. Each herb has a particular function on its own, but we combine specific herbs in our original recipes to provide you with optimal blends that deliver essential substances vital for your hormonal system. Every herb that we choose has a unique property that harmonizes female hormones throughout her life -- from a healthy menstrual cycle to pregnancy and menopause. Our body oils and roll-ons are made from high-quality, natural essential oils -- each one a unique formula created to indulge the senses and to support the soul. 
 


FEMNA HEALTH PREGNANCY LINE

When Maxie, one of the FEMNA Health founders, became pregnant with twins, she experienced many common pregnancy symptoms. Yet, appropriate products were difficult to find. That's when the FEMNA Health pregnancy line was born.

We want to make it really easy for women to know which products they need according to each phase of their pregnancy. That is why we've created functional herbal products that support women during each trimester of their pregnancy.

 

TRIMESTER 1

Welcome to your pregnancy! At this stage, about 75 % of women suffer from nausea or morning sickness. Luckily, there are traditionally well-known herbs which can support you. The healing properties of these herbs have been backed by scientific research. We have combined them to create yummy healthy products for you.

Easy Queezy Belly Tea

Ease into your pregnancy with our Easy Queezy Belly Tea. Lady’s mantle and yarrow harmonise pregnancy hormones, peppermint and fennel calm the stomach and lime blossom, as well as balm, offer confidence and serenity.

Ingredients: Lady's Mantle / Yarrow / Balm / Fennel Seed / Linden / Peppermint

Fresh Morning Roll On
Our Fresh Morning Roll On contains a soothing blend of natural essential oils of mint, lemon, ginger and cardamom. Use it anytime, anywhere, for a quick fresh sensation.

Ingredients: Peppermint Oil / Lemon Peel Oil / Ginger Root Oil / Cardamom / Vitamin E



TRIMESTER 2

Belly time! The 2nd trimester of pregnancy is the time to feel good about your body - your belly and your anticipation grow and the nausea slowly disappears. But what should you drink during this time? And how can you support your body? We have developed the Mommy To Be Tea and the Smooth & Firm Body Oil for you.

Mommy-To-Be Tea

The Mommy To Be Tea is a delicious, light blend for everyday consumption, specially tailored to the 13th to 26th week of pregnancy. 

Ingredients: Horsetail / Lady's Mantle / Lemonbalm/ Marigold / Sunflower / Rose

Smooth & Firm Body Oil
Our Smooth & Firm Body Oil is a soothing, nourishing body oil with argan oil and rose. For the extra care you need and prevention of stretch marks. 

Ingredients: : Almond Oil / Marigold Oil / Rosa Canina Fruit Oil / Yarrow Oil / Grapefruit Oil / Geranium Oil / Myrtle Oil / Vitamin E



TRIMESTER 3

Getting close! In the third trimester, women often suffer from insomnia and heavy legs. The extra weight and change in hormones can make this stage a little more challenging. Birth preparation is at the center of attention. We have consulted with herbalists and researchers to create natural support for this phase.

Light Legs, Sound Sleep Tea

The Light Legs, Sound Sleep Tea is our answer, for ease and confidence. Nettle and goldenrod regulate hydration, passionflower and hawthorn promote relaxation and raspberry leaves prepare the uterine tissue for childbirth.

Ingredients: Raspberry leaves / Goldenrod / Lady's Mantle / Stinging Nettle / Hawthorn / Passionflower / Malvae

Sweet Release Oil

The Sweet Release Oil is a nourishing body oil with valuable and natural essential oils, as well as lavender, juniper, cypress and lemon. Cooling, refreshing and soothing on heavy legs for the last trimester of pregnancy.

Ingredients: Almond Oil / Diestel Oil / Lavender Oil / Juniper Oil / Geranium Oil / Cypress Oil/ Lemon Peel Oil / Vitamin E


MOMMY'S REVIVAL BUNDLE 

You're a true hero! No matter how you got here, the baby is born and you can take your time to heal. Of course, we have prepared some natural products to soothe the soul and help your body recover inside and out. Traditionally, the post-natal period lasts for 8 weeks, a time for regeneration and bonding with your baby.

Mommy's Revival Tea

The herbs in Mommy's Revival Tea support this natural process, they are invigorating and regenerating. Yarrow, shepherd's purse and daisy are traditionally recommended after birth. White nettle, lady's mantle and horsetail ensure a healthy postpartum vaginal bleeding and work to strengthen the abdominal tissue.

Ingredients: Shepherd's Purse / Lady's mantle / Daisy / Dead Nettle / Yarrow / Ginger / Lemon Verbena

Mommy's Belly Oil

Our Mommy's Belly Oil is a regenerative body oil with natural essential oils for the period of recovery after birth. 

Ingredients: Apricot Kernel Oil / Jojoba Oil / Argan Oil / Rosehip Oil / Laurel Oil / Vitamin E


MOMMY'S MILK BUNDLE

Who's got milk? For nursing, it's all about the connection between you and your baby - it's nature's solution for love and nutrition all packed into one. In the beginning, it may be a bit tricky and you can use some herbs to back the supply, soothe sore nipples and calm your nerves.

Mommy Milk Tea

Our Mommy Milk Tea combines herbs recommended by lactation consultants and midwives to support milk production - fenugreek seeds, fennel, anise, cumin and nettle. Lavender and lemon balm provide the necessary emotional support when everything feels like it's gone a little haywire in life with a newborn.

Fennel / Caraway / Anise / Fenugreek Seed / Lavender / Balm / Stinging Nettle

Yummy Mommy Nipple Balm

No nursing mom should be without our Yummy Mommy Nipple Balm - a gentle balm to soothe sore nipples during the nursing period. With cocoa butter, rosehip, calendula and jojoba oil.

Cocoa Butter / Rosehip Oil / Forana / Calendula / Vitamin E


WOMEN'S HEALTH EXPERTS

All of our products have been developed in collaboration with leading women's health experts. We are grateful to have such a wonderful and highly competent team consisting of a naturopath, food scientist, midwife and pharmacist. This allows us to draw on a great wealth of experience and provide you with a holistic approach to female health and well-being.


HOW WE WORK

The reality of pregnancy differs depending on where you were born. Every day, approximately 830 women die from preventable causes related to pregnancy and childbirth (WHO). Almost all maternal deaths (99%) occur in developing countries. In Kenya, 1 in 47 women die from pregnancy and childbirth-related causes.

In wealthier countries, most women receive four antenatal care visits and are attended by a midwife or skilled health worker during delivery and after birth.

Pregnant women in Kenya often live long distances away from a health clinic or educated midwives. As a result, many give birth unattended at home, under unhygienic conditions and without a midwife’s attendance. Many Kenyan women are poor and lack the information on how to have a healthy and safe pregnancy, not knowing who to turn to for help or advice.

A Preventable Problem

According to the WHO, 75% of maternal deaths in Kenya are preventable. Skilled care before, during and after childbirth can save the lives of thousands of women and newborn babies.

With simple, low-cost interventions, such as regular midwife visits and a birth kit, Kenyan women can deliver in safe and more hygienic conditions.

 

THE MOMS FOR MOMS® PROJECT

This is why we have partnered up with the Kenyan Midwife Association. Their mission is to provide “every woman and every newborn with quality midwifery care.”

For every product of the FEMNA Health pregnancy line that you buy, we give 10% of sales to buy safe birth materials, such as sheets, gloves and soap as well as training materials and guidelines for health workers.
 

Safe birth kits can reduce the risk of infections during and after childbirth and make pregnancy for Kenyan women much safer.

Results that the Kenyan Midwife Association achieved so far

  • Antenatal care uptake increased from 88% to 96%
  • Skilled birth attendance increased from 44% to 62%
  • Post-natal care uptake increased from 42 to 51%
  • Infant mortality rate decreased from 52 to 39 out of 1000 live births
  • Child mortality rate decreased to more than half of all live births


WHO WE ARE 

Maxie was influenced by the women in her family to care passionately about female health. Her first endevour was founding Ruby Cup, a hygenic menstrual cup and company that supports  female hygiene in Kenya. This social project has already helped over 36,000 Kenyan girls. Since she became pregnant and gave birth to twin boys, she experienced the importance of midwifery, transitioning her mission to help pregnant women in Kenya have a safe birth.

Emily is the creative lead and other half of FEMNA Health. Her interest in women’s health first sparked when she was advised to stop taking the contraceptive pill which she took to control her Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS) symptoms. Thanks to that forward-thinking advice, she started to investigate everything about hormones, learning how the female body works and what’s best for it.

& FEMNA Health's Power-Women Hannah, Julia, Annie, Gosia, Alessia, Melina
and Loic.   

TIMELINE

 

 

ORDER RISKS

Delivery time
There is always a risk of delay in the production and there may be challenges that we cannot anticipate. However, we have scheduled a buffer so as to hopefully avert any delays.

Customs / VAT fees
If you live outside the EU, you may be charged for customs and/or country-specific VAT.

Custom process
Some countries are known to have a lengthy customs process. Please inquire about this in your country. Unfortunately, we cannot expidite the customs process and cannot be held responsible for a hold up in customs.

We will keep you updated on our progress and if we anticipate any upcoming delays!

 

DO YOU HAVE A QUESTION?

Check our FAQ's below or send us an email to hello@femna.eu. We're happy to help!

 

FAQ'S

Q: When will the products be delivered?
A: We will send out all purchased pregnancy products at the end of October.

Q: I’m not pregnant, but how can I support you?
A: You can continue to support pregnancy in Kenya and here in Europe by purchasing a gift for a friend currently pregnant or trying to conceive. We offer gift cards and pregnancy journals which are not time sensitive. You can also buy our Be Bold tea that is tasty and suited for everyone.

Q: I just recently became pregnant. How do I know what I need in the coming months?
A: Don’t worry, this is why we have developed the pregnancy line based on Trimesters. The first trimester products should be taken during the first three months, the second trimester products during the next three months (months 4-6) and the third trimester products during the last three months of your pregnancy.

 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

Please share our campaign!

❤ THANK YOU THANK YOU ❤ 

 

   Deutsche Version

________________________________________________________

Keine Kreditkarte?

Macht nichts! Weitere Zahlungsmöglichkeiten findet du hier.



 

WIR SIND FEMNA Health

NATÜRLICHE PRODUKTE FÜR FRAUEN

"Wir kombinieren traditionelle Kräuterkunde mit moderner Forschung und haben natürliche  Rezepturen kreiert, die Frauen in den verschiedenen Lebensphasen unterstützen."

- Maxie und Emily, Gründerinnen von FEMNA Health

 

DIE KRAFT UNSERER KRÄUTER

Unsere Kräutertees und ätherischen Öle bestehen aus 100% natürlichen Zutaten. Unsere Tees enthalten 5-8 verschiedene Kräuter, von dem allgemein bekannten Löwenzahn bis zum exotischen sibirischen Ginseng. Die Kräuter unterstützen den Körper und liefern essentielle Substanzen, die für ein hormonelles System wichtig sind. Die einzigartigen Eigenschaften der Kräuter harmonisieren die Hormone im Leben einer Frau – von einem gesunden Menstruationszyklus über Schwangerschaft und Menopause.

Unsere Körperöle und Roll-Ons werden aus hochwertigen natürlichen ätherischen Ölen zu einer einzigartigen Formel zusammengemischt, um die Sinne zu verwöhnen und die Seele baumeln zu lassen.


EXPERTEN FÜR WOMEN'S HEALTH

Femna Produkte werden mit höchster Sorgfalt und in Kooperation mit führenden Experten aus den jeweiligen Bereichen entworfen. Wir sind dankbar, ein so wunderbares und hoch kompetentes Team von FEMNA Health Experten im Rücken zu haben, das aus einer Heilpraktikerin, Ökotrophologin, Hebamme und Apothekerin besteht. 


DIE FEMNA HEALTH SCHWANGERSCHAFTSLINIE 

Als Maxie, eine der Gründerinnen von FEMNA Health, mit Zwillingen schwanger wurde, erlebte sie viele häufige Schwangerschaftssymptome. Geeignete Produkte waren jedoch schwer zu finden. Somit entstand die Idee der FEMNA Health Schwangerschaftslinie.

Wir möchten es Frauen leicht machen zu wissen, welche Produkte sie benötigen, je nachdem, in welcher Phase der Schwangerschaft sie sich befinden. Deshalb haben wir funktionelle Kräuterprodukte für die häufigsten Begleiterscheinungen während der unterschiedlichen Trimester einer Schwangerschaft entwickelt.


TRIMESTER 1

Willkommen in deiner Schwangerschaft! In diesem Stadium leiden etwa 75% der Frauen an Übelkeit oder Unwohlsein. Zum Glück gibt es traditionell erprobte Kräuter, die dich unterstützen können! 


Easy Queezy Belly Tea
Für ein entspanntes Ankommen mit der Schwangerschaft im Bauch und im Kopf hat FEMNA Health den Easy Queezy Belly Tea entwickelt. Frauenmantel und Schafgarbe harmonisieren die Schwangerschaftshormone, Pfefferminze und Fenchel beruhigen den Bauch und Lindenblüte sowie Melisse spenden Zuversicht und Gelassenheit.
Mit: Frauenmantel/ Melisse/ Pfefferminze/ Fenchel/ Schafgarbe/ Lindenblüten

Fresh Morning Roll On
Unser Fresh Morning Roll On enthält eine beruhigende Mischung aus natürlichen ätherischen Ölen aus Minze, Zitrone, Ingwer und Kardamom. Verwenden kann man den Roll-On jederzeit und überall für ein schnelles frisches Gefühl. 
Mit: Pfefferminzöl/ Zitronenschalenöl/ Ingwerwurzelöl  / Kardamom / Vitamin E



TRIMESTER 2

Babybauchzeit! Das 2. Schwangerschaftstrimester ist für die meisten Frauen die Wohlfühlzeit - der Bauch und die Vorfreude wachsen und die Übelkeit verschwindet langsam! Doch was sollst du in dieser Zeit trinken? Und wie kannst du deinen Körper unterstützen? FEMNA Health hat für dich den Mommy To Be Tea und das Smooth & Firm Körperöl entwickelt.


Mommy To Be Tea
Der Mommy To Be Tea ist eine leckere, leichte Mischung für jeden Tag, speziell abgestimmt auf die 13. bis 26. Schwangerschaftswoche. 
Mit: Schachtelhalm/ Frauenmantel/ Melisse/ Ringelblume/ Sonnenblume/ Rose


Smooth & Firm Oil
Unser Smooth & Firm Body Oil ist ein wohltuendes, pflegendes Körperöl mit Arganöl und Rose. Zur Pflege der Haut und Vorbeugung von Dehnungsstreifen
Mit: Mandelöl / Ringelblumenöl / Wildsrosenöl / Schafgarbenöl/ Grapefruitöl/ Geranienöl/  Myrtenöl / Vitamin E


TRIMESTER 3

Bald geschafft! Im dritten Trimester leiden Frauen oft unter Schlaflosigkeit und schweren Beinen. Das zusätzliche Gewicht und die Veränderung der Hormone können diese Phase zu einer Herausforderung machen. Die Geburtsvorbereitung steht nun im Mittelpunkt. Wir haben uns mit Kräuterkundigen und Forschern beraten, um natürliche Unterstützung für diese Phase zu schaffen.

Light Legs, Sound Sleep Tea
Der Light Legs, Sound Sleep Tea ist FEMNAs Antwort für Leichtigkeit und Zuversicht. Brennnessel und Goldrute regulieren den Wasserhaushalt, Passionsblume und Weißdorn fördern die Entspannung und die Himbeerblätter bereiten das Gewebe auf die Geburt vor.
Mit: Himbeerblätter/ Brennnessel/ Frauenmantel/ Weißdorn/ Passionsblume/ Goldrute/ Malve

Sweet Release Oil
Das Sweet Release Oil ist ein pflegendes Körperöl mit wertvollen und natürlichen ätherischen Ölen, sowie Lavendel, Wacholder, Zypresse und Zitrone. Kühlend, erfrischend und wohltuend bei schweren Beinen und beruhigend im letzten Schwangerschaftsdrittel.
Mit: Mandelöl / Diestelöl / Lavendelöl/ Wacholderöl / Rosengeranienöl/ Zypressenöl / Zitronenschalenöl / Vitamin E


MOMMY'S REVIVAL PAKET

Du bist eine Superheldin! Egal wie du es bis hier geschafft hast, das Baby ist geboren und du kannst dir jetzt Zeit nehmen, um zu heilen. Wir haben Einiges für dich vorbereitet, um diese Zeit zu begleiten und dem Körper zu helfen, sich innerlich und äußerlich zu erholen. Traditionell dauert das Wochenbett 8 Wochen - Zeit, die Bindung zum Baby aufzubauen und den Körper nach der Geburt zu pflegen.


Mommy's Revival Tea
Die Kräuter im Mommy’s Revival Tea unterstützen diesen natürlichen Vorgang, sie sind stärkend und regenerierend. Schafgarbe, Hirtentäschel und Gänseblümchen werden traditionell nach der Geburt empfohlen. Weiße Taubnessel, Frauenmantel und Schachtelhalm sorgen für einen gesunden Wochenfluss und stärken das Gewebe.
Mit: Hirtentäschel/ Frauenmantel/ Gänseblümchen/ Taubnessel/ Schafgarbe/ Ingwer/ Zitronenverbene

Mommy's Belly Oil
Das Mommy's Belly Oil ist ein regeneratives Körperöl mit natürlichen ätherischen Ölen für die Zeit der Rückbildung nach der Geburt. Mit Ringelblume, Wildrose, Schafgarbe und Grapefruit.
Mit: Aprikosenkernöl / Jojobaöl / (Arganöl)/ Hundsrosenöl / Lorbeeröl / Vitamin E



MOMMY'S MILK PAKET

Hier geht es um deine Brüste! Beim Stillen dreht sich alles um die Verbindung zwischen dir und deinem Baby - es ist die perfekte Lösung, um Liebe und Ernährung zu kombinieren. Am Anfang mag es etwas knifflig sein, aber du kannst dir bei FEMNA Health Unterstützung suchen, um deine Milchproduktion anzuregen, wunde Brustwarzen zu pflegen und die Nerven zu beruhigen.

Mommy Milk Tea

Der Mommy Milk Tea kombiniert Kräuter, die von Stillberaterinnen und Hebammen empfohlen werden, um die Milchproduktion zu unterstützen - Bockshornkleesamen, Fenchel, Anis, Kümmel und Brennnessel. Lavendel und Melisse geben den nötigen seelischen Halt, wenn mal wieder alles drunter und drüber geht im Leben mit einem Neugeborenen.
Mit: Fenchel/ Kümmel/ Anis/ Bockshornkleesamen/ Lavendel/ Melisse/ Brennessel

Yummy Mommy Nipple Balm
Der Yummy Mommy Nipple Balm- ein sanfter Balsam zur Pflege wunder Brustwarzen in der Stillzeit. Mit Kakaobutter, Hagebutte, Ringelblume und Jojobaöl.
Mit: Kakaobutter / Wildrosenöl / Lorbeeröl / Ringelblumenöl / Vitamin E


WIE WIR ARBEITEN

Laut der WHO sterben jeden Tag schätzungsweise 830 Frauen an schwangerschafts- und geburtsbezogenen Ursachen, die vermieden werden könnten. Nahezu alle Fälle von Müttersterblichkeit (99%) passieren in Entwicklungsländern. In Kenya stirbt eine von 47 Frauen an Folgen ihrer Schwangerschaft oder der Geburt ihres Kindes.

Warum?

In Ländern mit hohem Einkommen sind ungefähr vier pränatale Vorsorgeuntersuchung, die Unterstützung einer Hebamme und gut ausgebildetes Personal während und nach der Geburt die Regel.

In Kenia leben schwangere Frauen oft sehr weit von der nächsten Klinik und somit von gut ausgebildeten Hebamme entfernt. Resultat sind daher häufig Hausgeburten mit unhygienischen Bedingungen und ohne ärztlicher oder professioneller Unterstützung. Viele Frauen sind arm und nicht ausreichend über relevante Faktoren einer gesunden und sicheren Schwangerschaft informiert. Sie wissen nicht, wer ihnen in ihrer Situation helfen kann.


DAS MOMS FOR MOMS®-PROJEKT

75% der Müttersterblichkeit in Kenya sind laut der WHO vermeidbar. Sachkundige Verpflegung vor, während und nach der Geburt kann das Leben vieler Frauen und deren Kinder retten. Eine Entbindung in Sicherheit unter hygienischen Bedingungen ist schon durch kleine, kostengünstige Maßnahmen, wie zum Beispiel regelmäßige Besuche einer Hebamme oder einem Geburt-Kit möglich. Aus diesem Grund haben wir uns mit der Kenyan Midwives Association zusammen-geschlossen. Deren Mission ist es, jeder Frau und einem jedem Kind qualitative Pflege durch eine Hebamme zu ermöglichen.

Für jedes verkaufte Produkt unsere Schwangerschaftslinie spenden wir 10%, um notwendige Materialien für eine sichere Geburt zu kaufen, wie zum Beispiel Bettlaken, Handschuhe & Seife, sowie Informationsmaterial und Sicherheitsrichtlinien für medizinisches Personal.

Diese Kits für eine sichere Geburt können das Risiko von Infektionen während und nach der Entbindung erheblich reduzieren und die Schwangerschaft für Frauen in Kenia sicherer machen.

Bisherige Erfolgserlebnisse der Kenyan Midwife Association:

  • Steigerung pränataler Versorgung um 88%-96%
  • 44%-62% mehr Anwesenheit von sachkundigem Personal bei Geburten
  • Steigerung von postnataler Versorgung um 42%-51%
  • Säuglingssterblichkeit ist von 52/1000 auf 39/1000 gesunken
  • Kindersterblichkeit ist von 3,1% auf 1,4% gesunken

 

WER WIR SIND

Maxie
Durch meine Großmutter, eine begeisterte Ärztin, und meine Mutter, die sich als Psychologin viel mit der Salutogenese beschäftigt hat, kam ich früh mit Gesundheitsthemen in Berührung. Durch meine erste Firma, Ruby Cup, die erfolgreich eine innovative Lösung für die Menstruation, eine Menstruatinoskappe,  entwickelt und vertreibt, habe ich mein Interesse an natürlicher Frauenhygiene vertieft. Durch meine Zeit mit Ruby Cup in Kenia, in der ich in den Slums mit lokalen Frauengruppen gearbeitet habe, kenne ich mich mit den Begebenheiten vor Ort gut aus. Als ich Schwanger wurde, habe ich mich mit allen Themen rund um das Thema Geburt, Hebammen und Frauengesundheit beschäftigt. Jetzt möchte ich mich mit FEMNA Health durch unser „Moms For Moms“- Projekt für sichere Geburten in Kenia einsetzen.

Emily
Mein Interesse an der Gesundheit von Frauen wurde ausgelöst, als mein Arzt mir sagte, ich solle die Pille absetzen, denn ich bekam dadurch chronische Migräne. Ich hatte davor seit Jahren die Pille genommen, um die Symptome des polyzystischen Ovar Syndroms (PCOS) einzudämmen. Dank dieser zukunftsorientierten Beratung begann ich erstmalig zu verstehen, was Hormone sind und wie sie funktionieren. Ich begann meinen Körper zu verstehen und zu lernen, was das Beste für mich und meinen Körper ist. Mit Femna möchte ich die bestmöglichen natürlichen Produkte anbieten, um Frauen das Leben zu erleichtern.

& FEMNA Health's Power-Women Hannah, Julia, Annie, Gosia, Alessia, Melina
and Loic.   

 

ZEITPLAN 




RISIKEN

Lieferzeit
In der Fertigung von Produkten besteht immer die Gefahr einer Verzögerung. In Anbetracht unserer Produktion könnte es theoretisch Herausforderungen geben, die wir nicht vorausgesehen haben. Allerdings haben wir dafür einen Puffer als Vorlaufzeit eingeplant.

Zoll- / MWSt-Gebühren 
Wenn Du außerhalb der EU wohnst, können eventuell Gebühren für Zoll- und/oder für die länderspezifische Mehrwertsteuer anfallen.

Zoll
Einige Länder sind dafür bekannt, dass sie sehr viel Zeit für den Zollprozess benötigen. Bitte erkundige Dich hierzu in Deinem Land. Es tut uns leid, dass wir auf Dein Paket keinen "magischen Stempel" aufdrücken können, damit es schneller durchkommt.

Wir werden Dich regelmäßig über unsere Fortschritte und gegebenenfalls aufkommende Verzögerungen auf dem Laufenden halten!


DU HAST FRAGEN?

Schau dir unsere FAQs an oder sende uns eine E-Mail an hello@femna.eu.
Wir helfen Dir gerne weiter!


FAQs

Q: Wann werden die Produkte geliefert?
A: Wir werden alle verkauften Produkte unserer Schwangerschaftslinie Ende Oktober versenden.

Q: Ich bin nicht schwanger, würde euch aber trotzdem gerne unterstützen. Wie kann ich das am Besten machen?
A: Du kannst trotzdem weiterhin sichere Schwangerschaften in Kenya unterstützen indem du z.B. Produkte als Geschenk für eine Freundin kaufst, die schwanger ist oder versucht schwanger zu werden.  Außerdem haben wir auch Gutscheine und ein Schwangerschaftsjournal im Angebot, beides Produkte, die weniger zeitsensitiv sind. Schlussendlich kannst du uns unterstützen, indem du dir unseren leckeren Tee "Be Bold" ergatterst - der ist für alle, Männer und Frauen, sehr zu empfehlen.


Q: Ich bin erst seit kurzem schwanger. Woher weiß ich, welche Produkte ich in den nächsten Monaten brauchen werde?
A: Keine Sorge, genau deshalb haben wir unsere Schwangerschaftslinie in Trimester-Pakete aufgeteilt. Das erste Paket wird in den ersten 3 Monaten eingenommen, das zweite in den Monaten 4-6 und das dritte im letzten Trimester, damit du dich nicht darum sorgen musst, sondern auf deine Schwangerschaft konzentrieren kannst.

 

WIR BRAUCHEN DEINE UNTERSTÜTZUNG

Bitte teile unsere Kampagne!

❤ VIELEN DANK ❤
story_txt:
Deutsche Version weiter unten. German version below.  
____________________________________________________________________
No credit card?
Don't worry! Other payment options are available here. 
 

WE ARE FEMNA Health
THE ONE STOP SHOP FOR NATURAL FEMALE HEALTH
“We combine traditional herbal wisdom with modern research to create essential blends that support women in the different stages of life.”
- Maxie and Emily, founders of FEMNA Health

 THE FUNCTIONAL POWER OF OUR HERBSOur herbal teas and essential oils are made with 100 % natural ingredients. We combine traditional herbal wisdom with modern research to create herbal and essential blends that support women during the different stages of their life. Each of our teas contain a combination of 5-8 different herbs, ranging from the commonly known dandelion to the exotic Siberian ginseng. Each herb has a particular function on its own, but we combine specific herbs in our original recipes to provide you with optimal blends that deliver essential substances vital for your hormonal system. Every herb that we choose has a unique property that harmonizes female hormones throughout her life -- from a healthy menstrual cycle to pregnancy and menopause. Our body oils and roll-ons are made from high-quality, natural essential oils -- each one a unique formula created to indulge the senses and to support the soul.  
FEMNA HEALTH PREGNANCY LINE
When Maxie, one of the FEMNA Health founders, became pregnant with twins, she experienced many common pregnancy symptoms. Yet, appropriate products were difficult to find. That's when the FEMNA Health pregnancy line was born.We want to make it really easy for women to know which products they need according to each phase of their pregnancy. That is why we've created functional herbal products that support women during each trimester of their pregnancy.  TRIMESTER 1Welcome to your pregnancy! At this stage, about 75 % of women suffer from nausea or morning sickness. Luckily, there are traditionally well-known herbs which can support you. The healing properties of these herbs have been backed by scientific research. We have combined them to create yummy healthy products for you.Easy Queezy Belly TeaEase into your pregnancy with our Easy Queezy Belly Tea. Lady’s mantle and yarrow harmonise pregnancy hormones, peppermint and fennel calm the stomach and lime blossom, as well as balm, offer confidence and serenity.Ingredients: Lady's Mantle / Yarrow / Balm / Fennel Seed / Linden / PeppermintFresh Morning Roll OnOur Fresh Morning Roll On contains a soothing blend of natural essential oils of mint, lemon, ginger and cardamom. Use it anytime, anywhere, for a quick fresh sensation.Ingredients: Peppermint Oil / Lemon Peel Oil / Ginger Root Oil / Cardamom / Vitamin E
TRIMESTER 2
Belly time! The 2nd trimester of pregnancy is the time to feel good about your body - your belly and your anticipation grow and the nausea slowly disappears. But what should you drink during this time? And how can you support your body? We have developed the Mommy To Be Tea and the Smooth & Firm Body Oil for you.Mommy-To-Be TeaThe Mommy To Be Tea is a delicious, light blend for everyday consumption, specially tailored to the 13th to 26th week of pregnancy. Ingredients: Horsetail / Lady's Mantle / Lemonbalm/ Marigold / Sunflower / RoseSmooth & Firm Body OilOur Smooth & Firm Body Oil is a soothing, nourishing body oil with argan oil and rose. For the extra care you need and prevention of stretch marks. Ingredients: : Almond Oil / Marigold Oil / Rosa Canina Fruit Oil / Yarrow Oil / Grapefruit Oil / Geranium Oil / Myrtle Oil / Vitamin E
TRIMESTER 3
Getting close! In the third trimester, women often suffer from insomnia and heavy legs. The extra weight and change in hormones can make this stage a little more challenging. Birth preparation is at the center of attention. We have consulted with herbalists and researchers to create natural support for this phase.Light Legs, Sound Sleep TeaThe Light Legs, Sound Sleep Tea is our answer, for ease and confidence. Nettle and goldenrod regulate hydration, passionflower and hawthorn promote relaxation and raspberry leaves prepare the uterine tissue for childbirth.Ingredients: Raspberry leaves / Goldenrod / Lady's Mantle / Stinging Nettle / Hawthorn / Passionflower / MalvaeSweet Release OilThe Sweet Release Oil is a nourishing body oil with valuable and natural essential oils, as well as lavender, juniper, cypress and lemon. Cooling, refreshing and soothing on heavy legs for the last trimester of pregnancy.Ingredients: Almond Oil / Diestel Oil / Lavender Oil / Juniper Oil / Geranium Oil / Cypress Oil/ Lemon Peel Oil / Vitamin E
MOMMY'S REVIVAL BUNDLE 
You're a true hero! No matter how you got here, the baby is born and you can take your time to heal. Of course, we have prepared some natural products to soothe the soul and help your body recover inside and out. Traditionally, the post-natal period lasts for 8 weeks, a time for regeneration and bonding with your baby.Mommy's Revival TeaThe herbs in Mommy's Revival Tea support this natural process, they are invigorating and regenerating. Yarrow, shepherd's purse and daisy are traditionally recommended after birth. White nettle, lady's mantle and horsetail ensure a healthy postpartum vaginal bleeding and work to strengthen the abdominal tissue.Ingredients: Shepherd's Purse / Lady's mantle / Daisy / Dead Nettle / Yarrow / Ginger / Lemon VerbenaMommy's Belly OilOur Mommy's Belly Oil is a regenerative body oil with natural essential oils for the period of recovery after birth. Ingredients: Apricot Kernel Oil / Jojoba Oil / Argan Oil / Rosehip Oil / Laurel Oil / Vitamin E
MOMMY'S MILK BUNDLE
Who's got milk? For nursing, it's all about the connection between you and your baby - it's nature's solution for love and nutrition all packed into one. In the beginning, it may be a bit tricky and you can use some herbs to back the supply, soothe sore nipples and calm your nerves.Mommy Milk TeaOur Mommy Milk Tea combines herbs recommended by lactation consultants and midwives to support milk production - fenugreek seeds, fennel, anise, cumin and nettle. Lavender and lemon balm provide the necessary emotional support when everything feels like it's gone a little haywire in life with a newborn.Fennel / Caraway / Anise / Fenugreek Seed / Lavender / Balm / Stinging NettleYummy Mommy Nipple BalmNo nursing mom should be without our Yummy Mommy Nipple Balm - a gentle balm to soothe sore nipples during the nursing period. With cocoa butter, rosehip, calendula and jojoba oil.Cocoa Butter / Rosehip Oil / Forana / Calendula / Vitamin E
WOMEN'S HEALTH EXPERTSAll of our products have been developed in collaboration with leading women's health experts. We are grateful to have such a wonderful and highly competent team consisting of a naturopath, food scientist, midwife and pharmacist. This allows us to draw on a great wealth of experience and provide you with a holistic approach to female health and well-being.
HOW WE WORKThe reality of pregnancy differs depending on where you were born. Every day, approximately 830 women die from preventable causes related to pregnancy and childbirth (WHO). Almost all maternal deaths (99%) occur in developing countries. In Kenya, 1 in 47 women die from pregnancy and childbirth-related causes.In wealthier countries, most women receive four antenatal care visits and are attended by a midwife or skilled health worker during delivery and after birth.Pregnant women in Kenya often live long distances away from a health clinic or educated midwives. As a result, many give birth unattended at home, under unhygienic conditions and without a midwife’s attendance. Many Kenyan women are poor and lack the information on how to have a healthy and safe pregnancy, not knowing who to turn to for help or advice.A Preventable ProblemAccording to the WHO, 75% of maternal deaths in Kenya are preventable. Skilled care before, during and after childbirth can save the lives of thousands of women and newborn babies.With simple, low-cost interventions, such as regular midwife visits and a birth kit, Kenyan women can deliver in safe and more hygienic conditions. THE MOMS FOR MOMS® PROJECTThis is why we have partnered up with the Kenyan Midwife Association. Their mission is to provide “every woman and every newborn with quality midwifery care.”For every product of the FEMNA Health pregnancy line that you buy, we give 10% of sales to buy safe birth materials, such as sheets, gloves and soap as well as training materials and guidelines for health workers. Safe birth kits can reduce the risk of infections during and after childbirth and make pregnancy for Kenyan women much safer.Results that the Kenyan Midwife Association achieved so far
Antenatal care uptake increased from 88% to 96%
Skilled birth attendance increased from 44% to 62%
Post-natal care uptake increased from 42 to 51%
Infant mortality rate decreased from 52 to 39 out of 1000 live births
Child mortality rate decreased to more than half of all live births

WHO WE ARE Maxie was influenced by the women in her family to care passionately about female health. Her first endevour was founding Ruby Cup, a hygenic menstrual cup and company that supports  female hygiene in Kenya. This social project has already helped over 36,000 Kenyan girls. Since she became pregnant and gave birth to twin boys, she experienced the importance of midwifery, transitioning her mission to help pregnant women in Kenya have a safe birth.Emily is the creative lead and other half of FEMNA Health. Her interest in women’s health first sparked when she was advised to stop taking the contraceptive pill which she took to control her Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS) symptoms. Thanks to that forward-thinking advice, she started to investigate everything about hormones, learning how the female body works and what’s best for it.& FEMNA Health's Power-Women Hannah, Julia, Annie, Gosia, Alessia, Melinaand Loic.   TIMELINE
  ORDER RISKSDelivery timeThere is always a risk of delay in the production and there may be challenges that we cannot anticipate. However, we have scheduled a buffer so as to hopefully avert any delays.Customs / VAT feesIf you live outside the EU, you may be charged for customs and/or country-specific VAT.Custom processSome countries are known to have a lengthy customs process. Please inquire about this in your country. Unfortunately, we cannot expidite the customs process and cannot be held responsible for a hold up in customs.We will keep you updated on our progress and if we anticipate any upcoming delays! DO YOU HAVE A QUESTION?Check our FAQ's below or send us an email to hello@femna.eu. We're happy to help! FAQ'SQ: When will the products be delivered?A: We will send out all purchased pregnancy products at the end of October.Q: I’m not pregnant, but how can I support you?A: You can continue to support pregnancy in Kenya and here in Europe by purchasing a gift for a friend currently pregnant or trying to conceive. We offer gift cards and pregnancy journals which are not time sensitive. You can also buy our Be Bold tea that is tasty and suited for everyone.Q: I just recently became pregnant. How do I know what I need in the coming months?A: Don’t worry, this is why we have developed the pregnancy line based on Trimesters. The first trimester products should be taken during the first three months, the second trimester products during the next three months (months 4-6) and the third trimester products during the last three months of your pregnancy. WE NEED YOUR SUPPORTPlease share our campaign!❤ THANK YOU THANK YOU ❤  
   Deutsche Version

Keine Kreditkarte?
Macht nichts! Weitere Zahlungsmöglichkeiten findet du hier.

 
WIR SIND FEMNA Health
NATÜRLICHE PRODUKTE FÜR FRAUEN"Wir kombinieren traditionelle Kräuterkunde mit moderner Forschung und haben natürliche  Rezepturen kreiert, die Frauen in den verschiedenen Lebensphasen unterstützen." 
- Maxie und Emily, Gründerinnen von FEMNA Health
 DIE KRAFT UNSERER KRÄUTERUnsere Kräutertees und ätherischen Öle bestehen aus 100% natürlichen Zutaten. Unsere Tees enthalten 5-8 verschiedene Kräuter, von dem allgemein bekannten Löwenzahn bis zum exotischen sibirischen Ginseng. Die Kräuter unterstützen den Körper und liefern essentielle Substanzen, die für ein hormonelles System wichtig sind. Die einzigartigen Eigenschaften der Kräuter harmonisieren die Hormone im Leben einer Frau – von einem gesunden Menstruationszyklus über Schwangerschaft und Menopause.Unsere Körperöle und Roll-Ons werden aus hochwertigen natürlichen ätherischen Ölen zu einer einzigartigen Formel zusammengemischt, um die Sinne zu verwöhnen und die Seele baumeln zu lassen.
EXPERTEN FÜR WOMEN'S HEALTHFemna Produkte werden mit höchster Sorgfalt und in Kooperation mit führenden Experten aus den jeweiligen Bereichen entworfen. Wir sind dankbar, ein so wunderbares und hoch kompetentes Team von FEMNA Health Experten im Rücken zu haben, das aus einer Heilpraktikerin, Ökotrophologin, Hebamme und Apothekerin besteht. 
DIE FEMNA HEALTH SCHWANGERSCHAFTSLINIE Als Maxie, eine der Gründerinnen von FEMNA Health, mit Zwillingen schwanger wurde, erlebte sie viele häufige Schwangerschaftssymptome. Geeignete Produkte waren jedoch schwer zu finden. Somit entstand die Idee der FEMNA Health Schwangerschaftslinie.Wir möchten es Frauen leicht machen zu wissen, welche Produkte sie benötigen, je nachdem, in welcher Phase der Schwangerschaft sie sich befinden. Deshalb haben wir funktionelle Kräuterprodukte für die häufigsten Begleiterscheinungen während der unterschiedlichen Trimester einer Schwangerschaft entwickelt.
TRIMESTER 1
Willkommen in deiner Schwangerschaft! In diesem Stadium leiden etwa 75% der Frauen an Übelkeit oder Unwohlsein. Zum Glück gibt es traditionell erprobte Kräuter, die dich unterstützen können! Easy Queezy Belly TeaFür ein entspanntes Ankommen mit der Schwangerschaft im Bauch und im Kopf hat FEMNA Health den Easy Queezy Belly Tea entwickelt. Frauenmantel und Schafgarbe harmonisieren die Schwangerschaftshormone, Pfefferminze und Fenchel beruhigen den Bauch und Lindenblüte sowie Melisse spenden Zuversicht und Gelassenheit.Mit: Frauenmantel/ Melisse/ Pfefferminze/ Fenchel/ Schafgarbe/ LindenblütenFresh Morning Roll OnUnser Fresh Morning Roll On enthält eine beruhigende Mischung aus natürlichen ätherischen Ölen aus Minze, Zitrone, Ingwer und Kardamom. Verwenden kann man den Roll-On jederzeit und überall für ein schnelles frisches Gefühl. Mit: Pfefferminzöl/ Zitronenschalenöl/ Ingwerwurzelöl  / Kardamom / Vitamin E
TRIMESTER 2
Babybauchzeit! Das 2. Schwangerschaftstrimester ist für die meisten Frauen die Wohlfühlzeit - der Bauch und die Vorfreude wachsen und die Übelkeit verschwindet langsam! Doch was sollst du in dieser Zeit trinken? Und wie kannst du deinen Körper unterstützen? FEMNA Health hat für dich den Mommy To Be Tea und das Smooth & Firm Körperöl entwickelt.Mommy To Be TeaDer Mommy To Be Tea ist eine leckere, leichte Mischung für jeden Tag, speziell abgestimmt auf die 13. bis 26. Schwangerschaftswoche. Mit: Schachtelhalm/ Frauenmantel/ Melisse/ Ringelblume/ Sonnenblume/ RoseSmooth & Firm OilUnser Smooth & Firm Body Oil ist ein wohltuendes, pflegendes Körperöl mit Arganöl und Rose. Zur Pflege der Haut und Vorbeugung von DehnungsstreifenMit: Mandelöl / Ringelblumenöl / Wildsrosenöl / Schafgarbenöl/ Grapefruitöl/ Geranienöl/  Myrtenöl / Vitamin E
TRIMESTER 3
Bald geschafft! Im dritten Trimester leiden Frauen oft unter Schlaflosigkeit und schweren Beinen. Das zusätzliche Gewicht und die Veränderung der Hormone können diese Phase zu einer Herausforderung machen. Die Geburtsvorbereitung steht nun im Mittelpunkt. Wir haben uns mit Kräuterkundigen und Forschern beraten, um natürliche Unterstützung für diese Phase zu schaffen.Light Legs, Sound Sleep TeaDer Light Legs, Sound Sleep Tea ist FEMNAs Antwort für Leichtigkeit und Zuversicht. Brennnessel und Goldrute regulieren den Wasserhaushalt, Passionsblume und Weißdorn fördern die Entspannung und die Himbeerblätter bereiten das Gewebe auf die Geburt vor.Mit: Himbeerblätter/ Brennnessel/ Frauenmantel/ Weißdorn/ Passionsblume/ Goldrute/ MalveSweet Release OilDas Sweet Release Oil ist ein pflegendes Körperöl mit wertvollen und natürlichen ätherischen Ölen, sowie Lavendel, Wacholder, Zypresse und Zitrone. Kühlend, erfrischend und wohltuend bei schweren Beinen und beruhigend im letzten Schwangerschaftsdrittel.Mit: Mandelöl / Diestelöl / Lavendelöl/ Wacholderöl / Rosengeranienöl/ Zypressenöl / Zitronenschalenöl / Vitamin E
MOMMY'S REVIVAL PAKET
Du bist eine Superheldin! Egal wie du es bis hier geschafft hast, das Baby ist geboren und du kannst dir jetzt Zeit nehmen, um zu heilen. Wir haben Einiges für dich vorbereitet, um diese Zeit zu begleiten und dem Körper zu helfen, sich innerlich und äußerlich zu erholen. Traditionell dauert das Wochenbett 8 Wochen - Zeit, die Bindung zum Baby aufzubauen und den Körper nach der Geburt zu pflegen.Mommy's Revival TeaDie Kräuter im Mommy’s Revival Tea unterstützen diesen natürlichen Vorgang, sie sind stärkend und regenerierend. Schafgarbe, Hirtentäschel und Gänseblümchen werden traditionell nach der Geburt empfohlen. Weiße Taubnessel, Frauenmantel und Schachtelhalm sorgen für einen gesunden Wochenfluss und stärken das Gewebe.Mit: Hirtentäschel/ Frauenmantel/ Gänseblümchen/ Taubnessel/ Schafgarbe/ Ingwer/ ZitronenverbeneMommy's Belly OilDas Mommy's Belly Oil ist ein regeneratives Körperöl mit natürlichen ätherischen Ölen für die Zeit der Rückbildung nach der Geburt. Mit Ringelblume, Wildrose, Schafgarbe und Grapefruit.Mit: Aprikosenkernöl / Jojobaöl / (Arganöl)/ Hundsrosenöl / Lorbeeröl / Vitamin E
MOMMY'S MILK PAKETHier geht es um deine Brüste! Beim Stillen dreht sich alles um die Verbindung zwischen dir und deinem Baby - es ist die perfekte Lösung, um Liebe und Ernährung zu kombinieren. Am Anfang mag es etwas knifflig sein, aber du kannst dir bei FEMNA Health Unterstützung suchen, um deine Milchproduktion anzuregen, wunde Brustwarzen zu pflegen und die Nerven zu beruhigen.Mommy Milk TeaDer Mommy Milk Tea kombiniert Kräuter, die von Stillberaterinnen und Hebammen empfohlen werden, um die Milchproduktion zu unterstützen - Bockshornkleesamen, Fenchel, Anis, Kümmel und Brennnessel. Lavendel und Melisse geben den nötigen seelischen Halt, wenn mal wieder alles drunter und drüber geht im Leben mit einem Neugeborenen.Mit: Fenchel/ Kümmel/ Anis/ Bockshornkleesamen/ Lavendel/ Melisse/ BrennesselYummy Mommy Nipple BalmDer Yummy Mommy Nipple Balm- ein sanfter Balsam zur Pflege wunder Brustwarzen in der Stillzeit. Mit Kakaobutter, Hagebutte, Ringelblume und Jojobaöl.Mit: Kakaobutter / Wildrosenöl / Lorbeeröl / Ringelblumenöl / Vitamin E
WIE WIR ARBEITENLaut der WHO sterben jeden Tag schätzungsweise 830 Frauen an schwangerschafts- und geburtsbezogenen Ursachen, die vermieden werden könnten. Nahezu alle Fälle von Müttersterblichkeit (99%) passieren in Entwicklungsländern. In Kenya stirbt eine von 47 Frauen an Folgen ihrer Schwangerschaft oder der Geburt ihres Kindes.Warum?In Ländern mit hohem Einkommen sind ungefähr vier pränatale Vorsorgeuntersuchung, die Unterstützung einer Hebamme und gut ausgebildetes Personal während und nach der Geburt die Regel.In Kenia leben schwangere Frauen oft sehr weit von der nächsten Klinik und somit von gut ausgebildeten Hebamme entfernt. Resultat sind daher häufig Hausgeburten mit unhygienischen Bedingungen und ohne ärztlicher oder professioneller Unterstützung. Viele Frauen sind arm und nicht ausreichend über relevante Faktoren einer gesunden und sicheren Schwangerschaft informiert. Sie wissen nicht, wer ihnen in ihrer Situation helfen kann.
DAS MOMS FOR MOMS®-PROJEKT75% der Müttersterblichkeit in Kenya sind laut der WHO vermeidbar. Sachkundige Verpflegung vor, während und nach der Geburt kann das Leben vieler Frauen und deren Kinder retten. Eine Entbindung in Sicherheit unter hygienischen Bedingungen ist schon durch kleine, kostengünstige Maßnahmen, wie zum Beispiel regelmäßige Besuche einer Hebamme oder einem Geburt-Kit möglich. Aus diesem Grund haben wir uns mit der Kenyan Midwives Association zusammen-geschlossen. Deren Mission ist es, jeder Frau und einem jedem Kind qualitative Pflege durch eine Hebamme zu ermöglichen.Für jedes verkaufte Produkt unsere Schwangerschaftslinie spenden wir 10%, um notwendige Materialien für eine sichere Geburt zu kaufen, wie zum Beispiel Bettlaken, Handschuhe & Seife, sowie Informationsmaterial und Sicherheitsrichtlinien für medizinisches Personal.Diese Kits für eine sichere Geburt können das Risiko von Infektionen während und nach der Entbindung erheblich reduzieren und die Schwangerschaft für Frauen in Kenia sicherer machen.Bisherige Erfolgserlebnisse der Kenyan Midwife Association:
Steigerung pränataler Versorgung um 88%-96%
44%-62% mehr Anwesenheit von sachkundigem Personal bei Geburten
Steigerung von postnataler Versorgung um 42%-51%
Säuglingssterblichkeit ist von 52/1000 auf 39/1000 gesunken
Kindersterblichkeit ist von 3,1% auf 1,4% gesunken
 WER WIR SINDMaxieDurch meine Großmutter, eine begeisterte Ärztin, und meine Mutter, die sich als Psychologin viel mit der Salutogenese beschäftigt hat, kam ich früh mit Gesundheitsthemen in Berührung. Durch meine erste Firma, Ruby Cup, die erfolgreich eine innovative Lösung für die Menstruation, eine Menstruatinoskappe,  entwickelt und vertreibt, habe ich mein Interesse an natürlicher Frauenhygiene vertieft. Durch meine Zeit mit Ruby Cup in Kenia, in der ich in den Slums mit lokalen Frauengruppen gearbeitet habe, kenne ich mich mit den Begebenheiten vor Ort gut aus. Als ich Schwanger wurde, habe ich mich mit allen Themen rund um das Thema Geburt, Hebammen und Frauengesundheit beschäftigt. Jetzt möchte ich mich mit FEMNA Health durch unser „Moms For Moms“- Projekt für sichere Geburten in Kenia einsetzen.EmilyMein Interesse an der Gesundheit von Frauen wurde ausgelöst, als mein Arzt mir sagte, ich solle die Pille absetzen, denn ich bekam dadurch chronische Migräne. Ich hatte davor seit Jahren die Pille genommen, um die Symptome des polyzystischen Ovar Syndroms (PCOS) einzudämmen. Dank dieser zukunftsorientierten Beratung begann ich erstmalig zu verstehen, was Hormone sind und wie sie funktionieren. Ich begann meinen Körper zu verstehen und zu lernen, was das Beste für mich und meinen Körper ist. Mit Femna möchte ich die bestmöglichen natürlichen Produkte anbieten, um Frauen das Leben zu erleichtern.& FEMNA Health's Power-Women Hannah, Julia, Annie, Gosia, Alessia, Melinaand Loic.    ZEITPLAN 
RISIKENLieferzeitIn der Fertigung von Produkten besteht immer die Gefahr einer Verzögerung. In Anbetracht unserer Produktion könnte es theoretisch Herausforderungen geben, die wir nicht vorausgesehen haben. Allerdings haben wir dafür einen Puffer als Vorlaufzeit eingeplant.Zoll- / MWSt-Gebühren Wenn Du außerhalb der EU wohnst, können eventuell Gebühren für Zoll- und/oder für die länderspezifische Mehrwertsteuer anfallen.ZollEinige Länder sind dafür bekannt, dass sie sehr viel Zeit für den Zollprozess benötigen. Bitte erkundige Dich hierzu in Deinem Land. Es tut uns leid, dass wir auf Dein Paket keinen "magischen Stempel" aufdrücken können, damit es schneller durchkommt.Wir werden Dich regelmäßig über unsere Fortschritte und gegebenenfalls aufkommende Verzögerungen auf dem Laufenden halten!
DU HAST FRAGEN?Schau dir unsere FAQs an oder sende uns eine E-Mail an hello@femna.eu.Wir helfen Dir gerne weiter!
FAQsQ: Wann werden die Produkte geliefert?A: Wir werden alle verkauften Produkte unserer Schwangerschaftslinie Ende Oktober versenden.Q: Ich bin nicht schwanger, würde euch aber trotzdem gerne unterstützen. Wie kann ich das am Besten machen?A: Du kannst trotzdem weiterhin sichere Schwangerschaften in Kenya unterstützen indem du z.B. Produkte als Geschenk für eine Freundin kaufst, die schwanger ist oder versucht schwanger zu werden.  Außerdem haben wir auch Gutscheine und ein Schwangerschaftsjournal im Angebot, beides Produkte, die weniger zeitsensitiv sind. Schlussendlich kannst du uns unterstützen, indem du dir unseren leckeren Tee "Be Bold" ergatterst - der ist für alle, Männer und Frauen, sehr zu empfehlen.Q: Ich bin erst seit kurzem schwanger. Woher weiß ich, welche Produkte ich in den nächsten Monaten brauchen werde?A: Keine Sorge, genau deshalb haben wir unsere Schwangerschaftslinie in Trimester-Pakete aufgeteilt. Das erste Paket wird in den ersten 3 Monaten eingenommen, das zweite in den Monaten 4-6 und das dritte im letzten Trimester, damit du dich nicht darum sorgen musst, sondern auf deine Schwangerschaft konzentrieren kannst. WIR BRAUCHEN DEINE UNTERSTÜTZUNGBitte teile unsere Kampagne!❤ VIELEN DANK ❤

story:
Majestic! Miraculous! Magnificent! Moringa is the greatest food you’ve never heard of (unless you have): an all natural power-plant, with life-supporting benefits, that thrives in arid climates. It grows 2 feet per month and is completely usable, from root to flower.

We believe that you can’t go another day without it, that’s why we’ve made it our mission to bring this magical plant to you... and everyone else, too.





Moringa is one of the most nutrient-rich natural foods in the world. It contains 92 nutrients and 46 types of antioxidants, it’s packed with vitamins and contains all 9 essential amino acids. That’s why we call it ‘the Mother of all Multivitamins’.


 



For our launch we’ll begin with our first product: Moringa! Our Moringa comes in powder form that's great for delicious smoothies, powerful breakfasts and sumptuous snacks, and Capsulated Moringa Powder, also available in vegan capsules, for people with limited time to enjoy and for those who aren’t so partial to the taste. 

With time we’ll be developing much more. See our stretch goals section for more info.

Yamba Moringa is the perfect alternative to those nasty chemically produced multivitamins. 

 



We’ve been working for more than a year to set up this company! Having already begun producing our first dream product, Moringa, we’re just about ready to bring it to the world. However, there are still a few corners to smoothen.

We need your help to invest in transportation, expand our production facilities, pay the hefty start up costs for distribution and cover all the hidden costs which unendingly pop up on this rocky road to worldwide empowerment.

We chose Indiegogo for its amazing community, that believes in the power of a great idea and top quality products. We felt it a perfect fit for our colourful company, and we hope you’ll agree.






Yamba believes in the power that companies have to make a real difference in the world. From responsibly sourcing products, to creating social business models that fairly integrate everybody involved. That’s why our Indiegogo is no different to how we do things on a regular day.

For every perk that you purchase on our Indiegogo, we give a matching perk for Malawi. If everybody doesn’t win, then nobody really wins. So when you buy a packet, we give a plant. And if you support some of our bigger goals, we’ll give both bigger and more complex gifts to the communities we work with,  so we all strive together.









Power! Moringa is just our first product, we plan on much more. We’re already researching and developing multiple other product lines. Our aim is to continuously bring you powerful products to elevate your health to new dimensions, while you go through life empowering those around you.

At the same time we’ll be using a portion of our excess money to develop added strategies to truly improve the lives of the people we work with. We’ll communicate with communities to find out their needs through time: Starting with using the leftover branches to make sustainable charcoal and fight against deforestation, and organise our farmers in a corporation to make sure we work together in the right way.

Keep an eye on us and maybe even get involved. We're a lot of fun!





Not a dollar wasted! Obviously we’ll be delighted to meet our goals. But should we by chance exceed that goal, we have plans in place to make sure we make the best of the incredible support we receive. See below a chart of our stretch goals:









#YambaPower
Become a part of our story!



For more information visit:
https://www.yambahealth.com

That’s why we call it ‘the Mother of all Multivitamins’. For our launch we’ll begin with our first product: Moringa! Our Moringa comes in powder form that's great for delicious smoothies, powerful breakfasts and sumptuous snacks, and Capsulated Moringa Powder, also available in vegan capsules, for people with limited time to enjoy and for those who aren’t so partial to the taste. With time we’ll be developing much more. See our stretch goals section for more info.Yamba Moringa is the perfect alternative to those nasty chemically produced multivitamins.  We’ve been working for more than a year to set up this company! Having already begun producing our first dream product, Moringa, we’re just about ready to bring it to the world. However, there are still a few corners to smoothen.We need your help to invest in transportation, expand our production facilities, pay the hefty start up costs for distribution and cover all the hidden costs which unendingly pop up on this rocky road to worldwide empowerment.We chose Indiegogo for its amazing community, that believes in the power of a great idea and top quality products. We felt it a perfect fit for our colourful company, and we hope you’ll agree.Yamba believes in the power that companies have to make a real difference in the world. From responsibly sourcing products, to creating social business models that fairly integrate everybody involved. That’s why our Indiegogo is no different to how we do things on a regular day.For every perk that you purchase on our Indiegogo, we give a matching perk for Malawi. If everybody doesn’t win, then nobody really wins. So when you buy a packet, we give a plant. And if you support some of our bigger goals, we’ll give both bigger and more complex gifts to the communities we work with,  so we all strive together.Power! Moringa is just our first product, we plan on much more. We’re already researching and developing multiple other product lines. Our aim is to continuously bring you powerful products to elevate your health to new dimensions, while you go through life empowering those around you.At the same time we’ll be using a portion of our excess money to develop added strategies to truly improve the lives of the people we work with. We’ll communicate with communities to find out their needs through time: Starting with using the leftover branches to make sustainable charcoal and fight against deforestation, and organise our farmers in a corporation to make sure we work together in the right way.Keep an eye on us and maybe even get involved. We're a lot of fun!Not a dollar wasted! Obviously we’ll be delighted to meet our goals. But should we by chance exceed that goal, we have plans in place to make sure we make the best of the incredible support we receive. See below a chart of our stretch goals:#YambaPowerBecome a part of our story!For more information visit:https://www.yambahealth.com

story:
Radix Soccer Training provides one-on-one training that is perfect for players who wish to move to the next level by improving their technical, tactical and physical skills. Training is modified to their specific needs and we also provide  a player profile that will allow them to showcase their skills and leave them with a long lasting memory of their hard working ethic.

My objective is to raise $3000 for start up costs in a time span of 30 days. I have a full time job and a part-time coaching job with a local youth academy. Most of the money i collect goes to me and my wife's cost of living. I find it hard in my budget to have the money to start my business effectively but with your help i will be able to start helping kids, teenagers and young adults from all levels of the game as soon as possible. On the attributes that a great soccer player must have:

1.Technique

2. Mindset

3. Game Intelligence

4. Team Player

5.Physique

Every dollar counts. If you can't donate any money you can help me by sharing this campaign with people you know that may be able to help.

Thank you for your time and contribution to my project. "Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do."- Pele
