story:
We are proud to announce the launch of SF Squared, as the first fitness company to build gender neutral training facilities in America. By donating to our indiegogo campaign, you can be a part of this reinvention of fitness community and education.  

Turning away from the idea that fitness gyms see you as a dollar sign, we want to make community the cornerstone of the SF Squared company; and instead want to invest back in you. By making a mobile app, we call 'The Squad', we are not only encouraging communication with training professionals, but will make it easier to connect with other members, and get support in training with rewards for making progress. Our investment in your fitness goals continue with training education, with one-to-one personal training in our facility, and outreach boot camp classes in local neighborhoods. However, the best way for us to make sure that no one is left behind, and that we make an inclusive community, is to embrace gender neutrality in all of our facilities. That means that all restrooms, locker rooms / members' lounges will be designed, and constructed with this in mind. We believe that fair and equal treatment isn't just a member agreement to sign, but can be showcased beautifully when incorporated into a fitness space design. As a member and/or client, you want more than just paying a monthly fee, you want to meet your fitness goals, and feel supported along the way. SF Squared is determined to go beyond what traditional gyms offer, and help you get there. 

We want your donations, to make this concept a reality. By donating today, your funds will be used to secure and construct our first training studio location, and complete development of our app, ‘The Squad’. We want to change the fitness industry to move away from traditional gyms, and into a new modern training community. One that educates, welcomes, and empowers you. That's why SF Squared is 'Empowering Fitness'! 

Our biggest risk - Securing location to build gym

During our search for locations that could be modified, or be turn key, it was apparent that finding the right one that could work, would be difficult. However, by already having the support from the Castro Merchants Association and Castro Business Association, we believe that our search will be much easier. Our timeline to secure the first location (training studio) is by July 2017. This studio will allow for more time to search for a second location, as well as garner public support for a large gym facility to be built in the Castro / Eureka Valley neighborhood. 

Second biggest risk - Comfort with Gender Neutrality

Gender Neutrality is a new concept for many people, and we understand that it may be difficult for potential clients and members to embrace a gender neutral (co-ed) locker room space, as well as gender neutrality in training spaces. Our team has laid out a plan through promotion of gender neutrality, and allowing the first location to stand as a model, to fully explain and educate the public. Simultaneously, all staff will be fully knowledgeable to uphold policies against discrimination and sexual harassment. By embracing gender neutrality throughout our facilities, we strive to make a community that is educated in equality, staff that uphold fairness to all, and members who are in agreement of a standard of gym etiquette and respect for one another.

Rewards 

For every donation of $50 or more, you receive an SF Squared Thermal Water Bottle (available in grey or blue)

For every donation of $100 or more, you receive an SF Squared Founders T-shirt - Preshrunk Cotton Blend in Grey (available in various sizes)

For every donation of $250 or more, you receive a complimentary training session with Owner/Coach Race Cooper (Only available to residents of San Francisco - Bay Area)

For more information please visit, getsfsquared.com. To donate, please select a donation amount on this page. Thank you for investing in the future of training, at SF Squared!

story:
Gathering to Talk About our Experiences with Race

In the wake of Ferguson, I asked friends if they would be interested in meeting for dinner to discuss what was happening in our communities. I received an overwhelming response on social media, and within a week, hundreds of people from San Francisco to London, had expressed an interest in attending a dinner.

With such a show of support, I began compiling resources and looking for venues to host dinners. I decided to call the dinners 'Deliberate Discourse' and in the first three months of 2015 I coordinated 11 dinners in 7 cities in the United States. Each dinner was simple and yet powerful, the way things of the heart tend to be.

One group from our San Francisco dinner exchanged contact information and planned five more potlucks to continue the conversation they had started. Over 200 people have attended dinners, but the impact does not stop there. Friendships have formed through the power of vulnerability and good communication. I  want to share this experience with others.

Given the continued interest in discussing our experiences with race in America, we are kicking off this campaign to subsidize the expenses of hosting these events so that we can continue to offer the dinners at an affordable price for all attendees.

We would love you to join us at a dinner or sponsor a seat for someone else. 


Use of Funds: Bring More People To The Table

The money raised will cover the administration and logistical costs of hosting 12 Deliberate Discourse dinners (venue, paying the chef and facilitators, educational material), allowing guests who have not pre-purchased a dinner ticket through this campaign to pay only for the cost of the food itself ($35/per person).

In addition to organizing the dinners (finding the venue, chef, trained facilitators and managing communication before and after the events) we will gather stories and advice from attendees to create a guide to engaging friends and loved ones in conversations about race and personal bias.

Benchmarks in Funding:

  • First $20,000: 3 Dinners + Downloadable Conversation Guide on Race & Bias
  • Next $20,000: 3 Dinners + 1 Deliberate Discourse for Kids
  • Next $20,000: 3 Dinners
  • Next $20,000: 3 Dinners
  • Next $5,000:  1 Video Capturing the Stories and Experiences of Attendees

Any money raised over the $90,000 will allow us to host more dinners and bring in more people to support this initiative. For every $3,000 raised above the target, we will host a free community dinner in a park or public space to encourage broader dialog in communities.


What Guests Have Had To Say About the Experience

To date, we have had 11 dinners in 7 cities across the United States. Dinners have varied in size from 8 people to 45, and have been hosted in restaurants and in private homes.



What Can I Expect at the Dinner?

  • Deliberate Discourse dinners are hosted family style
  • Prior to arrival, guests are sent a series of videos and articles to read, creating a reference point for later discussion
  • Upon arrival at the dinner, everyone is welcomed and asked to sit at tables in groups of 5 or 6 maximum, to ensure that everyone can participate.
  • Once seated, everyone is given a Reflection Prompt Card to set the tone for the evening
  • Dinner is served and each table is free to have a self-directed conversation using a set of question cards provided to facilitate dialog
  • After finishing dinner and dessert, the entire group comes back together to share key takeaways

Other Ways You Can Help

A core part of making these dinners successful is ensuring that the environment is a safe and welcoming one. Therefore we carefully select the venue, looking for spaces where people are able to have an open conversation without interruption.

  • If you own or have access to a space we can utilize (restaurant, cafe, gallery), let us know!
  • Are you a chef? We are always looking for culinary artists who can help make these dinners memorable.


Logistics

  1. Share this campaign with your friends and family.
  2. We will plan dinners in the cities with the most demand first. You can express interest in having a dinner in your city by registering on our website.
  3. We will send all backers a code for 100% off their dinner ticket, to be used for any of the dinners we schedule in 2016


Now and In The Future

Gathering around the table to share a good meal is one way that we can share our humanity while diving into an important topic that affects us all – race.

We believe that face-to-face dialog is a simple and powerful way to increase understanding, grow in empathy, and discover new possibilities. We hope Deliberate Discourse can grow into a series of discussions about things that matter.


Read more about what prompted Fay to start these dinners in Fast Company

story:
Driver Watchdog was created to provide safety and connectivity for drivers and allows a remote viewer to monitor all vehicle activity. A live stream enables real-time monitoring of all in-car and out-of-vehicle activity, linking any situation to the driver’s chosen contacts. Driver Watchdog aims to keep you safe on the road while creating an enjoyable driving experience.


Data Plan

Data is provided in a variety of options which will be added each month after the two free months you get through the crowdfunding campaign. Data will be offered in options of 5 GB,  10 GB, and unlimited with the cost of $9.99, $14.99,  and $24.99 respectively. Almost all of our features use data in some capacity. 

  • 5 GB - $9.99/mo
  • 10 GB - $14.99/mo
  • Unlimited Data - $24.99/mo












Make your car a Smart Car with Driver Watchdogs 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot. Access high speed Internet in your car through a secure private signal and connect all your devices. Conduct business from your car while stopped or stream entertainment on long road trips. 


Driver Watchdog has a dual HD internal/external camera that captures in-car events and records all out of vehicle activity creating a near 360° monitoring view. In all situations, this recorded data can be streamed in real-time, saved for review, and used for possible future action. Your Evidence. For Your Eyes Only.


Through Driver Watchdog’s internal and external cameras, remote viewers have the ability to monitor drivers through the device’s real-time monitoring capabilities. Driver Watchdog is also equipped with audio capabilities that allow the remote viewer to verbally contact the driver hands-free through the device.


In the case of an accident, drivers young and old are often in shock, disoriented, overwhelmed or simply can’t get to their phone. With Driver Watchdog’s g-force sensor technology, the device will send automatic emergency alerts to pre-designated contacts the moment an accident occurs. The emergency contact will be the first to know and can activate the device’s audio link. The audio and visual capabilities of the device, allow you to immediately assess the driver’s condition, locate the car through the device’s GPS feature, and call for emergency help if necessary.


Drive alert and safe at all times with Driver Watchdog’s fatigue sensor. Using motion detection and retina scanner technology, the device will detect abrupt head nodding and eye alertness and then wake the driver with a loud noise and vibration. Emergency alerts can be set up to notify your selected contacts if desired in the event the fatigues sensor is triggered. The fatigue sensor can be set either by the driver or by the user [viewer] remotely. Put your mind at ease that your loved one is safe and alert on long road trips.


Included with all Driver Watchdog devices, a panic button will be provided to alert emergency contacts immediately of any situation. Set up pre-designated emergency contacts through the Driver Watchdog app and choose to alert them via phone, text, or email. The panic button can placed on the dashboard of your vehicle or attached to your key chain.


Driver Watchdog’s motion detector detects any abnormal levels of motion inside or outside of the vehicle. Running into the post office for a moment and need to leave your pet in the car? Monitor the internal temperature of the car and view the interior of the vehicle through the Driver Watchdog app to be sure your pet is comfortable and safe. 

The devices external motion detector will monitor incidents of theft. Is your car safely sitting in your driveway, parking lot or garage? Monitor unusual motion around your car and be alerted of the potential dangerous situation before it happens.  


How many times have you told your loved one “Call or text me when you get there?” With Driver Watchdog’s geo-fencing technology, users can monitor the driver’s location at all times. Set physical boundaries on a map for the vehicles expected travel. Automatic alerts will be sent to the driver’s pre-determined contacts if the driver leaves the designated area. 


Driver Watchdog is a wireless “plug and play” device that needs no professional installation. With no assembly required, Driver Watchdog only takes minutes to install. Simply mount the device anywhere in your vehicle, turn it on, download the free Driver Watchdog app, and enjoy all of Driver Watchdog’s unparalleled features. Driver Watchdog is battery operated with up to 36 hours of continued recording and is charged via USB. Provided with a car/truck or motorcycle/bicycle mount, Driver Watchdog can be used on any vehicle you desire. Only 5.5” wide, the device’s small and sleek design is designed for protection not distraction.


 Link Driver Watchdog’s app seamlessly with all your devices. The driver and designated contacts can open and access the app through a mobile phone, tablet, or desktop. User friendly and clear, the app links all activity, all the time!


Driver Watchdog is compatible with every make, model, and type of vehicle. Driver Watchdog can be used in all types of motor vehicles - including motorcycles and can even be mounted to bicycles.









Engineering Team:

Shipping and Fulfillment Center:

story:
Introducing Green Calm

Green Calm is a new kind of nutrient-based supplement for anxiety and mood. It contains a unique blend of vitamins, minerals and a special amino acid designed to support the body's natural calming ability. 


For All Forms of Anxiety

Anxiety can manifest in a variety of ways. For some people it’s chronic and they feel it most of the time. For others it’s more situational and can be brought on by events like work or school, or certain substances like coffee, cannabis, or some medications. Because Green Calm benefits the nervous system on the fundamental level of nutrition it’s helpful for anxiety in all forms.


Ingredients



Science & Research

The core of the Green Calm blend is magnesium and P5P (vitamin B6). Research has shown these to be beneficial for anxiety, depression, PMS, ADHD, autism, and other health problems.

Magnesium induces anxiolytic-like behavior in mice

A combination of magnesium and B6 reduce anxiety-related PMS symptoms

Magnesium and B6 reduce ADHD symptoms

Autism symptoms reduced with magnesium and B6

Lower plasma levels of B6 associated with depression

Lower magnesium intake linked to depression

For additional support Green Calm contains zinc, R5P (vitamin B2), and niacinamide (B3). These have been shown in research to enhance the function of the core ingredients, and to improve anxiety and depression.

Lower zinc intake linked to depression

Zinc supplementation reduces anxiety and depression

Niacinamide activates GABA receptors, reduces anxiety in mice

Case studies show reduction of anxiety with niacinamide

And to round out the blend there's a bit of l-theanine. It's an uncommon amino acid found in green tea, and unlike the other ingredients it's not an essential nutrient. Research has shown it to be helpful for anxiety, mood, focus, and for mitigating some of the negative effects of caffeine. It's also very benign on the body compared to other compounds that offer similar benefits.  

Theanine reduces psychological and physiological stress responses

Theanine in the brain releases dopamine and glycine, prevents release of aspartic acid


 


What Does Using It Feel Like?

The experience of using Green Calm is not like most other anxiety remedies. It isn't an intense, in-your-face sensation. You won't feel like you're "on something." Instead, things just go more smoothly and easily. Stressors don't throw you off as much. You might find yourself with more energy, focus, or sleeping easier with an increased supply of nutrients helping your body rebalance.


"When I take Green Calm I'm less anxious, I feel a greater sense of well-being, and bothersome things just don't get to me as much."
– Nancy


"I didn't realize just how anxious I was until I started taking Green Calm. I had gotten used to it. Now my anxiety is a lot better and the difference is obvious."
– Matt


"I used to have a low level of anxiety all the time, plus sometimes it would become more intense. Since I started using Green Calm I don't have that constant anxiety, and things that used to make me even more anxious like coffee and cannabis aren't a problem."
– Nicole


"I used to get stressed at work and after my shift everyday for a month my eye would twitch, but I haven't had any panic attacks or shortness of breath and my eye hasn't been twitching at work! I'm loving the Green Calm product."
– Antonio


The Backstory

Katie and I both have some chronic health problems that we've been dealing with for a while. A few years ago, my doctor had me do genetic testing in an effort to assess and improve my body's methylation system. After finding some disadvantageous genes, she had me use a combination of biologically active nutrients. These made a real difference in how I felt, and in a way that I did not experience from the more common forms of the same nutrients. My mood was better, and I was less prone to anxiety. Katie tried them and had a similar experience.

I already knew a lot about nutrition, and as I did more research on these nutrients I was supplementing with our reactions made more sense. Vitamin B6 is needed by the body for production of the major calming neurotransmitter, GABA, along with other important ones like serotonin and dopamine. Magnesium, zinc, B2 and B3 are important in balancing GABA with it's opposite, glutamate, the major neurotransmitter for activating and speeding up.

Ideally, we would get all the nutrients we need just by eating a rich, varied diet of healthful foods and avoiding junk. But many of us don't eat this well, and even if we do it's not always enough. Magnesium, for example, is difficult to get in optimal quantities through food because of modern farming practices and water processing. Our ability to absorb nutrients can be impaired by a dysfunctional digestive system or other obstacles. Some nutrients, like vitamin B6, are often eaten in foods or supplements in a form that is not biologically active, so it requires conversion by the body into the biologically active form before it can be useful. This conversion process can be impaired by a variety of health conditions.

 


Why We're on Indiegogo

We've already had the first batch of Green Calm produced and we're here on Indiegogo for two main reasons. The first is to make our big launch and reach out across the internet. We're a small, independent company with limited resources, and this is a good option for us to connect with people who can benefit from Green Calm. The second reason is to help us recoup some of the costs we invested in the first run, so that we have more funds available for other parts of our enterprise, like research and development.

So, the risks and challenges are minimal, and once the campaign is over and settled all the orders will ship out using inventory that we already have. If the campaign goes especially well and we exceed the inventory produced in the first batch then we can start taking orders for the next batch we produce, which would likely start shipping about 2 months after all the current inventory is claimed.




Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't or don't need to buy anything to support our campaign, you can still be a big help by sharing this with the people you know, the communities you're part of, on social media, etc. The sharing tools on the left side of this page are always a good place to start.

FAQ

Who can benefit from Green Calm?

The supplement is designed to benefit people who would like to reduce anxiety and balance their mood. There is also research demonstrating that some of the ingredients can be helpful for people with PMS, ADHD, and autism. The ingredients are relatively mild and not likely to cause problems, but if you have health problems or are pregnant please do consult your doctor or other medical professional. 

Do you ship to my country?

We ship almost anywhere in the world. Exceptions include North Korea, Somalia, and anywhere else with trade embargoes or mail restrictions from the US.

How should I use Green Calm?

The recommended dose is 2 capsules per day, though you may take 1 to 4 capsules per day as needed. Taking it with food is typically better than on an empty stomach, and some people prefer having it in the morning, so taking it after your first meal of the day is what we like to recommend. Effects should be noticeable within the first day of taking it. It may take up to a week or more to see maximum benefits as your biological pathways get back up to speed with their newly increased supply of nutrients. Best results come from using it regularly.

Is Green Calm safe for kids?

Generally yes, but they should probably stick with 1 pill per day, and it would be best to consult with your medical professional. The ingredients are as benign as what you'd find in a multivitamin supplement.

I have a hard time with pills. How big are these?

The pills are size 00, and they're about an inch long. If you can't swallow pills at all you can still use Green Calm by pulling the pills open and swallowing the contents with some water or other beverage. The taste is pretty mild, and not something that really needs a coverup. 

What are the ingredients?

Magnesium citrate, zinc citrate, pyridoxal-5-phosphate (B6), niacinamide (B3), riboflavin-5-phosphate (B2), and l-theanine. Plus a plant-derived capsule to contain them. 


Does Green Calm contain fillers, gluten, soy, animal products, etc?

Nope! If it's not on the ingredient list it's not in Green Calm. There are no fillers or binders, just the active ingredients contained in plant-derived capsules. No gluten, soy, dairy, nuts, or anything else. 

So, Green Calm can reduce the paranoia and nervousness caused by cannabis?

As with anything the results will vary from person to person, but our research has shown Green Calm to be helpful for this purpose with medical patients here in California. Of course, we only endorse this usage when in accordance with relevant laws.



FDA disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, cure, or prevent any disease.
story_txt:
Introducing Green Calm
Green Calm is a new kind of nutrient-based supplement for anxiety and mood. It contains a unique blend of vitamins, minerals and a special amino acid designed to support the body's natural calming ability. 






For All Forms of Anxiety
Anxiety can manifest in a variety of ways. For some people it’s chronic and they feel it most of the time. For others it’s more situational and can be brought on by events like work or school, or certain substances like coffee, cannabis, or some medications. Because Green Calm benefits the nervous system on the fundamental level of nutrition it’s helpful for anxiety in all forms.

Ingredients









Science & Research
The core of the Green Calm blend is magnesium and P5P (vitamin B6). Research has shown these to be beneficial for anxiety, depression, PMS, ADHD, autism, and other health problems.
Magnesium induces anxiolytic-like behavior in mice
A combination of magnesium and B6 reduce anxiety-related PMS symptoms
Magnesium and B6 reduce ADHD symptoms
Autism symptoms reduced with magnesium and B6
Lower plasma levels of B6 associated with depression
Lower magnesium intake linked to depression
For additional support Green Calm contains zinc, R5P (vitamin B2), and niacinamide (B3). These have been shown in research to enhance the function of the core ingredients, and to improve anxiety and depression.
Lower zinc intake linked to depression
Zinc supplementation reduces anxiety and depression
Niacinamide activates GABA receptors, reduces anxiety in mice
Case studies show reduction of anxiety with niacinamide
And to round out the blend there's a bit of l-theanine. It's an uncommon amino acid found in green tea, and unlike the other ingredients it's not an essential nutrient. Research has shown it to be helpful for anxiety, mood, focus, and for mitigating some of the negative effects of caffeine. It's also very benign on the body compared to other compounds that offer similar benefits.  
Theanine reduces psychological and physiological stress responses
Theanine in the brain releases dopamine and glycine, prevents release of aspartic acid

story:
Short Summary

Through an accident; all of our camera recording equipment has been destroyed.  It has been amazing bringing Free Yoga to the world for the last 2 years.  Unfortunately; we recently lost thousands of dollars of equipment to keep it going.  Please, help us rebuild.

What We Need & What You Get

We are aiming to replace all of our recording equipment that was lost in an accident. Starting on March 26th, we will be live streaming and recording a Yoga class every Saturday at 10:30am PST with a LIVE discussion with students to follow... Please join us any time you can, or join us later with the recorded classes.

We are going to have a raffle for a skype yoga private with Stephen Beitler, 2 free months of a new premium membership at Freeyoga.tv (Commercial free), and individual skype yoga privates with Stephen

However much we earn, even if we don't reach our goal,  will go toward a new camera. 

The Impact

As most of you know I have spent the last 2 years posting at least one class every week.  Sharing my journey with you, as so many of you have shared your journey with me.  This will give us the opportunity to create a haven of being.  A haven for us to discover what this present moment is.  With all the tools we have learned from our myriad of backgrounds. Trengpa Rinpoche talks about how the communication from the student to the teacher is just as important as the teacher to the student.  I hope these live classes would help to keep the communication growing in our community.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    Be there for someone who needs you.  Pay it forward.  And, maybe mention freeyoga.tv if a friend seems like they need somewhere to go for their practice.

      And that's all there is to it.

story:
We always conscience of germs around us.  We constantly clean our home.  The counters are clean, the toilet bowl is clean, and we even keep all rugs out of that room.  But we are missing one key area. 

According to research, diarrhea and skin infections causing 100 million bacteria, including Ecoli, Candida, Staphylococci, and Enterococci are found on a tooth brush!  

Especially, Enterococci normally live in intestine and excrement.  How come Enterococci breeds on toothbrush? 

Whenever we flush a toilet, the water vapor moves up to 18 feet and this bacteria can remain alive for up to 90 minutes.  Putting our toothbrush, razor blade, and even dental floss within reach of the bacteria.

Mom is also concerned about everything the baby touches always putting things in the mouth.  Small items like the pacifier, little toys, even the cell phone and remote control are prime candidates for germ contamination.

What we don’t know as that in the kitchen, after washing dishes, the dishtowels and scouring pads are prime bacteria breading grounds as well as the sink drain.  Up to 8 million bacteria can live on a scouring pad and 10 million bacteria can be hiding in the sink drain!

Now there is a safe solution for the removal of germs and bacteria!  Just as doctors and medical professionals sterilize their equipment, Collapsible Sterilizer will sterilize your items as well.

Using two AA batteries, Collapsible Sterilizer is easy to use sterilizing small items in home. It turns off automatically after three minutes.

Collapsible Sterilizer is the perfect solution for your peace of mind!


- Diameter X Collapsed height X Extended height: 5X4X8 inch
- Net weight: 5 oz


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=simlLn6MHiw

story: Hello. This is Mike Walrath speaking. Or "Ajarn"  for what it's worth. I am up against it.  My 90 year old Mamma had a stroke and I need to come up with the money for 24/7  care for her.  I spent my life giving to people mostly for free.  I provided some place to live at my Thai Boxing gym to many kids who would otherwise have been on the streets. For over 30 years I have tried to keep kids off of drugs and to help them become better citizens. My deal with a lot of them was "stay off meth or heroine and you can train for free for life"-- with little concern for money.  I tried to provide a true path of travel and opportunity through Muay Thai for all of my students.  I love my students, my family, and Muay Thai. Well now, for me, the chips are down. My Mamma had a stroke!  I am appealing to all you out there in Computer Land to help. I have made a habit of never asking for help. Well now I am calling in the favors and asking Everyone, even people I don't know, to help.  It's going o be on-going, and for how long:  I don't know.  We need thousands of dollars for round-the-clock help . Can you say the word Stress? So for this website, I need to have a monetary figure: $200 000, that ought to last a while.  Please help! Thank you.

story:
Hi I'm Tracy, Registered Nurse (BSN) since 2003, Bikram yoga teacher since 2008, surprise mom since 2011, professional wanderer since 2013. With your generosity, a Bikram yoga studio owner since 2016.

In 2013 I put my trust in Bikram yoga by leaving my profession as a full-time blood and marrow transplant nurse at Stanford Hospital to spend time with my then one and a half year old daughter; supporting us by teaching yoga full-time. After that sustained us for a full year, we again took a leap of faith and decided to travel, teach and assist with the Bikram Yoga Teacher Trainings in Thailand, volunteering as the staff nurse accompanied by ray of sunshine, Lady.

Have you met Lady? Ambassador of yoga and my right-hand man.

This campaign is a celebration of yoga, moms, travelers, and maybe finally finding a home. It's the new American dream.

We chose Cebu for this dream as it is where my parents were born and raised (but a place I am still learning about, being raised assimilation-style in the U.S). It has a burgeoning economy and yoga community. It is the gateway to some of the most beautiful places in the world. And we might possibly be able to afford it. With your help.

We will be using all of the proceeds of the campaign to physically build-out the space/home of the yoga studio - using your good intentions and dollars to create a basic space to begin, over time developing it's own character. Proceeds will cover costs related to building a yoga room, suspending heaters from the ceiling, adding mirrors on three walls. Other specifications will include male and female locker rooms with showers, and a reception area. It will be the first heated Bikram yoga studio on the island of Cebu, bringing an internationally recognized physical practice and tool for transformation to a community of people who will quickly recognize the benefits.

There are risks we foresee, there are risks we can not foresee. As I am pulling together sources for funding, the big question is always whether we will have enough. Of course. Other risks include those associated with opening a business in a country technically not of my origin. I am fortunate to have several close family members still living in Cebu, some who have become trusted advisors and friends in the last few years of our travels. My thirteen years as a registered nurse, pared with a previous degree in psychology, eight years teaching yoga and traveling the world with my young daughter has prepared me for this moment. Of realizing the story of building our yoga studio, creating a community centered around balance and well-being as well as providing a home for and raising my kid. Showing her that anything is possible.

As the staff nurse at the Thailand teacher trainings and several in Los Angeles prior to that, the overwhelming response I heard from hundreds of trainees is that this unique sequence of yoga postures, performed in the right conditions has physically and emotionally reversed conditions in their lives that were killing them. Straight up. Or lessened conditions that were limiting. Allowing you to be your best, getting closer to realizing what your purpose is, hitting your stride. Regardless of what you may find when you google Bikram Yoga, please know that the physical practice can be life-changing. And all you have to do is start with one class and see what happens.

I'll be adding more things to this page during the campaign - pictures, updates, what not. If you'd like to know a little more about me and who you'd be funding, I started a blog a few months ago which I'll be updating with posts as well. You may not agree with everything you read but it is hopefully at best an attempt at being open and genuine. http://randombrown.com. It's also the website link below.

Thank you for reading. Thank you for giving! If you can't give, I don't mind. I still love you, namaste. Please just spread it, live it, love it, visit.

story:
Skincare as a Wearable - A Clever Technology to Educate Your Skin!

You can achieve results in about 60 days!

non-staining, odorless formula. spray it inside your shapewear undergarments, workout clothing, business attire, pajamas, or your street clothes.


The participants are in the same position and the camera is positioned at the same distance in each photo (as indicated by markers).

HINT: the easiest way to see the decrease in fat...look at how much BLUE background day 56 versus day 0!

 


Results

Research shows decreased girth with the active ingredient in Workout Textile Spray. Best results are shown when combined with exercise.

  • Abdominal circumference was reduced between 2.8cm & 3.1cm in 28 days.
  • Thigh  circumference  was  reduced  between  2.1cm  &  2.9cm  in  56  days.
  • Upper arm circumference was reduced between 1.3cm & 2.4cm in 56 day


(hint: form-fitting clothing works best) 

     

Results Even Better if You Do Exercise!

Why Workout Textile Spray is Sprayed on Clothing Rather than Skin

The active ingredient is encapsulated in a novel delivery system specifically designed to adhere to fabric. This smart molecule has a positive electrical charge while our skin surface has an inherent negative electrical charge. This creates a flow of the molecules from the fabric into our skin for the duration of clothing wear. It would be a waste of product to apply it directly to skin because the delivery system is specifically engineered for textile time-release. The durability is around 3 washing cycles, although the strength does decrease with each wash.

Meet Jade L Brown, Creator of skinPT 


 

Biohack Your Workout!

Upon achieving our campaign goal of $20K, skinPT will launch Workout Textile Spray and you will be able to experience it for yourself...because

Being is Believing!

Funds will allow Jade the resources required for the raw ingredients, labels, containers, and formulation she needs to launch skinPT's Workout Textile Spray. There is a 6 week lead time for the raw ingredients to be shipped from Spain, so for your participation, we will happily send you your perk in August, or perhaps earlier if possible.

We invite you to be a part of this exciting opportunity to experience breakthrough results. Learn more about how to re-educate your skin:

  •  skinPT 
  •  Steadfast Physical Therapy 


Stretch Goals

skinPT has been well-received in Maui. Products are made on Maui in small batches in Jade's lab. If our campaign exceeds it's goal, here's what we envision:

  • Launching skinPT to a larger audience for Whole People in Healthy Bodies in Happy Skin all around our World!
  • Access of this and other breakout products through distribution channels such as Indiegogo InDemand, Amazon, Sephora, perhaps QVC...
  • skinPT formulation, manufacturing, filing & fulfillment in a sustainably run lab.
  • Continued R&D on additional skincare products worthy of your investment.

Much More To Come...

but for now, I ask for your help...because these days, we all need community love & support to accomplish our very best for each other.

Victory fist-bump ;)

story:
Hello everyone. We are the family of a wonderful woman who lived life to the fullest. Recently, she passed away and it has really impacted our family. Our mother worked as an optometrist for many years before switching into a career of being an in-home care nurse. She loved helping people with anything they needed and it is definitely a trait that that has been passed down to us children. Mom had quite a few friends and family who cared a lot about her and all came together recently in memory of her.

Our family has never been a family that had a lot of money but we have tried to look past that and live happily. Mom had quite a few health problems, from heart disease to diabetes, but it never slowed her down, not even after she had gotten part of her leg amputated. She was always so happy and determined to reach her goals, and even though she kept getting infections, she still put a smile on her face and lived happily. Because of mom's health problems, there were quite a lot of times that we didn't have much money to spare, this is one of those times.

Because our mother died, we have been given a bill for the funeral and it is a pretty hefty amount. We originally needed about $4500 but we were able to raise roughly $1600. The remaining amount is a lot and we are having troubles trying to come up with the amount. We also only have until about April 3 to come up with the remaining $3000. It would mean the absolute world to us if anyone could help. 

Even if you can't donate any money, it would mean the world if you could just get the word out there. We are keeping this campaign open until March 31st and hopefully we can get enough to finally put our mother at rest.

story:
Not Just Any Gym-in-a-Box:

S.T.R.O.N.G. isn’t a “gym”, it’s a mindset, and our mindset is in the name.  We’re not focusing on breaking PR’s, building glamour muscles, or asking “how much do you bench?”.…we are focused on helping create a healthier, functionally stronger, mindfully balanced version of you.  And we are taking a unique approach to make it happen.  What started as a group and personal fitness venture has now evolved into the ultimate goal of putting multiple wellness providers all under one roof such as Yoga, massage, self-defense, acupuncture, tai chi, nutrition, and other well-being services to ensure you reach the balance of “Strong Body ~ Strong Mind ~ Strong Spirit”.

You will see and hear the following from us more than once:  This is about community.  A strong and healthy community.  


It's a little long, but please keep reading and check out our video trailer to see what we mean…


This is in our blood…literally:

My name is Patrick McKewen, I have been involved in health and fitness my entire life.  I have been blessed with athletics that run through my bloodline, as a direct descendent of an Olympic gold medalist, I have played almost every sport and excelled naturally.  I hold a national certification and have 30 years of fitness, sports, and martial arts experience, including working as a Fitness Trainer at a health club in the Northeast, teaching martial arts and self-defense programs, coaching youth sports, and running a group fitness program locally in Atlanta.  

I have witnessed first-hand the benefits of living a healthy lifestyle.  I had my own journey with amazing results, and recently decided to share my passion and experience as a way of life by creating S.T.R.O.N.G.  My students and clients have their own amazing results, from being able to stop taking blood pressure medications, to successfully defending themselves when in danger, to lowering their body fat percentage, to reducing their stress levels and living a more balanced way of life, and so many more success stories!

S.T.R.O.N.G. started way before I ever thought of running a health and fitness business.  Like I said, it’s a mindset; and for a deeper look at the mindset, check out our “doctrine”.  It’s an excerpt from a blog post I wrote several years ago:  www.strongfitnessgroup.com/about-us/the-doctrine


The Big Picture – A Little Help FOR Our Friends:

It hasn’t all been sexy-James Bond-jetsetting-around the world adventures for Patrick.  He knows what tough times are like after losing a corporate job and trying to stay healthy while figuring out his next step.  If our Indiegogo campaign ($16,700) is fully funded, S.T.R.O.N.G. Health & Fitness Group will be able to truly help support healthy lifestyles in our community. Our biggest commitment lies in giving the resources and knowledge we have to sponsor two families, every 6 months, that otherwise couldn't pay for wellness services, and provide them with nutrition counseling and Group access three times a week....giving them the tools they need to stay healthy and support a better lifestyle for them and their children while they get back on track at no cost!  If you know of someone who is trying to get back on track and stay healthy, but can't because of financial circumstances, please let us know at contact@strongfitnessgroup.com.

Next, because we will have multiple providers in the same facility, we can keep our pricing options competitive and lower than anyone else around, not to mention the convenience of having so many amazing wellness professionals all in one location instead of spread across the community!

Lastly, we don't just work here in the community, we live here.  Our kids go to school here.  We volunteer at local county community organizations and the public school system as a mentor for children in need.  You'll see some charity fundraising initiatives outlined below, but deeper than that, we support other small, locally-owned businesses and even collaborate with other fitness providers.  We all have the same mission of making our local community better....making it "stronger".  See where the mindset supports our name?  


What we want to provide:

We want to create a wellness community FOR our community, all under one roof.  Multiple providers will be part of the S.T.R.O.N.G. family, such as Yoga, massage, acupuncture, nutrition, and more!  Because of our background, we have some very specific fitness programs.  It seems random and diverse, but here’s what those programs are all about:

* Cause-Related Fundraisers – Like we said, this is about community, and this program is listed first even though we don’t make a penny on these events.  There are some causes near and dear to us, 6 to be exact, so we are going to support them whole-heartedly.  We plan to hold special events throughout the year that are themed to support the following: National Fallen Firefighters Foundation, National Law Enforcement Officers Memorial Fund, Make-A-Wish Georgia, Girls on the Run, Breast Cancer Awareness, and Lone Survivor Foundation.  We mean it, 100% of all proceeds from these charity events will be donated directly to each respective organization.  We are open to supporting more worthy causes in the future, but this is our starting point.

* Concierge Personal Training Services - 1:1 clients or small group training at home or work in the Atlanta area! 

* Group Fitness Boot Camp - Led by a positive and challenging coach, and filled with other like-minded participants who are supportive and fun!

* “I Now Pronounce You S.T.R.O.N.G.” – Customized for the bride/groom-to-be, and even the wedding party, to look and feel great during their wedding (and honeymoon!).

* Tactical Fitness / PFT Prep – For aspiring and current LEO’s, firefighters, and other tactical professionals who want to be in peak physical condition and ready for whatever rigors the job throws at them.

* Self-Defense – Customized specific to your needs, including women’s topics, anti-bullying for school children, and law enforcement officer safety.  


The Building Blocks:

100% of your donations will go toward the building occupancy and the essential equipment and resources needed to launch these programs in the community.  The math adds up to $16,700.00 for the following:

o  The Roof – this is the big one; it all hinges on building space for the Group.  We have a few options for space identified along the Route 400 corridor, and time is of the essence so we don’t miss out and secure it to begin our programs!

o  The Stuff – Kettlebells, Power Clubs, Sandbags, Battle Ropes, Medicine/Wall Balls, Resistance / Assistance Bands, Suspension Trainer Systems (such as TRX), ViPR, Plyometric Boxes, Balance Trainers (such as BOSU), Flooring, Conditioning Aids: Cones / Ladders / Hurdles / Parachutes / Slingshots, miscellaneous furniture and any necessary buildout/space modifications.

o  Human Billboards – The first round of branded apparel for brand ambassadors to wear and spread the word about us.


You Are the Critical Pieces of the Puzzle:

Not to beat a dead horse or anything, but this is about our community, which is exactly why we need your help as a startup!   You can be a part of something really big here – to help stand up a company that wants to do the right thing, that wants to share a passion for health and wellness, and that wants to improve the lives of everyone we connect with.  You can be the voice to our future partners, showing that we have a support and client base to launch a unique health and wellness concept!  We have some indoor space options identified that will fit our needs, and we don’t want to miss out on this amazing opportunity!!!

Our rewards for your help will prove how much we appreciate you!  From invites to our grand opening party, to some branded gear to look great in, to creating and naming a custom workout routine to challenge our members, to even more…. we will have lots of ways you can support a great cause and get some fun perks in return.  Check out all of the incentive package options to the right and choose one that makes you smile!


Other Ways You Can Help...

Don't have the funds to support the campaign?  You can still help!  Share our story with your friends and family through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Vine, email, text…carrier pigeon…..smoke signal…..secret decoder ring message……whatever!



Get to Know S.T.R.O.N.G. a Little Better: 

Follow us on Facebook (facebook.com/STRONGHealthandFitness) or Instagram (@strong_healthandfitness).

story:
By means of an update, our community has raised $4900 for Mrs. V.  The cost of the funeral alone was approximately $18,000.   Fortunately mom's workplace contributed $6,000 towards this expense.  Simple math leaves her short $7,100. If you have contributed we thank you in advance, if you haven't please reconsider.

We, our school community, write to ask you to support our goal of raising funds for a young adult in need. Ms. V has been a fabric of our community for the past two years.  In that time, she has left an indelible imprint on students, staff and parents alike.  It is our time to now step up and support Ms. V with this most worthy initiative.  

By way of background, we share with you her very heartbreaking story.  Ms. V was faced with growing up quicker than one should when her dad passed away a few years ago.  Together with mom the two forged ahead the best they could.  Suddenly mom feel victim to this most devastating disease and in a few short weeks succumbed to her illness.  This leaves Ms. V parentless and alone in Canada, no siblings,  no relatives, no family - her parents immigrated to Canada by way of Poland. 

Some points to consider:

  • She is an only child and a mere 24 years old, 
  • She has lost both her parents to cancer. 
  • Left with no family.  
  • Currently working two jobs to keep up with bills.
  • Certified Ontario Teacher unable to secure permanent teaching position, currently working as an Occasional Educational Assitant.
  • Funds secured will go towards paying off funeral costs, university expenses, everyday household expenses, food and clothing.
  • We gathered as a school community to raise in excess of $1,000 in 24 hours.   Thank you in advance for your support!

story:
OUR OBJECTIVE
Save a life by funding the surgery for a Syrian child affected by congenital heart disease. Donate now to support Syrian kids! Help us by sharing this campaign with Indiegogo share and on Facebook. Thank you!

The amount raised will support one surgery in a mission to Jordan that will be held in January by Dr. Giancarlo Crupi, a pediatric cardiac surgeon with 35+ years of experience. The funds will cover the rental of medical facilities (e.g., hospital bed) and purchase of medical equipment (e.g., drugs) in Istiklal hospital in Amman (Jordan) and allow Dr. Crupi  to perform life-saving surgery on one of the many young refugees in the camps in between Jordan and Syria. Often victims of devastating wars, these children find themselves living in poverty, away from their families and home country, and in desperate need of heart surgery to which they are not entitled to due to their lack of social security coverage.


THE ASSOCIATION

Healing a Child’s Heart (HCH) is a non-profit organization that aims to provide free surgery to indigent children in the Middle East born with a congenital heart disease. We target our efforts on Syrian kids living in the refugee camps in northern Jordan. 

Our long-term goal is to develop a program of international cooperation, the “Middle East Children Heart Project”, in conjunction with two other non-profit organizations: New York-based Gift of life Inc. and Amman-based Palestine for Medical Coverage.To date, our operations have taken place in Amman (Jordan), where we have healed the hearts of 31 indigent children from Jordan, Syria, Iraq and Palestine. 

Our initiative builds upon the 35+ years of surgical experience of Giancarlo Crupi, who received several national and international awards for his achievements in the field of international cooperation for pediatric cardiac surgery.

THE ASSOCIATION 
Healing a Child’s Heart (HCH) is a non-profit organization that aims to provide free surgery to indigent children in the Middle East born with a congenital heart disease. We target our efforts on Syrian kids living in the refugee camps in northern Jordan. Our long-term goal is to develop a program of international cooperation, the “Middle East Children Heart Project”, in conjunction with two other non-profit organizations: New York-based Gift of life Inc. and Amman-based Palestine for Medical Coverage.To date, our operations have taken place in Amman (Jordan), where we have healed the hearts of 31 indigent children from Jordan, Syria, Iraq and Palestine. Our initiative builds upon the 35+ years of surgical experience of Giancarlo Crupi, who received several national and international awards for his achievements in the field of international cooperation for pediatric cardiac surgery.

story:
What Is Med-eSmart?

Med-eSmart is the first virtual Doctor mobile application for children in Sub-Sahara.  We provide affordable Doctors’ consultations for children from low income households in rural and marginalized urban settlements in Southern Africa. Med-eSmart offers:


We are Med-eSmart: ‘A Doctor For Every Child™.  At last, a family doctor without the high cost usually associated with quality medical care. 


Med-eSmart was created by social entrepreneurs and medical personnel to bring low – cost medical care to children in Sub-Saharan Africa.  Extensive research with doctors, caregivers, parents and relevant government departments in Zimbabwe, South Africa and Mozambique has shown us that the average healthcare cost is too high for most parents.  


The Med-eSmart Difference

Med-eSmart is convenient and inexpensive. We team up with a network of practitioners to offer virtual doctors’ visits and efficient referrals. Targeting under-served settlements such as rural communities and informal urban settlements (townships) means low to middle – income families have an opportunity to guarantee the good health of their children. 

Med-eSmart makes child healthcare more accessible. Here’s how:


Through the Med-eSmart app, Rutendo’s mom can simply send text or pictures of baby’s rash to a doctor and receive instant advice or have an appointment scheduled. 


Vimbai can talk to a doctor in, real time, on Med-eSmart, about her son’s diarrhea in the comfort of her home in Gonzoni village. 


Novhuyo’s grandmother walks 10km to get to the nearest clinic. She then has to wait in a lengthy queue for hours. That’s all going to change with Med-eSmart’s intuitive referrals and booking system. 


What started as a common cold for Mpho went untreated and in a week had developed into  pneumonia. Med-eSmart will provide a complimentary shuttle service to make sure Mpho always sees a doctor when she needs to.


Mai Netsai lost baby’s clinic booklet and so couldn’t see the doctor. Med-eSmart’s secure cloud servers will ensure that all patient documents are safe, confidential and accessible on demand. 


Thanks to Med-eSmart uncle Itai can get a notification on his phone whenever his neice, Taku is not doing so well.


With Med-eSmart parents can get prescriptions and manage their children’s dosages easily on the go or at home. 


With Med-eSmart, Chenai can easily find encouragement from other mothers when her little one is ill. Her doctor is also on standby to answer any questions she may have.

In short, Med-eSmart is a complete solution to all pediatric needs. 


Med-eSmart Upclose



Applicability Of Med-eSmart

The Med-eSmart platform is not just a different way to schedule a doctor’s appointment. It provides a one – stop shop medicare solution that can have a positive impact on the region in various situations:

The situations in which one can use Med-eSmart to assure good health are unlimited. Wherever you can take your phone, your doctor will be there. 


How Do You Use Med-eSmart?

The user downloads the app, creates a profile and can choose from various subscriptions. The member gets access to the vast Med-eSmart network of pediatricians and physicians. When child in the family develops a problem, the user has the option to request a virtual consultation or send a detailed description of the symptoms. 

A doctor on call will respond to the query within 30 minutes or less. The attending doctor can decide to give advice, diagnose or refer the case as he / she deems necessary.  An ePrescription can also be given in conjunction with the diagnosis. 

If the patient is in need of emergency care or physical appointment, an alert is directed to the nearest Med-eRide shuttle which will be on hand to take the patient to the nearest doctor. 




When To Use Med-eSmart

Med-eSmart is particularly suitable for conditions such as, but not limited to:

-  Bladder infection

-  Cute bronchitis

-  Cough

-  Sinusitis

-  Acute pharyngitis

-  Acute cystitis

-  Urinary tract infection

-  Abdominal pain

-  Diarrhoea

-  Rash

-  Sinus problems

-  Fever

-  Acute conjunctivitis

-  Painful urination

-  Influenza

-  Respiratory infection

-  Migraine / headache

-  Strep throat


Med-eSmart is not ideal for:

-  Health exams / tests / scans

-  Complex or emergency conditions

-  Chronic illnesses

-  Injuries / sprains requiring dressing and / or bandaging


All patients have to be accompanied by the relevant parent, guardian or caregiver registered on the system. Med-eSmart’s is compatible with Windows, iOS and Android. 


Why Use Med-eSmart?

Most Sub – Saharan countries have two main health services providers, the public and private sectors.  Generally private hospitals offer better care, access to drugs and doctors compared to public facilities. Most private health access is made possible through medical aid schemes. 

These are often too expensive for the average household. As an example, South Africa, one of the most powerful economies in Africa, in 2015 only had 27.7% of total households covered by medical aid. The situation is worse in countries like Zimbabwe where the medical aid industry has almost totally collapsed.


Who Will Use Med-eSmart?

The past decade has seen a remarkable growth in mobile use and internet connectivity for people in Southern Africa. Let’s look at some fast facts:


Join Us Now And Make Med-eSmart A Reality

Please be part of the movement and support our campaign to make ‘A Doctor For Every Child’ possible. Our goal is to ensure the good health and happiness of as many children as possible. The method and design to make it happen is there, but we can’t do it without your help. 


''There can be no keener revelation of a society's soul than the way in which it treats its children.''

- Nelson Mandela - 



Budget Allocation



To successfully launch the pilot, Med- eSmart will incur the following expenses:

1.  Setting up premises                                                                       $2,000.00

-  Lease deposit and advance rent

-  Fittings and furniture

-  Utilities

-  Stationery and office supplies

2.  Assets and Equipment                                                                  $8,000.00

-  Office equipment

-  Med-eRide Shuttle

-  Telecommunications equipment

-  Computers and software

3.  Starting Operations                                                                      $14,500.00

-  Advertising and promotion

-  Mobile Application Development

-  Fibre Optic Internet Installation

-  Purchase of cloud server storage

-  Purchase of server operating system 

-  Website Design & Branding

-  Working Capital

4.  Subscription Services                                                                         $500.00

-  Commercial insurance and liability underwriting

-  Network Security and Monitoring Tools

-  Fibre Optic Internet Rental

-  Secure cloud storage service


Operational Team

The Med-eSmart team has 6 operational members. These individuals, combined, have 40 years of professional experience; 13 years in enterprise and marketing, 9 years in finance and accounting, 10 years in project management and 8 in Monitoring and Evaluation. 

Med-eSmart collaborates with a network of specialists in areas such as Pediatrics, Obstetrics & Gynaecology, Allergy & Immunology and Family Medicine which is in turn supported by an outsourced IT framework. 



Contact

For further information and enquiries, please contact info@dzimbahwe.co.za

story:
Hello my name is Jesse, I'm a 33-year-old male and an outside the box thinker with a passion for business. At the age of 17 I took the rite of passage from boyhood to manhood when I started shaving. About a week later I discovered how negatively ingrown hair could impact a person. Razor bumps and irritation literally hi-jacked my life, making me self-conscious and depressed, it was difficult looking into the bathroom mirror.



At age 25, my dermatologist explained in layman terms exactly what caused
the bumps and irritation.

He said "Imagine a bee stinger, when it enters your skin, it causes swelling, pain and irritation. The stinger is a foreign body and the above mentioned affects are the result of it. Once the stinger is removed the body begins the healing process and reverses the effects of the bee sting. your body reacts the same way to ingrown hair, if you free the hair from the skin the bumps and irritation will go away."

That is exactly how BumpBan works. You gently rub it on any area you shave or  wax, allowing  it to gently free ingrown hair, eliminating the bumps and irritation they can cause.

*BumpBan does not replace shaving or waxing, it's designed to work after the hair has been removed.

We've worked tirelessly on this, now after 3 years of development and another 3 more years of being tested and perfected BumpBan is market ready.



· U.S. patent pending, manufacturing process complete 25,000 units per month capability, fully packaged and already selling online through various outlets.

· Over 3,000 units successfully sold

· 5,000 pieces of inventory

All of these expenses came out of pocket, now I need your help to create our
As Seen On TV infomercial being offered by Kevin Harrington's marketing firm, Kevin was an original shark on Shark Tank the TV series.

Next to being a good father and husband, launching this is the most important thing in this world to me. I've dedicated everything in getting BumpBan to this stage. I can't express how monumental this would be for a national marketing to be realized. Allowing others to get the relief and satisfaction of having their confidence restored, as 1000's already have.


What We Need & What You Get

All of the funding we secure will be utilized for marketing and expansion beyond the 5,000 units currently in stock.

$19,900 will be used as follows:

(1) 30 second infomercial (1) 60 second Infomercial

Both infomercial spots will air a total of 202 times on top national cable networks specifically selected to match our customers' demographic and geographic profile.

The :30 second spot airs 1x nationally and 150x regionally and the :60 second spot airs 1x nationally and 50x regionally.


DRTV Campaign Deliverables

    • Professional script-writing, HD-high definition camerawork production, & post production/editing of both a :30 and :60 (DRTV) Direct Response Television Spot for the product.
    • The :60 spot includes celebrity ‘King of the Infomercial’ Kevin Harrington introducing the product.
    • Ownership and Licensing Rights of both infomercials
    • Broadcast Distribution of both spots, nationally and regionally on targeted networks and in targeted markets we choose.
    • Your :60 DRTV spot is featured on Kevin Harrington's E-Commerce website www.AsSeenOnTV.pro for twelve (12) months.
    • Integrated Social Media exposure promoting your product/service via press releases, Facebook, Linked In, Pinterest, and Twitter.

$5,000 will be used to secure approximately 5,000 additional units of inventory.

*Any additional funding received will go toward building more inventory.



Everyone has heard of Apple visionary Steve Jobs. He knew his products’ had the potential to change the way we interacted with technology. He also knew his limitations when it came to marketing, which is why he left that to people who were as visionary in that field as he was in his. I agree with this philosophy 100%.

We have tried in every way possible to minimize the risk of this campaign.
We are putting the campaign in the hands of marketing gurus with a track record of successfully launching products to the world.


*If we are unable to reach our total goal EVERY DOLLAR raised will still go towards the marketing and promotion of BumpBan. We will also keep everyone updated on progress, from start to finish!

Thank you,

Jesse

story:
WE NEED FOOD!!!!

In South Africa there is a shortage of food, yes we do produce a lot of food but not all are so lucky to get a good salary to buy fruit, nuts and other "normal" food.

We found a while back a few TED movies (Ron Finley, Stephen Ritz, Pam Warhurst) about using the government land (the section of land between your house and the road) to plant food for the community, and this is what this campaign is all about.

Currently the government plant shade trees not FOOD trees. (What is in front of your yard and next to your roads?)

Here, there are many people that would benefit from additional nutrition. Not only the poor but also others that temporarily is without an income. Imagine if you could walk down your road and pick a few FOOD items... for FREE. Maybe a nut here and a peach there.

As this is also World Food month, I would like to ask you to assist us in planting a few FOOD trees.

Just to show you we are serious about this, we have cut down the old "useless" shade trees and planted 2 Pecan nut and 1 Macadamia nut trees in their place. See Campaign Photos.

We would love to plant hundreds of trees but for now, we ask for 5 trees, let's see though, if we could make it 100 or what about 1,000?

Thank you ever so much!

story:
BLOCKER BUDDY

Hi, I'm Angela to together with my son Lucas and husband Tobias we developed this hands free tablet holder with EMF & Radiation shield to protect against possible side effects of long term use of RF (radiation) emitting electronics.


Tablet or mobile device set on their lap. What can this radiation do to a child? Radiation and EMF exposure can lead to fatigue, dizziness, sleep disturbance, DNA damage, impaired nervous system activity, low sperm count and infertility (remember, where does a laptop or tablet sit when on the lap?!), impaired motor skills in children, memory loss, and cancer.
Blocker Buddy shields the body!

It would be so amazing to have enough backers and support to grow our business. And to raise awareness of this issue.

We will be manufacturing Blocker Buddy in America.

Want one? Check out are backer rewards.

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • We need 15000 dollars to get our business running. If we don't raise all the money we will still manufacture in America, we will just start smaller.  The money will be going to the manufacturing, storage and set up. Manufacturing in America cost more but we want to support our country.
  • With your support you will have the option to have a blocker Buddy of your own. Check out our backer rewards.
  • If we don't reach our goal we will still be manufacturing just in smaller amounts. We believe in our product and will continue on one way or another. It will take longer.

The Impact

Your contribution will make a huge difference on how fast we can get our product to the hands of the consumer. We developed Blocker Buddy as a family, we will continue to come out with new and exciting products with quality materials.  And American manufacturing.

Gann Memorials Custom Plush Toys http://www.gannmemorials.com/Welcome-to-Gann-Me...

  • Our project is valuable to you the contributor and to the world by raising awareness of RF (radiation)  and Emf exposure. And offering a product to reduce EMF exposure. 
  • There is lots of information on RF( Radiation) the internet of the dangers of EMF from the scientific community.  And we do not yet fully know the effects.
  • Inside the shield pad has a high quality Conductive Fabric Excellent EMF radiowave shielding & RFID protection

Risks & Challenges

We have had some challenges financially. Every step of the way has had expenses.  We have also had challenges with manufacturing. We wanted to make sure production was done in America.

Thank you Gann Memorials Custom Plush Toys.

  • We believe in our product and we are determined,
  • We have had some help from family so that we can get Blocker Buddy to you.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about Blocker Buddy campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

We are excited to be featured on BackerClub.co this week!
They are the top community for people who are very serious about crowdfunding sites and we are really looking forward to the feedback and support from their community of super-backers!
