story:
The Mind Fitness  program is a twelve-week technical and emotional journey of self-realization, self-love and self-leadership. It guides the user to free, educate and train the mind trough 84 daily steps rich of new knowledge and groundbreaking mind's tools, sound hypno-meditations, daily exercises, and evening recaps. The program can be owned in the form of a beautiful large, high-resolution illustration book, or digitally within a compelling interactive eBook.

 

"Hello,

My name is Luka Pecel, and I am the co-author of Mind Fitness.

My battle with alcohol and depression was a long, demoralizing, and futile fight that by age 44 had left me for dead. I had been diagnosed with cirrhosis of the liver, had been deemed a lost cause by friends and family, I was arrested several times for DUI's, and had been to countless hospitals and rehabilitation centers. Feeling hopeless and alone, I was finalizing my plan of escape from the world. By the Grace of God, I found Luca Bosurgi. What happened next changed my life forever, and I promise it will change yours too.           

I had been through a decade of traditional cognitive therapy with virtually no results. Looking for answers, I traveled and searched, assiduously investigating every self-help movement that was available. Time and time again, I found myself back in an even deeper depression, with a bottle at my bedside. It wasn’t until Luca explained to me his groundbreaking discovery of AED (adult emotional dependency) that I understood for the first time what my problem had been all these years. It was like the weight of the world had been lifted off me. There is so much more to say about my many amazing discoveries, life-changing lessons and eye opening experiences-- but I must leave them for the book! My role is to add color, commentary, structure, and my own personal journey to the THE MIND FITNESS BOOK.

 Luca Bosurgi’s twenty five years of experience and training, prodigious faith, and revolutionary breakthroughs in psychology of the mind are going to help change the world for generations to come, as they have done for me.  I was lucky enough to get this help. Many are not. Helping co-author this book is both my honor and my mission. I have to help give back what was so abundantly given to me. I truly believe that Luca is on the cutting edge of solving depression and addiction once and for all. This is something the world needs right now, and with God's blessing, we are going to do everything in our power to help spread this technology." -Luka

Luka Pecel has written and collaborated with celebrities like Michael Bolton, Teri Hatcher, Sasha Alexander, and David Carradine just to name a few. He co-founded Dreamline Entertainment in Beverly Hills, CA in the late 90's and in the early 2000’s was founder of One Eleven Films in Los Angeles. He is also an award-winning director who was nominated for the prestigious 'Golden Bear' award at The Berlin Film Festival. He has written and directed feature films, commercials and music videos.

"I once told Luka Pecel he was like a Bukowski. I meant his writing ability, not to copy his lifestyle. Unfortunately, he took it literally. I am so pleased that he has gotten his life together and I'm expecting something great. I am more than impressed by the turnaround I have witnessed because of this program” - Matt Ochacher - Partner/Head of Literary Department New Wave Entertainment

"I have met so many talented, good people suffering from addiction issues, Luka was one of them. His struggle has taken him years and to see him have light again, to be himself, authentically, is truly a miracle. Luka has so much to give the world, I cant wait to see what comes out."  - Sasha Alexander - Former star of NCIS / Rizzoli and Isles

 

The program is offered in print and digital version.

  1. A beautiful large format 260-280 page book, rich in high-resolution illustrations and images. Similar to a journal, the book will journey the reader trough the daily programs. Each day will offer new knowledge and groundbreaking mind tools, a sound meditation, daily exercises, reflections and evening recaps in the form of multi-choice questions. We chose this simple and easy to use format, because it allows a progressive and almost effortless acquisition of Luca's more efficient and natural behavioral models and mind tools. 84 daily meditations of about ten minutes each, will be downloadable from the Mind Fitness Club website.
     
  2. A compelling and user-friendly eBook will reproduce the daily look and functionality of the paper version, including a variety of interactive digital features, reminders and tips.
     
  3. The Mind Fitness Club website will compliment both platforms with features, resources, webinars, conversations with experts in the mind field, forums, Q&As, and will offer a variety of membership services. The aim is to establish the Mind Fitness Club as the hub for the 'Mind education and training' oriented community.

Here is the list of the exclusive goodies that you can purchase with our perks:

  1. The Mind Fitness Book - A4 Full Colors, 260-280 pages, High Resolution Illustrations and Images. Each copy includes a download key for the 84 Guided Deep Meditations (about 840 minutes of daily meditations).


     
  2. Authors Signature or Personal Dedication in your Mind Fitness Book.
     
  3. The Mind Fitness interactive eBook.


     
  4. 80 Sound Meditations (800 minutes in total) included with the Book and eBook.


     
  5.  Certificate of Completion - granted after completion of the program.
     
  6. The Mind Fitness T-shirt


     
  7. Parchment Certificate (Backer, Sponsor or Donor - Silver, Gold or Platinum). 
     
  8. Your name listed  in the Hall of Fame in Mind Fitness Club website. (Backer, Sponsor or Donor - Silver, Gold or Platinum). 
     
  9. Your name listed in the Hall of Fame in the 1st Book Edition (Backer, Sponsor or Donor - Silver, Gold or Platinum). 
     
  10. Mind Fitness Club membership - exclusive resources online, webinars, etc.
     
  11. Mind Fitness Club VIP membership - invite to exclusive events, gathering, conferences, etc.
     

Sponsorship options in the Mind Fitness Book 1st edition.

  1. One page.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 1 page.
     
  2. Three pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 1 day of the program.
     
  3. Nine pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 3 days of the program.
     
  4. Fifteen pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 5 days of the  program.
     
  5. Twenty one pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 7 days of the program. 
     
  6. Thirty pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 10 days of the program. 
     
  7. Forty Two pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 14 days of the program. 
     
  8. One Weekly section.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of one of the 12 weekly sections (4 pages) of the program. 
     
  9. Two Weekly sections.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of two of the 12 weekly sections (8 pages in total) of the program. 

    * Fonts, size and position TBD


The Mind Fitness program derives from the Bosurgi Method® - Luca Bosurgi's 12 steps healing modality. The method developed with 25 years of clinical researches and successfully tested with over 5,000 people is a proprietary program of life and mind coaching combined with CognitiveOS Hypnosis®. The process helps to educate, clear and optimize the mind, removing unnecessary emotional blockages. This is obtained by establishing the natural self-reliance, resetting obsolete emotional imbalances, and improving the management of thoughts and feelings. The process consequently clears the associated mental struggles and byproducts, ie. anxiety, fear, low self-confidence, depression, alcohol and drug abuse, procrastination, etc. Most importantly it frees misused brainpower, which can be reinvested into confidence, high performance and happiness.

The peaceful mind’s environment attained by the method discontinues the unnecessary releases of Adrenaline, Cortisol and Norepinephrine, which are the powerful hormones used by the brain to respond to danger in the "fight, freeze or flight" process. This frees the body from the intoxication and the muscular tensions produced by the chemicals, allowing noticeable physical improvements. Luca's clients have reported reduction of muscular and back pain, headache and gastrointestinal conditions – improved sleep and stamina, and substantial enhancements in physical health, complexion and attractiveness.

The Mind Fitness program is complementary and enhances most reputable therapeutic modalities. The emotional freedom granted by the program greatly amplifies previous therapeutic and self-help work done, and offers optimal mind’s settings for present and future self-development goals.

1st week: Discover your mind – The first week of this program will help you to discover your mind, what it does, how it works, and will help you to build a more formal connection with your intelligence.

2nd week: Re-parenting – the second week outlines and enforces your adoption of your own mind and body. This secures to your life equipment a new mother/father, you! 

3rd week: Self-love – your mind needs love to be balanced and operate efficiently. This is a vital physical energy that your mind is meant to receive from you. If you don't fulfilled this need, your mind will starve, and will try to grab love from partners, friends or colleagues.

4th week: Self-protection – your mind needs your protection or will experience constant anxiety and fear, trying to get safety from people, religious organizations, teams and groups etc.

5th week: Self-Leadership – your mind needs your leadership, without it will work on autopilot trying to be led by the external world.

6th week: Emotional Independence – now you are ready to formalize your self-reliance, transforming dependency to inter-dependency.

7th week: Building emotional self-reliance – this week is dedicated to build a master behavior of self-reliance that will be applied to different aspects of your everyday life.

8th week: Reset your survival system – clear unchartered anxiety and fear.

9th week: Removing self-judgment – reset and capitalize the past as fuel for the future removing shame, guilt and regret from past experiences.

10th week: Removing resentment and blame – reset and capitalize the past as fuel for the future removing blame, resentment, anger and pain.

11th week: Clear daily stress – shifting thoughts from needs to choices.

12th week: Manage thoughts, feeling and emotions.

The proceed of the raised funds will be invested in the production and marketing of the 'Mind Fitness Book' and the interactive eBook, and to build and establish the Mind Fitness website. Your generous contribution will help to accelerate the production and to create awareness throughout the US territory. The more funds we raise, the faster we can bring this solution to the people in need!   

Luca Bosurgi was born in Rome, Italy, to an Italian Aristocratic family descendants of the Marquis Bosurgi with a 1,200 history rich in art, engineering and enterprise. In the early 1890, Luca’s grandfather invented concentrated orange juice, establishing himself as one of the first Italian Industrialists.

Luca’s history is an eclectic mix of experiences that meshes perfectly with his passion to increase human happiness and self-reliance. At an early age, Luca began receiving extensive spiritual teachings from a channeled holy master. By the time he was becoming an adult, Luca had acquired groundbreaking knowledge about the meaning of life, the spirit-mind hierarchy, the mechanics of the mind and how it relates to mankind’s journey of spiritual evolution.

Luca studied Business & Law at the University Bocconi in Milan. At 23, he was called on to rescue his family company, Sanderson & Sons in Messina, Sicily. In three years, Luca saved 1,500 jobs and secured the continued production of approximately 25,000 citrus farmers. This experience launched Luca into his first career, investment banking. At 28, Luca established his investment portfolio in Luxemburg with offices in London and New York. His company focused on portfolio management, VC investments and M&A.

In the 2005, after more than two decades of sharing his life between his healing mission and the world of banking, he sold his business and moved to Los Angeles to establish his Bosurgi Method® School and Los Angeles practice. This began Luca’s 12-year-long journey towards perfecting the first three phases of the Bosurgi Method, and has allowed him to enhance and refine his method–improving his success rate from the initial 65% to more than 95% in the last four years. Today, thousands of people have experienced the Bosurgi Method, not only with Luca, but also with the approximately 20 mind healers that he has trained.

In 2014, Luca identified Virtual Reality as an effective channel to bring the Bosurgi Method® to the general public. This motivated him to build a team and, based on the Bosurgi Method, develop a Virtual Reality Mind Training solution. The efficacy of using VR as a delivery mechanism for the Bosurgi Method® was tested and proven out in beta testing, showing results that equaled those he obtained in his practice – exceeding 95%.

In 2015, following his vision to create a higher performing, emotionally independent and happy world, Luca founded Mind Fitness Lab, a portfolio company established to invest, develop and distribute disruptive mind solutions. Currently, the Bosurgi Method® VR ( the Virtual Reality version of the method) is licensed, packaged and distributed as a VR experience through  Mind Fitness Lab – recognized on the 2016 TransTech 200 list of key technologies driving mental and emotional well-being forward.

Additionally, Luca is a Medicine Man (Shaman) according to Native American traditions, known by his spiritual name Red Cougar Mountain Spirit. He is also highly trained in ancient combat and martial arts (black belt in judo and karate), and initiated in Western and Easter mind-body disciplines.

Luca consistently seeks effective ways to impart greater balance and healing to those in need. He discovered the power of Clinical Hypnosis in the early 1990’s in London. He was individually trained by Michael Joseph, Founder and President of the British Society of Clinical Hypnosis and publisher of the European Journal of Clinical Hypnosis. Clinical Hypnosis, combined with his comprehensive knowledge of computer and digital science, metaphysics, psychology and ancient mind/spirit healing techniques, became the foundation of Luca’s new form of psychotherapy, the Bosurgi Method®. Luca lives with his wife and three children in Santa Monica, California.

"I've never met anyone who can so effectively give someone the tools to live their life with confidence quite like Luca.  Without his help I would not have the success I have today, which stems solely from an ability to live myself and be confident in all aspects of my life - things that Luca enabled me to do. I am so grateful for his help and his ongoing friendship" -John

Runa is an Icelandic CEO/entrepreneur, speaker, author, and Conscious Leadership facilitator influencing and advising startup founders/entrepreneurs, C-suite executives, investors, and other business leaders to live and lead from a whole-person perspective. She is on the vanguard of the new business paradigm thinking, the creation of vibrant workplaces, and growing the extraordinary leaders. Runa sits on a number of advisory boards, and is a contributing author at the People Development Magazine. In addition to the companies Runa founded in Reykjavik, she co-founded the Conscious Leader Network, the Conscious Capitalism LA Chapter, and the TOGETHER! Network -- all social impact platforms.

"Luca is an exceptionally talented and experienced life-coach who helps people who have exhausted all other meant to heal and live anxiety free lives. He guides people to take charge of their lives through their mind-mastery and self-leadership. Clients come from Luca with expanded mindset and perception, and heightened sense of who they truly are. He masterfully helps people to live and lead healthy, productive, and fulfilling lives." - Runa

"My experience with the Bosurgi Method" -Blane

 

"I’m a firm believer of the Bosurgi Method. Luca has helped me and all my family to embrace efficiency and happiness in our life. I’ve been supporting Luca’s Virtual Reality venture, The Mind Fitness Lab financially and personally as CFO from the 2014 and I’m excited to be part of this new development of his groundbreaking program. His discoveries about the mind, combine with his proven method, offered in a form that everyone can use, will certainly help many to remove alcohol and drug addictions, anxiety and depression and embrace a powerful and happy life. "

Ivan Klarich is a corporate strategist with a unique ability to quickly convert strategic thinking into tactical plans that can be efficiently implemented. Having a keen eye for potential points-of- failure and the ability to quickly discern what NOT to do, Ivan has frequently held the CEO or President title in a career spanning over 25 years of business leadership and investment management. He is a highly sought-after strategic consultant to CEOs and their boards and teams.

"Mind fitness is the process of preparing, exercising and maintaining your mind to be in the perfect performance state for the life you chose to lead.  Like with physical fitness, if your body is not in the proper shape it has the potential of holding you back from achieving your goals.  The mind is the same in this respect.  Weather bogged down with past learned behaviors and habits, easily distracted due to your personality type, or any of many reasons your mind could be creating unwanted challenges, a properly designed Mind Fitness program will transition your mind from your biggest challenge to your biggest supporter." -Ivan

Suzy Miller is a visionary speaker, author, telepathic communicator, multidimensional seer and founder of the groundbreaking Awesomism Practitioner Process and The Journey Back to Love Series. A former Pediatric Speech-Language Pathologist, with a Masters Degree in Education, Suzy pioneered a shift in the perception of autism from an individual “disorder” to a collective revolution in human consciousness that is based in and as love. She has been playing in the field of leading edge consciousness ever since.

“ After participating in the Mind Fitness Lab Virtual Reality program just once, I was so impressed with the reduction of my stress levels and the self awareness that I was gaining that I asked Luca to be a guest speaker for my practitioners internationally, knowing that the more clear and coherent their minds are…the more effective they would be in working with energetically sensitive children and families. I  went onto deeper and deeper results by using the VR program a few more times. I recently had the opportunity to do private sessions with Luca, which clearly supported my ability to get out of my own way, allowing my creativity and potential to flow in new and beautiful ways!  Luca is a wonderful human being with a clear mission to support as many as he can to be all that they are here to be! He does that very well!” Suzy Miller

Vinicius is a Brazilian Computer Scientist specialized in Digital Signal Processing.  From the 2013, hi co-operated with Luca Bosurgi, leading  the sister company Mind Fitness Lab's development team. He is now leading the digital development of the Mind Fitness Network products.

"Luca is an expert when it comes to understanding the mind, it's habits, and how one can change their mindset with precision and speed. It's been a huge part of my growth as an entrepreneur. In even a few sessions I was having deeper awareness and insights about my own thinking and the thinking of others that would have taken me years to come to understand on my own or through reading. When you use your brain to be creative, you need a way to conserve and focus it's power. Mind Fitness shows you how."

"Luca Bosurgi is a very special man. Luca blessed with a divine grace that you will only understand when in his presence. He has completely changed my life forever. I know something now, which Luca has helped me to achieve, that I have never known before. I have access a source of strength inside my mind that was always there – but Luca showed me how to use it. The deep love and happiness I have found through working with Luca is truly awe-inspiring. I will never be able to fully articulate the gift that Luca has shared with me. I give Luca my highest recommendation and only hope that he will continue to do his good work for others for as along as he can. " -Rebecca

Christine is a classically trained violinst, cellist, pianist and composer based in Los Angeles. After a successful career in symphonic world, she trained in production and engineering and has found success in the pop, commercial, television and film arenas in Los Angeles and beyond. When she's not playing or writing music, Christine keeps her creative sensibilities honed with yoga, meditation and ballet.

"After trying everything and nothing worked, the Bosurgi Method reduced 95% of my PTSD with just one session.  By the end of the program everyone was commenting on my rejuvenated appearance, a happy side effect of massive stress reduction that I hadn't even noticed!  I have creative freedom and clarity in all areas of life now that unnecessary stress isn't taking up my brain power. " Christine 

“Our vision is to help create a community of psychologically independent, high performing, and emotionally self-sufficient people. I have researched the mind for over 25 years and identified the unfulfilled needs that restrain millions of people in a cage of dependency, under-performance and fears. I also identified the rational key for permanently ending psychological dependency in a very short time. Our mission is to offer this awareness and mind training methodology to our communities to help bring humanity to a healthier, more efficient and joyful place.

Together, we can create an interdependent society of people – based on being, instead of trying to be; on choosing, instead of being chosen; on our real identities instead of the ones mirroring external expectations. We can help millions to free their mind from fears and thereby enhance their performances and compassionate intelligence so as to move our communities into the next wave of inventions, accomplishments and, most importantly, harmonious accord.

If you feel that this is a cause that deserves your love, please contribute,  purchasing our perks, sponsoring or donating. Your support and generosity will make this project a reality. Thanks to you, many will walk away from drugs, alcohol and depression, many will engage in fulfilling relationships and responsible parenting, and many more will find happiness and success. Thank you for reading!“ –Luca Bosurgi
story_txt:
The Mind Fitness  program is a twelve-week technical and emotional journey of self-realization, self-love and self-leadership. It guides the user to free, educate and train the mind trough 84 daily steps rich of new knowledge and groundbreaking mind's tools, sound hypno-meditations, daily exercises, and evening recaps. The program can be owned in the form of a beautiful large, high-resolution illustration book, or digitally within a compelling interactive eBook. "Hello,My name is Luka Pecel, and I am the co-author of Mind Fitness.My battle with alcohol and depression was a long, demoralizing, and futile fight that by age 44 had left me for dead. I had been diagnosed with cirrhosis of the liver, had been deemed a lost cause by friends and family, I was arrested several times for DUI's, and had been to countless hospitals and rehabilitation centers. Feeling hopeless and alone, I was finalizing my plan of escape from the world. By the Grace of God, I found Luca Bosurgi. What happened next changed my life forever, and I promise it will change yours too.           I had been through a decade of traditional cognitive therapy with virtually no results. Looking for answers, I traveled and searched, assiduously investigating every self-help movement that was available. Time and time again, I found myself back in an even deeper depression, with a bottle at my bedside. It wasn’t until Luca explained to me his groundbreaking discovery of AED (adult emotional dependency) that I understood for the first time what my problem had been all these years. It was like the weight of the world had been lifted off me. There is so much more to say about my many amazing discoveries, life-changing lessons and eye opening experiences-- but I must leave them for the book! My role is to add color, commentary, structure, and my own personal journey to the THE MIND FITNESS BOOK. Luca Bosurgi’s twenty five years of experience and training, prodigious faith, and revolutionary breakthroughs in psychology of the mind are going to help change the world for generations to come, as they have done for me.  I was lucky enough to get this help. Many are not. Helping co-author this book is both my honor and my mission. I have to help give back what was so abundantly given to me. I truly believe that Luca is on the cutting edge of solving depression and addiction once and for all. This is something the world needs right now, and with God's blessing, we are going to do everything in our power to help spread this technology." -LukaLuka Pecel has written and collaborated with celebrities like Michael Bolton, Teri Hatcher, Sasha Alexander, and David Carradine just to name a few. He co-founded Dreamline Entertainment in Beverly Hills, CA in the late 90's and in the early 2000’s was founder of One Eleven Films in Los Angeles. He is also an award-winning director who was nominated for the prestigious 'Golden Bear' award at The Berlin Film Festival. He has written and directed feature films, commercials and music videos."I once told Luka Pecel he was like a Bukowski. I meant his writing ability, not to copy his lifestyle. Unfortunately, he took it literally. I am so pleased that he has gotten his life together and I'm expecting something great. I am more than impressed by the turnaround I have witnessed because of this program” - Matt Ochacher - Partner/Head of Literary Department New Wave Entertainment"I have met so many talented, good people suffering from addiction issues, Luka was one of them. His struggle has taken him years and to see him have light again, to be himself, authentically, is truly a miracle. Luka has so much to give the world, I cant wait to see what comes out."  - Sasha Alexander - Former star of NCIS / Rizzoli and Isles The program is offered in print and digital version.
A beautiful large format 260-280 page book, rich in high-resolution illustrations and images. Similar to a journal, the book will journey the reader trough the daily programs. Each day will offer new knowledge and groundbreaking mind tools, a sound meditation, daily exercises, reflections and evening recaps in the form of multi-choice questions. We chose this simple and easy to use format, because it allows a progressive and almost effortless acquisition of Luca's more efficient and natural behavioral models and mind tools. 84 daily meditations of about ten minutes each, will be downloadable from the Mind Fitness Club website. 
A compelling and user-friendly eBook will reproduce the daily look and functionality of the paper version, including a variety of interactive digital features, reminders and tips. 
The Mind Fitness Club website will compliment both platforms with features, resources, webinars, conversations with experts in the mind field, forums, Q&As, and will offer a variety of membership services. The aim is to establish the Mind Fitness Club as the hub for the 'Mind education and training' oriented community.
Here is the list of the exclusive goodies that you can purchase with our perks:

The Mind Fitness Book - A4 Full Colors, 260-280 pages, High Resolution Illustrations and Images. Each copy includes a download key for the 84 Guided Deep Meditations (about 840 minutes of daily meditations). 

Authors Signature or Personal Dedication in your Mind Fitness Book. 

The Mind Fitness interactive eBook. 
80 Sound Meditations (800 minutes in total) included with the Book and eBook. 
 Certificate of Completion - granted after completion of the program. 
The Mind Fitness T-shirt 

Parchment Certificate (Backer, Sponsor or Donor - Silver, Gold or Platinum).  
Your name listed  in the Hall of Fame in Mind Fitness Club website. (Backer, Sponsor or Donor - Silver, Gold or Platinum).  
Your name listed in the Hall of Fame in the 1st Book Edition (Backer, Sponsor or Donor - Silver, Gold or Platinum).  

Mind Fitness Club membership - exclusive resources online, webinars, etc. 

Mind Fitness Club VIP membership - invite to exclusive events, gathering, conferences, etc. 
Sponsorship options in the Mind Fitness Book 1st edition.

One page.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 1 page. 

Three pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 1 day of the program. 

Nine pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 3 days of the program. 

Fifteen pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 5 days of the  program. 

Twenty one pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 7 days of the program.  

Thirty pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 10 days of the program.  

Forty Two pages.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of 14 days of the program.  

One Weekly section.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of one of the 12 weekly sections (4 pages) of the program.  

Two Weekly sections.* Your name or your company honored as the sponsor of two of the 12 weekly sections (8 pages in total) of the program. * Fonts, size and position TBD

The Mind Fitness program derives from the Bosurgi Method® - Luca Bosurgi's 12 steps healing modality. The method developed with 25 years of clinical researches and successfully tested with over 5,000 people is a proprietary program of life and mind coaching combined with CognitiveOS Hypnosis®. The process helps to educate, clear and optimize the mind, removing unnecessary emotional blockages. This is obtained by establishing the natural self-reliance, resetting obsolete emotional imbalances, and improving the management of thoughts and feelings. The process consequently clears the associated mental struggles and byproducts, ie. anxiety, fear, low self-confidence, depression, alcohol and drug abuse, procrastination, etc. Most importantly it frees misused brainpower, which can be reinvested into confidence, high performance and happiness.The peaceful mind’s environment attained by the method discontinues the unnecessary releases of Adrenaline, Cortisol and Norepinephrine, which are the powerful hormones used by the brain to respond to danger in the "fight, freeze or flight" process. This frees the body from the intoxication and the muscular tensions produced by the chemicals, allowing noticeable physical improvements. Luca's clients have reported reduction of muscular and back pain, headache and gastrointestinal conditions – improved sleep and stamina, and substantial enhancements in physical health, complexion and attractiveness.The Mind Fitness program is complementary and enhances most reputable therapeutic modalities. The emotional freedom granted by the program greatly amplifies previous therapeutic and self-help work done, and offers optimal mind’s settings for present and future self-development goals.1st week: Discover your mind – The first week of this program will help you to discover your mind, what it does, how it works, and will help you to build a more formal connection with your intelligence.2nd week: Re-parenting – the second week outlines and enforces your adoption of your own mind and body. This secures to your life equipment a new mother/father, you! 3rd week: Self-love – your mind needs love to be balanced and operate efficiently. This is a vital physical energy that your mind is meant to receive from you. If you don't fulfilled this need, your mind will starve, and will try to grab love from partners, friends or colleagues.4th week: Self-protection – your mind needs your protection or will experience constant anxiety and fear, trying to get safety from people, religious organizations, teams and groups etc.5th week: Self-Leadership – your mind needs your leadership, without it will work on autopilot trying to be led by the external world.6th week: Emotional Independence – now you are ready to formalize your self-reliance, transforming dependency to inter-dependency.7th week: Building emotional self-reliance – this week is dedicated to build a master behavior of self-reliance that will be applied to different aspects of your everyday life.8th week: Reset your survival system – clear unchartered anxiety and fear.9th week: Removing self-judgment – reset and capitalize the past as fuel for the future removing shame, guilt and regret from past experiences.10th week: Removing resentment and blame – reset and capitalize the past as fuel for the future removing blame, resentment, anger and pain.11th week: Clear daily stress – shifting thoughts from needs to choices.12th week: Manage thoughts, feeling and emotions.The proceed of the raised funds will be invested in the production and marketing of the 'Mind Fitness Book' and the interactive eBook, and to build and establish the Mind Fitness website. Your generous contribution will help to accelerate the production and to create awareness throughout the US territory. The more funds we raise, the faster we can bring this solution to the people in need!   Luca Bosurgi was born in Rome, Italy, to an Italian Aristocratic family descendants of the Marquis Bosurgi with a 1,200 history rich in art, engineering and enterprise. In the early 1890, Luca’s grandfather invented concentrated orange juice, establishing himself as one of the first Italian Industrialists.Luca’s history is an eclectic mix of experiences that meshes perfectly with his passion to increase human happiness and self-reliance. At an early age, Luca began receiving extensive spiritual teachings from a channeled holy master. By the time he was becoming an adult, Luca had acquired groundbreaking knowledge about the meaning of life, the spirit-mind hierarchy, the mechanics of the mind and how it relates to mankind’s journey of spiritual evolution.Luca studied Business & Law at the University Bocconi in Milan. At 23, he was called on to rescue his family company, Sanderson & Sons in Messina, Sicily. In three years, Luca saved 1,500 jobs and secured the continued production of approximately 25,000 citrus farmers. This experience launched Luca into his first career, investment banking. At 28, Luca established his investment portfolio in Luxemburg with offices in London and New York. His company focused on portfolio management, VC investments and M&A.In the 2005, after more than two decades of sharing his life between his healing mission and the world of banking, he sold his business and moved to Los Angeles to establish his Bosurgi Method® School and Los Angeles practice. This began Luca’s 12-year-long journey towards perfecting the first three phases of the Bosurgi Method, and has allowed him to enhance and refine his method–improving his success rate from the initial 65% to more than 95% in the last four years. Today, thousands of people have experienced the Bosurgi Method, not only with Luca, but also with the approximately 20 mind healers that he has trained.In 2014, Luca identified Virtual Reality as an effective channel to bring the Bosurgi Method® to the general public. This motivated him to build a team and, based on the Bosurgi Method, develop a Virtual Reality Mind Training solution. The efficacy of using VR as a delivery mechanism for the Bosurgi Method® was tested and proven out in beta testing, showing results that equaled those he obtained in his practice – exceeding 95%.In 2015, following his vision to create a higher performing, emotionally independent and happy world, Luca founded Mind Fitness Lab, a portfolio company established to invest, develop and distribute disruptive mind solutions. Currently, the Bosurgi Method® VR ( the Virtual Reality version of the method) is licensed, packaged and distributed as a VR experience through  Mind Fitness Lab – recognized on the 2016 TransTech 200 list of key technologies driving mental and emotional well-being forward.Additionally, Luca is a Medicine Man (Shaman) according to Native American traditions, known by his spiritual name Red Cougar Mountain Spirit. He is also highly trained in ancient combat and martial arts (black belt in judo and karate), and initiated in Western and Easter mind-body disciplines.Luca consistently seeks effective ways to impart greater balance and healing to those in need. He discovered the power of Clinical Hypnosis in the early 1990’s in London. He was individually trained by Michael Joseph, Founder and President of the British Society of Clinical Hypnosis and publisher of the European Journal of Clinical Hypnosis. Clinical Hypnosis, combined with his comprehensive knowledge of computer and digital science, metaphysics, psychology and ancient mind/spirit healing techniques, became the foundation of Luca’s new form of psychotherapy, the Bosurgi Method®. Luca lives with his wife and three children in Santa Monica, California."I've never met anyone who can so effectively give someone the tools to live their life with confidence quite like Luca.  Without his help I would not have the success I have today, which stems solely from an ability to live myself and be confident in all aspects of my life - things that Luca enabled me to do. I am so grateful for his help and his ongoing friendship" -John

She is on the vanguard of the new business paradigm thinking, the creation of vibrant workplaces, and growing the extraordinary leaders. Runa sits on a number of advisory boards, and is a contributing author at the People Development Magazine. In addition to the companies Runa founded in Reykjavik, she co-founded the Conscious Leader Network, the Conscious Capitalism LA Chapter, and the TOGETHER! Network -- all social impact platforms.

story:
Athletohub is truly revolutionizing the way athletes connect, organize and play. Our platform provides users with tailored event feeds based on interests, skill-level, location and a multitude of sport-specific preferences. You can even host your own public and private groups to meet either on a recurring basis or for a one-time event.

Three years of coding, coffee and more coding have been poured into this project and our team is beyond excited to launch the initial funding campaign for Athletohub. Your generous support as a contributor will allow our team to accomplish the following:

  • Rapidly increase site development to expand into new sports and new markets.
  • Begin mass-marketing the platform to fitness enthusiasts across the country.
  • Integrate third-party fitness apps (Strava, Nike+, Runkeeper, etc) allowing users to sync their history to Athletohub in order to build a more tailored event feed and a comprehensive digital fitness identity.

 

 

The Need

People are hungry for connection, beyond just the digital space. With Athletohub, we're bridging the gap between nurturing online communities and meaningful offline activities. There has been a monumental shift in the health and fitness space, specifically as it pertains to niche health tribes such as runners, cyclists, Yogies, Crossfitters, Boot Campers, etc. We want to bring the excitement and engagement of these trends under a centralized roof that hosts activities of all size, shape and sport.

 

 

Our Sports

Athletohub is fitness-agnostic, meaning we welcome all athletic communities to post events on our platform. From running, cycling, basketball and tennis to BMX, e-sports and crossfit, our mission remains the same: to help athletes connect, organize and play. Our strategy for building event databases throughout these markets will follow a pre-defined template: identifying event leaders in the market, partnering and integrating their systems with Athletohub and engaging local community groups to further permiate the space.

 

How It Works

Our platform uses proprietary technology to automatically sync with athletic event sponsors and organizers to continually grow our database. Additionally, user analytics are constantly optimizing experience and event feeds based on behavior, preferences and tracking. Users can easily create a profile, set their preferences, sign up for events and easily engage with attendees, sponsors, volunteers and more.

 

 

 

Our Team & Progress

We are proud to have gathered a highly-experienced, passionate and dedicated group of entrepreneurs who've helped make Athletohub a reality. Our platform has seen some impressive organic growth simply by word-of-mouth alone and our strategic partnerships are continuing to grow. Learn more about our team and traction below.

 

 

 

 

 

Benefits

 

 

Competition

 

 

Campaign Overview

Our strategy for building event databases throughout these markets will follow a pre-defined template: identifying event leaders in the market, partnering and integrating their systems with Athletohub and engaging local community groups to further permiate the space. How It WorksOur platform uses proprietary technology to automatically sync with athletic event sponsors and organizers to continually grow our database. Additionally, user analytics are constantly optimizing experience and event feeds based on behavior, preferences and tracking. Users can easily create a profile, set their preferences, sign up for events and easily engage with attendees, sponsors, volunteers and more.   Our Team & ProgressWe are proud to have gathered a highly-experienced, passionate and dedicated group of entrepreneurs who've helped make Athletohub a reality. Our platform has seen some impressive organic growth simply by word-of-mouth alone and our strategic partnerships are continuing to grow. Learn more about our team and traction below.     Benefits  Competition  Campaign Overview

story:
* Version Française plus bas

Features

What your donations will allow us to do

We cumulate experience in project management and web development ... but we are definitely not graphic designers! Thanks to your donations, we will hire a designer who will design a superb interface!

Furthermore, since we are only two developers, we will be hiring another resource to help us and speed up the development.

We will also hire someone who will film the training sequences included in the glossary of the movements.

And, we will acquire the software licences and/or some hardware equipment that we need for development and testing purposes.

Finally, as we want to inform the world of the arrival of the app, we will invest a small portion in promotion.

Team

Where we're at now

In the past few months, we met multiple times with Crossfit athletes, including Box owners. We gathered their ideas and comments for analysis.

We already started working on the technical side of the app, like the database structure and that kind of stuff, and we started looking for designers. We will be able to start building the user interfaces as soon as the design will be ready.

We will keep you up-to-date throughout the development and design of the interface, including sending you screen captures. That way, you will not miss anything of the development.

We do not know exactly when we'll launch the app, but we'll be able to set a launch date for the beta in a couple of weeks when the development and design of the interface is more advanced. We certainly want to get it out as quickly as possible, but we also want to take the time to do it right.

Perks

Size chart completely at the end of the page.

Other ways to help

You do not necessarily want to donate money, but still want to help us bring this project to life? Well, just share this page on your social networks. Tell your friends and family that the WOD Impulse app is coming - and how awesome it will be!

Conclusion

Finally, we hope to have transmitted our enthusiasm about the project! If you would like to receive more information and ask us questions, do not hesitate to contact us. We will answer you with pleasure!

 

Cheers !

 

Fonctionnalités

Ce que nous ferons avec vos dons

Nous avons de l’expérience en gestion de projet et en développement web… mais absolument aucune en graphisme! Grâce à vos dons, nous embaucherons notamment un·e designer qui concevra une superbe interface!

De plus, puisque nous ne sommes que deux développeurs, nous embaucherons une autre ressource pour accélérer le processus.

Nous embaucherons également un·e vidéaste qui filmera les séquences d’entraînement incluses dans le lexique des mouvements.

Et, nous nous procurerons licences et autres matériels que nous aurons besoins à des fins de développement et de tests.

Finalement, comme nous souhaitons informer le monde de l’arrivée de l’app, nous investirons en promotion.

L'équipe

Où nous en sommes

Au cours des derniers mois, nous avons rencontré des adeptes de CrossFit, dont les propriétaires de Box. Nous avons récolté leurs idées et commentaires à des fins d’analyse.

Nous avons commencé à concevoir les aspects techniques de l’app, comme la structure de la base de données, et à chercher des designer. Nous pourrons commencer à bâtir l’interface dès que le design sera prêt.

Nous vous tiendrons à jour tout au long du développement et de la conception de l’interface, en vous envoyant notamment des saisies d’écran. Comme ça, vous ne raterez rien de la progression.

Nous ne savons pas exactement quand nous lancerons l’app, mais nous pourrons déterminer une date de lancement de la version bêta dans quelques semaines lorsque le développement et la conception de l’interface seront plus avancés. Certes, nous souhaitons la sortir le plus rapidement possible, mais nous voulons aussi prendre le temps de bien faire les choses.

Avantages

Charte des grandeurs à la fin complètement.

Pour aider autrement

Vous n’avez pas nécessairement envie de faire un don en argent, mais voulez quand même nous aider à donner vie à ce projet? Eh bien, il suffit de partager cette page sur vos réseaux sociaux. Dites à vos amis et à votre famille que l’app WOD Impulse s’en vient — et à quel point elle sera malade!

Conclusion

Nous espérons finalement vous avoir transmis notre enthousiasme quant au projet! Si vous souhaitez recevoir plus de renseignements et nous poser des questions, n’hésitez surtout pas à nous contacter. Nous vous répondrons avec plaisir!

 

À bientôt !

 

*********************************************************

Size Charts

T-Shirt - MEN

T-Shirt - WOMAN

Hoodie - MEN

Hoodie - WOMAN

Charte de grandeurs

T-Shirt - HOMME

T-Shirt - FEMME

Cotton Ouater - HOMME

Cotton Ouater - FEMME

story:
Links: Facebook, Twitter, Youtube

Site: www.soymianova.com

RISK & CHALLENGES

We plan on doing a residential program to provide individualized mental health services.  We are licensed and certified and provide the services for adults, aged 18 years and older. 

Our biggest obstacle is paying rent for an office, clinic or community home while we build our clinic.Our goal is to provide high quality facilities and we need at least 12 months anticipation. 

TESTIMONIALS

Juan Gerardo Espinoza, Entrepreneur.

  I am very happy and calm with the work they have done with me. They  helped me a lot, to be honest I lived on the fast lane not anymore. They are  great therapist.    

Norma E. Morales Pérez, Medic.

 I am completely grateful and satisfied with my spiritual growth.

José Trinidad Vega y Erika Tornero, Couple.

The therapists helped us grow as a couple and see our strengths.

OUR TEAM  

 

 

 

 

 

 

ESPAÑOL

Links: Facebook, Twitter, Youtube

www.soymianova.com

RIESGO Y DESAFÍOS

Planeamos hacer un programa residencial para proveer servicios de salud mental individualizados. Somos licenciados y certificados y proporcionamos los servicios para adolescentes y adultos.

Nuestro mayor obstáculo es pagar el alquiler de una oficina, clínica o casa comunidad, mientras construimos nuestra clínica. Nuestro objetivo es proporcionar instalaciones de alta calidad y necesitamos al menos 12 meses de anticipación.

TESTIMONIOS

Juan Gerardo Espinoza, Empresario.

Estoy muy contento y tranquilo con el trabajo que realizaron conmigo, me ayudaron demasiado, yo la verdad vivía muy aprisa y es algo que a la fecha todavía no me sale bien, pero ya me controlo más. Son muy buenos terapeutas.

Norma E. Morales Pérez, Medico

Completamente agradecida y satisfecha de lo trabajado en mi crecimiento Espiritual.

José Trinidad Vega y Erika Tornero, Pareja.​

Aprendimos como a ver nuestras fortalezas y debilidades, y con la orientación de los terapeutas nos ayudaron a visualizar, como podemos mejorar para seguir creciendo y fortaleciéndonos en pareja.

 

NUESTRO EQUIPO

story:
Ground Force Supplements would help healthcare providers develop and launch their own supplement ideas. Under the Ground Force brand, each healer that develops a nutraceutical would be given credit and, more importantly, a percentage for each bottle sold.

ABOUT ME

Before starting Naturopathic Medical School at 29, I completed my undergraduate degree in Organic Chemistry and worked in the private sector for 6 years. But, it really wasn't fulfilling for me. While scanning graduate programs in hopes of enhancing my degree in chemistry and having a greater desire to help individuals, I came across the field of Naturopathic Medicine. I knew immediately this was what I was supposed to do for the rest of my life.

Fast forward through 4 years of med school at one of the eight accredited schools in North America for Naturopathic Medicine and 2 years in practice. I realized (a) it’s really hard to start your own practice and; (b) there are still combinations and variations of nutraceuticals yet to be discovered.

How are these things related you might ask? Well, who better to develop new supplements than the experts themselves (especially ones who recently got out of school and had to memorize all the vitamins, minerals and 300 herbs to take their board exams)?

But, Dr. Sara you might say, “with tens to hundreds of thousands of dollars in student loan debt, how can a new doctor or herbalist or nutritionist start their own supplement company?” This is where Ground Force Supplements comes into play.

By giving to this campaign, you would not only fulfill my dream of starting a supplement company, but you would be supporting a new idea in this field bringing together day-to-day practitioners. You will also be assisting established and dedicated healthcare providers see their own ideas come to fruition while helping to supplement their income.

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

To manufacture a single customized supplement, at a minimum production amount, costs range anywhere between $8,000 to $12,000 (this does not include distribution/fulfillment, label development or marketing). With the $17,000 I’m hoping to raise, thanks to you all, Ground Force Supplements will manufacture its first supplement developed by Dr. Keith Zeitlin, Naturopathic Physician (5elementsnhc.com) and myself in the Fall of 2018. The product is still a bit ‘top secret’ as its never been manufactured before, but let’s just say, it will change how people (especially children) are able to take an already widely used nutrient.

The profits from this new product will go towards helping another healer develop and launch their own supplement(s).

In gratitude, everyone that contributes will receive a gift; starting with a inspiration sticker and working up to free supplements and being a guest of honor at a Ground Force Supplement launch party.

Now, don’t feel like this is an all or nothing thing. There are many levels of support. Every penny donated helps a healer in the art of complementary and alternative medicine develop new and innovative nutraceuticals.

IMPACT

What’s great about this product line is that it will be developed by the pros, the people recommending them on a daily basis. It will help address the needs missing from the market today, while providing a passive income stream to those who work so hard in our healing journey.

There are 350-400 new Naturopathic Medical School graduates each year leaving school very much in debt and expecting to start a business, pay exorbitant license fees and malpractice insurance. Ground Force Supplements would help these new Naturopathic docs, along with the  6,000 licensed previously ones and other alternative medical providers, bring their ideas to life while supporting them financially.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

The greatest challenge: getting people to buy the products. But as a Naturopathic Doctor, I believe I am best fit to meet this challenge with my already established wholesale supplement company professional accounts and the vast, but close knit, network of Naturopathic Doctors. And as for marketing and distribution, groundforcesupplements.com has been purchased and is in the process being developed into a marketplace where anyone can purchase the supplements.

A risk for this company is existing competition. But by utilizing those that know herbs and nutrients the best, Ground Force Supplements would provide innovative and new products to the market providing a unique position in the marketplace.

Another risk would be running out of ideas or not getting the experts on board. No worries there. I have over 20 supplement ideas of my own which include cancer prevention herbs based on genetics, pre- and post-surgery protocols, topicals for excess hair growth and loss, memory support, sleep support and a whole line of supplements exclusively for children.

And finally, cost. Cost is a major obstacle in developing a company such as this, especially to those of us paying off our student loans. This is where you and IndieGoGo come in. True healers get into the field of healthcare, not to make money, but to help people. Here’s your opportunity to help the healers themselves.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

I know it can be a struggle sometimes to even give a few dollars, so if you can’t afford to contribute at this time and want to help out, please share this concept and offering! Share with friends, colleagues, family, acquaintances, other business owners, frenemies, even that eccentric hippie down the street that’s into alternative medicine. You never know who can and is willing to help! Thanks for your consideration!

Here’s your opportunity to help the healers themselves.OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPI know it can be a struggle sometimes to even give a few dollars, so if you can’t afford to contribute at this time and want to help out, please share this concept and offering! Share with friends, colleagues, family, acquaintances, other business owners, frenemies, even that eccentric hippie down the street that’s into alternative medicine. You never know who can and is willing to help! Thanks for your consideration!

story:
Short Summary

Our campaign is simple: to raise enough funds so that we may open a strength and conditioning facility in Leland, NC.  This would allow us to get a small business loan so that we can secure a location, buy the equipment we need and become operational before the end of the year. This is important to us because we are tired of seeing countless amounts of people waste their time and hard earned money joining gyms that promise results and deliver nothing. It’s time someone broke away from the norm and focused on delivering healthy results instead of receiving profit.  Our dream is to be a beacon of hope in the Leland community in terms of health and fitness for those who believe they have none. Our hope is to provide a location where you can receive high quality, all inclusive structured training at a low cost. We want to help create a healthy community by promoting other businesses involved with health and fitness.  With your help, we can achieve this together. Results first, profit second.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $40,000 in order to secure a loan so that we can be operational by the end of the year! We are currently looking at loan options so in the event that a loan is secured before the campaign is over, funds will go toward equipment and establishing a location.

What you get!

  • $50 contribution- T-shirt
  • $100 contribution- T-shirt, Unlimited membership @ $100/month for a year
  • $500 contribution- T-shirt, 6 months unlimited membership free
  • $1000 contribution- T-shirt, 6 months unlimited membership free, then 6 months unlimited @ $100/month
  • $1000 local business contribution- T-shirt, advertisement in the facility for life.

In the event that our goal is not reached, funds will still go toward securing a small business loan. If a loan is secured, the funds will go toward equipment and location. 

 

The Impact

We wish that we could put into words the impact that this facility will have on the community and surrounding communities. Truthfully, the impact is unfathomable.  There are a lot of gyms and facilities out there that promise people “real results” and are short on delivery. There are a lot of products that promise so much yet get you so little. The impact that we want to have is to change people’s idea of fitness. We want to make fitness a lifestyle, not a fad. We want to help people go from, “I want to look like him or I want to look like her” to “I want to be a part of that”. Just imagine a gym where everyone there is working together, as a team, to accomplish the same thing. To be fit and healthy!

This will be a gym where everyone there is supportive of each other and are treated as teammates instead of members. That’s infectious. That is something that spreads like wildfire and in turn will impact so much more than just the physical body. We have to change your habits and thought process about fitness before we can change your body. We can promise you this; You will work hard for your results and we will help you. You will work hard to be healthy and we will be there every step of the way. There is no secret to fitness. There is no particular gym or product that will get your there, just good old fashioned work. Out of that work will come something amazing. Self-efficacy, self-esteem, confidence, success, and most importantly, community!

Risks & Challenges

Risks:

  • Business fails because of no members
  • Financial debt

Obstacles:

  • Competition
  • Finances

Fitness is my passion.  I have been very successful at the gyms and clubs I have worked for and that was only possible by putting in the necessary work.  Clients were not given to me. I had to learn how to sell personal training and I had to put in hundreds of calls a day in order to build the clientele I needed in order to make the money I wanted. I have a great understanding of what it takes to make and run a successful business.

Right now the only obstacle I can see is financial.  I don't have the $115,000 that I need in order to become operational. I am looking into loan options but need some funds in order to secure a loan.

 Competition is minimal, at best, in Leland.  There is absolutely nothing like what we want to build. In a community that is growing fast it is only a matter of time before more fitness studios open. If we were the first to open we would most definitely stand out among the crowd and provide a product that  is elite and beneficial for the community. I have a B.S. in Exercise Science and an elite level certification. It is my passion and dedication to the members and clients that separates me from the competition. I will live by this quote, “people first, profit second”.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute, but we would still like your support! Whether you contribute or not we would appreciate it if you could spread the word about our campaign. There are Indiegogo share tools so that you may post it to social media.  Our hope is that we not only reach our campaign goal, but also inspire someone else to pursue their dream whether its fitness related or something else entirely!

We wish that we could put into words the impact that this facility will have on the community and surrounding communities. Truthfully, the impact is unfathomable.  There are a lot of gyms and facilities out there that promise people “real results” and are short on delivery. There are a lot of products that promise so much yet get you so little. The impact that we want to have is to change people’s idea of fitness. We want to make fitness a lifestyle, not a fad. We want to help people go from, “I want to look like him or I want to look like her” to “I want to be a part of that”. Just imagine a gym where everyone there is working together, as a team, to accomplish the same thing. To be fit and healthy!
This will be a gym where everyone there is supportive of each other and are treated as teammates instead of members. That’s infectious. That is something that spreads like wildfire and in turn will impact so much more than just the physical body. We have to change your habits and thought process about fitness before we can change your body. We can promise you this; You will work hard for your results and we will help you. You will work hard to be healthy and we will be there every step of the way. There is no secret to fitness. There is no particular gym or product that will get your there, just good old fashioned work. Out of that work will come something amazing. Self-efficacy, self-esteem, confidence, success, and most importantly, community!

Risks & Challenges
Risks:

Business fails because of no members
Financial debt

Obstacles:

Competition
Finances

Fitness is my passion.  I have been very successful at the gyms and clubs I have worked for and that was only possible by putting in the necessary work.  Clients were not given to me. I had to learn how to sell personal training and I had to put in hundreds of calls a day in order to build the clientele I needed in order to make the money I wanted. I have a great understanding of what it takes to make and run a successful business.
Right now the only obstacle I can see is financial.  I don't have the $115,000 that I need in order to become operational. I am looking into loan options but need some funds in order to secure a loan.
 Competition is minimal, at best, in Leland.  There is absolutely nothing like what we want to build. In a community that is growing fast it is only a matter of time before more fitness studios open. If we were the first to open we would most definitely stand out among the crowd and provide a product that  is elite and beneficial for the community. I have a B.S. in Exercise Science and an elite level certification. It is my passion and dedication to the members and clients that separates me from the competition. I will live by this quote, “people first, profit second”.

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone can contribute, but we would still like your support! Whether you contribute or not we would appreciate it if you could spread the word about our campaign. There are Indiegogo share tools so that you may post it to social media.  Our hope is that we not only reach our campaign goal, but also inspire someone else to pursue their dream whether its fitness related or something else entirely!

story:
$1-USD para el Rugby Chileno

Esta Campaña nace para apoyar el crecimiento del Rugby en Chile enfocando nuestros esfuerzos hacia los mas jóvenes.
La idea en un comienzo es fomentar la carrera del joven rugbista para que pueda llegar al mas alto nivel de competencia. Buscamos apoyo para poder financiar  10 becas a jugadores entre 15 y 18 años para irse a un International Rugby Academy en Nueva Zelanda por 6 semanas. 
El camino hacia una carrera internacional de rugby debe iniciar a temprana edad y que mejor lugar para comenzar tu carrera que en la cuna del rugby del actual campeón del Mundo, Nueva Zelanda. 
Esta iniciativa es parte del trabajo que tiene Pro Rugby Chile para lograr su objetivo que consiste en que, en Chile haya rugby profesional y apoyar a la selección rumbo a su participación del Mundial de Rugby 2019 en Japon.
Invitamos a todos a participar de esta campaña de fomento de promesas del Rugby Chileno.
Les contamos en que vamos a invertir este dinero:
  • 10 Becas = $60.000USD
  • 1 Beca = $6.000USD (Vuelo, Alojamiento, Comida, Rugby Academy) 

 Importante que la Comunidad del Rugby, Marcas y Empresas comiencen a tener mayor participación con el deporte. 

 Si no alcanzamos a llegar al monto que apuntamos utilizaremos el dinero para entregar becas parciales a los 10 jugadores. Si llegamos a sobrepasar el objetivo el resto del dinero lo invertiremos en entregar mas becas a jugadores Chilenos. 
Este es el primer paso hacia el desarrollo del Rugby en Chile hay muchas cosas que se pueden hacer para que este crezca y te invitamos a ti ser participe de esta campaña. 
Dona $1-USD para el Rugby Chileno
Si no quieres donar pero te gusta la causa comparte en Facebook, Instagram o Twitter el link de esta campaña y estaras apoyando la causa. Te lo agradeceriamos un monton.

story:
Our Story. Natural Healing through Native Botanicals.

Our ancestors gave us a beautiful way of life and a path to help heal ourselves and others. In the spirit of Indigenous Peoples' Day—we're asking our relatives and community to be part of our dream.  As a Native American/Lakota family from the Pine Ridge Reservation, we are bringing our indigenous healing traditions into modern wellness through our company, Native Botanicals.  We're making sustainable wellness available today and for future generations.

Growing up surrounded by our culture, we learned about our traditional healing ceremonies and medicines from our elders and medicine people. Native Botanicals was born out of a need to become healthier ourselves, and to help others in our community to find a path to wellness through Lakota remedies. We've seen the power of our medicines first hand, and now we want to share them with the world.

Our company is bottling indigenous herbal remedies into medicinal tinctures. Traditionally, these medicines are taken as a tea, but by concentrating the essence of these plant medicines into tinctures, we can modernize their application and share them with more people.  In addition to tinctures, we’ve developed other products that include healing salves, smudging herbs, and sprays that encourage environmental wellness. All of our products use ingredients that are wisdom-backed by Lakota elders, and incorporate traditional medicinal herbs like sage and yucca.

We respect our medicines, and are mindful of the balance between what we give and take. In our Lakota language we say Mitakuye Oyasin, which means "all my relations," and we acknowledge our plant medicines as relatives. That's why a portion of our profits goes toward our reservation replanting initiative, to grow plants and herbs and teach native youth how to use and care for our traditional medicines so we can all thrive — now and in the future.

As important as protecting the plant nation, it's equally important to preserve the knowledge and teachings that come with them. Our ancestors had the foresight to share this wisdom with us, and we’re passing it along through our work.

While Native American wisdom has become popularized, it’s also increasingly misused. The misappropriation of our culture dilutes it and puts it in danger of not surviving. The moment has come for native people to thrive through our way of life and show others to respect our people and plant medicines—reclaiming our authentic power.  It's also time for people to recognize the true healing power of Lakota remedies.

We're living in a world where racial injustice is a movement, people seek holistic protection for their well being, and sustainability is necessary for our long-term survival. The moment has come to support indigenous-owned businesses like Native Botanicals.

Thank you for reading our story. We're grateful you’ve chosen to be a part of the journey. Wopila (thank you) and we wish wicozani (good health + spiritual wealth) for you and your families.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to build our inventory for growth.  Your contribution will help fund raw materials and working with our manufacturing partner for production to ensure products are GMP compliant. $5000
  • With additional funding, we are hiring marketing help for campaigns around the holidays.  $2000-$10,000 (stretch goal)
  • If we don't reach our full goal, funds will go toward inventory and self-created ad and influencer campaigns to pay for the ad space/influencer support. 
  • Over $100 receives a Sage Tincture
  • Over $300 receives a Sage Tincture + Liquid Smudge Spray
  • Over $500 Wellness Tincture Trio
  • Over $1000 receives Collectors Smudge Kit + Wellness Tincture Trio

The Impact

A portion of all proceeds funds our replanting initiative on the Pine Ridge Reservation.  We're working to end over harvesting and extinction of endangered plants that we use as medicine. 

  • Replanting Sweetgrass, Cottonwood trees and other medicines 
  • Showing our Native youth how to care for them, respect them and use them in a traditional way

Risks & Challenges

Native Botanicals is a lifelong dream we are bringing to life.  While there are challenges to overcome and areas in which we aren't experts, we are working with mentors and experts to help us along the way, ensuring our long term success.

Be a Part of our Journey!  Even if you can't contribute today, sharing our message and building awareness helps. Grow with us. Wopila (thank you)

story:
FAVE is a smart balance trainer, designed based on the combination of fitness equipment and ICT. A motion detectable sensor built-in FAVE allows you to enjoy various sensible contents by playing mobile games. FAVE enables you to not only have fun but build the body balance and core muscles. Thru the app, you can be provided lots of health data information, Such as usage of exercise and center of pressure (Index of body balance) in real-time monitoring.​

 

 

 

 

FAVE is designed in the shape of a hemisphere that let you make a various pose on it. With FAVE exercise, you can have many great physical effects for your body. The effects of FAVE have been widely proven through biomechanical evaluation by certificate authorities.

(DAEGU UNIV. HANBAT UNIV, Busan Economic Promotion Agency, Footwear Industrial Promotion Center, Ergonomics Society of Korea)

 

A built-in motion detectable sensor is put in FAVE. The sensor measures the quantity of motion of a moving body and calorie burn rate. The motion detectable sensor is FAVE proprietary technology protected by a patent right.​

 

 

The app, called FAVE Fitness, provides a professional exercise training program. Users who get FAVE are allowed to keep getting trained at home through the training program recorded by the professional trainers via the app. You can utilize all the features of FAVE through the built-in sensor and professional training program. Besides, it will be way better FAVE with a bigger screen. Simply hook up the app to TV (with Smart mirroring or HDMI cable).

 

       

 

 

While you are doing FAVE, the motion detectable sensor sends the exercise information to the server 42 times per second. Right after you’re done, the app informs you COP (Center of Pressure), VO2MAX, Calorie burn, activity time.​

 

 

With FAVE, you can work out a playing video game connected to a Smart device. FAVE makes exercise more fun! A total of four driving masters, Mad Runner, Smash World, and Surf games can be played through FAVE.

 

[Driving Master]

[Mad Runner]

[Smash World]

[FAVE Surfing]

 

 

 

FAVE is light enough to carry compared to other competitors.​

 

 

In addition, FAVE made by eco-friendly material that is EVA certified by the U.S. FDA.

 

         

 

 

 

 When you first open the product, the air-tube will be filled with air already. If you need to inflate the air-tube, you can use the air-pump coming with the product.

 

 

 

  •  FAVE 350: For professional athletics and old hands

 

 

  • FAVE 450: For beginners and children

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The FAVE Smart Trainer was recognized for its excellent athletic performance through its biomechanical performance assessment.

[certificate for Geometry Balance Motion System, Independent Development Motion Detection Sensor, and User Motion Information Providing Independent Algorithm Design Technology, Light Weight, Special Materials]

All of these technologies are covered by seven patents and intellectual property rights.

 

 

 

FAVE is recommended by experienced users. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

               

All types of FAVE are already packed. We are ready to ship the FAVE to you. At least, May 2020 will start the shipping all over the world. Please let us know if you want to Know an exactly shipping Schedule. We Will send the Invoice and tracking number.​

 

 

The idea of Fave, a smart home trainer came up from Se-Don Hwang, CEO of Strong Friend, who was one of the representative Muscle Mania in Korea from 2014-2017.

 

 

“Hello,

I’m Se-Don Hwang, CEO of Strong Friend, who brought up the idea of FAVE and actualized it. I am a pro bodybuilder. I was one of the representatives of Muscle Mania in Korea from 2014-2017 and received the No.1 bodybuilder championship. Unfortunately, I got injured 3 weeks before the competition and my coach didn’t think I would be the bodybuilder afterward. I thought my athletic career was over. I was very frustrated and couldn’t accept the fact that I can’t be the bodybuilder anymore.

However, instead of giving up, I started doing balance training to recover from the injury and finally I won the championship I attended. Based on my experience, in order to spread the balance training out further, I created FAVE.

Through our Indiegogo campaign, I hope everybody will be healthy and have so much fun while exercising with FAVE.”

 

 

 

Strong friends (INC) are starting to get rid of why they can't exercise for everyone in the world. Starting with Balance Training, Strong friends will create a sports platform that anyone can learn from professionals around the world.
And that's the beginning of "Smart Balance Trainer, FAVE." We're the tech company, and we're the global fitness platform company where people all over the world change their lives.

 

Since the FAVE creation, there have been many technological challenges, both in terms of hardware and software. Being a hardware company, we know that a non-perfectly functional product can damage the company permanently. We also understand that software development is crucial both for treating and presenting efficiently the massive amount of data gathered, as well as providing pleasant user experience. Even if we waited as long as possible before revealing our prototype to the public, we received a lot of attention from many people in the health-care industry. So flattered! Our focus is now to complete this campaign well and ship you our FAVE! We are beyond excited to bring you a product that will make you proud and healthy!! Thank you. TEAM FAVE.​
